[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/dkon brtseT ca pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D64}]@##/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu pa ste glog thob kyis zhus pa/_bam po dang po/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bi d+yuta 
[\[1b.2\]]prAp+ta pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa glog thob kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di 
[\[1b.3\]]skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum tshogs shing seng ge'i 
[\[1b.4\]]sgra sgrogs pa stong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de dag thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med par gyur pa/_mi skye ba'i 
[\[1b.5\]]chos la bzod pa mngon sum du byas pa/_phyir mi ldog pa la gnas pa/_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa/_sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa sha stag la 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]@#/_/'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu mtho gsal dang /_byang chub 
[\[2a.2\]]sems dpa' rnam par snang byed dang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i yon tan 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi rkyen dang ldan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' smon 
[\[2a.3\]]lam dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dga' sred dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo mos pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par 
[\[2a.4\]]rgyal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i spobs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i nga ro dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[2a.5\]]sad byed dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa sgyur ba la mkhas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i spyod pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni gtso bor gyur to/_/gzhan yang brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_
[\[2a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang /_mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor tshad med pa rnams dang yang thabs cig 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]tu bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ces bya bas 'khor mang po rab tu zhi zhing yongs su dag pa dag 'dus par gyur pa mthong ba dang stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[2b.2\]]ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tshom cung zad cig mchis te deng zhu bar 'tshal na/_de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rjes gsan cing gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[2b.3\]]dpa' glog thob la bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod la skabs phyes/_khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang khyod la yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' glog 
[\[2b.4\]]thob kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos ji lta bu zhig dang ldan par gyur na sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing skyon rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dbang po dang rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du thabs 
[\[2b.5\]]mkhas pas sems can de dag drangs te lus zhig pa'i 'og tu ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing gdon mi 'tshal bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten na gnas kyang pad ma bzhin skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings las ma 
[\[2b.6\]]g.yos par yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu rgyu zhing rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par thar pa gsum la rab tu gnas kyang snyoms par mi 'jug par sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa yongs 
[\[2b.7\]]su sbyangs nas skad cig ma gcig la myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog thob kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de zhu ba zhus pa/_bla 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]na ma mchis mi yi gtso/_/mkhyen dang gzigs pa tshad ma mchis/_/ma 'dres chos la bzhugs nas ni/_/'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad/_/sems can kun la snyoms par gzigs/_/'jig rten kun gyi mgon skyabs mdzad/_/log dang yang 
[\[3a.2\]]dag lam bstan nas/_/mthar thug bde la 'god par mdzad/_/yon tan mchog ni rab bsags pas/_/rin chen sna tshogs phung po 'dra/_/'jig rten shes rab nyi ma khyod/_/khams gsum mchod 'os gtso bo lags/_/theg pa chen po bkas bshad nas/_/byang chub lam ni 
[\[3a.3\]]rdzogs par mdzod/_/zhal mtshan zla ba nya ba 'dra/_/zhi gnas dag ni phun sum tshogs/_/nyer zhi chos ni rab bstan nas/_/nyon mongs rnams ni zhi bar mdzad/_/byang chub spyod pa bkas bshad nas/_/sems can rnams la phan mdzad gsol/_/sangs rgyas zhing dang sku tshe dang /_/
[\[3a.4\]]gzugs sku dang ni 'khor rnams dang /_/phrin las gsum dang chos rnams kyang /_/thams cad kun ni rnam par dag_/bcom ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/rnam dag spyod pa bkas bshad gsol/_/ji ltar bdud ni gdul bar bgyi/_/ji ltar chos ni bstan par bgyi/_/ji ltar 
[\[3a.5\]]dran pa nyams mi 'gyur/_/khyod kyi bkas ni bshad du gsol/_/ji ltar dpa' bo dag gis ni/_/'khor ba kun du zhugs gyur kyang /_/mtshan nyid gcig la gnas bgyid cing /_/chos la rtag tu g.yo mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams la ni/_/bstan cing mchod pa bgyis 
[\[3a.6\]]nas ni/_/rtag par sangs rgyas sku bltas kyang /_/mthar ni mtshan ma spong 'gyur lags/_/rnam thar gsum po mngon bgyis kyang /_/mkha' la bya ni 'phur ba bzhin/_/yon tan phun tshogs ma gyur par/_/nam yang mya ngan mi 'da' lags/_/dbang po rang bzhin yongs rtogs 
[\[3a.7\]]nas/_/'jigs pa ma mchis rjes 'brang zhing /_/mngon par zhen pa ma mchis bar/_/sems can de dag smin bgyid lags/_/sngar ni 'jig rten bde btang nas/_/slad kyis dang ba'i sems bskyed de/_/ye shes gya nom phun tshogs pas/_/bla med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]'di 'dra'i zab mo gya nom don/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bkas bshad gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glog thob la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can tshad med pa rnams la phan zhing bde bar bya ba dang /_da ltar 
[\[3b.2\]]gyi lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu zhus pa legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir glog thob shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang khyod la yang dag par bstan par 
[\[3b.3\]]bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' glog thob kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gter chen po dang /_zad mi shes pa'i gter dang /_
[\[3b.4\]]kun du zad mi shes pa'i gter dang /_mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i gter phun sum tshogs par gyur pas rgud pa rnams gtan du spong zhing gong du bstan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed la 
[\[3b.5\]]tshegs chung ngus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod chags spyod pa'i gter dang /_zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter dang /_gti mug spyod pa'i gter dang /_cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter dang /_chos thams cad 
[\[3b.6\]]kyi gter gang yin pa'o/_/glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'thun zhing phyin ci log gis bcings pas mtshan ma rnams kyi 
[\[3b.7\]]rjes su gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos la sogs pa'i yul dag la rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par brtags nas brtan pa nyid du mngon par zhen pa dang /_bde ba la chags shing myos par gyur pa yin la/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can de dag 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]gi sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas sems can de dag gang la mos shing 'dun pa dang /_spyod yul gang la chags shing goms pas mthu can du gyur pa dang /_dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan zhing phun sum 
[\[4a.2\]]tshogs par gyur pa dang /_sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu bskyed pa dang /_theg pa gang la gzhol bar byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed yod pa dag nam zhig na yongs su smin par gyur pa yang rab tu shes te/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can de dag gi 'dod pa thams 
[\[4a.3\]]cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir dang /_de dag gi dge ba'i sems rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir shin tu legs par brtags nas yongs su gso bar byed de/_glog thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang /_spyod pa'i bye brag ni shin tu shes par dka' bar rig par bya ste/_
[\[4a.4\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rig par mi nus na so so'i skye bo dang /_mu stegs can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_glog thob sems can kha cig ni 'dod pa rnams la mngon par zhen par gyur kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 
[\[4a.5\]]smin par byed pa yang yod do/_/sems can kha cig ni 'dod pa'i yul la reg pa tsam 'am/_'dod pa'i sems kyis tshig smras pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa yang yod do/_/sems can kha cig ni gzugs sdug gu dag mthong 
[\[4a.6\]]nas 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa las gzugs de rnam par 'gyur zhing zhig par mthong ba nyid kyis gzugs mi rtag par khong du chud par gyur nas 'dod pa'i gdung ba nye bar zhi ste/_mi rtag pa nyid shin tu yid la byed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 
[\[4a.7\]]smin par byed pa yang yod do/_/sems can kha cig ni bud med mthong ba na mngon par zhen pa skyes ba med kyang phyis yid la dran pa'i dbang gis 'dod chags kyi sems skyes nas de'i kha dog dang dbyibs yid la byas nas rjes su chags pa skye bar 'gyur ba yang yod do/_/sems can kha 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]cig ni rmi lam na gzugs yid du 'ong ba rnams mthong ba'i dbang gis 'dod chags kyi mngon par zhen pa skyes nas yid la byed cing yongs su gnyer bar byed pa yang yod do/_/sems can kha cig ni bud med kyi sgra thos pa tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi sred pa skyed par byed la/_res 
[\[4b.2\]]'ga' ni mthong ba tsam gyis 'dod chags kyi sems dang bral nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa yang yod pas/_de'i phyir glog thob byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa dang /_'dod chags kyi 
[\[4b.3\]]sman rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag thabs mkhas pas legs par khong du chud kyang chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma yang med la/_chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag la yang snying rje chen po skyed par byed do/_/glog thob 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[4b.4\]]gti mug ces bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i chos cung zad tsam yang dmigs su med pas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis mthong ba ltar na sems can rnams ni mtshan ma med pa/_rang bzhin gyis stong zhing dben pa/_btags pa tsam du 
[\[4b.5\]]rnam par gzhag pa tshogs shing 'dus pa'i chos 'di la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug skyed par byed pas bdag gis 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas 'dod chags kyis rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du snying rje chen po la 
[\[4b.6\]]gnas nas sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos par rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par bya'o snyam du sems so/_/skyes pa gang zhig bud med dag la yang dag pa ma yin pas sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas 'dod chags lci ba 
[\[4b.7\]]skyes par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpas bud med shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa/_gzugs kyi mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa/_rin po che'i rgyan phreng dang ldan pa/_rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pas lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar gyur pa sngon ma mthong ba dag tu bsgyur nas 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]sems can de dag gis ji ltar sred cing rjes su chags pa dang /_shin tu mngon par zhen par gyur pa ston par byed de/_de dag gi nus pa dang sbyar nas thabs kyis 'dod chags kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i ched du rang dbang du gyur pa'i mthus bud med kyi gzugs 
[\[5a.2\]]su bsgyur nas de'i mdun du snang bar byas nas chos bstan pa nyid kyis sems can de dag chos kyi dbyings rtogs par byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang zhig skyes pa dag la 'dod chags kyi sems skyes par gyur na byang chub sems dpas skyes pa'i lus bstan nas 'dod 
[\[5a.3\]]chags kyi dug mda' dbyung ba'i ched du chos bstan pa nyid kyis chos kyi dbyings la zhugs par byas nas mi snang bar byed do/_/glog thob 'dod chags kyi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang /_spyod pa gzhan de dag kyang gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub 
[\[5a.4\]]sems dpas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi sgo mo bye ba stong phrag tshad med pa bskyed de/_sems can rnams kyi sems khong du chud par byas nas thams cad rnam par grol bar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can dag la 'di lta bu'i chos bstan to snyam du sems pa yang med la/_
[\[5a.5\]]sems can rnam par grol bar gyur pa yang mi dmigs so/_/glog thob 'di lta ste dper na mtsho ma dros pa'i klu'i rgyal po ni las kyi mthu'i dbang gis de'i pho brang gi nang nas chu klung chen po bzhi byung nas sems can chu dang skam la gnas pa dag dbyar tsha ba'i dus kyi tshe bsil ba dang /_
[\[5a.6\]]rlan gyis me tog dang /_'bras bu dag rgyas shing 'bru rnams 'phel bar gyur nas sems can mang po shin tu bde bar byed kyang /_klu'i rgyal po de bdag gis chu bo 'di dag phyung ngo /_/dbyung bar bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/_'on kyang chu klung bzhi po dag rtag tu 'bab cing sems can 
[\[5a.7\]]rnams nye bar spyod par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'i dbang gis rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan nas 'khor ba'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad bsal te lha dang mi rnams la 'phags 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]pa'i rnam par grol ba'i bde ba sbyin par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' de bdag gis chos bstan to/_/bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/_'on kyang rang gi ngang gis snying rje chen po'i bsam pa la gnas nas sems can rnams la so sor brtags te ci rigs par chos ston 
[\[5b.2\]]par byed do/_/gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste dper na brgya byin lha'i dbang po la lha'i bu mo khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod pa de dag brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i rang dbang gi mthu'i dbang gis lus mang po bstan nas lha'i bu mo de dag de dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i bde ba yongs su 
[\[5b.3\]]rdzogs par myong bas de dag so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu ni/_deng lha'i dbang po dang lhan cig rtses so snyam du sems kyang yang dag par lha'i dbang po de la mngon par zhen par gyur pa ci yang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du sems can gang yongs su 
[\[5b.4\]]bzla ba'i 'os su gyur pa de dag gi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par byed kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do/_/gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ri mthon po'i rtse mo la shar ba'i tshe 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[5b.5\]]kun du snang bar byed pas gang du snang bar byas pa'i gnas de dag tu kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston par byed kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de ni kha dog gcig pa/_'od gcig pa nyid de tha dad pa'i mtshan ma med do/_/byang chub sems 
[\[5b.6\]]dpa' yang de bzhin du shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings snang bar byas nas sems can gyi mngon par zhen pa'i ri'i rtse mo de dag tu shar ba na dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur cing de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang /_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[5b.7\]]la gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med de/_glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags kyi spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par sems can 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa bstan nas tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med do/_/gzhan yang glog thob 'di lta ste dper na gser yang dag pa ni mgar ba'i 
[\[6a.2\]]thabs mkhas pa'i mthu'i dbang gis mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs su byas te mtshan nyid tha dad par gyur kyang gser gyi rang bzhin la ni tha dad du gyur pa ci yang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par brtags nas 
[\[6a.3\]]sems can mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du lus tshad med pa dag bstan nas tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la ni gnyis su gyur pa'i mtshan nyid med de/_'di ni rtag par chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas mtshan nyid gcig tu gyur pa zhes 
[\[6a.4\]]bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di lta bu thob par gyur na sems can gyi ched du rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas chos ston par byed pas de dag gis chos thos pa'i dbang gis 'phags pa'i nor phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan par gyur pas 'khor ba'i rgud pa 
[\[6a.5\]]dag gtan du yongs su spong bar byed do/_/gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams ni nga rgyal dang mtshungs par ldan pa/_bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang 
[\[6a.6\]]bcas pa/_bdag dang bdag gi mtshan ma la gnas pas yun ring po nas byams pa dang /_bzod pa ma bsgoms pa/_zhe sdang gi gdung bas rang gi sems bshig par gyur pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran par ma gyur pa/_zhe sdang gi gdug pas 
[\[6a.7\]]g.yogs pas chos nyid la rmongs par gyur pa yin yang byang chub sems dpa' ni zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la nam yang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba skyed par mi byed kyi/_'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di dag ni gti mug gis rmongs pas chos rnams gzod ma nyid nas 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]rab tu dben zhing zhi ba/_dri ma dang rnyog pa med pa/_'dum pa med pa/_rtsod pa med pa/_rab tu dben pa'i chos nyid la phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan par gyur pa'i dbang gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i zhe sdang dang /_'khon du 'dzin pa rgyas par gyur to snyam du sems pa kho nar 
[\[6b.2\]]zad do/_/de snyam du bsams nas kyang snying rje chen po la gnas te rtag par bdag nyid 'gyod cing bshags par yang byed la/_gal te lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa zhig yod na yang zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can de dag 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir bzod pa la rab tu 
[\[6b.3\]]gnas par byed do/_/gal te zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can tshad med pa de dag phan tshun gcig la gcig rgyab kyis phyogs shing zhe sdang dang /_'khon du 'dzin pa'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang gis sbrul gdug pa ngan 'gro'i lus su ltung bar gyur pa dag la ni byang chub sems 
[\[6b.4\]]dpa' bzod pa la rab tu gnas pa des 'di ltar byams pa dang /_dran pa'i stobs kyis sems can de dag btul nas ngan 'gro'i rnam par smin pa len par mi 'gyur zhing /_gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas 
[\[6b.5\]]pas sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa yongs su bsal bar byed pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te sems can zhe sdang can dag mthong bar gyur na/_'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa yin na/_kye ma sems can 
[\[6b.6\]]'di dag ni zhe sdang gi rjes su 'brangs nas yang dag pa ma yin pas rnam par rtog pa bskyed nas mnyam zhing rtsod pa med pa'i chos nyid 'di la zhe sdang gi bsam pa bskyed pas sems can 'di dag chos kyi dbyings nyid ma rtogs par gyur to/_/gal te sems can 'di dag chos nyid 
[\[6b.7\]]mthong bar gyur na ni gzhan dag la gnod sems bskyed par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ma rtogs pas de'i phyir zhe sdang skyes par gyur to zhes byang chub sems dpa' des zhe sdang mang ba'i sems can de dag la lhag par snying brtse ba bskyed nas snying rje chen 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]po la gnas te/_sngon gyi smon lam yang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/_rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis sems can gyi zhe sdang gi spyod pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir chos kyi sgo mo rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par byed kyang bdag gis sems can gyi zhe 
[\[7a.2\]]sdang bsal ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du mi sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpas chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid la gnas nas nyon mongs 
[\[7a.3\]]pa'i spyod pa rab tu bsal ba zhes bya'o/_/glog thob 'di lta ste/_dper na mun pa bsal nas snang ba 'thob par 'gyur yang mun pa sel bar byed pa med de/_'di ltar mun pa dang snang ba'i ngo bo nyid nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing dbyer med pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[7a.4\]]sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i ye shes de la brten nas thabs mkhas pas chos bstan te/_zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul zhing zhi bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la tha dad du gyur pa med do/_/glog thob 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[7a.5\]]'khor shar nas 'od kyis gang dang gang du snang bar byas pa de dag thams cad ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis bsdus pa yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zhe sdang gi spyod pa gdul zhing bsal ba'i phyir ji tsam du tshig tu brjod pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo yin yang 
[\[7a.6\]]chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa med do/_/'di ltar zhe sdang gi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang /_spyod pa gzhan gtogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes yongs su grub pas sems can de dag gi zhe sdang gi spyod pa 
[\[7a.7\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su chos ston par byed kyang bdag gis sems can la chos bstan to/_/ston to/_/ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med do/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]gter 'di thob par gyur na bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par sems can gyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su tshig 'bru dang /_yi ge dang /_brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang zhe sdang spyod pa'i mtha' rnyed par mi 'gyur la/_byang chub 
[\[7b.2\]]sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang /_spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i zhe sdang spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[7b.3\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/_glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di ni shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po yin te/_'di ltar sems can rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/_gzhan la gnod pa byed pa/_ma rig 
[\[7b.4\]]pa'i mngal gyi sgo ngas kun tu dkris pa/_dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid bcings pas chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i thabs med pa/_bya ba dag la legs par so sor mi rtog pa bdag tu lta ba la mngon par zhen pa/_lam log par zhugs pa/_byis pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa/_
[\[7b.5\]]nges par 'byung ba dka' ba yin pas 'di lta bu la sogs pas rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can dag gi ched du dang po sems bskyed pa nas sbyor ba chen po bskyed de/_ngal zhing sdug bsngal ba yang med/_le lo yang med par rkyen gang dang /_mos pa gang dang /_chos bstan pa ji lta 
[\[7b.6\]]bu zhig gis sems can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la btsud de rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' sngon chos kyi dbyings legs par so sor brtags par rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis snying rje chen po la gnas te/_sems can 
[\[7b.7\]]de dag chos kyi dbyings la rmongs par gyur par rig nas ci nus ci lcogs kyis chos bstan nas rab tu dul bar byed kyang bdag gis chos bstan to/_/ston to/_/ston par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa med de/_'on kyang de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba legs 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]par so sor brtags nas rang gi ngang gis chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan te/_sems can de dag gi ma rig pa'i las kyi 'du byed bsal nas rnam par grol ba 'thob par byed do/_/glog thob 'di lta ste dper na sman pa bzang po nad mang po gso ba la mkhas pa/_
[\[8a.2\]]sngar sman dpyad rnams la shin tu goms par gyur pa ni nad kyi mtshan ma mthong ma thag tu sngags dang sman btang ba thams cad rab tu rtogs par gyur pas des gsos pa gang yang mi sos pa med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu legs par 
[\[8a.3\]]rtogs pas rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis gti mug gi spyod pa bsags pa'i sems can de dag gi dbang po dang /_rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma bstan nas thams cad rab tu gsal bar rtogs par byed de/_glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[8a.4\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas gti mug spyod pa'i sems can de dag gi ched du bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag 
[\[8a.5\]]par de dag gi rang bzhin dang /_'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshig 'bru dang /_yi ge dang /_brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang gti mug spyod pa'i mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa yang gtugs 
[\[8a.6\]]par mi 'gyur te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/_/'di ltar gti mug gi spyod pa nyi khri chig stong dang /_spyod pa gzhan gtogs par brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag byang chub 
[\[8a.7\]]sems dpas yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma rab tu phye nas yang dag par ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i gti mug spyod pa'i gter ces bya'o/_/gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter zhes bya 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]ba ji lta bu yin zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag cing yongs su gsal ba dri ma med pa lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhag na gzugs brnyan rnams der snang zhing 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de bdag gis gzugs brnyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'di 
[\[8b.2\]]dag ston par byed do zhes mi sems mod kyi/_'on kyang me long gi dkyil 'khor de shin tu legs par byi dor byas na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa thams cad rang gi ngang gis rab tu snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings kyi me long gi dkyil 'khor shin 
[\[8b.3\]]tu legs par byi dor byas pas rtsol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi sgo mo brgya stong du ma rnam par phye ste bstan nas de dag thams cad rab tu rtogs shing rnam par grol ba thob par byas kyang chos kyi mtshan ma dang 
[\[8b.4\]]sems can gyi mtshan ma skyed par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' des chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid shin tu legs par rtogs pa'i phyir dang /_spyod pa bzhi po 'di dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[8b.5\]]rtogs pas de dag gi dbang po dang /_rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings dang /_sems can gyi khams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog par byed pas gnyis su 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid kyang med de/_chos kyi dbyings dang /_sems can gyi khams 
[\[8b.6\]]ji snyed pa de dag gnyis su med cing tha dad pa med par gsal bar mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/glog thob 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma yang med la rnam par gzhag pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi dbyings shin 
[\[8b.7\]]tu legs par so sor brtags nas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu 'jug par rtogs pa dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la ni tha dad du gyur pa med do/_/glog thob cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]'di la nyi khri chig stong yod pa dang /_spyod pa gzhan gtogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gyur pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpas so sor brtags nas thams cad gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na sman pa mkhas pa nad dang sman gtong ba rab tu 
[\[9a.2\]]shes pa bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis chos rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi cha mnyam pa spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na sems can rnams kyi ched 
[\[9a.3\]]du bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par de dag mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang spyod pa de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab dang spobs pa yang gtugs par mi 'gyur te/_
[\[9a.4\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid legs par bshad pas thob pa'i cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa'i gter zhes bya'o//_//bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_gzhan yang glog thob byang chub sems dpa' des de lta bu'i ye shes yongs su 
[\[9a.5\]]rdzogs par gyur pas sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang /_spyod pa dang /_bsam pa yang thabs mkhas pas rab tu rtogs pas gal te 'dod chags mang ba'i sems can mthong bar gyur na/_de dag rab tu gdul zhing de dag gi nad gso ba'i phyir so so'i skye bo dang 'thun par 'dod pa rnams la 
[\[9a.6\]]yongs su spyod pa dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_khyim gyi so chis phun sum tshogs pa ston par byed kyang pad ma bzhin du des gos zhing mngon par zhen par gyur pa med do/_/sems can gang gti mug cing blo dang mi ldan pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa mi shes pas 'di 
[\[9a.7\]]snyam du blo dang ldan pa su zhig so so'i skye bo dang tha mi dad par 'dod pa rnams nyams su len par byed ces byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di ni byang chub spangs pa yin no snyam du sems par byed do/_/sems can de lta bu de dag ni sems yongs su mi gtsang ba'i phyir zhe sdang chen po skyes nas gus 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]par mi 'gyur bas las de'i dbang gis lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar gyur kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' shin tu gsang bas gdul ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam pa yongs su zad nas gdon mi za bar mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa la rab tu 'god 
[\[9b.2\]]par byed do/_/glog thob 'di lta ste dper na me rab tu 'bar ba ni rtswa dang shing dang phrad par gyur pa na thams cad rab tu 'bar zhing me'i phung po nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ye shes kyi me 'bar bar gyur pa na sems can rnams kyi 'dod 
[\[9b.3\]]chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig 'grogs shing thams cad rab tu 'bar nas shes rab nyid du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos zhes bya'o//
[\[9b.4\]]gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste/_rin po che sna bzhi las mngon par grub pa yin te/_sems can rnams kyang de'i rjes su kha dog sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mtshan 
[\[9b.5\]]nyid du gyur par byed de/_gal te bai DUr+ya'i ngos su phyin na ni thams cad kyang bai DUr+ya'i kha dog gcig pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed do/_/gser gyi kha dog gi ngos su phyin na ni thams cad gser gyi kha dog nyid du 'gyur bar byed do/_/dngul dang /_chu shel gyi kha dog tu 'gyur ba yang de 
[\[9b.6\]]bzhin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang ma 'dres pa'i chos thob pas sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba ji snyed pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i thad du phyin cing lhan cig 'grogs par gyur na thams 
[\[9b.7\]]cad byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes la 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed kyang /_de'i sems mi gtsang zhing rang gi sdig pa'i las kyi dbang gis sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung bar gyur pas 'di ltar byang chub sems 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i yon tan dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis kha na ma tho ba'i rnam par smin pa zad pa'i 'og tu gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba la 'god par byed do/_/glog thob sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad 
[\[10a.2\]]med/_dpag tu med/_grangs med pa na snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_
[\[10a.3\]]lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i phung po yon tan gyi sgra zhes bya ba byung ste/_de'i tshe skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya nyi shu tham par gyur te/_da ltar nga ji lta ba bzhin no/_/de'i tshe sems can rnams 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[10a.4\]]gti mug shin tu che ste/_nyon mongs pa rnams kyis zil gyis non pas pha ma dang /_phu nu dang /_grogs po'i yid dang 'gal bar byed pa/_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyi rjes su mi 'brang ba/_byas pa drin du mi gzo ba/_rtag par gnod sems dang bcas pa/_g.yo sgyu dang 
[\[10a.5\]]rkun bu'i sems dang ldan pa/_phan tshun gcig la gcig gnod pa byed pa/_tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/_ser snas zil gyis non pas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi chos spyod pa'i sems can de lta bu sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas 
[\[10a.6\]]par gyur pas ni shin tu gdul dka' bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus dus ngan pa de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de la nyan thos chen po'i tshogs ni nyi khri 
[\[10a.7\]]nyis stong mnga' bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgya cher byin pa zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems shin tu dang bar gyur pa zhig yod pa des de bzhin gshegs pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par dbyar 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]zla ba gsum spyan drangs te mchod pa rgya cher bshams nas mchod cing rim gro byas so/_/de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/_chos ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pas 'khor mang po rnams nyan par spro ba/_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 
[\[10b.2\]]la rtag par ngal ba med pa/_re ba med par chos ston pa/_mdog gsal zhing gsong por smra ba/_gzugs dang stobs phun sum tshogs pa/_byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa/_sems can rnams kyis mthong bar mos shing rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bla mar byed cing 
[\[10b.3\]]bsngags pa brjod pa zhig yod de/_dge slong gsar bu dag kyang rtag par dri ma med pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la thogs pa med par gyur pas gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman rnam pa 
[\[10b.4\]]sna tshogs kyis kyang rim gro byas par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po de las dge slong phal cher lus kyi sdom pa dang /_sems kyi shes rab bsgom pa mi shes pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la gus pa med pa/_rtag par lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_
[\[10b.5\]]bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la skur ba 'debs pa/_rnam par g.yeng zhing gdul dka' ba/_dbang po rnams mi sdom pa/_chos bzhin ma yin pa la gnas pa/_dge sbyong gi tshul med par bdag nyid dge sbyong du khas 'che ba/_lus dang ngag dang yid 
[\[10b.6\]]kyi las thams cad log par zhugs pa sha stag gnas par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de dbyar 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_rgyal po rgya cher byin pas tsan dan dmar pos sku zhugs la bzhen nas mchod pa byas te ring bsrel gyi mchod rten ngos bzhi kun tu 
[\[10b.7\]]tsan dan dmar po'i mu khyud kyis bskor ba/_pad ma gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu brtsigs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong dri ma med pa ni bcom ldan 'das des mang du thos pa'i mchog tu lung bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]dam pa'i chos rgya cher spel te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal gang dang gang du song ba der sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed yongs su btul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod par gyur to/_/de'i tshe dge slong sdig can mang po 
[\[11a.2\]]rnams rnal 'byor khong du ma chud pa/_rtag par phrag dog dang bcas pa/_bdud kyis bslus pa rnams rgyal po de ga la ba der dong ste 'di skad du rgyal pos bkur ba'i dge slong dri ma med pa ni rgyal po'i pho brang du 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thags thogs ma mchis te/_dge slong 'di 
[\[11a.3\]]'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma lags la/_dus ma lags par yang zas 'tshal te/_spos dang phreng ba dag gis kyang lus brgyan par bgyid pas yang dag par tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pas mchod pa mdzad pa'i mi rigs so/_/bdag cag ni don 'di'i slad du 'dir 
[\[11a.4\]]mchis nas rgyal po la gsol ba lags kyis/_slad kyis 'gyod par yang ma mdzad cig_/sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i bstan pa la thugs mi ches pa yang mi bskyed du gsol zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe bdud sdig can zhes bya ba zhig kyang bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su bsgyur nas rgyal 
[\[11a.5\]]po de ga la ba der song ste snga ma bzhin du smras so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin pas yang dang yang du de skad smras pa thos kyang 'di snyam du dge slong dri ma med pa ni rab tu brtson zhing blo dang ldan pas bdag gis bla mar bkur ba yin te/_dngos po 'di lta bu byed pa ni gnas med do snyam mo/_/
[\[11a.6\]]de nas de'i tshe bdud kyi 'khor rnams par snang las lus phyed bstan nas rgyal po de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rgyal po bzo yi sgyu rtsal slobs/_/dus tshod dag la mkhas par gyis/_/rgyal pos de ni ma shes na/_/mi rgyal rtags dang ldan ma yin/_/sangs rgyas nyan thos 
[\[11a.7\]]dgra bcom pa/_/ye shes chen po ldan pa yi/_/tshig dag la ni mi rten par/_/ci yi phyir na chad par lta/_/dge slong rnams ni phan gdags phyir/_/khyod la bden tshig smra ba yin/_/chad smra ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i mi/_/yang dag tshangs spyod ma yin pas/_/de ni rgyal po'i pho 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]brang du/_/btsun mo dag dang lhan cig rtse/_/rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa yis/_/legs par rtogs la the tshom sol/_/rgyal pos dngos po 'di thos pas/_/sems la skrag cing mya ngan skyes/_/'khor rnams dang ni lhan cig tu/_/myur zhing rings par pho brang dong /_/
[\[11b.2\]]de tshe dri med pho brang nang /_/chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa dang /_/bdag dang sems can med pa yi/_/dam pa'i don ni ston par byed/_/rgyal po dmag 'khor bcas pa rnams/_/thams cad bdud kyis bslus pas na/_/pho brang nang gi btsun mo rnams/_/dge slong yongs 
[\[11b.3\]]bskor mthong ba dang /_/zhe sdang glang chen myos 'dra bas/_/gshed ma dag la rab bsgo ba/_/dge slong nga yi btsun mo bslus/_/sdug bsngal chos kyi chad pas chod/_/blon po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/_/thams cad bdud kyis zin pas na/_/dge slong nyes pa med pa la/_/
[\[11b.4\]]sems kyis gnod pa bya bar bsams/_/gshed ma mtshon thogs 'ongs pa dang /_/dri med snying brtse mchi ma byung /_/rgyal pos khyod ni chos min na/_/ci yi phyir na mchi ma byung /_/dri med rgyal po la smras pa/_/dngos po 'di ni yid ches dka'/_/re shig skad cig sdod cig 
[\[11b.5\]]dang /_/bdag bsad pa yi long yod do/_/rgyal pos dge slong tshig thos nas/_/gshed ma dag la sdod cig bsgo/_/bden pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod/_/khyod kyis myur du smra ba'i rigs/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ldan gyur cing /_/snying rjes 'jig rten phan 'dogs pas/_/
[\[11b.6\]]sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te/_/bden pa'i tshig ni 'di skad smras/_/rgyal po chen pos mkhyen par mdzod/_/gal te yang dag nyes med na/_/sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_/mkha' las me tog char phob shig_/de skad tshig ni smras ma thag_/sa chen rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_/
[\[11b.7\]]mkha' las lha yi me tog bab/_/bdud 'khor mya ngan skyes par gyur/_/de tshe rgyal po dang ba skyes/_/rkang la phyag byas bzod pa gsol/_/bdag ni dmyal bar ltung 'gyur na/_/mgon med bdag la skyabs mdzod cig_/kyi hud sdig pa'i grogs phrad pas/_/gdug pa'i sems 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]ni skyes par gyur/_/sdig pa'i grogs po rjes 'brangs pas/_/mgon dang skyabs byed su yang med/_/ston pa chen po ma gtogs par/_/phyogs bcur bdag gi mgon byed med/_/bdag gis rgyal srid spangs nas ni/_/nam 'tsho'i bar du skyabs su 
[\[12a.2\]]mchis/_/dge slong des ni rgyal po dang /_/g.yog 'khor bsam pa rig gyur nas/_/dam pa'i don ni rab tu bshad/_/rgyal pos thos nas dang ba thob/_/'khor ni bye ba brgya stong dang /_/rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung /_/sbyangs pa'i sdom pa blangs pas na/_/gzhan 
[\[12a.3\]]gyis 'gron gnyer yong mi len/_/de tshe rgyal po'i pho brang nang /_/btsun mo 'khor bcas brgyad khri rnams/_/dam pa'i don ni thos pas na/_/phyir mi ldog la gnas par gyur/_/rgyal pos sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin/_/lo ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bar/_/nyin mtshan rtag par 
[\[12a.4\]]sdig bshags kyang /_/'on kyang sdig pa'i las ma zad/_/lo ni bye mang sdug bsngal myong /_/sdig zad de bzhin gshegs dang phrad/_/sngon ni skrag par byas pa'i rgyus/_/rnam smin lhag ma rtag par dman/_/mthar gyis rnal 'byor rab bsgoms te/_/sangs rgyas bye ba 
[\[12a.5\]]stong mchod nas/_/so sor zhing khams gzhan dag tu/_/thams cad mngon par rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/thams cad kun kyang mtshan 'thun par/_/yon tan grags pa zhes byar gyur/_/de tshe rgyal po rgya cher byin/_/dge sbyong byams bzod de la ni/_/gdug pa'i sems ni 
[\[12a.6\]]bskyed pas na/_/lo ni bye ba mang por yang /_/sngon gyi sdig las mngon gyur pas/_/ngu 'bod chen por lhung bar gyur/_/rnam smin de ni zad nas kyang /_/slar yang mi lus thob gyur te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun spyan phrad/_/rtag tu bsnyen bkur rim gro byas/_/gzhan 
[\[12a.7\]]yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag_/brgyad cu dag la rim gro byas/_/de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas pa/_/de ni nga bdag nyid yin no/_/chos smra nyes pa med pa la/_/gnod pa byas pa'i dge slong ni/_/ma 'ongs mngon par 'tshang rgya ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yin/_/
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]de tshe rgyal po pho brang nang /_/btsun mo'i 'khor ni brgyad khri rnams/_/shin tu dang bas dge rtsa bskyed/_/sangs rgyas tshad med rim gro byas/_/de ltar spyod pa rab bskyed nas/_/sems can phan gdags smon lam btab/_/sangs rgyas bye ba stong mchod nas/_/so sor 
[\[12b.2\]]mngon par 'tshang rgya yang /_/ngas deng khyod la bsgo ba ni/_/thams cad gnod sems ma skyed cig_/gang zhig byams bsgoms sangs rgyas bsngags/_/myur du byang chub chen po 'thob/_/de lta bas na glog thob sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang /_rang bzhin dang /_bsam 
[\[12b.3\]]pa dag la mi mkhas ba dag gis dus thams cad du gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/glog thob 'di lta ste dper na ri rnams kyi nang na ri rab mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog dang gtso bo dang /_bla na med par 
[\[12b.4\]]gyur pa yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na chu bo thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na mchog tu zab cing rgya che bar gyur pa yin no/_/gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po rnams kyi nang na 'khor los 
[\[12b.5\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchog dang /_gtso bo dang /_bla mar gyur pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang ye shes rnams kyi nang na gong na med par gyur pa yin no/_/glog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags 
[\[12b.6\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug spyod pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug cing 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen cing se gol gtogs pa gcig la thams cad yongs su sdud par mdzad do/_/glog thob de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa 
[\[12b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pas 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pas rtsol ba la mi ltos par rang gi lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing the tshom med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi sems can gyi spyod pa ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]thams cad rab tu mkhyen pas 'khor mang po'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston par mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dod chags 
[\[13a.2\]]kyis yongs su gdungs nas nyin mtshan du yid la byed cing don med par dus las 'da' bar byed pa yang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so/_/'dod chags kyis gdung bas/_lus dang /_ngag gi las rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing 
[\[13a.3\]]gzigs so/_/zhe sdang spyod pa'i sems can de dag zhe sdang gi zil gyis non nas gcig la gcig zhe sdang gis phrag dog byed pa dang /_gnod pa byas pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen cing gzigs so/_/gti mug spyod pa dang 
[\[13a.4\]]mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems can rnams ma rig pa'i mun nag gis bsgribs shing rmongs pas mngon par zhen pa dang /_log par lta ba'i rjes su 'brang ba la mos par 'gyur ba dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to/_/'os su 'gyur ba dang /_'os su mi 'gyur ba dang /_'phel zhing rtsol 
[\[13a.5\]]ba dang bcas pa dang /_ldog cing nyams par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen to/_/de bzhin 
[\[13a.6\]]gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pas 'khor mang po'i nang du bzhugs nas sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag kyang rab tu mkhyen pas gal te dus la ma bab par rig par gyur na ni cang mi gsung zhing btang snyoms su bzhag nas sems can 'di dag ni chos la 
[\[13a.7\]]rmongs par gyur pas/_khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbang po dang stobs khyad par du 'phags pa phun sum tshogs shing dus rab tu mkhyen pa'i phyir gdul ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_bsam pa mchog tu gyur pa dang /_
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]bzod par nus pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang /_tshig legs par nyan par gyur pa dag kyang ngas rab tu mkhyen te/_de ltar mkhyen par gyur nas kyang sems can de dag yongs su sdud cing phan 'dogs par byed do/_/de lta bas na glog thob byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa yang 
[\[13b.2\]]dag pa'i gnas skabs su ma zhugs pa sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa legs par khong du ma chud pa dag gis khyim na gnas pa 'am/_rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/_thams cad kun la smod cing gnod sems bskyed nas yun ring por bdag nyid la gnod par 'gyur 
[\[13b.3\]]ba mi bya'o/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas theg pa chen po la gnas pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/sems can gzhan dag sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na yang gnod sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de 
[\[13b.4\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu sems can gang rnam par dkar zhing yongs su dag pa'i chos las cung zad cig nyan par gyur na nam yang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te 'dod 
[\[13b.5\]]chags spyod pa'i sems can mthong bar gyur na sems can 'di dag 'dod chags kyis gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa yang bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so/_/zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis gdung bas bsregs par gyur pa de dag mthong na yang 'di dag thams 
[\[13b.6\]]cad ni bdag gis nyes pa yin no snyam du sems so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis sems can thams cad na ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur na sman yongs su btsal te thabs mkhas pas yongs su gso ba'i rigs pa las/_bdag sngon sems can 
[\[13b.7\]]gyi nad bsal bar yi dam bcas nas deng yal bar bor ba 'di nyid bdag gi nyes pa yin no snyam du sems pas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bdag nyid kyi nyes pa la lta zhing sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems skyed par byed do/_/gal te gsod 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]pa 'am/_lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gcod cing gtub pa zhig dang phrad par gyur na yang pha rol gnod pa byed pa de dag la lan bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa med do/_/glog thob byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yang dag par sgom pa na 'das pa'i mi dge ba'i las 
[\[14a.2\]]ji snyed pa dag kyang gtan du zad cing ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur la/_ma 'ongs pa'i mi dge ba rnams ni yang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/glog thob sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi yang ches snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[14a.3\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog tu skyes pa zhes bya ba 'jig 
[\[14a.4\]]rten du byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'od zer can zhes bya ste/_rgyal po'i grong khyer rab tu bde ba zhes bya ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe shan pa 'jigs su rung ba zhes bya ba khro gtum che zhing gsod pa la dga' ba/_bzod pa dang byams pa'i sems med pa/_lag pa khrag 
[\[14a.5\]]gis bskus pa/_mthong ba thams cad skrag par 'gyur ba zhig yod de/_de'i tshe shan pa des glang zhig khang pa'i nang du bcings te nang du zhugs nas gsod par byas pa las glang des de mthong nas shin tu skrag pas thag pa bcad de bros nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa 
[\[14a.6\]]bzhugs pa'i tshal ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe shan pa de yang mtshon thogs nas phyi bzhin du bsnyags pas glang de skrag nas g.yang sa zab mo zhig tu lhung bas srog chad la thug pa tsam du na zhing sdug bsngal bas sgra phyung ngo /_/de'i tshe shan pas glang de mthong nas zhe sdang cher skyes te/_
[\[14a.7\]]g.yang sa zab mo de nyid du zhugs nas mtshon thogs te bsad par byas pa las mtshon ma btab pa'i bar skabs su/_de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pa tshal der 'khor mang po brgya stong tshad med pas yongs su bskor ba dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis 
[\[14b.2\]]sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na rten cing 
[\[14b.3\]]'brel par 'byung ba 'di dag thams cad ni sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig go zhes rgya cher rnam par phye ste ston par mdzad pas/_glog thob rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di la ma rig pa yang 'du byed la mi sems mi rtog la/_'du byed kyang ma rig pa la mi sems mi 
[\[14b.4\]]rtog go_/de bzhin du skye ba yang rga shi la mi sems mi rtog la/_rga shi yang skye ba la mi sems mi rtog pas de ltar na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dmigs su med pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa/_dran pa med pa/_bdag dang bdag gi ba med pa/_rang bzhin gyis rnam par 
[\[14b.5\]]dag pa/_phan tshun gcig gis gcig mi rig pa yin no/_/so so'i skye bo rnams 'di lta bu'i chos ma thos pa'i phyir gzugs ni bdag yin no/_/bdag ni gzugs rnams dang ldan no/_/gzugs ni bdag gi yin no zhes 'dzin par byed de/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_
[\[14b.6\]]'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa'i bar la yang de bzhin no/_/bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis mi rtag pa la rtag par 'dzin par byed/_sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'dzin par byed/_mi sdug pa la sdug pa nyid du 'dzin par byed/_bdag med pa la bdag 
[\[14b.7\]]tu 'dzin cing phyin ci log bzhi skyed par byed do/_/phyin ci log tu lta ba'i phyir ma rig pas rmongs nas yang dag par tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing sems kyi rjes su mngon par zhen par gyur pas srid pa'i sred pa 'ching ba gcod par mi nus shing 'khor ba'i 'khor bar rgyun mi 'chad par 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]'khor bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid la shin tu legs par rtog par byed pa'i phyir bdag dang /_gang zag dang /_sems can zhes bya ba nas srog ces bya ba'i bar du cung zad tsam yod par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[15a.2\]]la/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_gsod pa dang /_gnod pa byed pa dag kyang mi dmigs so zhes gsungs pa dang /_glog thob de'i tshe shan pa 'jigs su rungs pas rgyang nas de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa'i sgra thos nas go bar gyur pas de ma thag tu 
[\[15a.3\]]gsod pa'i sems nye bar zhi bar gyur nas mtshon cha spangs te g.yang sa nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das de ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[15a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de rigs so/_/dge slong legs par 'ongs sam zhes gsungs ma thag tu dge slong gi dngos por gyur nas 
[\[15a.5\]]rdzogs par bsnyen par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu skyes pas de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas mthar gyis yongs su smin par mdzad cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa 'jigs su rung bas thos pas mi skye 
[\[15a.6\]]ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to/_/glang de yang de bzhin gshegs pa des rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i gsung sgra shin tu gya nom pa thos nas sems la rab tu dga' ba skyes pas shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu dga' ldan gyi 
[\[15a.7\]]lha'i gnas su skyes nas tha mar byams pa dang phrad de yang dag pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/glog thob de ltar na sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni shin tu zab pa dang /_rnam par rig par dka' zhing shes par dka' ba yin te/_de'i phyir glog thob byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas sems can gyi dbang po dang /_spyod pa dag la shin tu mkhas par byas nas sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems dang /_thogs pa med pa'i sems la rab tu gnas te chos thams cad la rtag tu mngon 
[\[15b.2\]]par zhen pa med par bya'o/_/ci bdog pa rnams yongs su spangs te tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/bzod pa la gnas par bya'o/_/brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o/_/bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba 
[\[15b.3\]]bzhin du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la so sor brtag par bya'o/_/glog thob byang chub sems dpa' gang chos drug po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par gyur na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar yongs su rdzogs 
[\[15b.4\]]par byed ce na/_'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten nas mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/glog thob byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi gter gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpas gzugs thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 
[\[15b.5\]]rtogs shing /_gzod ma nyid nas skye ba med pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par mthong ba gang yin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni gzugs la mkhas pa thob pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don 
[\[15b.6\]]so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o/_/de la don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gzugs kyi don rnams la thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/gzugs 
[\[15b.7\]]kyi don gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_don dam pa gang yin pa'o/_/don dam pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzugs dmigs su med pa gang yin pa ste/_don dam pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/_/chos so so yang dag par 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]rig pa ni gzugs kyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/_/nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzugs rnams la 
[\[16a.2\]]thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi thabs la mkhas pas nges pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/_/spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni 'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi chos rnams sems can gyi dbang po 
[\[16a.3\]]ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye ste ston par byed kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas gzugs kyi chos la rmongs shing mngon par zhen par 
[\[16a.4\]]gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /_'dun pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes kyis ci rigs par chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings la mtshan nyid gnyis su gyur pa med de/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos kyi bar la yang de bzhin du 
[\[16a.5\]]rgyas par sbyar te/_/glog thob 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi gter zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gter 'di thob par gyur na spyod yul rnams la rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de lta bu dag yongs su gdul bar 'dod pa'i phyir 
[\[16a.6\]]de dag gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag re re la yang bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi thabs la mkhas pas chos ston par byed kyang de dag gi mtha' yang rnyed par mi 'gyur la/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i shes rab la yang 'grib pa med cing 
[\[16a.7\]]chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'gal bar gnyis su med cing dbyer med pa'i rjes su 'brang ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pas 'thob pa'i chos kyi gter zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi gter 'dis sems can 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]dag la ci rigs par chos bstan nas zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gter phun sum tshogs par gyur te/_'khor ba'i rgud pa gtan du spong ba gang yin pa 'di ni glog thob byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gter chen po dang /_zad mi shes pa'i gter dang /_kun tu zad 
[\[16b.2\]]mi shes pa'i gter dang /_mtha' med pa'i gter rnam pa lnga zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gter 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur na yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshegs chung ngus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[16b.3\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi gter bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glog thob ni gzungs rab tu thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni glog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/lha'i bu 
[\[16b.4\]]sum khri drug stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rtsol ba ma mchis pa'i ye shes zhes gang 
[\[16b.5\]]gsungs pa de'i don ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gis dge ba'i chos rnams la lus dang sems kyi rjes su 'thun pas dmigs shing mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[16b.6\]]dpa' gang lus dang sems rab tu dul bar gyur nas/_dran pa med pa/_gnas pa med pa/_rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mtshan ma dang bral bar gyur pa dang /_de sngon gyi smon lam dang /_ye shes yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams su rnam 
[\[16b.7\]]pa sna tshogs su ston par byed kyang chos kyi dbyings las g.yo ba med pa dang /_rtag tu chos ston par byed kyang chos kyi mtshan ma cung zad tsam yang med pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byas kyang sems can gang yang yongs su bzlas pa med pa 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyangs kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /_rtag par sangs rgyas rnams rjes su dran par byed kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du mi lta ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu 
[\[17a.2\]]rgyu bar byed kyang chos kyi dbyings dang mi 'bral ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes shes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas kyang gang byas pa de dag 
[\[17a.3\]]la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes 'di bstan pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/_/brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang bcas par 
[\[17a.4\]]steng gi bar snang las me tog man dA ra ba dang /_ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dang /_pun da ri ka dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par phab ste/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/_/lha'i rnga rnams kyang rang sgra byung bar gyur to/_/ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i snang ba 
[\[17a.5\]]chen pos kyang kun tu snang bar byas te/_sems can gang la reg par gyur pa de'i lus kyang shin tu bsil bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' glog thob la bka' stsal pa/_glog thob 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[17a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsungs so/_/ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe yang gnas 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na da ltar 
[\[17a.7\]]bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i phyir 'od zer chen po 'gyed par mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_/bdag gis ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam 
[\[17b.2\]]grangs 'di ni mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa zhes bya'o/_/chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes kyang bya ste/_khyod kyis de ltar ming yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' glog thob dang /_tshe 
[\[17b.3\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'khor bzhi po rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi 
[\[17b.4\]]rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mi zad pa'i gter bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste 'dus pa nyi shu pa rdzogs so//_//[{D65}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ste sgyu ma mkhan bzang 
[\[17b.5\]]po lung bstan pa/_bam po gcig pa/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya b+ha dra mA yA ka ra byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[17b.6\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par grags pa/_mngon par grags pa 
[\[17b.7\]]mngon par shes pa thob pa/_gzungs thob pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul thob pa/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa lnga stong la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge blo gros dang /_byang chub 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan bzang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha lo sgyur ba chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od dpal dang /_
[\[18a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od byed dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzi brjid dang ldan zhing nga ro snyan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gsal dang /_
[\[18a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can kha lo sgyur ba dul ba dang ldan pa dang /_byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /_'jam dpal 
[\[18a.4\]]gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang yang thabs cig go_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang yang thabs cig go_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang yang thabs 
[\[18a.5\]]cig go_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po du mas kyang yongs su bskor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la rten cing bzhugs te/_rgyal po dang /_blon po 
[\[18a.6\]]chen po rnams dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis ni gus par byas/_bla mar byas/_bsnyen bkur byas/_mchod pa byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_
[\[18a.7\]]sman zong ni brnyes/_bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang /_snyan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po ni mngon par 'phags te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa ste/_thams cad ni mkhyen/_thams cad ni gzigs/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang 
[\[18b.2\]]ni ldan/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ni ldan/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/_spyan 
[\[18b.3\]]lnga dang ni ldan/_cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/_kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so/_/bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas pa/_grong rdal dang bcas pa/_sa dang bcas 
[\[18b.4\]]pa/_'gro ba dang bcas pa/_ri rab dang bcas pa/_rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa/_lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/_khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/_rtswa dang /_shing dang rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa bas kyang lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis 'dzin 
[\[18b.5\]]par mdzad do/_/yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po zhes bya ba bstan bcos la shin tu mkhas pa/_gsang sngags la shin tu mkhas pa/_bzo dang rig pa la 'byam pa/_las kyi mtha' byas zin pa/_rab tu byed pa byas pa/_sgra grags pa/_yul 
[\[18b.6\]]ma ga d+ha na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma ji snyed pa de dag gi mchog tu grags pa/_phul du grags pa zhig gnas te/_des yul ma ga d+ha ril gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dun par byas/_rmongs par byas/_mgo 'khor bar byas nas ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/_
[\[18b.7\]]bden pa mthong ba rnams dang /_dad pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/des sgyu mas rmongs par byed pa'i rig pa'i stobs bskyed pas rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa yang lhag 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]par rnyed do/_/sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang /_snyan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa lhag par mngon par 'phags te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde 
[\[19a.2\]]bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa ste/_thams cad ni mkhyen/_thams cad ni gzigs/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[19a.3\]]bcu dang ni ldan/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ni ldan/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ni ldan/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ni ldan/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang ni ldan/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan nyams pa mi mnga' ba dang ni ldan/_
[\[19a.4\]]spyan lnga dang ni ldan/_cho 'phrul yang brnyes te/_kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni brnyes/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ni brnyes so/_/bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer dang bcas pa/_grong rdal dang bcas pa/_sa dang 
[\[19a.5\]]bcas pa/_'gro ba dang bcas pa/_ri rab dang bcas pa/_rgya mtsho'i mthas gtugs pa/_lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/_khor yug dang 'obs su bcas pa/_rtswa dang shing dang rir bcas pa 'di nam mkha' la bskal pa'am/_bskal pa bas lhag par skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la 'dzin par 
[\[19a.6\]]mdzad do zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_yul ma ga d+ha ril gyi skye bo thams cad bdag gis 'dun par byas/_rmongs par byas/_mgo 'khor bar byas nas ya mtshan gyi chos la bkod de/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag chen po gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bdag gi 
[\[19a.7\]]ming gis rab tu mgu bar gyur na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de gcig pu da dung ma bgams/_rmongs par ma byas/_mgo 'khor bar ma byas kyis ma la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]der 'gro bar bya'o/_/song nas kyang bgam par bya ste/_gal te rmongs pa'am/_mgo 'khor ba bya nus pa lta na/_de lta na yul ma ga d+ha thams cad bdag la gcig tu 'du la/_bdag gi rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti yang ches stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas yang sgyu ma 
[\[19b.2\]]mkhan bzang po sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/song nas kyang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma bye ba phrag 'bum pas 
[\[19b.3\]]lhag pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba/_zhal zla ba bye ba phrag 'bum pas lhag par dri ma med pa/_sku shing n+ya gro d+ha'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/_mdzod spu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od dag pa ltar gsal ba/_spyan pad ma dang /_ud pa la sngon po kha phye ba lta bu'i bkrag yod pa/_spyi gtsug tshangs pas kyang 
[\[19b.4\]]bltar mi mthong ba/_'khor gyi nang na gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu dang ldan pas chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de'i sku de lta bu mthong /_gsung gi phrin las de lta bu thos nas sems dang bar gyur cing de 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag gis 'di ci thams cad mkhyen 
[\[19b.5\]]la thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa zhig yin nam/_'on te ma yin pa bgam par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bgam pa'i bsam pas sang gi gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren to zhes gsol to/_/
[\[19b.6\]]'di snyam du yang sems te/_ci 'dis bdag gi sems shes sam 'on te mi shes zhig gu/_gal te shes na ni der 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ci ste mi shes na ni des na 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad/_rgyal 
[\[19b.7\]]po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo phal po che gdul ba'i dbang du yang mdzad nas mkhyen bzhin du sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/_'di bdag rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]bsam pa dang ldan pa la 'dir khas len pa dang sbyar na 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa yang ma yin la thams cad gzigs pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin no snyam nas de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad 
[\[20a.2\]]nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos ni sgyu ma'i za ma tog gis dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di la mtho 'tsham par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi 
[\[20a.3\]]bu khyod snying las chung bar gyis shig dang /_ngas yun ring po nas spyad pa bsgrubs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dir dus mkhyen pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni lta dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang tho btsam par mi nus so/_/maud gal gyi bu gzhan yang 'dod chags ni mtho 
[\[20a.4\]]'tsham par byed pa yin/_zhe sdang ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin/_gti mug ni mtho 'tsham par byed pa yin na/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bag la nyal dang bcas te zad bral yongs su gyur/_gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i chos can yin te/_des na de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang 
[\[20a.5\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang tho btsam par mi nus so/_/maud gal gyi bu gzhan yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma ni phyogs gcig pa yin pas sgyu ma yang dag pa ma yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ni yang dag pa yin te/_des na chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[20a.6\]]sangs rgyas so/_/maud gal gyi bu sems can gyi khams su gdags par 'dogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste/_sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sgyu ma 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_
[\[20a.7\]]stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_bye ba 'bum gyi char yang /_grangs su yang /_char yang /_bgrang bar yang /_dper yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]brgyan par kun tu ston nus sam/_gsol pa/_ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed brgyan cing de thams cad kyang skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam la kun tu ston par mdzad kyang /_
[\[20b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu ma ril gyis bstan par ni mi 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu phyogs bcu na rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su gcod byed ces bya ba gang dag gis stong 
[\[20b.3\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yongs su gcod par byed cing yongs su bcad nas kyang 'jig par byed pa dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu 'thor byed dang /_rnam par 'thor byed ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi bar na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor kun 
[\[20b.4\]]nas yongs su 'jog pa zhes bya ba srid pa'i rtse mo na rgyu ba gang dag yin pa dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/_ri phal pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa gang dag yin pa dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'bar byed ces 
[\[20b.5\]]bya ba sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe ldang zhing gang gis na me lce de dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'phen par byed pa dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par sgrub byed ces bya ba gang gis sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me de zhi bar byed pa dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu tshim byed ces bya ba gang gis 
[\[20b.6\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sprin gyi dra ba gcig gis kun tu khebs par byed pa dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor chus 'debs zhes bya ba gang gis na sreg pa'i bskal pa'i tshe char 'bebs par byed pa dang /_rlung gi dkyil 'khor lhag par skems zhes bya ba gang gis 
[\[20b.7\]]na chus 'jig pa de lhag par skems par byed pa yod do/_/maud gal gyi bu ngas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor las brtsams te chos bstan pa la mtha' thug pa med do/_/maud 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag gi nang du 'dug par nus sam/_gsol pa/_ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu nga ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad 
[\[21a.2\]]kyi nang du spyod lam bzhis gnas par byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du 'jog par mdzad/_'jug par mdzad la/_yungs 'bru de yang rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing /_yungs 'bru de'i nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor 
[\[21a.3\]]de dag thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad kyang nye bar ston par mdzad la/_rlung de dag phan tshun thug par yang mi 'gyur/_ltung bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/maud gal gyi bu nga ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid de lta bu dang de ma yin pa gzhan yang tshad med pa dang ldan no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 
[\[21a.4\]]chen po dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te ngag 'thun par tshig tu smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/_ston pa 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar dbang che bar 
[\[21a.5\]]grags pa/_'di ltar mthu che ba ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas mos par bgyid cing mos par bgyis nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyid pa 
[\[21a.6\]]de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so/_/de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/_de nyid kyi nub mo rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyogs gang na grong khyer thams cad kyi btsog dgu dang /_mi 'thun pa thams cad 'bab pa dang /_
[\[21a.7\]]'byung ba'i sa phyogs der 'khor gyi khyams chen po dar gyi lda ldi dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng bas brgyan pa/_gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/_me tog bkram pa/_spos bzang po mchog gis bdugs pa/_steng du bla re bres pa zhig mngon par sprul to/_/
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa brgyad stong mngon par sprul to/_/rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du yang seng ge'i khri ras bcos bu du mas g.yogs pa rin po che'i ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa mngon par 
[\[21b.2\]]sprul to/_/seng ge'i khri'i g.yas g.yon du yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bur bcas pa bzhi bzhi mngon par sprul to/_/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa yang mngon par sprul to/_/
[\[21b.3\]]rim gro byed pa gos dkar po bgos pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lnga brgya yang mngon par sprul to/_/sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bkod pa de lta bu sprul ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la rgyal po chen po bzhi lus chen por sprul nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa ga la ba der 
[\[21b.4\]]song nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /_khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed 
[\[21b.5\]]pa legs par rnyed do/_/bzang po gzhan yang kho bo cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i las bya ba la bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_khyod la bstang ba'i phyir 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na kho bo cag
