[\[21b.6\]]la gnang bar gyis shig_/de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la gnang ba dang /_de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams de lta bu zhig mngon par sprul to/_/de nas yang lha rnams 
[\[21b.7\]]kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu sum khri dang lhan cig bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa ga la ba der song nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzang po khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas nga gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su longs spyad 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]par bya ba'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di mngon par sprul pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bzang po kho bo cag kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las bya zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pa dang /_khyod la bstang ba'i 
[\[22a.2\]]phyir 'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa 'di lta bu gnyis pa cung zhig ston par byed na kho bo cag la gnang bar gyis shig_/de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la gnang ba dang /_de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 
[\[22a.3\]]'das kyis yongs su longs spyad par bya ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal ba dang /_yongs 'du sa brtol bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'khor gyi khyams zhig mngon par sprul te/_'khor gyi khyams des sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i bkod pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[22a.4\]]po chen po bzhi'i bkod pa yang mog mog por byas par gyur to/_/de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po 'di snyam du sems te/_lha'i bu 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba dang /_mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson te lhags pa dang sbyar na/_sems can 
[\[22a.5\]]'di ni tha mal pa ma yin pas bdag gis sems can mchog de lta bu la tho btsams par gyur na mi rung gis bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag dor gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po sprul pa'i bya ba de dag 'dor bar byed/_de dag med par byed de/_gsang sngags dang 
[\[22a.6\]]rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis med par byed cing mi snang bar bya bar brgal kyang zhal zas dang /_rim gro ba dang /_'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa dang /_seng ge'i khri yang de kho na bzhin du snang ste/_gsang sngags dang /_rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams 
[\[22a.7\]]cad kyis med par bya ma nus pa dang /_de shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag sngon chad ni 'dod na sgyu ma ston par yang byed/_'dod na sgyu ma med par yang byed na/_da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ched du gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa med par byed ma nus so snyam mo/_/
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzang po ji ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir gnas kyi bkod pa byas pa 'di med 
[\[22b.2\]]par bya mi nus pa de bzhin du bzang po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam thob pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa de yang med par mi 'gyur te/_de dag gi de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro/_/de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po dga' 
[\[22b.3\]]mgu yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod la bab pa skul bar byed de/_bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod lags pa'i dus dang tshod la bab na da gdugs tshod la bab par dgongs su gsol 
[\[22b.4\]]zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs mnabs/_chos gos gsol/_lhung bzed thogs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dang la gshegs te/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 
[\[22b.5\]]gshegs nas/_sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der gshegs te/_gang gis na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes/_rgyal po chen po bzhi yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag 
[\[22b.6\]]gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes/_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gis sprul pa'i bkod pa na bzhugs so snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/rgyal po'i khab 
[\[22b.7\]]kyi grong khyer chen po de na gzhan mu stegs can dang /_spyod pa ba dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gang dag gis thos pa de dag ni ngo mtshar du gyur nas 'khor gyi khyams der dong ste/_de ring dge sbyong gau tam lam tho 'tsham pa blta bar bya'o snyam mo/_/rgyal po'i 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na dad pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dong nas de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la bgam pa yang mnyan par bya/_cho 'phrul chen po yang 
[\[23a.2\]]blta bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_khengs pa nges par bcom nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par tho btsam 
[\[23a.3\]]pa'i bsam pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir gshegs su gsol ba gang lags pa'i nongs pa 'chags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang zhal zas sprul pa dang /_rim gro bgyid pa sprul pa dang /_seng ge'i khri sprul pa dang /_'khor gyi khyams sprul pa de 
[\[23a.4\]]la bdag 'di snyam du sems can mchog de lta bu de la bslus par gyur na mi rung gis bya ba 'di ma mchis par bgyi snyam ste shin tu spangs kyang ma mchis par ma btub/_gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa thams cad kyis kyang ma mchis par bgyi rngo ma 
[\[23a.5\]]thog nas zhal zas dang /_rim gro bgyid pa dang /_seng ge'i khri dang /_'khor gyi khyams kyi bkod pa yang de kho na bzhin du gda'o/_/de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang po sems can 
[\[23a.6\]]thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa dang /_yongs su spyad pa yang 'di lta ste/_las kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/_/bzang po dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di yang 'di lta ste/_chos kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/_/bzang po nga yang 'di lta ste/_ye shes kyi sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/_/
[\[23a.7\]]bzang po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang 'di lta ste/_sna tshogs mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/_/bzang po chos thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/_rkyen tshogs pa'i sgyu mas sprul pa yin no/_/bzang po 'on kyang da de'i dus la 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]bab par shes na ji ltar sprul pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba dang /_bldag pa dag khyod kyis phul cig_/de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos sprul pa'i rim gro ba de dag dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa dang lhan cig 
[\[23b.2\]]sprul pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_myang ba dang /_bldag pa des bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun yang dag par tshim par byed do/_/de nas de'i tshe gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/sbyin pa 'di ni ci 'dra dang /_/len 
[\[23b.3\]]par byed pa ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra'i chos nyid thob 'gyur bar/_/yon ni rnam par sbyong gyur cig_/maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_/gdan ni ji ltar bshams pa dang /_/de la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/_/mi mnyam ma mchis mtshungs pa ste/_/mchod sbyin dge ba bla na med/_/
[\[23b.4\]]shA ri'i bus smras pa/_rim gro byed pa'i sems gang dang /_/len par byed pa'i sems gang dang /_/sbyin par byed pa ji lta bar/_/yon ni myur du sbyong bar shog_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_gtong med sbyin pa 'di btang ba/_/len pa med pa rnams kyis blangs/_/gang dag 
[\[23b.5\]]'dir ni gshegs pa rnams/_/de dag yon sbyong byed pa yin/_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_'di ni nam mkha'i sbyin pa ste/_/bsam gyis mi khyab rnams kyis spyad/_/gang dag sems lus grol ba de/_/'jig rten dag na yon sbyong mchog_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od tog 
[\[23b.6\]]gis smras pa/_ji lta bur na sgyu ma'i mkhan/_/bzang pos bkod pa sprul byas pa/_/dngos kun de dang 'dra ba ste/_/byis pas de ni mi rtogs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od bkod pas smras pa/_ji ltar gdan dang ljon shing dag_/du ma mngon par sprul byas pa/_/yid kyi 
[\[23b.7\]]sgyu ma lta bur stong /_/'di la khyad par 'ga' yang med/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ges smras pa/_seng ge'i sgra ni ma thos na/_/wa ni nags tshal nang na sgrogs/_/de yis seng ge'i sgra thos nas/_/phyogs bcu dag tu 'bros par 'gyur/_/de bzhin sgyu mkhan bzang 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]po yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong na/_/mu stegs nang du rgyal ba bas/_/bdag nyid mchog ces sgrogs par byed/_/bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/sgyu mas sgyu mar rtogs byed pa/_/tshad mar gyur pa gsungs nas ni/_/de la bdud kyi gting mi dpogs/_
[\[24a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_zhal zas 'di ni sprul pa ste/_/bsnyen bkur byed pa'ang sprul pa yin/_/spyod par byed pa'ang sprul pa ste/_/sbyin pa dge ba bla na med/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/_me ni mar dang til mar gyis/_/
[\[24a.3\]]phyi phyir zhing ni rab tu mched/_/de bzhin bzang po'i sgyu ma yis/_/sangs rgyas sgyu ma nges par bstan/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/_/ji ltar 'di ni sngon gnas pa/_/thams cad byed pa med pa ltar/_/de bzhin chos rnams thams cad ni/_/sngon gyi 
[\[24a.4\]]mtha' nas rtag tu mnyam/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po shin tu gdul ba'i dbang du mdzad nas khyim bdag cig sprul te/_'khor gyi khyams de'i nang du zhugs nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzang po ci byed smras pa/_dge 
[\[24a.5\]]sbyong gau ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do/_/des smras pa/_bzang po thong de skad ma zer/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol zhing bzhugs so/_/sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs 
[\[24a.6\]]rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khab na gdugs tshod gsol bar mthong ngo /_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gnyis pa zhig mngon par sprul nas de nang du zhugs te/_sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad 
[\[24a.7\]]ces smras so/_/bzang po ci byed smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do/_/des smras pa/_thong de skad ma zer/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing bzhugs so/_/sgyu ma 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]mkhan bzang pos kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu kun tu rgyu'i srang na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar mthong ngo /_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gzhan zhig sprul te/_de nang du zhugs nas sgyu ma mkhan 
[\[24b.2\]]bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzang po ci byed/_smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do/_/des smras pa/_bzang po thong de skad ma zer/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'tsho byed kyi skyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/
[\[24b.3\]]sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho byed kyi skyed mos tshal na 'khor bzhi la chos ston par mthong ngo /_/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sgyu ma mkhan bzang po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[24b.4\]]so/_/bzang po ci byed/_smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di gdugs tshod gsol bar byed do/_/des smras pa/_bzang po thong de skad ma zer/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la chos ston 
[\[24b.5\]]cing bzhugs so/_/bzang pos kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na shing yongs 'du'i drung na chos ston par mthong ngo /_/de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos shing ljon pa sprul pa ji snyed pa de thams cad kyi lo ma thams cad dang /_me tog thams cad la de 
[\[24b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo /_/sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhis seng ge'i khri sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad la yang de 
[\[24b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo /_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na rtsig pa'am/_khyim mam/_khang [{]bzangs sam[,]bzang ngam[}]/_srang ngam/_lam po che ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad na yang 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na yang sgyu ma mkhan bzang po bdag nyid phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa 'chags par mthong zhing /_de nas 
[\[25a.2\]]sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i mig lam na gang cung zad ci snang ba de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan cung zad kyang ma mthong nas de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde bar gyur to/_/de dga' ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis dad pa 
[\[25a.3\]]rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de ting nge 'dzin de las langs ma thag tu thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bzhed na brgya phrag stong las lhag gyur cing /_/dper na gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi/_/sangs 
[\[25a.4\]]rgyas mang po sprul par mdzad pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul de la mos/_/bdag gis sngon bslabs sgyu ma'i sa ma lags/_/'dzam bu'i gling na bdag 'dra med snyam na/_/de ring rgyal ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'di mthong nas/_/'di yi grangs dang char yang ma phod do/_/
[\[25a.5\]]bdag gi sha yi mig gis gang mthong ba/_/thams cad rgyal ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku/_/chos kyi rgyal po la ni 'di dag zhus/_/rgyal ba yang dag gang lags bka' stsol cig_/gang zhig mchod na legs par mchod pa lags/_/gang la 'bras bu chen por 
[\[25a.6\]]'gyur ba lags/_/gang gi byang chub 'thun par gzung ba 'di/_/kun tu spyan gyis bdag la bka' stsol cig_/de ring 'jig rten mgon bgam bgyis pa yi/_/nongs pa gang lags de 'dir kun tu 'chags/_/gang dag sems can mchog la gus mi gnas/_/sems 
[\[25a.7\]]can de dag rgyal ba'i bde las nyams/_/bdag la lha dang brgya byin tshangs pa dang /_/'khor 'dus gyur pa 'di dag kun gson cig_/sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol slad du/_/byang chub sems ni bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]'gron du gnyer/_/bdud rtsi bde bas yang dag tshim par bgyi/_/gnyid kyis rab log sems can shes rab kyi/_/mthu dang sgrub pas rnam par sad par bgyi/_/rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra mthong gyur cing /_/bde bar gshegs bka' yid 'ong ye shes dang /_/chags pa 
[\[25b.2\]]med pa'i spyod mchog thos nas ni/_/su zhig dag pa'i rgyu sems bskyed mi bgyid/_/byang chub sems mkhas ji ltar spyod pa yi/_/byang chub lam ni bdag la bshad du gsol/_/gang la nyan thos rnams kyis mi dpogs pa'i/_/de dag rnams kyi spyod pa ji lta bu/_/cho ga 
[\[25b.3\]]spyod pa'i yon tan ji lta bu/_/mnyan par 'dod la gus pa ji lta bu/_/nges pa rnams kyi spyod lam ci 'dra ba/_/bdag la the tshom ma mchis de bzhin gsungs/_/ji ltar thos pa tshol la goms pa lags/_/thos pa snying por bgyid pa'i dang po gang /_/gzhan la gsal 
[\[25b.4\]]bar ston pa ji lta bu/_/srog chags thams cad ji ltar chos la dad/_/ji ltar 'di dag shes kyi khe mi tshol/_/zang zing med pa'i sems la ji ltar gnas/_/byas pa shes shing rab tu phan 'dogs dang /_/sems can mi phyed gnas par ji ltar 'gyur/_/grogs po gang 
[\[25b.5\]]dag bsten bgyi ji lta bu/_/sdig pa'i grogs rnams ji ltar rnam par spong /_/ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur/_/de dag mthong nas ji ltar mchod par bgyi/_/ji ltar bslab pa dag la gus pa lags/_/de yi bslab pa bca' ba gang zhig lags/_/tshul 
[\[25b.6\]]khrims ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin rnam par dag pa ji ltar 'thob/_/ji ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba lags/_/tshul bzhin ma lags ji ltar spong ba lags/_/ji ltar shin tu nges par bsams yid dang /_/nyon mongs bdud kyi 'ching bas mi thub lags/_/
[\[25b.7\]]ji ltar dad ldan don ni sems bgyid cing /_/sems kyis sems can rnams ni mi gtong lags/_/ji ltar sems can yongs su smin bgyid cing /_/nor mchog 'dzin pa med la dpa' ba lags/_/ji ltar sems can spyod la 'jug pa dang /_/thabs dang byams pa'i snying 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]rje gnas pa lags/_/mngon par shes pa ji ltar yongs rdzogs 'gyur/_/dran dang blo gros gang gis rnam dag cing /_/so so yang dag rig gzungs bzod par 'gyur/_/smon lam rnam dag spyod las mi ldog cing /_/zab mo shes ldan don dam mkhas pa 
[\[26a.2\]]lags/_/smon lam thams cad ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/_/ji ltar de dag pha rol phyin 'phags shing /_/de bzhin byang chub rjes su 'thun par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun shes shing /_/byang chub phyir ni spyod pa mi ldog pa/_/kun mkhyen legs par 
[\[26a.3\]]don bsams shes rab mtsho/_/ye shes 'byung gnas 'di ni bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan phan yon bdag la bstan du gsol/_/bdag gis nan tan snying por bgyi bar 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la slar tshigs su bcad de bka' 
[\[26a.4\]]stsal pa/_chos kun sprul par gang gis shes pa de/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong sprul par byed/_/sprul pa de dag zhing rnams bye bar 'gro/_/de dag song nas sems can bye ba 'grel/_/ji ltar bzang po khyod kyis gzugs med las/_/sna tshogs mtha' yas gzugs 
[\[26a.5\]]ni ston byed cing /_/de dag skye ba med cing 'gag med la/_/'gro med 'ong med gnas pa med pa ltar/_/bzang po skyes bu khyu mchog rgyal ba yis/_/phung po dge 'dun tshogs bcas sprul de 'dra/_/de dang ye shes med par mi 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas bsam yas 
[\[26a.6\]]rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul yin/_/ji ltar sgyu mas rmongs byas skye bo ni/_/sems pa yong min de la nga rgyal med/_/'di la grub pa med cing rdzas yod min/_/phyin ci log gi sems kyis mthong ba ltar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs med kha dog dang /_/dbyibs min 
[\[26a.7\]]spyod pa ston yang spyod lam med/_/'jig tshogs lta bas kun nas bslang ma yin/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas snyam du 'du shes shing /_/sangs rgyas gzugs su mi blta mtshan dang ni/_/na tshod rigs su ma yin sgra dang ni/_/'chad par 'gyur ba ma yin sems dang ni/_/
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]rnam shes yid kyis rab tu phye ba min/_/chos nyid gang yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/dus gsum stong zhing mtshan yang ma skyes pa/_/rtag tu sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnam par grol/_/de la bgrang bas rab tu phye ba med/_/sangs rgyas 'byung gang chos nyid 'byung ba med/_/
[\[26b.2\]]de la phung po yod min khams mi 'byung /_/chos de gnas pa mi g.yo ston pa med/_/de ni mig lnga'i gnas kyang ma yin no/_/gang zhig bdag gis sangs rgyas blta snyam sems/_/des ni gzhar yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/_/'dren pa mthong ba med pa mthong ba ste/_/
[\[26b.3\]]dper na nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin/_/bzang po gang khyod cung zad sangs rgyas lta/_/de kun don gcig yin par shes par gyis/_/nga dang gzhan gang yin pa de kun mtshungs/_/bar snang mthong dang 'dra bar mnyam pa yin/_/de dag ting 'dzin mnyam zhing shes rab mnyam/_/
[\[26b.4\]]de dag rnam par grol bar mnyam pa yin/_/rnam grol ye shes mthong dang stobs dang ni/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan kun gyis mnyam pa yin/_/de dag stong don go 'phang gnas par mnyam/_/thams cad chags pa med pa'i chos nyid gnas/_/kun kyang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 
[\[26b.5\]]rnam par grol/_/de dag 'byung ba med par 'byung ba yin/_/bzang po rgyal ba gcig la mchod byed na/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la ni mchod 'gyur te/_/'di ltar de dag nga yi chos dbyings dang /_/tha dad bya ba nam yang yod ma yin/_/de dag thams cad yon 
[\[26b.6\]]bzhes sbyong bar mdzad/_/kun la phul ba 'ang 'bras bu che bar 'gyur/_/de kun chos nyid dag pa mnyam pa brnyes/_/sangs rgyas rnams la tha dad bya ba 'ang med/_/rgyal ba yang dag gang yin bshad bya yis/_/rtse gcig sems dang dran pa nyer gzhag cing /_/chos tshul 
[\[26b.7\]]rtogs pa rnam par lta bas de/_/legs par nges bsams sems kyis nga las nyon/_/bzang po de kun ma bskyed yang dag min/_/phyin ci log gis de kun mthong bar zad/_/gal te dngos po'i ngo bo yang dag na/_/dngos po thams cad du ni zad mi 'gyur/_/de phyir shin 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]tu ma skyes yang dag min/_/de dag skye med zad la gnas pa med/_/des na bltar med ngo bo de dag snang /_/rnam par bltas na gnas pa yod ma yin/_/ji ltar bzang pos rgyal ba mthong ba dang /_/ji ltar phyogs su mngon par sprul mthong ba/_/gang 
[\[27a.2\]]gzhan phung po rgya chen rten stobs dang /_/phung po lnga po 'ang de dang 'dra bar ltos/_/chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste/_/sems can dang ni sangs rgyas mtshan nyid med/_/mtshan nyid med la mtshan du 'dod pa de/_/sangs rgyas las ni shin tu ring bar 'gyur/_/
[\[27a.3\]]chos yod ma yin kun tu rtog pas bslad/_/dngos po med par yang ni brten nas shes/_/byed pa med cing byed pa po las 'das/_/ming du 'dzin pas stong pa rab tu ston/_/gang gis rgyu dang byed po rkyen min shes/_/des ni chags bral gyur pa'i chos kyang shes/_/'dod 
[\[27a.4\]]chags bral ba'i chos ni shes gyur na/_/des ni rnam dag mig gis sangs rgyas mthong /_/yang de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag brjod de bstan pa na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po chos la nges par rtogs pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa chung ngu skyes so/_/srog chags lnga stong ni bla na med 
[\[27a.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems sngon ma bskyed pa skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas sprul pa de gsol nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po'i yon yongs su 
[\[27a.6\]]sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang gis sbyin dang gang la sbyin/_/sbyin pa ji ltar mi rtog pa/_/sbyin pa mnyam pa de nyid ni/_/bzang po la ni yongs rdzogs shog_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di 
[\[27a.7\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams 'di rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du dgung bdun du gnas shing mi gda' bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi khyams de ji ltar rgyan gyis brgyan 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]bzhin du zhag bdun du gnas shing mi snang bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas chos bstan 
[\[27b.2\]]pa'i phyir bzhugs so/_/dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za de dag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo /_/de nas sgyu ma mkhan bzang po yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song 
[\[27b.3\]]ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas gus pa dang bcas/_zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la sgyu ma 
[\[27b.4\]]mkhan bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por mchi bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu 
[\[27b.5\]]ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[27b.6\]]de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang /_
[\[27b.7\]]sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la ngoms mi shes pa nyid dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/_bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' lam gang la zhugs na byang chub 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang /_gnas 
[\[28a.2\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_skye ba yongs su dag pa ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni gang la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting mi dpogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos 
[\[28a.3\]]yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bsam gtan zlog pa dang /_sems kyis rnam par 'byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la snying rje che ba dang /_spobs pa dang /_skad sna tshogs pa nyid de/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[28a.4\]]dpa' rnams kyi 'phags pa'i spyod pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_'du 'dzi la mi dga' ba dang /_de na gnas na sems can rnams la byams pa dang /_'du byed rnams gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes pa 
[\[28a.5\]]ste bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sri zhu che zhing gus pa la gnas pa zhes brjod par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /_sems rtag tu dga' ba dang /_nga rgyal dang /_
[\[28a.6\]]dregs pa spang ba dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin du sgrub pa ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dus shes pa dang /_tshod shes pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[28a.7\]]dben pa dang /_yang dag pa nyid de bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na the tshom med pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'gyod pa kun nas ldang ba rnam par gnon pa dang /_mkhas pa dang shes rab chen po la bsnyen bkur 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]byed pa dang /_thos pa'i don sems pa dang /_gzhan gyi nyes ba mi gleng zhing gleng ba gang yin pa yang byams pas gleng gi skyon gtsor byed pas ma yin pa ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na thos pa tshol 
[\[28b.2\]]bar byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag dang gzhan gyi shes rab sbyong ba dang /_phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa rnams kyi the tshom gcod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa zad mi shes pa ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang 
[\[28b.3\]]po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mang du thos pa'i snying po yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_thos nas chos bye brag tu shes pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no/_/thos nas bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no/_/thos nas gzhan la ston par 
[\[28b.4\]]byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin no/_/thos nas don de nyid rnam par grol ba 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la gtod par byed pa 'di ni 'di'i snying po yin te/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[28b.5\]]dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_las byas nas kyang zas la yongs su spyod pa dang /_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_nad gsos dang /_sman zong rnams rnyed pa dang /_gzhan gyi 
[\[28b.6\]]phyogs mthu chung bar byed pa dang /_chos 'dod pa'i lha rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing de dag gis bsrungs pas bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/_bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' chos ston par byed pa'i phan yon yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos 
[\[28b.7\]]bzhi dang ldan na gzhan dag la chos ston par byed cing 'di'i tshig gi lam gzung bar 'os par yang 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_ngang tshul bzang zhing mnyen pa dang /_bdag nyid kyi chos sgrub pa ste/_bzhi po 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes kyi khe las 'byol zhing zang zing med par chos ston pa yang yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'khor ba las 'jigs pa skyed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi zang zing dang 'du 'dzi don 
[\[29a.2\]]du mi gnyer ba dang /_pha rol rjes su srung ba dang /_'phags pa'i rigs la gnas pa ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor ba dang /_byas pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa yin te/_bzhi 
[\[29a.3\]]gang zhe na/_gzhan byang chub yang dag par len du 'jug pa dang /_las byas pa chud mi gzon pa dang /_bdag nyid la byams pa ltar gzhan la yang byams pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa'i rtsal don du gnyer ba ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems 
[\[29a.4\]]dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bzod pa'i stobs kyi go bgos pa dang /_lan du phan 'dogs par cung zad kyang re ba med pa dang /_snying rje chen po mi 'dor ba dang /_log par zhugs pa 
[\[29a.5\]]rnams mi spong ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sems can rnams la mdza' bshes mi phyed par 'gyur ro/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par bya ba'i grogs po yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyor ba phun sum 
[\[29a.6\]]tshogs pa dang /_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gang dag 'di'i byang chub nye bar ston par byed pa ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi dge ba'i grogs po 
[\[29a.7\]]yin par rig par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_theg pa dman pa ston pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems la 'dun pa zlog par byed pa dang /_gang dag bsten na mi dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba ste/_
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_dran pa rtse gcig pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsngags pa yang dang yang du sgrogs pa 
[\[29b.2\]]dang /_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam 'debs pa ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[29b.3\]]yon gnas mchog la mchod par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag mthong nas sems can gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mchod na byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa 
[\[29b.4\]]gnyis dang ldan pa mngon sum du mthong na dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba ste/_bzang po byang chub sems dpas phan yon bzhi po de dag mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar spro bar 'gyur ro/_/bzang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas don gyi dbang bzhi 
[\[29b.5\]]mthong na bslab pa lhur len par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_ngan 'gro las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_bde 'gro 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la gus pa dang /_smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/
[\[29b.6\]]bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang /_sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa 
[\[29b.7\]]mnyan pa la mi skrag pa ste/_bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bya ba ma yin pa mi spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]la mos pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi spong ba dang /_lta ba bag la nyal dang bcas par yang dag par 'joms pa ste/_bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[30a.2\]]dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'du 'dzi med pa dang /_rab tu dben pa dang /_sems kyi rnyog pa med pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa ste/_bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rigs yin no/_/bzang 
[\[30a.3\]]po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes nas byang chub kyi sems mngon du byed pa dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog pa la sgrib pa med pa dang /_rnam par thar ba'i sgo dag la 'dris par byed pa dang /_nges 
[\[30a.4\]]pa la mi 'jug pa ste/_bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'khor ba'i 
[\[30a.5\]]'jigs pas skrag pa dang /_rnal 'byor spyod pa dag la ma mos pa dang /_dgongs pa dag la mi dga' ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par 'du mi byed pa ste/_bzang po bzhi po de dag ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems skye ba bzlog par bya ba yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag 
[\[30a.6\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir yang bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar thug par 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa dang po yin no/_/bdag gis sems can thams 
[\[30a.7\]]cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams shes par bya zhing de dag gi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa gnyis pa yin no/_/bdag gis mi dge ba'i 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par byas nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/_bdud kyi dpung pham par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa 
[\[30b.2\]]gsum pa yin no/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig gcig gis go bar byas te chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems kyis nges par bsam pa bzhi pa yin te/_bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis nges par bsam 
[\[30b.3\]]pa yin no/_/bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_chos la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang /_tshul bzhin du sbyor ba dang /_chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa dang /_mtshan ma thams cad la mi 
[\[30b.4\]]gnas pa ste/_bzang po chos bzhi po de dag ni bdud 'dul ba yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gang zag med pa'i phyir chos rnams brten nas skye ba yin gyi chos 'ga' yang rgyu med par ni mi skye 
[\[30b.5\]]ba dang /_brten nas skye ba'i chos gang yin pa de ma skyes pa dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyir chud mi za ba ste/_bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don sems pa yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems 
[\[30b.6\]]can rnams mi gtong ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sngon gyi smon lam mi 'dor ba dang /_yongs su skyo ba bzod pa dang /_lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud pa ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[30b.7\]]kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_yongs su smin pa la chos ston pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_dus dus su skul bas dran par byed pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_bdag nyid kyi bde 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]ba spangs nas gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ston pa dang /_yongs su smin par byed pa ste/_bzang po bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su smin par byed pa yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ma bsdus pa sdud 
[\[31a.2\]]par byed pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu la yang mos pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gzhan gyi don byed par spro ba dang /_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_des pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su 
[\[31a.3\]]bcad pa thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_mngon par shes pa thob pa dang /_ye shes thob pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin chen por 
[\[31a.4\]]gyur pa tshad med pa la 'jug pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid sgom zhing rnam par grol ba dang ma 'dres pa ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[31a.5\]]sems bskyed pa thams cad la byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba ste/_tha na nyon mongs pa'i sems la yang rung na dge ba'i sems la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa dang /_sems can thams cad chos kyi snod nyid yin par lta ba dang /_ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud pas chos thams cad 
[\[31a.6\]]log pa nyid du nges pa yin par lta ba dang /_rnam par grol bar 'dod pas snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i 'du shes sgom par byed pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/bzang po 
[\[31a.7\]]bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab par bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang /_bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang /_
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]bdag gis sems can thams cad bskul bar bya'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa dang /_bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam du byams pa sgom pa ste/_bzang po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa sgom pa yin no/_/bzang 
[\[31b.2\]]po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_ngan song du skyes pa rnams bde 'gro'i lam la 'god pa'i snying rje dang /_sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba'i snying rje dang /_theg pa dman pa la mos pa 
[\[31b.3\]]rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par len du 'jug pa'i snying rje dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa'i snying rje ni bzhi pa yin te/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mngon par shes pa 'thob par 
[\[31b.4\]]'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lus dang sems yang ba dang /_sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du rnam par 'byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la gus pa dang /_rim gro'i sems bskyed pa dang /_zhi gnas la rtse gcig tu gyur pas rnam par g.yeng ba med pa yin no/_/bzang po 
[\[31b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa dang /_chos la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la mi rton pa dang /_chos thams cad bdag med pa'i nges pa'i tshig 
[\[31b.6\]]dang /_yi ge mi zad par shes nas chags pa med cing thogs pa med par ston pas ston par byed pa ste bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_mang du thos pas ngoms mi shes pa dang /_mang 
[\[31b.7\]]du thos pa rnams la chos bzhin du gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_rtag tu gzhan dag la chos ston par brtson pa dang /_tshig dang yi ge thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa la 'jug pa yin no/_/bzang po byang 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bzod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_mos pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_tshogs pa dang /_yongs su mi skyo ba ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi 
[\[32a.2\]]dang ldan na spobs pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_chos smra ba gzhan dag gis bshad pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /_chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par chos nyan pa dang /_thos pas khengs pa med pa dang /_thos pa nyung ngu 
[\[32a.3\]]rnams la brnyas par mi byed pa ste bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgyur ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug sgyur ba dang /_nyan thos las sgyur ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas las sgyur ba dang /_
[\[32a.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos la 'du shes sgyur ba ste/_bzhi po de dag yin no/_/bzang po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rtogs par byed pa dang /_dgongs pa rtogs par byed 
[\[32a.5\]]pa dang /_bdag gi ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed pa dang /_'di ltar stong pa'i don du chos de dag thams cad don gcig par rtogs par byed pa ste/_bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don zab mo la sbyor ba yin no/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi 
[\[32a.6\]]dang ldan na smon lam 'grub par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_tshul khrims dang bslab pa yongs su dag pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba dang /_g.yo sgyu med pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la sems dbang byed pa ste/_bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[32a.7\]]dpa' rnams kyi smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ba'o/_/bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa gcig gi 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]nang du pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan thams cad kyang sdud par byed pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sems can gcig gi rang bzhin rtogs pas de las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyang shes pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas chos rnam par dag pa gcig 
[\[32b.2\]]gi tshul rtogs pas chos gzhan dag gi rnam par dag pa yang shes pa dang /_chos nyid yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu mos pa ste/_bzang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis 'phags shing phyir 
[\[32b.3\]]mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa 'di bshad pa na sgyu ma mkhan bzang po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde bar gyur nas dga' ba dang /_mchog 
[\[32b.4\]]tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer grangs med dpag tu med pa bkye bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer 
[\[32b.5\]]des khyab par byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal 
[\[32b.6\]]mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyu ma mchis pa dang /_rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_de'i tshe tshigs su 
[\[32b.7\]]bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to/_/ye shes 'byung gnas gzi brjid gzhal yas shes rab grags/_/'jig rten gsum du yon tan pha rol phyin brnyes grags/_/rgyal ba rang byung gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan pa/_/mi yi dbang pos de ni bdag la bka' stsal gsol/_/
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]phyogs rnams na ni 'gro ba sems can ji snyed gnas/_/de dag kun gyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams dang ni/_/dman dang mchog dang tha ma bar ma rgyu ldan mkhyen/_/ji slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa bdag la bstan du gsol/_/lha dang de bzhin zhugs 'bar sgra ni 
[\[33a.2\]]gang lags dang /_/mi 'am ci dang mi dang brgya byin lha min dang /_/mkha' lding lto 'phye tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra gzhan rnams/_/sangs rgyas rdul bral gsung sgra'i char yang ga la spyod/_/'od bzang nyi ma'i 'od dang nor bu'i 'od rnams dang /_/brgya byin 'od dang tshangs 
[\[33a.3\]]pa'i 'od rnams ji snyed pa/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas 'od kyis khyab par gda' ba ltar/_/'od rnams de dag thams cad rnam par gsal ma lags/_/sangs rgyas zhing de zab mo'i chos ni rjes su thob/_/stong pa bdag med sems can gang zag med mkhyen nas/_/yod dang 
[\[33a.4\]]med pa'i mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs nas su/_/dus gsum chu zla 'dra bar rab tu mkhyen pa po/_/deng 'dir su zhig theg pa'i mchog la sems btud de/_/su zhig sangs rgyas rigs dang chos kyi rigs la gnas/_/su zhig dkon mchog gsum po rgya cher skyed par bgyid/_/
[\[33a.5\]]gang gi ched du 'dzum pa mdzad pa legs par gsungs/_/gal te rgyal ba nyan thos rnams la don ldan gsung /_/de tshe bde gshegs 'dzum pa zhabs kyi pus mor nub/_/gal te rkyen gyi theg pa gsung na phrag par nub/_/gal te sangs rgyas theg gsung de tshe spyi bor nub/_/
[\[33a.6\]]ji ltar khyod kyis 'od zer 'bum snyed rab btang ba/_/bde bar gshegs kyi gtsug tu nub par gyur lags na/_/phan mdzad lha yi lha ste phan pa mdzad pa po/_/'di ni sangs rgyas theg par lung ston dogs ma mchis/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[33a.7\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu bzang po 'di ni bskal pa dgu khri nyis stong na bskal pa legs par sprul pa la 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen por de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[33b.2\]]rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po de'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba de ni 'byor par 'gyur/_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_nyams dga' ba dang /_mi dang skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur zhing lag mthil ltar mnyam pa dang /_ka tsa lin di 
[\[33b.3\]]ltar reg na 'jam pa dang /_me tog gi shing ljon pas brgyan pa dang /_rol mo sna tshogs sgrogs pa dang /_spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo bza' ba dang /_
[\[33b.4\]]btung ba ni dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod ltar bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub ste/_mi de dag gis nye bar spyad pa dang /_yongs su spyad pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po de rtag tu bkod pa thams cad nye 
[\[33b.5\]]bar ston par byed de/_des na 'jig rten gyi khams de bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos pa/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag tu 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' 
[\[33b.6\]]bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po'i tshe'i tshad ni lo khrir 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos lo bye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya 
[\[33b.7\]]ngan las 'da' ba de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par grags pa 'di nga'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi khyab bdag ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgra rnam par 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]grags pa lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/de nas rigs kyi bu bzang po bar snang de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag deng slan 
[\[34a.2\]]chad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin nyid las slar ma log pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[34a.3\]]pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_dbyer ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_ma tshang ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid 
[\[34a.4\]]gsung ba bzhin du bdag kyang de skad mchi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rigs kyi bu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzang po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob bam/_ci na khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid gsung ba ltar khyod de 
[\[34a.5\]]skad smra/_bzang pos smras pa/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid thob pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa nyid du thugs su chud de/_de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa gang 
[\[34a.6\]]yin pa der kho bo yang chud cing ji ltar kho bo chud pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang chud la/_ji ltar sems can thams cad chud pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang chud pa'i phyir te/_btsun pa kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye 
[\[34a.7\]]ba ma yin no/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo gnyis su med pa ni gang na kun tu shes pa med pa nyid dang /_yongs su shes pa med pa nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'du shes yongs su shes pa'i shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu bzang po ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgo rmongs par bgyid pa ste/_sngon yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid kyis mgo rmongs par bgyis so/_/da yang shes rab dang /_ye shes kyis mgo 
[\[34b.2\]]rmongs par bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di'i shes rab dang /_ye shes kyi spobs pa ni de lta bu lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bzang po khyod lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgo 
[\[34b.3\]]rmongs par byed pa bden nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar mgo rmongs par mdzad pa de bzhin du bdag kyang mgo rmongs par bgyid lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad 
[\[34b.4\]]btags te chos ston pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs par bgyid pa chen po lags pa'i slad du'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/_'gro 
[\[34b.5\]]ba'am/_skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi/_'chi 'pho ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par gsung ba bka' stsol ba ltar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi yul ga la lags/_
[\[34b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma mkhan bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod ji skad smra ba de kho na bzhin te/_'di lta ste bdag med pa nyid kyis sems can du tha snyad btags te chos ston pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_
[\[34b.7\]]gang zag med pa nyid kyis gang zag tu chos ston pa 'di ni mgo rmongs pa chen po yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pas ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs nas chos 'ga' yang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/_'gro ba 'am/_skye ba ma gzigs mod kyi/_'chi 'pho ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]skye ba'i chos ston par yang mdzad de/_'di la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'am/_yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang med do/_/de nas rigs kyi bu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung bar gsol pa dang /_
[\[35a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa khyod kyis rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung shig_/de nas byams pas rigs kyi bu bzang po rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so/_/rab tu rdzogs par bsnyen nas kyang bcom ldan 
[\[35a.3\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_tshul gyis rab tu byung ba ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig mtshan ma thams cad la yang chags pa 
[\[35a.4\]]ma mchis la sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du khams gsum na yang gnas na de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu byung ba lags so/_/yang de'i tshe bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags lnga stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[35a.5\]]sems bskyed do/_/dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di'i ming 
[\[35a.6\]]ji skad gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/rim gyis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang de bzhin gshegs pas lta bar 
[\[35a.7\]]'dod pa dang /_sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya bar 'dod pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_gzhan dag la yang bstan par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo gang gis 'di bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]dang /_bklags pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rab tu bstan pa des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yin/_des ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang byas pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod kyi skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying 
[\[35b.2\]]brtse ba dang /_'di lta ste/_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/kun dga' bo chos gang dag gis byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba dang /_theg pa chen po 'di la yang 
[\[35b.3\]]yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni theg pa chen po 'di las yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub yang dag par 'byung ba zhes/_kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o/_/khod du chud par bya'o/_/gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs 
[\[35b.4\]]bam du byed pa 'am/_lus la srel ba de'i lus la de bzhin gshegs pa yod pa yin na gang dag gis thos nas de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam 
[\[35b.5\]]grangs 'di ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba skul ba zhes bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa'i slad du lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[35b.6\]]skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rigs kyi bu bzang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 
[\[35b.7\]]bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa zhes bya ba ste/_le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_pradz+nya barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//[{D66}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u 
[\[36a.2\]]stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ste cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA pra ti hAr+ya ni ra de sha nA ma ma hA ya na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_
[\[36a.3\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong 
[\[36a.4\]]gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas lha'i bu ded dpon zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go_/de nas bcom 
[\[36a.5\]]ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa cho 'phrul du zhig gis sems can rnams 'dul bar mdzad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu nga ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 
[\[36a.6\]]sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lo/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul de gang zhe na/_thogs pa med pa'i 
[\[36a.7\]]ye shes kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus gzigs pa gang yin pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum po dag la ma dad pa rnams dad par mdzad pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang /_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pas gang zag gang la da ltar byung ba na nyes par spyad pa'i gzhi ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no/_/zhes kun rjod par mdzad pa dang /_gang zag de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus ngan song 
[\[36b.2\]]rnams las thar nas lha dang mi dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing /_theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang na nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_yang na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/_yang na theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du bde ba dang /_
[\[36b.3\]]sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen 
[\[36b.4\]]to/_/mkhyen nas kyang de ni de kho na bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no/_/zhes de kho na bzhin du kun rjod par mdzad pa dang /_gang zag gang dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus 'dod pa'i khams rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs 
[\[36b.5\]]med pa'i khams kyi skye mched gang yang rung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/_/theg pa gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bskal pa ji snyed cig gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_spyod pa ji lta bus sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[36b.6\]]ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/_/mkhyen nas kyang de kho na bzhin du kun rjod cing lung ston par mdzad pa dang /_dge ba'am/_mi dge ba'am/_dman pa'am/_bar 
[\[36b.7\]]ma'am/_mchog gam/_tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi 'da' ste/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na/_bslab pa bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir rjes su ston par mdzad pa 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]gang yin pa ste/_'di ni bya ba'o/_/'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/'di ni bsten par bya ba'o/_/'di ni bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/'di ni sgrub pa'o/_/'di ni log par sgrub pa'o/_/chos 'di dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i cha dang 
[\[37a.2\]]'thun pa'o/_/chos 'di dag ni rnam par byang ba'i cha dang 'thun pa'o zhes de ltar yon tan thams cad yang dag par blang ba rjes su ston pa dang /_mi dge ba thams cad spang ba rjes su ston pa dang /_dge ba'i lam gyi tshogs thams cad blang ba rjes su ston pa dang /_lam 
[\[37a.3\]]'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/_/lam 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/_/lam 'di ni theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/_/zhes rjes su ston pa gang yin pa ste/_de dag ji 
[\[37a.4\]]skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs na/_gnas gang yin pa de rjes su 'thob par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin/_skabs ma yin te/_de ni gnas med do/_/las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su khrid par byed do/_/las 'di yang 
[\[37a.5\]]dag par blangs na ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su khrid par byed do/_/las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su khrid par byed do/_/las 'di yang dag par blangs na ni lha rnams su khrid par byed do/_/las 'di yang dag par blangs na 
[\[37a.6\]]ni mi rnams su khrid par byed do/_/de la gang dag mi dge ba spangs nas dge ba yang dag par blang ba'i phyir 'jug pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam du 'jug pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams su skyes nas rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[37a.7\]]tshul de lta bus kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_rmongs pa med pa rjes su ston par mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gang zhe na/_gang dag rdzu 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]'phrul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pas bcom pa rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kun tu ston par mdzad de/_'di lta ste/_gcig tu gyur nas du mar 'gyur ro/_/du mar gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/snang bar 
[\[37b.2\]]gyur cing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro/_/rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro'o/_/ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro'o/_/ri la yang mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u zul byed de dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang mi nub par 
[\[37b.3\]]'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste/_dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/lus kyi stod nas me 'bar bar byed cing lus kyi smad nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/_/lus kyi smad nas me 'bar bar byed cing lus kyi stod 
[\[37b.4\]]nas chu'i rgyun 'bab par byed do/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la/_'di ltar mthu che ba/_'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la yang lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du yang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro/_/
[\[37b.5\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang kun tu 'bar bar ston te/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par ci dang ci lta bus sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i rdzu 
[\[37b.6\]]'phrul gyi rnam pa dag mngon par sgrub par byed do/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no/_/lha'i bu da ni cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon 
[\[37b.7\]]gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan ci zhig mnga' lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu yod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang thos na zab mo la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi phyogs 
[\[38a.2\]]kyang shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la khyod spobs par gyis shig_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam 
[\[38a.3\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i chab kyi phung po gang lags pa de thams cad phyag gi khyor ba ya gcig tu stsal kyang chab kyi sems 
[\[38a.4\]]can rnams la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni cho 'phrul 'di mnga' lags so/_/yang 'di ni cho 'phrul dam pa lags te/_gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa dang /_bsnyad 
[\[38a.5\]]du ma mchis pa dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /_ming ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_sgra ma mchis pa dang /_dbyangs ma mchis pa dang /_tshig gi lam ma mchis pa dang /_rgyu mtshan ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[38a.6\]]mtshan nyid ma mchis pa dang /_spyod pa ma mchis pa dang /_rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang /_kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa dang /_'dus ma bgyis pa dang /_sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang /_tha 
[\[38a.7\]]snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_byang ba dang /_phra ba dang /_mthong bar dka' ba dang /_brtag tu ma mchis pa dang /_rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yi ge dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_brda 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]dang /_tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis chos de dag gzhan dag la rnam par rig par mdzad pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de'i gting mi rtogs shing /_dmigs pa dang /_mtshan ma dang /_
[\[38b.2\]]yongs su rtog pa dang bcas pa'i dge sbyong dang /_bram ze thams cad dngang zhing 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[38b.3\]]khams 'di zhal gyi sgor stsal kyang gling chen po bzhi pa'i sems can rnams dang /_dgung zla dang /_gdugs dag dang /_khor yug rnams dang /_ran dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal rnams la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ba dang /_slar phyung ste/_
[\[38b.4\]]gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod kyang sems can rnams kyis 'di ltar bdag cag yul gang du bkod pa dang /_bdag cag yul gang nas bton pa yang ma 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/_/'di ni cho 'phrul 
[\[38b.5\]]chen po dam pa lags te/_gang de bzhin gshegs pas brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis pa dang /_bsnyad du ma mchis pa dang /_ming ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[38b.6\]]pa dang bral ba dang /_tha snyad thams cad yang dag par chad pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_byang ba dang /_phra ba dang /_mthong bar dka' ba dang /_brtag tu ma mchis pa dang /_rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa'i bar gyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 
[\[38b.7\]]yi ge dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_brda dang /_tha snyad kyi lam de dang de dag gis chos de bstan pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul de dag thams cad ni mtshan ma'i 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]dngos po dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kun nas 'dren par mdzad pa lags so/_/'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/_'di lta ste/_bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_sems can ma mchis pa la sems can 
[\[39a.2\]]du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_srog ma mchis pa la srog tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_gso ba ma mchis ba la gso bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_gang zag ma mchis pa la gang zag tu tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_shed las skyes ma mchis pa la shed las skyes su tha snyad 
[\[39a.3\]]'dogs pa dang /_shed bu ma mchis pa la shed bur tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_ming ma mchis pa la ming du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_gzugs ma mchis pa la gzugs su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_tshor ba ma mchis pa la tshor bar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_'du 
[\[39a.4\]]shes ma mchis pa la 'du shes su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_'du byed rnams ma mchis pa la 'du byed rnams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa la rnam par shes par tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_phung po ma mchis pa la phung por tha snyad 'dogs pa 
[\[39a.5\]]dang /_khams ma mchis pa la khams su tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_skye mched ma mchis pa la skye mched du tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_mig stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang mig ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang /_gzugs stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 
[\[39a.6\]]'dogs kyang gzugs ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang /_de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam 
[\[39a.7\]]par shes pa dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /_yid stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]snyam du mi sems pa dang /_chos rnams stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang chos rnams ni 'di snyam du bdag cag stong ngo snyam du mi sems pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bgyi bar tha snyad 'dogs kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni 'di snyam du bdag stong ngo snyam 
[\[39b.2\]]du mi sems te/_'di ltar bems po dang /_sems pa ma mchis pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa dang /_ming ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag sems can gzhan dang /_gang zag gzhan dag la yang dag par go bar mdzad pa gang 
[\[39b.3\]]lags pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po lags te/_cho 'phrul de ni mig dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_gzugs dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_rna ba dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_sgra dang 
[\[39b.4\]]ldan pa yang ma lags/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_sna dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_dri dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_sna'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_lce dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_ro dang ldan pa yang ma 
[\[39b.5\]]lags/_lce'i rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_lus dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_reg bya dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_yid dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_chos rnams dang ldan pa yang ma 
[\[39b.6\]]lags/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma lags te/_de lta bu'i cho 'phrul de ni yul ma mchis pa'i cho 'phrul lags so/_/de ni yul dang bral ba'i cho 'phrul lags te/_cho 'phrul de ni lus dang ldan par blta ba ma lags/_sems dang /_yid 
[\[39b.7\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa dang ldan par blta ba ma lags te/_de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni phung po lnga po dag lags te/_phung po lnga po mi rtag pa de la byis 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]pa rnams mngon par zhen cing /_de dag gis phung po lnga po dag rtag par gzung ba'i slad du ste/_de'i slad du cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so/_/'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag rtag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na 
[\[40a.2\]]de dag mi rtag go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/_/'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bde zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag sdug bsngal lo zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/_/'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag 
[\[40a.3\]]bdag ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag bdag ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/_/'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag sdug ces bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag mi sdug go zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags 
[\[40a.4\]]so/_/'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag bdag gi zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag bdag po ma mchis so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags so/_/'jig rten ni phung po lnga po dag yang dag pa zhes bgyi bar glo ba ches pas na de dag yang dag pa 
[\[40a.5\]]ma lags so zhes bshad na 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches lags te/_de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de ni 'jig rten thams cad glo ba mi ches par 'gyur ba lags so/_/cho 'phrul de la ni sems rangs par mi 'gyur lags te/_cho 'phrul de 
[\[40a.6\]]ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags so/_/cho 'phrul de ni mig tu bgrang ba ma lags/_gzugs su bgrang ba ma lags te/_cho 'phrul de ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/_/cho 'phrul de ni rna bar bgrang ba ma lags/_sgrar 
[\[40a.7\]]bgrang ba ma lags te/_cho 'phrul de ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_cho 'phrul de ni yid du bgrang ba ma lags/_chos su bgrang ba yang ma lags te/_cho 'phrul de ni yid dang chos kyi yul las yang dag 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]par 'das pa lags so/_/cho 'phrul de ni shes pa'i spyod yul ma lags/_rangs par bgyid ba ma lags te/_cho 'phrul de ni rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags so/_/stong pa nyid ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na stong pa nyid rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/
[\[40b.2\]]mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mtshan ma ma mchis pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/smon pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa ni brjod 
[\[40b.3\]]du ma mchis pa lags na mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa brjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/skye ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na skye ba ma mchis pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/'byung ba ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na 'byung ba ma mchis 
[\[40b.4\]]pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/dngos po ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na dngos po ma mchis pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/'gag 
[\[40b.5\]]pa ma mchis pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na 'gag pa ma mchis pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags na mya ngan las 'das pa rjod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/'di lta ste/_bdag tu dmigs pa ma mchis pa 
[\[40b.6\]]dang /_sems can du kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang /_byang chub la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/'di lta ste/_lus g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang /_ngag brjod pa ma mchis pa dang /_sems 
[\[40b.7\]]rgyu ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/'di lta ste/_sred par sgro 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang /_sems skad cig tu 'jig pa dang /_lus dang sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]pa'i bzod pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/'di lta ste/_blang ba ma mchis pa dang /_dor ba ma mchis pa dang /_gnas pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/'di lta ste/_nang nye bar zhi ba dang /_phyi 
[\[41a.2\]]rol tu rgyu ba ma mchis pa dang /_sems bsags pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/'di lta ste/_ngar 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa bor ba dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral 
[\[41a.3\]]ba'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i shes rab de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/chos thams cad ni rnam par bral ba ma mchis pa lags na de dag rnam par bral bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags na rang gi ngo bo dang 
[\[41a.4\]]bral bar bshad pa de ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/chos thams cad ni dbyer ma mchis pa lags na yi ges kun tu phye ste bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/chos thams cad ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gro ba ma mchis pa lags na 'ong ba dang 'gro bar bshad pa ni cho 
[\[41a.5\]]'phrul lags so/_/chos thams cad ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa lags na 'byung bar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/chos thams cad ni mngon par rtogs pa gcig pa lags na 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/chos thams cad ni ro 
[\[41a.6\]]gcig pa lags na theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/chos kyi dbyings na dbyer ma mchis pa lags na chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas gcig pa lags na 
[\[41a.7\]]sangs rgyas dpag tu ma mchis par bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/zhing thams cad ni zhing gcig pa lags na zhing sna tshogs bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig pa lags na sems can gyi rim pa bshad pa ni cho 'phrul 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]lags so/_/chos thams cad ni chos gcig pa lags na tha ma dang mchog dang bar mar bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/chos thams cad ni rnam par bsgrubs pa ma mchis pa lags na rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/
[\[41b.2\]]chos thams cad ni rnam par rig pa ma mchis pa lags na gzhan la rnam par rig par bshad pa ni cho 'phrul lags so/_/de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho 
[\[41b.3\]]bos shes pa ltar na ji tsam du brjod pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni cho 'phrul yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin pas de dag la brjod pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po 
[\[41b.4\]]yin no/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i bu ded dpon la 
[\[41b.5\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu ci khyod cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ram/_lha'i bus smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo nyid kyang cho 'phrul yin na de la kho bo skrag par 'gyur du ci yod/_sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/_lha'i bu khyod ci las 
[\[41b.6\]]bsams te de skad smras/_lha'i bus smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_chos thams cad ni 'pho ba med pa yin na de la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos 'pho ba gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba 
[\[41b.7\]]gang gis kho bo lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_bdag nyid chen po 'di yang thob pa'i dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa de ni sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed do/_/de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang sems par mi byed cing 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]rnam par shes par mi byed de/_sems par mi byed cing rnam par shes par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/klu rnams kyi klu'i yul 
[\[42a.2\]]yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/_de lta bas na chos thams cad ni bsam gyis 
[\[42a.3\]]mi khyab pa ste/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de ni cho 'phrul chen po yin no/_/yang gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad du lha'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa de thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ram zhes zer ba ni/_btsun pa sha ra dwa 
[\[42a.4\]]ti'i bu ci de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa gang yin pa des nam mkha'i khams skrag par 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas cho 'phrul bstan pa des nam mkha'i khams 
[\[42a.5\]]skrag par mi 'gyur na kho bo yang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu ci khyod nam mkha' yin nam/_smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo ni nam mkha' yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/_smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa 
[\[42a.6\]]ti'i bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis nang gi nam mkha'i khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa dang /_phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams su gsungs pa gang yin pa de nyid nam mkha'i khams ma yin nam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i 
[\[42a.7\]]bu de lta bas na/_sems can thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin can yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa bzhin du khyod nyid kyang ring po mi thogs par cho 'phrul de dag nyid nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]ti'i bu cho 'phrul de dag ni nye bar bstan par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_cho 'phrul de dag ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[42b.2\]]lha'i bu ded dpon 'di de lta bu ston pa las na 'dis ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis shing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras 
[\[42b.3\]]pa de bzhin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa 
[\[42b.4\]]mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med 
[\[42b.5\]]pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can rnams bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gnas shing sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid 
[\[42b.6\]]mi bde ba'i sgra 'ga' tsam yang med la 'jig rten gyi khams de yang rin po che sna bzhi gser dang /_dngul dang /_baidUr+ya dang /_shel las grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam la ka tsa lin di'i gos ltar reg na 'jam zhing mi khom pa dang /_ngan song rnams dang bral la lha dang mi rnams kyis kun tu
