[\[42b.7\]]gang zhing yid la bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang btung ba dag 'byor la bde ba tshad med pa dang ldan pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig ste/_brtson 'grus 'bar ba/_shes 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]rab kyi snang ba thob pa/_gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa/_spobs pa mi chod pa/_tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed cing ston pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/_mngon par shes pas rnam par shes pa khong du chud pa/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa/_sgrib pa 
[\[43a.2\]]med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du chos kyi sman sbyor ba la mkhas pa/_bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/_gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad 
[\[43a.3\]]kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i shes pa la mkhas pa/_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_blo rgya mtsho'i rjes su zhugs pa/_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_legs par sdom 
[\[43a.4\]]pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_shes rab la shin tu gnas pa/_thabs mtha' yas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa/_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas shin tu zhugs pa/_bsam gtan 
[\[43a.5\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par rtse ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i gsung rab la 
[\[43a.6\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rgyal po/_gling bzhi'i dbang phyug_/rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/_mi'i dbang por gyur pa zhig byung bar gyur to/_/de'i bu stong du tshang bar gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[43a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de yang btsun mo'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de'i sku tshe'i tshad dang /_mi de dag gi tshe'i tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag bdun du gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu stong dang lhan cig_/btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu chos la dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba 
[\[43b.2\]]dang /_dad pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo 'bum tshang bar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_
[\[43b.3\]]gdan dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams dang /_bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas rtag par rgyun tu de bzhin gshegs pa de la mngon sum du nyin gcig mi 'chad par rang gi lag nas gus 
[\[43b.4\]]par phul zhing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos nyan pa la yang 'jug par gyur to/_/de bu dang bcas/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas lo 'bum 'das nas kyang yang dang yang du sangs rgyas mthong zhing yang dang yang du de la chos mnyan pas rjes su dran pa bzhi thob par gyur to/_/bzhi 
[\[43b.5\]]gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_sbyin pa dang ldan zhing byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa ste/_rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag thob par gyur to/_/de rjes su dran pa bzhi po de dag dang ldan 
[\[43b.6\]]pas nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_chos yang dag par bgro ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mthong ba dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa bu dang bcas/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom 
[\[43b.7\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la cho 'phrul rnam 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]pa du mas rjes su gdams pa mdzad par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul de dag ma lags 
[\[44a.2\]]pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan mchis lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po cho 'phrul 
[\[44a.3\]]de dag ma yin pa'i cho 'phrul dam pa gzhan yang yod do/_/de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems dang sems las byung ba gzugs can ma yin pa rnams bshad pa dang /_sems dang sems las byung ba 'gags pa rnams bshad pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sems dang sems las byung 
[\[44a.4\]]ba mi gnas pa rnams smos pa dang /_ma skyes ma byung ba'i lam bshad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo ro gcig pa dang /_yan lag gsum du smos pa dang /_mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_rnam pa med pa 
[\[44a.5\]]dang /_'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub la yongs su sgrub par byed pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bshad pa dang /_phyin ci log dang /_nyon mongs pas grub pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_
[\[44a.6\]]dor ba med pa'i chos rnams la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang /_byas pa med pa'i chos rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /_'byung ba med cing skad cig pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /_lus dang 
[\[44a.7\]]sems dben pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /_bsdus pa dang rnam par g.yengs pa med pa'i chos rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /_pha rol dang tshu rol med pa'i chos rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang /_brtag pa dang /_
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]bsal ba med pa'i chos rnams la thabs la mkhas pa yod pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_rton pa med pa'i chos rnams la byams pa sgom pa dang /_bya ba med pa dang /_gzhig pa med pa'i chos rnams la snying rjes sbyor ba dang /_dga' ba med pa'i chos rnams la dga' ba mngon par sgrub pa dang /_
[\[44b.2\]]gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la btang snyoms sgom pa dang /_shes pa med pa dang /_mthong ba med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa dang /_thos pa med pa dang /_rnam par rig pa med pa'i chos rnams la lha'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa dang /_dmigs pa dang /_sems 
[\[44b.3\]]dang rnam par bral ba'i chos rnams la pha rol gyi sems shes pa yod pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang bral ba'i chos rnams la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yod pa dang /_sems dang lus dang /_sgra dang /_brtson 'grus dang bral ba'i chos rnams la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'thob pa dang /_
[\[44b.4\]]gnas pa med pa'i chos rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yang dag pa'i spong ba sgom pa dang /_dbang po med pa'i chos rnams la dbang po bstan pa dang /_stobs med pa dang /_nyam chung ba'i chos rnams la stobs 
[\[44b.5\]]yongs su rjod pa dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i chos rnams la byang chub kyi yan lag bshad pa dang /_khyad par med pa'i chos rnams la lam smos pa dang /_zhi ba'i mthar song ba'i chos rnams la zhi gnas skyed pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la lhag mthong la mkhas 
[\[44b.6\]]pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa smos pa'o/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de dang /_bu stong po de dag 
[\[44b.7\]]dang /_btsun mo'i tshogs de dag la cho 'phrul bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid las brtsams te de lta de ltar chos bstan pa dang /_srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa dang /_de'i bu 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de dag gis bzod pa thob nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi spobs pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab lta bu de la 
[\[45a.2\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na ni/_/lhun po'i rgyal po mdzes pa ltar/_/de bzhin dge 'dun dbus na ni/_/chos kyi rgyal po rnam par mdzes/_/ji ltar nyi ma 'char ba yis/_/mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas 
[\[45a.3\]]mdzod spu yang /_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar bgyid/_/ji ltar zla ba nya ba yi/_/zla ba yongs rdzogs lhang nge ltar/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs pa yi/_/'jig rten mgon yang lhang nge lags/_/ji ltar me tog pad ma ni/_/chab kyi nang du mi gos ltar/_/de bzhin 'jig rten 
[\[45a.4\]]mgon po yang /_/'jig rten chos kyis mi gos lags/_/ji ltar seng ge [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal/_/nags na sgra skad sgrogs pa ltar/_/de bzhin skyes bu seng ge yang /_/stong pa nyid kyi sgra skad sgrogs/_/mchis sam yang na ma mchis dang /_/mchis dang ma mchis thams cad dang /_/
[\[45a.5\]]mthar lta ba las rnam 'das pa/_/nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/_/skye ba'am yang na 'jig pa'ang rung /_/de dag mtshan mar bstan mdzad cing /_/mi skye 'gag pa ma mchis pa/_/nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/_/pha rol dang ni tshu rol dag_/de dag rnam par rtog par bstan/_/
[\[45a.6\]]chos rnams kun la mi gnas pa/_/nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang ba/_/de gnyis mtshan nyid ma mchis te/_/shin tu dri ma ma mchis chos/_/nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni/_/yongs su rtog las byung ba ste/_/rtog bral rnam 
[\[45a.7\]]rtog ma mchis pa/_/nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/_/'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/de dag lam du gzhug pa ste/_/chos rnams shin tu gsog lags pa/_/nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/_/skye dang 'chi dang 'khor ba ni/_/phyin ci log las byung ba ste/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]don/_/nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/_/lta dang dmigs pa gnas lags te/_/de dag gis ni 'jig rten 'jug_/chos rnams stong par rab bshad pa/_/nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/_/'jig rten mgon pos cho 'phrul ni/_/gang dag ji snyed bstan mdzad pa/_/de dag thams cad 
[\[45b.2\]]bshad pa ni/_/nges par seng ge'i sgra zhes bgyi/_/sems ni mnyam pa nyid slad du/_/rjes su 'thun dang mi 'thun pa/_/gang la'ang sems ni mi 'jug pa/_/de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad pa yi/_/zab cing zhi la 'thun bgyid cing /_/
[\[45b.3\]]de la rtsod par mi bgyid pa/_/de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/_/mi dge thams cad ma gtogs par/_/dge chos rnams la 'jug 'gyur zhing /_/de la'ang gnas par mi bgyid pa/_/de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/_/stong pa'i sgra dang sems can sgra/_/de bzhin lta ba'i sgra dang ni/_/
[\[45b.4\]]sgra rnams kun la ma chags pa/_/de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/_/sangs rgyas sgra dang nyon mongs sgra/_/rnam mang chos kyi sgra rnams dang /_/gang gi sgra la'ang mi rtog pa/_/de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims thos pa dang /_/brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes 
[\[45b.5\]]rab dang /_/de bzhin kun la brtson bgyid pa/_/de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/_/thams cad dag la sems mnyam zhing /_/byang chub sems ni mi spong la/_/byang chub lam ni ston bgyid pa/_/de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la/_/de 'dra'i 
[\[45b.6\]]chos ni bstan mdzad de/_/de la som nyi ma mchis pa/_/de ni rjes 'thun bzod pa lags/_/bdag kyang byang chub sangs rgyas shing /_/seng ge'i sgra skad bsgrags nas ni/_/ji ltar 'dren pas bstan mdzad pa'i/_/cho 'phrul nges par bstan par bgyi/_/zhing 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/
[\[45b.7\]]bla med bsod nams zhing de la/_/bdag gis sa bon btab pas na/_/bdag ni slar ldog ma mchis lags/_/dog sa thams cad rdol 'gyur zhing /_/rgya mtsho 'dabs par 'gyur gda' yi/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskrun pa yi/_/sa bon nam yang chab mi 'tshal/_/sems 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]can rnams kyi sems 'tshal cing /_/nam mkha' gzhal bar rngo thog gi_/byang chub tu ni bskrun pa'i sems/_/de yi bsod nams tshad ma mchis/_/bdag gi bsam pa ci 'dra ba'i/_/dbang du lha dang dri za dang /_/mi rnams gzhan dag ma mchis te/_/bcom ldan 
[\[46a.2\]]'das nyid bdag gi dpang /_/'dren pa bdag ni longs spyod dang /_/gzugs dang mtho ris mi 'tshal gyi/_/mi mchog khyod kyi mkhyen pa ni/_/ci 'dra de ltar bdag gyur cig_/byang chub la ni dmigs bgyis nas/_/bdag gis dgung lo 'bum du ni/_/ma chags sdang ba ma mchis 
[\[46a.3\]]par/_/bdag gis bde gshegs bsnyen bkur bgyis/_/bdag gi byis pa stong rnams dang /_/mchis brang yongs su smin bgyis pa/_/gang lags 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi/_/byang chub slad du spro bar mdzad/_/bdag gis bde gshegs legs mthong zhing /_/chos 'di 
[\[46a.4\]]legs par thos pa dang /_/byang chub la ni rtag dga' ba/_/bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed/_/gang zhig byang chub dga' bgyid pa/_/de ni chos la'ang rtag tu dga'/_/chos rnams spong bar mi bgyid pa/_/sems can kun la rtag dga' lags/_/de nas 'khor de nyid du 
[\[46a.5\]]chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul de dang 'thun par ma byas kyi mi 'thun par byas pas na khyod ni gnas ma yin pa 
[\[46a.6\]]la gnas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas la gnas pas 'jug pa med pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni tshor ba thams cad med pas shes pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni blangs pa med cing bor ba med 
[\[46a.7\]]pas blang ba med la dor ba med pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni nam mkha' la bris pa dang 'dra bas gzugs med pa/_kha dog med pa/_rtags med pa/_dbyibs med pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas gnyen po med pa yin no/_/
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]rgyal po chen po byang chub ni chos thams cad dang mnyam pas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas g.yo ba med pa yin no/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas zhi ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni brtag 
[\[46b.2\]]pa dang bsal ba dang bral bas nye bar zhi ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mi 'thun pa med pas lhag par g.yo ba med pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yongs su grub pa med pas sems mnyam pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pas sems can dang mtshungs pa'o/_/
[\[46b.3\]]rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pas skye ba med pas rab tu phye ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par rig pa med pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas 
[\[46b.4\]]rgyu ba med pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral bas spros pa med pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas stong pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mtshan ma med pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang 
[\[46b.5\]]chub ni smon pa dang bral bas smon pa med pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub ni mtshan nyid gsum dang bral bas 'dus ma byas pa ste/_rgyal po chen po gang dag byang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu dang /_ngo 
[\[46b.6\]]bo nyid de lta bu la sgrub par byed pa dang /_gang dag smon lam 'debs par byed pa dang /_gang dag mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang /_gang dag 'dod par byed pa de dag thams cad ni log par rtsol ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po byang chub ci 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[46b.7\]]yang de 'dra ba yin pas na gang dag de ltar spyod pa de dag ni yang dag par spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad la rlom sems med pa 
[\[47a.2\]]mnyam pa nyid kyis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tshul khrims dang /_bslab pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa ni byang 
[\[47a.3\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/bzod pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis tha ba dang /_khro ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_'chab pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang /_zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung ba thams cad 'byin par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin 
[\[47a.4\]]no/_/brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus brtan zhing 'bar ba dang /_zhum pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_
[\[47a.5\]]ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/gnyis dang bral ba'i 
[\[47a.6\]]btang snyoms mnyam pa nyid kyis tshangs pa'i gnas pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/mngon par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa skyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/don dang chos la nges par 
[\[47a.7\]]sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rton pa la mos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/yang dag par skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis nges 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]par sems pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/don 'thun pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yang dag par 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sems kyis 
[\[47b.2\]]rlom sems su mi byed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/nam mkha' yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa dang /_zhing yongs su dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 
[\[47b.3\]]byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshogs yang dag par sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems mnyam pa nyid kyis 
[\[47b.4\]]lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems brgyan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad la bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad la ci zhig bya snyam du spro ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta 
[\[47b.5\]]bur mos pa mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis legs par spyod pa'i las byed pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/chos sgyu ma 
[\[47b.6\]]lta bur so sor rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyis brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi go cha bgos pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sdug bsngal skye ba med par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/mdza' 
[\[47b.7\]]bshes dang mdza' bshes ma yin pa la sems snyoms pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mdza' ba brtan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/lan la re ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sbyor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/thos pa dang /_sgrub 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]pa mnyam pa nyid kyis thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa mnyam pa nyid kyis chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/chos dben pa mnyam pa nyid 
[\[48a.2\]]kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/don dam pa'i bden pa mnyam pa nyid kyis bden pa'i shes pa yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sems can la shin tu 'dud pa mnyam pa nyid kyis nga rgyal nges par 
[\[48a.3\]]bcom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/yon tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pas rlom sems med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yon tan thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba yongs su tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/de nas rgyal po dge ba'i 
[\[48a.4\]]bkod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid kyi spyod pa de dag thos nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_yi rangs pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas gos dang /_rgyan ci gyon pa rnams kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la mngon par 
[\[48a.5\]]bkab bo/_/bu stong po de dag gis kyang rang rang gi rgyan dag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan la bkab nas tshig 'di skad du gang bdag cag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dag rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed 
[\[48a.6\]]do/_/sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de lta bu dang /_spobs pa de lta bu dag thob par gyur cig ces kyang smras so/_/de nas chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste gos dang /_rgyan 
[\[48a.7\]]tsam gyis mchod pa de ni mchod pa chen po ma yin gyi/_de las gzhan pa'i mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa dag kyang yod kyis de dag khyod kyis sgrubs shig_/de yang gang zhe na/_de nas de'i tshe chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]dag stong chen sems can de dag kun/_/byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing /_/ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa rdzogs par ni/_/bu dang chung ma'i sbyin pa byas pa bas/_/gang gis byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab pa dang /_/rab 'byung 
[\[48b.2\]]sems kyis gom pa gcig bor ba/_/de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags/_/gang dag sngon chad byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_/gang dag ma byon byung dang bzhugs pa rnams/_/de dag skyon mang khab ni ma spangs par/_/bla med byang chub zhi ba thob pa med/_/rab 'byung de bzhin gshegs 
[\[48b.3\]]pa thams cad kyis/_/rab tu bstod cing bsngags la bkur ba ste/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod 'dod pa/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la rab 'byung gzung bar gyis/_/gang zhig khyim gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i/_/gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing byin dang /_/gang zhig rab 'byung 
[\[48b.4\]]nyin dang mtshan gcig tu/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems byed na/_/gang zhig rab 'byung bag yod gyur pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang /_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bcom byas shing /_/dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel ba yin/_/rab 'byung de ni lam 
[\[48b.5\]]ngan spangs pa dang /_/lam gyi rjes 'thun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod/_/de ni dge ba chud za ma yin zhing /_/de ni yongs su 'dzin pa spangs pa yin/_/khyim las grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing /_/nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med/_/rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa 
[\[48b.6\]]spyod/_/spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos pa dang /_'dod pa'i dga' ba dang /_longs spyod dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dag la mi lta bar gyur cing skyo la/_'dod chags dang bral ba skyes par gyur te rab tu 
[\[48b.7\]]'byung ba la sems gzhol bar gnas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob lags sam/_bcom 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po rab tu 'byung ba ni dgag pa med pa ste/_sems can thams cad la yang bar du mi gcod cing skabs yod do/_/khyim na gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas pa yin gyis/_gal 
[\[49a.2\]]te 'dod na ngas khyod la gdams shing rjes su bstan gyis khyod kyis kyang gtams shing rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'byung ba'i skabs phye ba dang /_rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas bu stong po de dag la smras pa/_khyed cag las rgyal 
[\[49a.3\]]srid sgrub pa dang /_sems can rnams chos yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par spro ba su yod/_de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/_yab bdag cag kyang dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lags kyis/_bdag cag mi dor bar gsol/_rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[49a.4\]]gal te khyed cag thams cad rab tu byung na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad rab tu chud zos par 'gyur gyis khyed cag las gang sems can rnams la brtan pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug par 'gyur ba des rgyal srid bsgrubs la sems can rnams la 
[\[49a.5\]]chos yang dag par 'dzin du chug shig_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gi nang nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems shes bya ba des rang gi pha de dang /_rgan rabs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rab 'byung yon tan du ma bsag pa zhes/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 
[\[49a.6\]]gsungs mod kyi/_de lta lags kyang snying rjer gyur pas na/_/'gro la phan phyir rgyal srid bdag gis bsgrub/_/ji srid 'tsho bar bdag ni tshangs spyod cing /_/gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa blang bar bgyi/_/me tog rnams dang dri dang byug pa dang /_/de bzhin chang yang myang bar mi 
[\[49a.7\]]bgyi'o/_/lus la rgyan rnams kyang ni mi thogs shing /_/mchil lham mi 'tshal rin chen gtsug phud min/_/khri rkang gser las bgyis par mi nyal zhing /_/rgyal po'i rkyen [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]gos kyang mi 'tshal lo/_/sil snyan glu dbyangs sgra la mi dga' zhing /_/rma bya ngang pa'i sgra la'ang dga' mi 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]bgyid/_/skye bos mdun bdar bud med gnas spong zhing /_/gcig pu mal na mchis nyal rlung mi g.yab/_/bdag ni gling nas gling du mchi bgyi zhing /_/dge ba bcu rnams rab tu bshad par bgyi/_/khyim na gnas pa'i nongs pa bstan bgyi zhing /_/rab tu 'byung ba'i bsngags pa 
[\[49b.2\]]'ang brjod par bgyi/_/gzugs dang longs spyod dbang phyug dregs pa yis/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun bgrod mi bgyi/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed par mi bgyi zhing /_/rtag tu yid byung srid gsum spyad par bgyi/_/sbyin dang snyan smra don spyod don 'thun pas/_/sems can 
[\[49b.3\]]bsdu ba la ni brtson bgyi zhing /_/bla med theg chen dam pa 'di la yang /_/srog chags bye ba mang po yongs smin bgyi/_/chos don mnyan cing bshad par bgyi slad du/_/nyin mo dus gsum mtshan mo dus gsum du/_/ri rab lta bu'i spyan sngar nyer mchi zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[49b.4\]]la ni mchod pa'ang bgyi/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu des rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/bslab pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i chos kyi yon tan des na 
[\[49b.5\]]khyim par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang rab tu byung ba dang /_yon tan mtshungs pa yin no/_/khyod kyi snying rje chen po des na rab tu byung ba'i yon tan bsgrub pa yang sgrub par byed pa yin no/_/de nas rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems rgyal srid la bzhag nas bu 
[\[49b.6\]]stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang /_lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/de dag rab tu byung nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa des cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di nyid kyis de lta de ltar gdams shing rjes su bstan pas de dag gis ring 
[\[49b.7\]]po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to/_/gzungs dang /_dran pa dang /_chos mnyan pa'i shes pa yang bskyed par gyur to/_/rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems kyang rgyal srid la dbang bskur nas zla ba nya'o cog na gling chen po bzhi po dag tu rjes su ston par byed de/_ci nas 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]kyang srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu dang /_bye ba phrag gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur to/_/de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab lta bu 
[\[50a.2\]]de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas theg pa chen po 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag tu gyur to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis ji tsam du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur cing 
[\[50a.3\]]dad pa bskyed par gyur pa'i gsung rab de la ltos/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_lha'i bu ded dpon 'di nyid 
[\[50a.4\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta 
[\[50a.5\]]ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/_
[\[50a.6\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid kyi sangs rgyas stong po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dge ba'i bkod pa de'i bu stong tham par gyur to/_/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa 
[\[50a.7\]]snyam du khyod som nyi dang yid gnyis za bar gyur na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu snying rje cher sems zhes bya bar gyur to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa rnams ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]shes bzhin gyi spyod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi tshul dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags sum khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[50b.2\]]sems skyes so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod ni lha'i bu ded dpon 'di dang lhan cig tu yun ring po nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas shing dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[50b.3\]]ba bskyed pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin la/_lam ni 'dus byas yin gyi/_kho bo ni 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yin pas de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs 
[\[50b.4\]]par spyod pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni spyod pa'i mtshan nyid yin gyi/_kho bo ni spyod pa med pa dang /_rab tu spyod pa med pa yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 
[\[50b.5\]]gnyis su sbyor ba yin gyi/_kho bo ni gnyis su sbyor ba yang ma yin la/_gnyis su med par sbyor ba yang ma yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po yin gyi/_kho bo ni 
[\[50b.6\]]gnyen pos rab tu phye ba ma yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos las 'byol ba yin gyi/_kho bo ni gzugs dang /_
[\[50b.7\]]sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos las 'byol ba ma yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni bdud kyi lam las yang dag par 'da' ba yin gyi/_kho bo ni bdud kyi lam las 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]yang dag par 'da' ba ma yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad yin gyi/_kho bo ni dge ba dang sdig pa la nges par sbyor bar mi byed de/_de'i phyir 
[\[51a.2\]]kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa yin gyi/_kho bo ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med pa thob pa ma yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par 
[\[51a.3\]]spyad pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba yin gyi/_kho bo ni 'khor ba las 'byol ba ma yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya ba de ni mya ngan las 'das 
[\[51a.4\]]pa'i lam du 'gro ba yin gyi/_kho bo ni mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba ma yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/zhes zer ba ni/_
[\[51a.5\]]btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs med cing bstan du med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshor ba med cing tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa yin 
[\[51a.6\]]pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du shes med cing 'du shes kyi mdud pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'du byed rnams med cing 'dus ma byas brnyes pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar 
[\[51a.7\]]mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa med cing yid gnas pa med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mig dang gzugs kyi yul ma yin zhing stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]gshegs pa ni rna ba dang sgra'i yul ma yin zhing mtshan ma med pa'i yul yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sna dang dri'i yul ma yin zhing gnyis dang bral ba yin pas/_de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni lce dang ro'i 
[\[51b.2\]]yul ma yin zhing rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang reg bya'i yul ma yin zhing thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni yid dang chos 
[\[51b.3\]]kyi yul ma yin zhing chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin nyid la gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang 'thun par zhugs pa yin 
[\[51b.4\]]pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyis rab tu phye ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chen po stong pa nyid la zhugs pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[51b.5\]]ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni spros pa thams cad yang dag par chad pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni dmigs pa med pa la zhugs pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar 
[\[51b.6\]]mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni khams gsum na mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni zag pa med pa yin pas 
[\[51b.7\]]de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten 'di dang /_'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_dbyibs dang bral ba yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 
[\[52a.2\]]thams cad du ma smad cing kha na ma tho ba med pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni spyod lam thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pa yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa dang /_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad 
[\[52a.3\]]du skur ba gdab tu med cing nam mkha' la bris pa lta bu yin pas de la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du 'jam dpal khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no zhes zer ba la/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni 'jig tshogs 
[\[52a.4\]]rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_srid pa'i sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_phyin ci log bzhi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_phung po lnga rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_skye mched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i gnas 
[\[52a.5\]]bdun rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_log pa brgyad rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_sems can gyi gnas dgu rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa 
[\[52a.6\]]ti'i bu bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_rig pa dang rnam par grol ba la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa dang /_lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa 
[\[52a.7\]]ba ma yin pa dang /_bden pa bzhi po dag la yongs su rtog pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_dbang po lngar 'du shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug la dmigs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sgro 'dogs pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]brgyad pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la lta ba skyed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_mi slob pa'i chos bcu la mngon par zhen pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/phung po'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_
[\[52b.2\]]nyon mongs pa'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_'chi bdag gi bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_lha'i bu'i bdud rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/sgrib pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_chod pa dang kun nas ldang ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_'gyod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[52b.3\]]ba yin no/_/bdag tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_sems can du lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_srog tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_gso ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/'byung bar lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_'jig par lta ba rtsa ba ma 
[\[52b.4\]]yin pa dang /_chad par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_rtag par lta ba rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_ma rig pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_'du byed rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_rnam par shes pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_ming dang 
[\[52b.5\]]gzugs rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_skye mched drug rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_reg pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_tshor ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_sred pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_len pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_srid pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_skye ba rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_rga shi rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_nad dang 
[\[52b.6\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/'dod pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_gzugs kyi khams rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/sbyin 
[\[52b.7\]]pas rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]snyoms kyis rlom sems su byed pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa rtsa ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba dang /_
[\[53a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi 'dor ba'i rtsa ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rtsa ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i rtsa ba dang /_rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i rtsa ba dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bslab pa 
[\[53a.3\]]thams cad yang dag par len pa'i rtsa ba dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba yang mi 'dod pa'i rtsa ba dang /_bzod pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dul ba dang /_des pa'i rtsa ba dang /_bdag dang /_gzhan la yang mi gnod pa'i rtsa ba dang /_brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rtsom pa'i rtsa ba 
[\[53a.4\]]dang /_dman pa'i chos yang dag par mi sdud pa'i rtsa ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi rtsa ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar mi byed pa'i rtsa ba dang /_shes rab kyi rtsa ba dang /_btang snyoms kyang ma yin pa'i rtsa ba dang /_thabs kyi rtsa ba dang /_thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub 
[\[53a.5\]]sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa'i rtsa ba dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/lus dang /_ngag 
[\[53a.6\]]dang /_sems kyi rgyun gyi rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/gzungs kyi shes pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/spobs pa mi chod pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/mngon par 
[\[53a.7\]]shes pa dang /_rig pa thob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba byin gyis rlob pa'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang /_lan 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don gyi gzhi rnam par nges par bstan pa gsum po 'di bshad pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba 
[\[53b.2\]]byin nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa der ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis byung 
[\[53b.3\]]ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/sems can gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/de dag gis ni bdud kyi las thams cad bkag pa yin no/_/de dag ni theg pa chen po 'di la 
[\[53b.4\]]snang ba thob pa yin no zhes kyang smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des smras pa la rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad nas lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu gang dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa de thos nas mos par 'gyur 
[\[53b.5\]]ba de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin te/_de dag ni de las gzhan pa'i cho 'phrul rnams kyis skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la mi rtag par bshad pa dang /_bde bar 'du shes pa rnams la sdug bsngal bar bshad pa dang 
[\[53b.6\]]bdag tu 'du shes pa rnams la bdag med par bshad pa dang /_sdug par 'du shes pa rnams la mi sdug par bshad pa dang /_dngos por 'du shes pa rnams la dngos po med par bshad pa dang /_lta bar 'du shes pa rnams la stong par bshad pa dang /_mtshan mar 'du shes pa rnams la mtshan 
[\[53b.7\]]ma med par bshad pa dang /_khams gsum par 'du shes pa rnams la smon pa med par bshad pa dang /_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin par 'du shes pa rnams la lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral bar bshad pa de ni 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa chen po yin te/_gang dag de la skrag par mi 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]'gyur ba de dag ni yang dag par dul ba yin pas na yang dag par dul ba rnams ni gang la yang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de gang las skrag par 'gyur ba'i chos 'di lta ste/_ngar 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa yongs su 'dzin pa de dag des yongs su ma bzung bas yongs su 
[\[54a.2\]]ma bzung ba la rten med pa dang /_rten med pa la g.yo ba med pa dang /_g.yo ba med pa la 'gul ba med pa dang /_'gul ba med pa la blang ba med pa dang /_blang ba med pa la dor ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa la 'dzin pa med pa dang /_'dzin pa med pa la mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa 
[\[54a.3\]]dang /_mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa la phyin ci log med pa dang /_phyin ci log med pa la log pa nyid med pa dang /_log pa nyid dang bral ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa yin pa dang /_yang dag par sgrub pa ni yang dag par lta ba yin pa dang /_yang dag par lta ba ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[54a.4\]]bar dag yin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang /_sems rnam par mi g.yeng ba la gnas pa med pa dang /_sems mi gnas pa la gnas med pa dang /_sems kyi gnas med pa la rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa dang /_rnam par rig pa 
[\[54a.5\]]med pa la brtag cing bsal ba med pa dang /_brtag cing bsal ba dang bral bas dmigs pa spangs pa dang /_dmigs pa med par gnas pa la sgrib pa med pa dang /_sgrib pa med par gnas pa la rlom sems med pa dang /_gang gi tshe rlom sems med pa de'i tshe lhag par rlom pa med pa dang /_
[\[54a.6\]]gang gi tshe lhag par rlom pa med pa de'i tshe bdag dang gzhan du mthong ba med pa dang /_med pa la yongs su gdung ba med pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba med pa la sgyid lug pa med pa dang /_sgyid lug pa med pa la nyon mongs pa'i rgyu med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i sems la gsal ba 
[\[54a.7\]]snang ba dang /_gsal ba thob pas ye shes mthong ba dang /_ye shes mthong ba la gnas pa'i sems kyi shes pa rgya che ba dang /_sems kyi shes pa rgya chen po la gnas pa la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa dang /_bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa la sgrib pa med pa mngon du gyur pa dang /_
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]sgrib pa med pa la gnas pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu gang byas pa med cing skye ba med pa'i chos rnams la chos kyi [{]go rims kyi [,]go rim gyi [}]mtshams sbyar ba de ltar ston pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[54b.2\]]nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ci dang ci 'dri ba de dang de nyid kyi tshig gi mtshams las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang ngo /_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/_de dag ni ji ltar 
[\[54b.3\]]'dod pa de bzhin du sgrub par byed do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mi zad pa ste/_de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du ston par byed do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/_de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rjod par byed do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos 
[\[54b.4\]]thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa ste/_de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par 'jog par byed do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni mthong ba med pa ste/_de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par dgod par byed do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni btang 
[\[54b.5\]]snyoms pa ste/_de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'chad par byed do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos de dag ni gang nas kyang ma blangs/_gang du yang ma khrid pa ste/_de dag ni bsags pa yang ma yin/_spungs pa yang ma yin no/_/de dag ni bshad kyang rung /_ma bshad kyang rung ste/_
[\[54b.6\]]chos kyi de bzhin nyid de mi 'dor ba yin no/_/sems can thams cad kyi yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa'i yi ge 'byung ba gang yin pa'i yi ge de dag thams cad ni lus las kyang ma byung /_sems las kyang ma byung ba ste/_rgyu dang rkyen nyid las 
[\[54b.7\]]byung ba yin no/_/ji ltar yi ge rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la yang bsags pa med do/_/ji ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la yang bsags 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]pa med do/_/ji ltar nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa thams cad la bsags pa med pa de bzhin du shes pa gang gis nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i shes pa de la yang bsags pa med de/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang mi gnas pa'i shes pas mi gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs 
[\[55a.2\]]pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/_/de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa gang yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'i shes pa dang /_phung 
[\[55a.3\]]po yongs su spangs pa la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_skye ba shes pa dang /_'byung ba shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_lam ngan pa rnam par bcad pa shes pa dang /_rgyu 
[\[55a.4\]]shes pa dang /_chud mi za ba shes pa dang /_'bras bu shes pa dang /_mngon sum du bya ba spang ba shes pa dang /_rkyen shes pa dang /_tshogs bsags pa shes pa dang /_bden pa shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la lta zhing thob par bya ba shes pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa 
[\[55a.5\]]dang /_'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa med pa shes pa dang /_phung po shes pa dang /_phung po'i bdud spang ba shes pa dang /_khams shes pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang /_skye mched shes pa dang /_grong stong pa lta bur so sor rtog pa'i shes pa dang /_sbyin pa shes pa dang /_dus 
[\[55a.6\]]dang dus ma yin pa las mi 'da' ba shes pa dang /_tshul khrims shes pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang /_bzod pa shes pa dang /_sems can rjes su srung ba shes pa dang /_brtson 'grus shes pa dang /_legs par byas pa'i las bya ba 
[\[55a.7\]]shes pa dang /_bsam gtan shes pa dang /_bsam gtan las ldog pa shes pa dang /_shes rab shes pa dang /_lta ba yongs su shes pa dang /_thabs shes pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa dang /_byams pa shes pa dang /_sems can bskyab pa shes 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]pa dang /_snying rje shes pa dang /_yongs su mi skyo ba shes pa dang /_dga' ba shes pa dang /_chos la dga' zhing rab tu dga' la mchog tu dga' ba shes pa dang /_btang snyoms shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa shes pa dang /_sems can gzhug pa shes pa dang /_
[\[55b.2\]]tha snyad shes pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa dang /_gnas med pa la gnas pa shes pa dang /_yang dag pa'i spong ba shes pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shes pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med par so sor rtog pa shes pa dang /_dad pa'i 
[\[55b.3\]]dbang po dang /_stobs shes pa dang /_chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_stobs shes pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa shes pa dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_stobs shes pa dang /_chos thams cad mi brjed 
[\[55b.4\]]pa shes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_stobs shes pa dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po dang /_stobs shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag shes pa dang /_
[\[55b.5\]]rang byung gi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa dang /_lam ngan pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba shes pa dang /_snying rje chen po la lhag par dmigs pa shes pa dang /_zad pa shes pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa shes pa dang /_skye ba med pa shes pa 
[\[55b.6\]]dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 'grub pa shes pa dang /_chos rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba shes pa dang /_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /_phyir mi ldog 
[\[55b.7\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang dag par 'du ba shes pa dang /_gtong ba rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba shes pa dang /_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa shes pa dang /_smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang /_lha rjes su 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]dran pa shes pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar shes pa dang /_sems can gyi dbang po shes pa dang /_rim pa rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /_thos pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba shes pa dang /_tshogs thams cad kyis mi ngoms pa shes pa dang /_sman thams 
[\[56a.2\]]cad shes pa dang /_rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba shes pa dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang /_gnas ma yin pa mi bya bar shes pa dang /_stobs bcu shes pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa dang rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa shes pa dang /_
[\[56a.3\]]bar du gcod pa dang /_bar du gcod pa ma yin pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /_'das pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang /_rnam par shes pa mi gnas par shes pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang /_chos thams cad las yang dag par mi 'da' ba shes pa dang /_
[\[56a.4\]]da ltar byung ba'i dus [#]ma thogs pa'i shes pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_rab tu gnas pa med pa shes pa dang /_lus sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi lus la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_ngag sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sgra rab tu dbye ba 
[\[56a.5\]]shes pa dang /_yid sngon du 'gro ba shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang /_'khrul pa med pa'i shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'khrul pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i shes 
[\[56a.6\]]pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba shes pa dang /_mi brjed pa'i shes pa dang /_sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can dran pa la 'jog pa shes pa dang /_dgongs pa rab tu 'dzin pa shes pa dang /_sems can le lo can yongs su gzung 
[\[56a.7\]]ba shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shes pa dang /_gdul ba'i sems can 'dul ba rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang /_thabs shes pa dang /_shes rab shes pa ste/_lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa yin te/_shes pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa 'thob bo/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang /_'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes pa de ni ngo mtshar te/_shes pa de ni go cha ngan ngon dang 
[\[56b.2\]]ldan pas yang dag par bsdu bar mi nus so/_/'jam dpal gang de lta bu'i shes pa skyed par byed pa de yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no//_//bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha legs par bgos pa yin/_'jam dpal 
[\[56b.3\]]gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sems can rnams la skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' ni go cha legs par bgos pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya/_
[\[56b.4\]]smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas kyi rjes su 'jug pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya/_smras pa/_lha'i bu brtsams pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang /_ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sems 
[\[56b.5\]]dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya/_smras pa/_lha'i bu shes rab kyis gzung ba med pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang /_thabs kyis chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pas de'i phyir sems can mchog ces bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i 
[\[56b.6\]]phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang nyon mongs pa'i dri ma rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom par yang byed pas de'i phyir sems can dag pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir sems can rnam 
[\[56b.7\]]par dag pa zhes bya/_smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ltar sems can thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnam par sbyong bar byed pas de'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya/_smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ltar lam de la gnas nas sems can 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su smin par byed pas de'i phyir 'dren pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir rnam par 'dren pa zhes bya/_smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ltar gdul ba'i sems can rnams shin tu 'dul ba la rab tu 'god par byed pas/_de'i phyir rnam par 
[\[57a.2\]]'dren pa zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu ji tsam gyis bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir srid pa len par byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba yin no/_/
[\[57a.3\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thul bar dka' ba yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ltar sngon dam bcas pa dang /_sngon gyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dag la 'dod par mi byed pa de lta bu ni thul bar dka' ba yin 
[\[57a.4\]]no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i shes rab dang thabs kyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir kun tu snang ba de tsam gyis na byang chub 
[\[57a.5\]]sems dpa' mngon par 'phags pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i tshig gis sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smra ba zil gyis gnon par byed pa de lta bu ni 
[\[57a.6\]]chos smra ba yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na 'dul ba smra ba yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag tshul khrims la gnas la sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang /_kun nas ldang ba rnam par bsal ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa de lta bu ni 'dul ba smra ba yin no/_/
[\[57a.7\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na don smra ba yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe thos pa thams cad la nan tan snying por byed cing don rjes su rtogs pa de lta bu ni don smra ba yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la phan pa'i 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa thams cad sems can rnams la stobs par byed pa de lta bu ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang 
[\[57b.2\]]chub sems dpa' drang po yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe bdag gi nyes pa mi 'chab pa de lta bu ni drang po yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi 
[\[57b.3\]]gya gyu can rnams la khong khro bar mi byed pa de'i phyir dam pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na g.yo med pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji skad smras pa'i tshig las mi 'da' ba de lta bu ni g.yo med pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na sgyu med pa yin/_smras pa/_
[\[57b.4\]]lha'i bu gang gi tshe ji ltar sems kyis mngon par bsgrub pa de bzhin du tshig tu rjod pa de lta bu ni sgyu med pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na nga rgyal med pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la 'dud par byed cing mi dge ba mi byed pa de lta bu ni nga rgyal med pa yin 
[\[57b.5\]]no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin bdag yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe yongs su bsdus pa'i byang chub kyang gtong bar byed na dngos po gzhan dag lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/_
[\[57b.6\]]smras pa/_lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong na srog gi phyir yang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na bzod pa smra ba yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe gnod pa bzod cing gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam 
[\[57b.7\]]dpal ji ltar na brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang rnam par bsams na chos 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i khams su phyis mi snang ba yin no/_/
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na shes rab dang ldan pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang shes rab kyi bya ba sbyin par mi byed pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byams pa la gnas pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can gyi khams la stong pa nyid du 
[\[58a.2\]]rnam par lta ba yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na snying rje la gnas pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur shes nas/_byang chub la brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na dga' ba la gnas pa yin/_
[\[58a.3\]]smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe thub cing zhi la rab tu zhi ba thob cing chos yongs su tshol ba la dga' bas mi ngoms pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[58a.4\]]chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lus yongs su dag pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe yid las byung ba'i lus kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'thun par ston pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji 
[\[58a.5\]]ltar na ngag yongs su dag pa yin/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad kyi sgra yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na sems yongs su dag pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems gcig gis sems 
[\[58a.6\]]can thams cad kyi sems rnams rab tu shes pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong la gzugs dben par yang ston pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam 
[\[58a.7\]]dpal ji ltar na lha'i rna ba thob pa yin/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe sgra thams cad thos la sgra dben par yang ston pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na pha rol gyi sems la mkhas pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems skyes pa zhig par gyur pa rnams kyi sems 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]kyi rgyun rab tu shes pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe sngon gyi mtha'i mu rjes su dran zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' las kyang mi g.yo ba yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa yin/_/smras 
[\[58b.2\]]pa/_lha'i bu gang bdud thams cad kyang ston la bdud kyi las rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na dul ba yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na bsrungs pa yin/_smras pa/_
[\[58b.3\]]lha'i bu dbang po thams cad mi g.yeng ba yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na rnam par dul ba yin/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe mi 'khrugs pa'i chos su gyur pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na zhi ba yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung 
[\[58b.4\]]ba thams cad kyis gdung ba med la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang pa'i phyir yang chos ston pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na dad pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs kyis phye yang mi phyed pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[58b.5\]]ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yin/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la byang chub la rag las par mthong ba yin no/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[58b.6\]]sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal legs so/_/legs so/_/khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[58b.7\]]kyi ming bshad pa de dang /_skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan de dag legs par smras te/_gzhan yang dpag tu med pa dag yod do/_/lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas na khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu ma sprul pa'i sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed 'gags pa de snyed la'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal sprul pa nyid la yang sems 
[\[59a.2\]]dang sems las byung ba dag med na ma sprul pa la lta ci smos/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ngo bo nyid de lta bu'i mtshan nyid yin la/_de dag la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyang de lta bu yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas sbyin 
[\[59a.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig la khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad ces dris na ci de lan ldon par byed dam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni cung zad kyang lan ldon par mi byed do/_/
[\[59a.4\]]smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo yang sprul pa de nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pas na kho bos ji skad du kho bo yun ring po 'di tsam zhig nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do/_/zhes lan gdab par bya/_smras pa/_'jam dpal 'o na ci khyod ser sna can yin nam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin te/_
[\[59a.5\]]kho bo ni ser sna can yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang yongs su mi gtong ba de ser sna can ma yin nam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci zhig yongs su mi gtong /_smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 
[\[59a.6\]]cad dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni ser sna can yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na khyod ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin te/_kho bo ni tshul khrims 'chal 
[\[59a.7\]]ba yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te/_de skad smras/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang tshul khrims 'chal pa de ngan song gsum po de dag tu ltung ba ma yin nam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]phyir bsams bzhin du ngan song rnams su 'gro ste/_de'i phyir kho bo ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci khyod gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin nam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin te/_kho bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no/_/smras pa/_
[\[59b.2\]]'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa de rjes su chags pa med pa ma yin nam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo yang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang /_byis pa thams cad dang /_nyan thos 
[\[59b.3\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la rjes su chags pa med de/_de'i phyir kho bo ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci khyod le lo can yin nam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin te/_kho bo ni le lo can yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci las 
[\[59b.4\]]bsams te de skad smra/_smras pa/_lha'i bu le lo can zhes bya ba ni gang lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis mi rtsom pa yin la/_kho bo yang rtsom pa med cing rnyed par mi byed pa dang /_len pa med pa dang /_'dor ba med pa yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni le lo can yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[59b.5\]]ci khyod sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin nam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin te/_kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi sems rnam par grol ba la mi gnas pa de sems rnam par g.yengs pa 
[\[59b.6\]]ma yin nam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo yang 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba la sems mi gnas pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par g.yengs ba yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni sems rnam par g.yengs pa yin 
[\[59b.7\]]no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci khyod shes rab 'chal pa yin nam/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin te/_kho bo ni shes rab 'chal pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te/_de skad smra/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang 'khor bas mi skrag cing sems can rmongs pa rnams 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]dang lhan cig na dga' ba de shes rab 'chal ba ma yin nam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo yang 'khor bas mi skrag cing de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rmongs pa rnams dang lhan cig na dga' ba yin te/_de'i phyir kho bo ni shes 
[\[60a.2\]]rab 'chal ba yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal 'jig rten na sbyin gnas su yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang dag gsad pa gsod pa'i sems skyed pa rnams so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gsad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags 
[\[60a.3\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams te/_gang de dag gsod par byed pa de ni gsad pa gsod par byed pa yin pas de ni 'jig rten na sbyin gnas yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu ni 'jig rten gnas pa skrag par 'gyur ba yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu 
[\[60a.4\]]gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' skrag par 'gyur na ni 'jig rten gnas pa yang skrag par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag gang du 'gro bar 
[\[60a.5\]]'gyur/_smras pa/_lha'i bu de dag ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/_smras pa/_lha'i bu pha rol gyi sgra nyan pa ma spangs par ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyon 
[\[60a.6\]]med par zhugs pa la ni yi ge'i 'jug pa med pas na gang dag mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/_smras pa/_lha'i bu rnam par grol ba ni yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med do/_/
[\[60a.7\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu gang dag rnam par grol ba de dag thams cad sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin nam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis chos bstan pa ni gnyen po med 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa yin no/_/smras pa/_lha'i bu stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la ni gnyen po brjod par mi nus so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni sems can thams cad la 
[\[60b.2\]]byams par gnas pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can ma gtogs par stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe sems can thams cad rten 
[\[60b.3\]]cing 'brel par 'byung bar mthong zhing de la rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar lta bar yang mi ltung ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi khams kyi mtha' khong du chud pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal sems can gyi khams gang dang ldan pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu sems can 
[\[60b.4\]]gyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings khams gang dang ldan pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi khams dang ldan pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams gang dang ldan pa yin/_smras 
[\[60b.5\]]pa/_lha'i bu yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i khams dang ldan pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal yul gang sangs rgyas kyi yul yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mig dang /_gzugs 
[\[60b.6\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no/_/rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no/_/sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sna dang /_dri dang /_rnam 
[\[60b.7\]]par shes pa'i yul ma yin no/_/lce'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lce dang /_ro dang /_rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no/_/lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lus dang /_reg bya dang /_rnam par 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]shes pa'i yul ma yin no/_/yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni yid dang /_chos dang rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gzugs su rung ba'i 
[\[61a.2\]]yul ma yin no/_/tshor ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni myong ba'i yul ma yin no/_/'du shes kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni kun tu g.yo ba'i yul ma yin no/_/'du byed kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin 
[\[61a.3\]]te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i yul ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rnam par rig pa'i yul ma yin no/_/ma rig pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rgyu dang rkyen 
[\[61a.4\]]gyi yul ma yin no/_/rga shi'i bar dag gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags so sor rnam par rig pa'i 
[\[61a.5\]]yul ma yin no/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'i yul ma yin no/_/gzugs med pa'i khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni lta ba las rnam par grol ba'i yul ma yin no/_/
[\[61a.6\]]'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gnyis su sbyor ba'i yul ma yin no/_/'dus byas kyi khams kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa'i yul ma yin no/_/lha'i bu de ni 
[\[61a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul yin te/_mtha' dang mtha' ma yin pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir yul der ni yul thams cad 'dus shing khongs su chud pa yin no/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni yul de lta bur zhugs shing don gyi yul thams cad la rnam par spyod kyang bdud kyi yul thob pa yang ma yin te/_
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]des ni bdud kyi yul dang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang mnyam zhing dben pa'i yul du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud do/_/lha'i bu gang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' ba 'di yang cho 'phrul chen po yin no/_/de la 
[\[61b.2\]]mnyam pa nyid ni gang /_mi mnyam pa nyid ni gang zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/_/gang dag stong pa nyid la mi 'jug pa de ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang stong pa nyid kyi mnyam 
[\[61b.3\]]pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/chos thams cad mtshan ma med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/_/gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mtshan ma med 
[\[61b.4\]]pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/chos thams cad smon pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/_/gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang smon pa 
[\[61b.5\]]med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med par mnyam pa nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/_/gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' ni de dag yongs su 
[\[61b.6\]]smin par byed kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo'o/_/chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang /_'byung ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang /_'gag pa med par mnyam pa nyid dang /_'dod chags dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid dang /_dben par mnyam pa 
[\[61b.7\]]nyid dang /_dngos po med par mnyam pa nyid dang /_'gog par mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mnyam par nyid du mnyam pa de ni mnyam pa nyid yin no/_/gang dag mnyam pa nyid de la mi 'jug pa de dag ni mi mnyam par gnas pa yin te/_byang chub sems 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]dpa' ni de dag yongs su smin par byed kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g.yo ste/_lha'i bu de ltar mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[62a.2\]]nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar 
[\[62a.3\]]na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu 'dod chags kyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/zhe sdang 
[\[62a.4\]]gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/gti mug gi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_
[\[62a.5\]]shes rab kyi bya ba sgrub par byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/ser sna med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/_sbyin pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang bral ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa 
[\[62a.6\]]yin te/_tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/gnod sems med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/_bzod pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/le lo med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/_
