[\[62a.7\]]brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/rnam par g.yeng ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/_bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/'chal pa'i shes rab med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]kyi spyod pa yin te/_shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/nyon mongs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin te/_nyon mongs pa med pas rlom sems su byed pa'i spyod pa ni ma yin no/_/nang dang phyi'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas brtse ba 
[\[62b.2\]]med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/bu dang /_bu mo dang /_chung ma yongs su gtong bas mngon par dga' ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/'dod pa'i yon tan la smod pas rtag tu gnod sems kyi spyod pa ni byang chub 
[\[62b.3\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pas mi lta ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/lus dang srog la mi lta bas lta ba med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su gtong 
[\[62b.4\]]bas tsham tshom med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/'khor ba dpag tu med pas mi skrag pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad kyi khur sgrol bas khur chen po sgrol ba'i spyod pa ni byang 
[\[62b.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sngar dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/rjes su 'gyod pa med pas yid la gcags pa med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa 
[\[62b.6\]]yin no/_/theg pa thams cad zil gyis mnan pas mngon par 'phags pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/yi dam ma zhig pas go cha rdo rje lta bu'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems la 
[\[62b.7\]]nges par sems pas rang gi sems la nges par sems pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/las byas pa chud mi za bas chud mi za ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas tha dad pa 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]med pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/dgra thams cad nges par bcom pas dpa' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/skal pa mnyam pa'i skye bo dang /_'thun par 'jug pas ma 'dres pa'i spyod pa ni byang 
[\[63a.2\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/gshe ba dang sdang ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pas rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas blta ba dang /_chos mnyan pa dang /_bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba la mchog 
[\[63a.3\]]tu dga' bas dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan par byed pas rgyan gyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/
[\[63a.4\]]mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa'i gnyen por gyur pas zil gyis mi non pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/skye bo mkhas shing mdzangs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pas ngan pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/tshul 
[\[63a.5\]]bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu nges par brtags pas mi rdzi ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/khur blangs pa nyams su lon pas skyes bu dam pa'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/brtson 'grus brtan pos phyir mi ldog par 
[\[63a.6\]]khyad par du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sdud pas chos spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pas byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba'i spyod pa ni byang chub sems 
[\[63a.7\]]dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/dkon mchog gsum 'bri bar mi byed pas dkon mchog gi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/sdud pa dang yongs su gcod pas shes rab dang thabs kyi spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yin no/_/byang chub sems 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[63b.2\]]rnams kyi spyod pa de ni legs par smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag spyod pa de dang ma bral ba de dag ni de nyid kyis lung bstan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe nga spyod pa de dang ma bral bar gyur 
[\[63b.3\]]pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/_der ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/lha'i bu gang spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa de lta bu 
[\[63b.4\]]de dag rab tu 'byed par byed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi skye ba zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/_'jug pa gang gis na/_byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos 
[\[63b.5\]]la bzod pa thob pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu mi skye ba zhes bya ba de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i mu'i mtshan nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin te/_de ni sngon byung bar gyur la phyis ma byung bar gyur pa ma yin te/_de ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no/_/de ni 
[\[63b.6\]]sngon srid par gyur la phyis mi srid par gyur pa ma yin te/_de ni gzod ma nas mi srid pa nyid yin no/_/de ni sngon skyes par gyur la phyis ma skyes par gyur pa ma yin te/_de ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid yin no/_/de ni sngon mngon par 'dus byas pa yin la phyis mngon par 'dus ma byas 
[\[63b.7\]]pa ma yin te/_de ni gzod ma nas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa nyid yin no/_/de ni sngon yod par gyur la phyis med par gyur pa ma yin te/_de ni gzod ma nas 'gyur ba med pa nyid yin no/_/de ni sngon gang zag tu bgrang bar gyur la phyis gang zag tu mi bgrang bar gyur pa ma yin te/_de ni 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]gzod ma nas stong pa nyid yin no/_/de ni sngon mtshan mar bgrang bar gyur la phyis mtshan mar mi bgrang bar gyur pa ma yin te/_de ni gzod ma nas mtshan ma med pa nyid yin no/_/gang gis de ltar rjes su rtogs pa dang /_sems kyis skye ba dang /_'jig pa la mngon par 
[\[64a.2\]]zhen pa med par rtogs pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o/_/de la bzod pa gang zhe na/_de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du zhing thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/de dag 
[\[64a.3\]]ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du slob pa dang /_mi slob pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas thams 
[\[64a.4\]]cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/de dag ji ltar mi skye ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang bzod pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/bzod pa de yang skad cig pa yin te/_gang gis skad cig pa yin zhe na/_skad cig pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/_/stong pa nyid ni 
[\[64a.5\]]stong pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/_/mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin no/_/ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa 
[\[64a.6\]]yin no/_/ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/_/ji ltar stong 
[\[64a.7\]]pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pas skad cig pa yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin no/_/ji ltar stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pas skad cig 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]pa yin pa de bzhin du skye mched thams cad kyang skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te/_skad cig pa gang yin pa de ni ya ma brla yin no/_/ya ma brla gang yin pa de ni gsog yin no/_/gsog gang yin pa de ni gsob yin no/_/gsob gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags 
[\[64b.2\]]med pa yin no/_/'dod chags med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no/_/'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid med pa yin no/_/ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa yin te/_de ni chos thams cad stong pa dang /_skad cig pa dang /_ya ma brla 
[\[64b.3\]]dang /_dben pa dang /_gsog ces bya ste/_chos thams cad de ltar bzod pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya'o/_/bzod pa de yang bzod pa nyid kyis skad cig pa yin te/_de ltar mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lung bstan pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob 
[\[64b.4\]]pa yin no/_/bzod pa de yang dmigs pas rab tu phye ba ma yin te/_de la dmigs pa gang zhe na/_gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyi gar dmigs na de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can dang /_srog dang /_gsob dang /_gang zag dang /_bzod pa gnyi gar dmigs na 
[\[64b.5\]]de ni dmigs pa zhes bya'o/_/de la dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/_gang gi tshe bdag dang bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can dang /_srog dang /_gsob dang /_gang zag dang /_bzod pa gnyi gar mi dmigs pa de ni dmigs pa med pa 
[\[64b.6\]]zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni ngo bo nyid gtan med pa yin no/_/ngo bo nyid gtan med pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa yin te/_ngo bo nyid de dang /_bzod pa de la gnyis su rjes su rtog par 
[\[64b.7\]]mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa med pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med par spyod pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa yin no/_/bzod pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/'jig rten 'di snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to/_/sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra 'khrol bar gyur to/_/me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu bab bo/_/srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[65a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong gis ni chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can du zhugs par gyur 
[\[65a.3\]]pa de lta bu yang kun tu snang bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe chos nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kha dog 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon 
[\[65a.4\]]po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/_de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/_nyi ma dang zla ba dag gi 'od 
[\[65a.5\]]kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang phyir log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom 
[\[65a.6\]]ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/thub pa ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad gyur pa/_/mi mnyam gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod la zhu/_/'od kyi bkod pa mdzad pa khyod la zhu/_/rab 
[\[65a.7\]]rib nyon mongs spong ba khyod la zhu/_/bde gshegs ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa/_/pha rol tshogs rnams 'joms pa khyod la zhu/_/bdud dpung tha mar mdzad pa khyod la zhu/_/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa khyod la zhu/_/rgyal ba ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]yon tan mtshan brgyan pa/_/bde gshegs rab dga' bde ba mdzad pa po/_/gzugs kyi dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu/_/bcom ldan ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa/_/mkhyen pa mtha' yas yon tan ston pa po/_/ye shes 'byung gnas 'gro ba shes mdzad pa/_/ye shes ljon 
[\[65b.2\]]shing mkhyen pa mchog la zhu/_/'jig rten gsum grags grags pa mtha' yas pa/_/gsum rig dri gsum tha mar mdzad pa po/_/'jig rten gsum rig rnam thar gsum mthar byon/_/ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad/_/sman pa dam pa skye rga mthar mdzad pa/_/bcom 
[\[65b.3\]]ldan zhabs la dra mchog 'khor lo mnga'/_/sred med sras po rdo rje mkhregs pa po/_/thub pa 'dzum mdzad sbyor ba bka' stsal gsol/_/gang gis spyod pa de ni rnam sbyangs sam/_/gang 'dir bzod pa de dag yongs rdzogs sam/_/gang sems sangs rgyas yon tan nges gyur 
[\[65b.4\]]tam/_/ci yi slad du thub chen 'dzum pa mdzad/_/bde gshegs zla med rgyu zhig mi mnga' bar/_/bcom ldan 'dren pa 'dzum pa mi ston pas/_/de thos sems can glo ba rangs 'gyur gyis/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs can legs par gsung dbyung gsol/_/de skad ces 
[\[65b.5\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/
[\[65b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang khyod kyis lha'i bu ded dpon 'di mthong ngam/_gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[65b.7\]]dga' bo lha'i bu ded dpon 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dag la bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_rim gror byas/_mchod pa byas/_yongs su zhu ba byas/_yongs su dri ba byas shing /_sems can dpag tu med pa dag 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go_/kun dga' bo lha'i bu ded dpon 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa sum brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 
[\[66a.2\]]dag pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[66a.3\]]mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rgyal po 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa de yang rin po che sna 
[\[66a.4\]]bdun 'di lta ste/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang /_mu tig dmar po las grub cing lag mthil ltar mnyam la/_rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su kun nas bkab par 'gyur te/_
[\[66a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams der nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag gis ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dag dang /_bdud rnams dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams kyi ming yang med cing mi 'byung 
[\[66a.6\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad po dag kyang med la bza' ba dang /_btung ba dag kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ltung ba dang /_'khrul pa'i nyes pa dag dang /_sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang 'byung 
[\[66a.7\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag gi longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa yang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_phal cher bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon 
[\[66b.2\]]tan rgyal po 'od de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang smon lam gyi dbang gis bar ma dor 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dung phyur 
[\[66b.3\]]phrag drug dang bye ba phrag gnyis su 'gyur te/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa dang /_gang dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa de dag 'jig rten gyi 
[\[66b.4\]]khams yongs su dag pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgyal po 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[66b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba zhig 'dus te/_'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis mngon par gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol 
[\[66b.6\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa der skye zhing 'khor 
[\[66b.7\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo lha'i bu spyan ras gzigs 'di ni gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po 'od de bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[67a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe 'di yang der 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po legs mthong zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_/des bcom ldan 'das de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas shing /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byas 
[\[67a.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_
[\[67a.4\]]'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong de yang dus gzhan zhig na bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag nas bcom 
[\[67a.5\]]ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de la byang chub sems dpa' legs mthong 'di ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa 
[\[67a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i bu ded dpon la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan tam/_
[\[67a.7\]]smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu kho bo ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lung bstan pa ltar lung bstan te/_da ltar gyi de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu yin pas de bzhin nyid de la ni 'phel ba yang med la yongs su 'grib pa yang med do/_/de nas 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/shod cig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_da ltar dang ma 'ongs 
[\[67b.2\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba rjes su yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bzung lags na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci 
[\[67b.3\]]lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa zhes bya ba dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi le'u 
[\[67b.4\]]zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_mos pa dang /_mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_rab tu 'don pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa de dag ni bsod nams 
[\[67b.5\]]thams cad kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha'i bu ded dpon dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar 
[\[67b.6\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa lha'i bu ded dpon gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u 
[\[67b.7\]]ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_pradz+nya barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]{D67}]@#/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa ste byams pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mai tre ya ma hA sing ha nA da nA ma ma hA yA 
[\[68a.2\]]na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa byams pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal 
[\[68a.3\]]bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_dpal gyi 
[\[68a.4\]]snying po dang /_byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 
[\[68a.5\]]'dug par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[68a.6\]]gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung 
[\[68a.7\]]chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal bas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar rnal 'byor 
[\[68b.2\]]du bgyi lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung legs so legs so/_/'od srung khyod 'di ltar skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la rjes su 
[\[68b.3\]]snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/_khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legs so/_/'od srung de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang 
[\[68b.4\]]ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[68b.5\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang /_cho ga phun sum tshogs pa dang /_spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba phra rab 
[\[68b.6\]]tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te bslab par bya'o/_/brkam chags med pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa med pa dang /_kha gsag med pa dang /_gzhogs slong med pa dang /_thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang /_
[\[68b.7\]]rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa med pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang ldan pa dang /_'dzem pa dang ldan par bya'o/_/'khor ba la yid skrag pa dang /_nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_nges par 'byung ba la mngon par brtson pa dang /_'khor 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]ba la rtag tu yid skyo ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba la phan yon du blta bar bya zhing shing drung na 'dug kyang rung /_ri la 'dug kyang rung /_gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung /_phug na 'dug kyang rung /_des de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya ste/_
[\[69a.2\]]'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_
[\[69a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gdung rgyud phun sum tshogs pa/_rigs phun sum tshogs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/_tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas dpag tu med pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis dpag 
[\[69a.4\]]tu med pa/_yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_gzhal du med pa dang /_tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_bden pa gsung ba/_yang dag pa gsung ba/_ji skad gsung ba de bzhin du mdzad pa/_mi slu bar mdzad pa/_
[\[69a.5\]]'phags pa/_sman pa chen po/_zug rngu 'byin pa/_ma gsol bar bshes gnyen mdzad pa/_thugs rje dang ldan pa/_ded dpon chen po yin te/_de ni chos mya ngan las 'das pa/_zab pa zab par snang ba/_zhi ba zhi bar ston pa/_stong pa/_sems can med pa/_
[\[69a.6\]]'khrul pa med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_mtshan ma yang dag par chad pa/_smon pa med pa/_smon pa dang bral ba/_spros pa med pa/_spros pa dang bral ba/_mthong bar dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_nye bar gtod pa/_dngos po dang bral ba/_dben pa/_
[\[69a.7\]]dben pa dang bral ba/_dngos po med pa/_dngos pos ma gos pa/_rgyu ba med pa/_rgyu ba yang dag par chad pa/_'gro ba dang bral ba/_brjod du med pa/_brjod pa dang bral ba/_rlom sems med pa/_kun du bstan pa/_rnyog pa med pa/_rnyog pa dang bral ba/_
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]blang ba med pa/_dor ba med pa/_sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba/_sred pa yang dag par chad pa ston par mdzad pa/_yang dag par ston par mdzad pa yin no zhes rnam pa las yid la bya'o/_/'od srung de la dge slong gcig pu dben par song ste/_nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs 
[\[69b.2\]]pas ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya ste/_bdag gis mi'i lus thob cing rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po yang thob/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yang mnyes par byas pas na bdag le lo byed pa dang /_
[\[69b.3\]]bya ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzis g.yen spyo zhing gnas pa ni bdag gi mi cha'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag la 'bras bu ma thob pa kho nar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de lta bu yang yod la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[69b.4\]]dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas de lta na bdag gis da ltar byung ba dang /_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/zhes de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las 
[\[69b.5\]]yid la bya'o/_/'od srung de la dge slong gis ni khyod dang /_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi rjes su bslab par bya ste/_'od srung 'di ltar khyod nga ma mthong ma thos par 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi rjes su slob pa 
[\[69b.6\]]na rab tu byung ba ni 'od srung khyod chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la mdzes par gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing mthong nas kyang nye bar 'ongs te/_rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gsol bar byed pa de dag gi 
[\[69b.7\]]rab tu byung ba ni de'i 'og tu yang de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su mkhyen to/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo don gyi dbang gnyis mthong bas ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar khas blang bar bya ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_tshe 'di la 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/_/'od srung de la skyes bu blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gos ngur smrig dag bgos shing rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[70a.2\]]pa dge slong gi dngos po khas blangs te bslab pa rnams blangs nas gnas khang du song ngam/_phug tu song ste sgo bcad nas 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed cing /_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag 
[\[70a.3\]]dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos kyi rnam par rtog pa dag dang /_mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /_slong mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par yang byed la/_de dag 'di snyam du yang sems te/_bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mi mkhyen 
[\[70a.4\]]mi rig rnam par mi rtogs so/_/snyam du yang sems so/_/'od srung gang gi tshe dge slong gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung /_phug na 'dug kyang rung /_'chag sa na 'dug kyang rung ste/_'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam/_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag gam/_rnam par 'tshe ba'i 
[\[70a.5\]]rnam par rtog pa dag gam/_mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag la rnam par rtog par byed pa de'i tshe gnas khang ngam/_phug gam/_'chag sa de na lha gang dag gnyug ma gnyug mar gnas pa de dag gis dge slong de'i sems sems kyis 
[\[70a.6\]]shes nas de dag 'di snyam du dge slong 'di gang gi phyir legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag la rnam par rtog par byed pa ni mi rigs so snyam nas yi ma rangs pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde 
[\[70a.7\]]bar 'gyur te/_'od srung de la lha de dag las kha cig ni skul bar yang byed/_kha cig gis ni snod ma yin par rig nas khyad du bsad de 'khod par yang byed do/_/'od srung ltos/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang /_shes pa chung ngu dang ldan pa'i lha de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]sems shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa nas legs par spyod pa spyad pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mi mkhyen pa'am/_ma gzigs pa'am/_thugs su ma chud pa 'am/_mngon sum 
[\[70b.2\]]du ma mdzad pa ci yang mi mnga' ste/_'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_dus las rnam par grol ba dang /_brjod par mi bya ba'i shes bya rnam pa lnga la ye shes thogs pa med pa dang /_ldan zhing the tshom dang bral ba 
[\[70b.3\]]yin no/_/'od srung de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bas bdag nyid rang la rag lus par shes nas de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen la/_gang dag phyogs bcu 
[\[70b.4\]]mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen pas na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas dge sbyong gi chom rkun mi bya'o zhes bslab 
[\[70b.5\]]par bya'o/_/'od srung de la dge sbyong gi chom rkun gang zhe na/_bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'od srung 'di la dge slong dge sbyong gi kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_dbyibs la gnas shing /_de yang tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /_
[\[70b.6\]]sdig pa'i chos can yin par gyur na de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun dang po yin no/_/dben pa'i gnas su song ste gnas pa na mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed na de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun gnyis pa yin no/_/bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so 
[\[70b.7\]]skye bo yin par shes bzhin du rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar byed na de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun gsum pa yin no/_/bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]par byed na de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun bzhi pa yin te/_'od srung bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun yin no/_/'od srung mi gtum pa/_brlang ba/_drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/_nyam stobs dang ldan pa/_stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la 
[\[71a.2\]]la zhig byung bar gyur la/_'od srung skyes bu des 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam/_mtshon gyis btab bam/_khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas nas/_nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig 
[\[71a.3\]]dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che sna tshogs dang /_khang khyim dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang /_yongs su 
[\[71a.4\]]spyad pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/_'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam 'am/_'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang 
[\[71a.5\]]du skyed lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung khyod mos par bya/_khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/_gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang /_
[\[71a.6\]]bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid rgyun du zhugs pa yin par khas 'che bar byed cing /_tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po 
[\[71a.7\]]mang du skyed de/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas dpe bstan pas bsdam pa'i 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]gnas bka' stsal pa da ni ngo mtshar lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dpe rin po che de lta bu thos na su zhig 'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas stsal ba chab snod gang tsam yang len par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung de de bzhin no/_/ji skad 
[\[71b.2\]]smras pa de bzhin te/_mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bur gnas par bya zhing 'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas byin pa chu snod gang tsam yang blang bar mi bya'o/_/'od srung mi gnyis pa ches gtum pa/_ches brlang pa/_ches drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/_ches nyam 
[\[71b.3\]]stobs dang ldan pa/_ches stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/_'od srung mi des gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam/_mtshon gyis btab bam/_khu tshur gyis bsnun te 
[\[71b.4\]]pham par byas nas/_nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che sna tshogs dang /_khang khyim dang /_bzhon 
[\[71b.5\]]pa dang /_gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang /_yongs su spyad pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba'i longs spyod ci snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/_'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[71b.6\]]gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam 'am/_'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung khyod mos par bya/_khyod kyis 
[\[71b.7\]]khong du chud par bya ste/_gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin par khas 'che bar 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]byed cing tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no/_/'od srung gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[72a.2\]]khams na mi gang ji snyed pa thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod rnams lta zhog gi_/'od srung mi gsum pa ches shin tu gtum pa/_ches shin tu brlang pa/_ches shin tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/_ches shin tu nyam stobs dang ldan pa/_ches shin tu stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa 
[\[72a.3\]]gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/_'od srung mi des stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag dbyug pas brdegs sam/_mtshon gyis btab bam/_khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas nas nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_
[\[72a.4\]]nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che sna tshogs dang /_khang khyim dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_stan gyi nye 
[\[72a.5\]]bar spyad pa dang /_yongs su spyad pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na/_'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam 'am/_'od srung gis 
[\[72a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung khyod mos par bya/_khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/_gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i 
[\[72a.7\]]skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid phyir mi 'ong ba yin par khas 'che bar byed cing tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na de ni de bas 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no/_/'od srung stong chung ngu phra mo'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mi gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod rnams lta zhog gi_/'od 
[\[72b.2\]]srung mi bzhi pa ches shin tu rab tu gtum pa/_ches shin tu rab tu brlang ba/_ches shin tu rab tu drag shul gyi las dang ldan pa/_ches shin tu rab tu nyam stobs dang ldan pa/_ches shin tu rab tu stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la/_
[\[72b.3\]]'od srung mi des stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dbyug pas 
[\[72b.4\]]brdegs sam/_mtshon gyis btab bam/_khu tshur gyis bsnun te pham par byas nas/_nye bar spyad pa'i longs spyod 'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_
[\[72b.5\]]rin po che sna tshogs dang /_khang khyim dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang /_yongs su spyad pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba'i yo byad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer 
[\[72b.6\]]bar gyur na/_'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed snyam 'am/_'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang du skyed lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang du skyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[72b.7\]]pa/_'od srung khyod mos par bya/_khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste/_gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du de rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar byed cing ci nas kyang gzhan dag gis bdag dgra bcom pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/snyam nas dgra bcom pa steng du 'byung ba ltar steng du 'byung bar yang byed/_dgra bcom pa'i dpe ston pa ltar dpe ston par yang byed 
[\[73a.2\]]la/_de ltar sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/_tha na gzhan gyis byin pa'i dad pas byin pa bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du skyed de/_de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i 
[\[73a.3\]]phung po mi zad pa skyed pa yin no/_/'od srung de lta bas na gang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'phrogs par spro ba de ni sdig can gyi 'dod pa de lta bu des dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed de/_'od srung ngas 
[\[73a.4\]]ni sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa de las gzhan pa rab tu byung ba'i chos shin tu tha chad cig shos gzhan ma mthong ngo /_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_
[\[73a.5\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'dod pa dang /_gzhan yang rgyal rigs kyi rigs dag 'dod pa dang /_bram ze'i rigs dag 'dod pa ste/_bzhi po de dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ba rab tu byung ba'i sdig pa 'dod pa yin no/_/gang du 'ga' zhig la smon par byed na/_cher na mya ngan las 
[\[73a.6\]]'das pa la smon par byed na de yang de'i sdig pa 'dod pa nyid yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas de la dgongs nas dge slong dag nga ni cher na phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/_skad cig tsam skye ba la yang bsngags pa mi brjod do/_/zhes ston to/_/
[\[73a.7\]]'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma ste/_rab tu byung bas de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'jig tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bslab pa las 'da' ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i sangs 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa ste/_bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong gi dri ma yin te/_rab tu byung bas de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du mi bya'o/_/'od srung dge sbyong dang /_bram ze 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/_sdig pa 'dod pa med pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_drang po'i rang 
[\[73b.2\]]bzhin can g.yo med pa/_sgyu can ma yin pa/_khengs pa ma yin pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 'dod pa rnams kyi ched du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na 'od srung de dag dbugs 'byin par byed pa brjod 
[\[73b.3\]]par bya ste/_de thos na rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dag dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad la bskal pa 
[\[73b.4\]]'am/_bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas pa bas ni yang dag par zhugs pa/_tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/_'tsho ba yongs su dag pa zhig gis sbyin pa po gang gi dad 
[\[73b.5\]]pas byin pa tha na chu snod gang tsam zhig bdag gir byas par gyur na de nyid de la bsod nams kyi phung po ches rgya che bar 'gyur gyi/_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par bde ba'i yo byad thams 
[\[73b.6\]]cad kyis bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas pa de la ni de lta ma yin no/_/'od srung ji ltar mi blun po sdig pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa des gang gi drung nas chos gos sam/_bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyad pa de'i don de yongs su nyams par byed 
[\[73b.7\]]pa de ltar ni dgra bo dang /_gshed ma dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_phas kyi dgras kyang yongs su nyams par byed mi nus so/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs pa cha phra ba rnams yin te/_rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba de dag dang ldan na 'di lta ste/_
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]dper na mda' 'phangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog gi chos nyid dang ldan pa dang /_sdom pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde thos nas tshul khrims kyi nyes pa 'byin par byed 
[\[74a.2\]]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las 'das sam/_bslab pa las 'das na lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'chab par byed cing rnam par 'byed par mi byed/_'chags par mi byed pa dang /_shes shing rtogs bzhin du dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyod par byed pa ste/_
[\[74a.3\]]'od srung bzhi po de dag ni rab tu byung ba'i nyon mongs pa cha phra ba rnams yin te/_rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba de dag dang ldan na 'di lta ste dper na mda' 'phangs pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni 
[\[74a.4\]]dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_bdag tu lta ba dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'jig rten rgyang phan pa ste/_bzhi po de dag ni dge sbyong ltar bcos pa yin no/_/'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba'i 
[\[74a.5\]]rgyags shing bag med pa yin te/_rab tu byung ba rgyags shing bag med pa de dag dang ldan na sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_mang du thos pas rgyags shing de mang du thos pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang /_rnyed pa dang /_
[\[74a.6\]]bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pas rgyags shing de rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pas zil gyis non pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang /_mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /_slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyis rgyags shing de mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /_
[\[74a.7\]]slongs mo ster ba'i khyim gyis spags pas bag med par 'gyur ba dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pas rgyags shing de sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pas rgyags pas bdag la stod par byed/_gzhan la smod par byed pa de ni bag med pa 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]zhes bya ste/_'od srung bzhi po de dag ni rab tu byung ba'i rgyags shing bag med pa yin te/_rab tu byung ba rgyags shing bag med pa de dag dang ldan na sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yin par brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad 
[\[74b.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge sbyong ltar bcos pa ngur smrig 'tshal ba gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[74b.3\]]byang chub 'di nub par bgyid par 'gyur ba ci 'dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la gtam 'di yongs su dris 
[\[74b.4\]]pas khyod la ci byas thong shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'od srung gal te de bzhin gshegs pas mi blun po de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang /_g.yo dang /_chom rkun dang /_phyin ci log dang /_bdud kyi nyes pa dang /_bdud kyi 
[\[74b.5\]]byin gyis brlabs kyi skyon yang dag pa thams cad brjod cing yang dag par bshad par gyur na/_'od srung khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi sdig pa kun spyod pa de dag thos na yang dag pa ma yin yang snang bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[74b.6\]]la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'dul ba 'di ci nas kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od 
[\[74b.7\]]srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni ring po mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par bzhugs su gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung gal te sangs rgyas stong 
[\[75a.2\]]snyed cig gis mi blun po de dag la cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos bstan du zin kyang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag sdig pa 'dod pa dang /_sdig pa 'dzin pa de dag las phyir gzung ba'am/_bzlog par mi spyod do/_/'od srung gzhan yang khyod phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya 
[\[75a.3\]]tha ma la dam pa'i chos bsrung bar spro 'am/_sems can bsam pa dge ba gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa la gus par nyan pa skyed par 'gyur ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad 
[\[75a.4\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang bcas pa/_brag dang /_ri bo'i zom dang bcas pa/_rgya mtsho dang /_chu klung dang /_nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal pa 'am/_
[\[75a.5\]]bskal pa las lhag par phrag pa'am/_spyi bo la 'tshal bar ni spro lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag rgya shug gam/_til lam/_
[\[75a.6\]]'bras bu gcig gis bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par 'tsho bar ni spro lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag stong gsum 
[\[75a.7\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bskal pa'i zhugs chen po 'bar/_kun tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar bar gyur pa'i nang du spyod lam bzhi po dag gis dgung lo bye ba snyed du gnas par ni spro lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag skyes bu dam pa ma 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can thams cad la khro ba dang /_spyo ba dang /_smad pa dang /_bshung ba dang /_bsdigs pa dang /_brdeg btsog dag bzod pas dang du len par ni spro lags 
[\[75b.2\]]kyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag mi blun po chos kyi rkun po/_chos kyi chom rkun po/_/chos la mu cor smra ba/_chos ltar bcos pa ston pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni nyi tshe bar spyod pa nyi tshe ba'i shes 
[\[75b.3\]]pa dang ldan pa lags pas de lta bu'i khur 'deg pa'i rngo mi thog lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ni de lta bu'i khur 'deg par rngo thog lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'di la bdag dper brjod par spobs lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[75b.4\]]'di lta ste dper bgyi na mi la la zhig rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs par gyur cing de yang na tshod dgung lo brgya nyi shu tsam lags par gyur la/_mi de bro nad kyis thebs shing glo ba mi bde nas mchis mal gyi khri steng du mchis nyal bar gyur na mi shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can phyug 
[\[75b.5\]]la nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba la la zhig der mchis nas mi mchis mal gyi khri steng na mchis nyal ba de la kye skyes bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gdams kyis kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu 'am/_nyi shu tsam na yul gzhan nas phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis gter 'di kho bo la phyir byin 
[\[75b.6\]]cig ces de'i sug par gter 'doms par bgyid cing de ltar gtams nas yul gzhan du mchis par gyur la/_mi mchis mal gyi khri stengs na mchis nyal ba de la yang bu yang ma mchis/_bu mo yang ma mchis/_'khor kyang ma mchis la/_de nas mi de yul gzhan du 
[\[75b.7\]]mchis nas ring po ma lags par de yang 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na nor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang chab 'tshal bar gyur pa'i slad na/_mi de slar mchis na su la ji skad bgyir yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang zhig nyan thos nyi tshe bar spyod pa/_
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa/_zla bo ma mchis pa/_yun ring por mi gnas pa la dam pa'i chos kyi gter 'doms par bgyid na de yang yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur bar 'tshal bar bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od 
[\[76a.2\]]srung legs so legs so/_/ngas kyang de ltar shes te/_'on kyang khyod la dpe'i spobs pa de lta bu thos na skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag kun du skyo ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur bas na ngas shes bzhin du khyod la dris pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung 
[\[76a.3\]]chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag dpe gnyis pa brjod par yang spobs lags te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na mi bro nad ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can bro nad dang bral ba/_dgung lo 'bum phrag du mar 'tsho ba/_gzhon nu thor bu 
[\[76a.4\]]lang tsho la bab pa/_g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa/_longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa/_rus phun sum tshogs pa/_rigs phun sum tshogs pa/_dge ba'i ngang tshul can/_byams pa dang ldan pa/_snying rje che ba/_yid dga' ba dang ldan pa/_sems can gyi 
[\[76a.5\]]skyon dang /_nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams la btang snyoms su 'jog pa/_skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du zhugs pa/_rtul ba brtan pa 
[\[76a.6\]]la la zhig mchis par gyur la/_skyes bu dam pa de'i gan du mi la la zhig mchis nas 'di skad ces kye skyes bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gdams kyis khyod kyis gter 'di legs par sba ba dang /_legs par bsrung bar gyis shig_/kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu 'am/_nyi shu 
[\[76a.7\]]tsam na yul gzhan nas phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis gter 'di kho bo la phyir byin cig ces smras te/_de'i sug par gter de gdams na mi de ni gter de blangs nas legs par sbed pa dang /_srung bar bgyid cing mi de slar mchis nas kyang gter de slar stsol bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/_
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' la dam pa'i chos kyi gter 'doms par bgyid na de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por yang chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po la yang sman thogs par 'gyur la/_sangs rgyas kyi gdung dang /_chos kyi gdung 
[\[76b.2\]]dang /_dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par yang 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpas gang yongs su sgrub par bgyid pa'i bgyi ba de dang /_don de yongs su bsgrub par rngo mi thog lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[76b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di 'khor 'di nyid du 'dus te mngon du mchis lags pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la bka' stsol cig dang /_'dis ni slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pas bskal 
[\[76b.4\]]pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/_rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de 
[\[76b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bu thu bo gang lags pa de ni rgyal po'i 'og tu rgyal 
[\[76b.6\]]srid bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur lags pas de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nyid mchis bzhin du yang rgyal srid la spro bar bgyid cing chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur la/_de 'di snyam du yang sems lags te/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di'i 'og tu ni 
[\[76b.7\]]bdag gis rgyal po bgyi'o/_/snyam nas dbugs 'byin pa thob par yang 'gyur zhing /_'di ltar rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag lags pa de dag la yang mngon par brtson par bgyid pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di yang 'di lta ste dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid kyi rgyal srid chen po bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ba lags pas 'dis ni dam pa'i chos kun du srung pa la mngon par brtson par bgyi 'tshal lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[77a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung legs so legs so/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par dge ba'i rtsa bas 
[\[77a.3\]]yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyag 'jam pa/_mchog tu mnyen pa/_ka tsa lin di ltar reg na bde ba rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bsgos pa'i mdog 'dra ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mgo bor bzhag ste byugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa khyod phyi 
[\[77a.4\]]ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung ba dang /_yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[77a.5\]]spro bar gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can bzhag ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lan gsum du rab tu g.yos te/_
[\[77a.6\]]g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg cing /_'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur/_sa bla ba dang /_bar snang la gnas pa dang /_'og min gyi bar gyi lha 
[\[77a.7\]]rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'phags pa byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_sman pa dang /_
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung ba dang /_yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /_yongs su gzung bar spro bar mdzod cig ces smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas 
[\[77b.2\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can gcig gi don gyi slad du yang slad ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor ba na 'khor bar yang spro lags na dam pa'i 
[\[77b.3\]]chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun du bsrung ba dang /_rgyas par bgyi lags so/_/byang 
[\[77b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs ma thag tu de nas yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[77b.5\]]byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni su la yang 'gran par mi bgyid/_nga rgyal mi bgyid lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba 'di dag ni skyes bu dam pa'i sug las lags te/_
[\[77b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas khur gang 'deg par bgyid pa'i khur de lta bu de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis 'deg par rngo mi thog pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so/_/zhes bya ba 
[\[77b.7\]]byin te/_byams pa legs so legs so/_/ji ltar nga'i spyan snga na khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra 'di lta bu sgrogs par byed pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi spyan snga dag na yang byang chub 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]sems dpa' rnams seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 
[\[78a.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa/_byang chub sems dpar mchid kyis 'che ba/_dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'che ba/_glen pa/_blun po/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la gdu ba/_mdza' bshes kyi sdum pa dang /_slongs 
[\[78a.3\]]mo ster ba'i sdum pa la gdu ba/_bsod snyoms la sbyor bar brtson pa de dag gi nongs pa'i gnas bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis rgyu de dag thos nas de dag rtogs pas myur ba myur bar spong bar bgyid cing /_nongs pa de dag las bdag 
[\[78a.4\]]nyid srung bar bgyid pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag las kyang la la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag mkhyen cing de bzhin gshegs pas bdag rtogs so/_/rab tu rtogs so/_/zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol 
[\[78a.5\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi nyes pa'i gnas gang yin pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan 
[\[78a.6\]]par bya ste/_byams pa de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba mang po 'byung ba de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa gang dag yin pa de dag bshad par bya'o/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba yin 
[\[78a.7\]]par rig par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /_bkur sti 'dod pa dang /_g.yo byed pa dang /_ya nga ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa yin te/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]byams pa de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba/_khyi'i chos kun du spyod pa mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_byams pa 'di lta ste dper na khyi ni sngon lan 'ga' phyin pa'i khyim gzhan zhig tu khyi gzhan zhig rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong na khyim 
[\[78b.2\]]'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas de la zugs par byed/_'khren skad 'byin/_khro bas lta bar byed/_gnod sems kyis nyes pa skyed par byed de/_gzhan gyi khyim bdag gir byed cing bdag gi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed do/_/byams pa de bzhin du phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga 
[\[78b.3\]]brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba/_khyi'i chos kun tu spyod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang gzhan gyi khyim dang /_gzhan gyi grong dag la bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed cing /_bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes bskyed nas kyang 
[\[78b.4\]]yongs su 'dzin par byed de/_dge slong des sngon phyin pa'i khyim der dge slong gzhan zhig 'ong ba mthong na de khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas khro bas lta bar byed/_gnod sems skyed par byed/_thab mo dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa skyed par byed/_phan tshun 
[\[78b.5\]]dbyen gyi tshig smra bar byed/_tshig rtsub po rjod par byed/_gcig la gcig dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do/_/dge slong mang ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do zhes mi snyan par rjod par byed cing khyim bdag la yang gal te khyod kho bo dang bsten par 'dod na/_
[\[78b.6\]]dge slong che ge mo zhig dang bsten par mi bya zhing dge slong ma dge mo zhig dang yang ma sten cig ces zer te/_de dag ni skyugs pa'i rgyur gyur pa/_ring du mi gnas pa/_smad par bya ba'i kha zas tsam gyi phyir bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skyed pa yin no/_/de dag ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi chos kun tu spyod 
[\[78b.7\]]cing dbul ba dang /_sems dman pa dang /_ser sna dang ldan pa dang /_bdag nyid gso bar byed pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis byang chub sems dpa' yin par khas 'che bar byed cing /_bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa dang ldan pa 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]dang /_sdig pa kun du spyod pa yin bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsngags pa brjod cing byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gzhan dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod nas zas dang gos sgrub par yang byed do/_/
[\[79a.2\]]byams pa 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra bsgrag cing seng ge'i las rnams bya ba'i rigs pa wa'i sgra sgrogs shing wa'i las rnams byed pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing 'jig rten gyi zang zing yun mi ring ba yongs su gtong bar mi byed la/_ser snas zil gyis non cing yo byad kyi dri 
[\[79a.3\]]mas sbags pa de dag gis gtong ba phyi rol du byas pa dang /_phan pa'i dngos po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_khong khro ba'i nyes pa mang po byed pa dang /_bzod pa'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing gcig tu gnod sems kyi sems su byed pa dang /_bsdu ba'i 
[\[79a.4\]]dngos po bzhi po dag gi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing sems can 'ga' yang sbyin pa'am/_snyan par smra ba'am/_don spyod pa'am/_don 'thun par sdud par mi byed pa de dag ji tsam du mi bzad par 'gyur ba la ltos/_de dag ni tshig tsam gyi dngos por 'gyur ba yin gyi/_de dag yon 
[\[79a.5\]]tan yang dag par blang ba dang /_'dres pa'i spyod pas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mos pa'i rjes su slob par byed pa ni ma yin no/_/byams pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa dang /_ches grangs med pa dang /_ches shin tu grangs med pa dang /_rgya che ba 
[\[79a.6\]]dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[79a.7\]]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste/_byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste dper na da ltar nga bzhin du snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa kho na'i 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/byams pa de'i tshe 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]na dge slong brtson 'grus mos zhes bya ba dran pa dang ldan pa/_rtogs pa dang ldan pa/_blo dang ldan pa/_'dod pa chung ba/_chog shes pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nan tan byed pa zhig byung bar gyur te/_de grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[79b.2\]]dang /_yul 'khor de dag tu song ste phyin pa dang /_chos ston par byed cing rgyal po dang /_blon po chen po dag dang /_skye bo phal po che gzhan dag gis kyang ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas/_bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_shes par byas/_yongs su shes par byas so/_/de khyim 
[\[79b.3\]]gang du zhugs shing gang las tshig snyan pa dang /_bdag la gus par nyan pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba thob par gyur pa'i khyim der ni lan gnyis su 'gro bar sems skyed par mi byed do/_/de 'jungs pa dang /_ma dad pa dang /_log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gzhan dag tu 
[\[79b.4\]]song zhing de dag tu son pa dang /_de la de dag 'ongs pa legs so zhes kyang mi zer/_de dag tshig snyan pa yang mi rjod pa'i steng du de la khro bar byed/_gshe bar byed na yang de bzod pa'i go bgos shing snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'gro la khyim de dag tu yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing 
[\[79b.5\]]yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos des khyim gang dag dad par byas pa de dag ni 'di lta ste chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad dag gis dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 
[\[79b.6\]]'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_de khyim de dag tu yang 'gro bar mi byed cing 'gro bar sems skyed par yang mi byed mod kyi/_'on kyang de de dag la phrag dog dang /_ser sna'i sems skyed par byed snyam 'am/_byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma 
[\[79b.7\]]lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de khyim gang dag nas tshig snyan pa dang /_bdag la gus par nyan pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba rnyed pa'i khyim de 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]dag mngon par dad par byas shing dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar byas nas/_de dag tu lan gnyis su 'jug par mi byed pa dang /_'jungs pa dang /_ma dad pa dang /_log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa de dag dad par byed cing de dag khro zhing gshe 
[\[80a.2\]]na yang yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phan pa'i dngos po nyid dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang /_'dod pa chung ba nyid dang /_chog shes pa nyid dang /_des pa nyid dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa nyid la ltos/_byams pa de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[80a.3\]]rnams ni khyim bdag dad par byas shing gzhan gyi nye bar 'tsho bar byed kyi/_bdag nyid kyi chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms kyi don du byed pa ni ma yin no/_/byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod yid gnyis 
[\[80a.4\]]dang /_the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos zhes bya bar gyur to/_/byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de'i rjes su 
[\[80a.5\]]bslab par bya/_de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dag gi rjes su yang bslab par bya zhing de dag gi chos kun du spyad par yang bya'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub 
[\[80a.6\]]sems dpar khas 'che ba'i dge slong kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni 'di lta ste/_rnyed pa dang /_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms kyi don du khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/_khyim pa rnams dad pa la dgod pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/de dag ni gcig la gcig bsngags pa ma 
[\[80a.7\]]yin pa brjod pa dang /_'byed pa dang /_rtsod pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yi rangs par 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin la/_ji ltar gzhan dag gis rnyed pas yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis ma rnyed pas 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]ni de lta ma yin no/_/byams pa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag nyid kyi bde ba'i yo byad de dag thams cad la mi blta bar gzhan dag la sbyin par bya ba yin na/_de dag ji tsam du phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba la ltos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa 'di ltar des ni bdag gis sems can 
[\[80b.2\]]thams cad la bde ba bskyed par bya'o/_/zhes snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro/_/byams pa 'di lta ste/_dper na tshong dpon nam khyim bdag cig la bu gcig pa sdug pa phangs pa yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur pa de la lan 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal pos btson rar 
[\[80b.3\]]bcug par gyur na byams pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshong dpon nam/_khyim bdag de yid la byed pa'i sems ji lta bu dag gis rgyal po'i btson ra der 'jug par 'gyur snyam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di 
[\[80b.4\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar bu gcig pa de thar par bgyi ba'i bsam pas bdag gis bu gcig pa 'di btson ra 'di nas myur du thar par bgyi'o/_/snyam nas bu gcig pa yid la bgyid pa kho na dag gis btson ra der 'jug par bgyid de/_thar pa yid la bgyid pa 
[\[80b.5\]]dag gis 'jug cing 'byung bar bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa ngas dpe de ni don shes par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa yin te/_'dir don kyang gang zhig yin par blta bar bya zhe na/_byams pa 'di lta ste/_dper na rgyal po'i btson ra de ji lta ba de bzhin 
[\[80b.6\]]du ni 'khor ba'i btson ra blta bar bya'o/_/byams pa 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon nam/_khyim bdag de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' blta bar bya'o/_/byams pa 'di lta ste dper na bu gcig pa ji lta ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 
[\[80b.7\]]'dra ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ba blta bar bya'o/_/byams pa 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon nam/_khyim bdag de rgyu gzhan gyi phyir ma yin zhing ched ka gzhan gyi phyir ma yin gyi/_bu gcig pa de'i don du btson ra der 'jug par 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byams pa byang chub sems dpas 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]chos gos kyi ched dang /_bsod snyoms kyi ched du khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/_'di ltar sems can de dag nyid 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya ba blta bar bya'o/_/byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma 
[\[81a.2\]]la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa/_sems ma bsgoms pa/_tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/_shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag ni chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms kyi ched du me tog gi skyes dag dang /_'bras bu'i skyes dag dang /_lo ma'i skyes dag dang /_
[\[81a.3\]]yo byad kyi skyes dag dang /_byas pa'i lan gyi skyes dag gis khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur bas byams pa dge slong gis ni me tog phreng rgyud lta bur mi bya zhing bran dang las mi lta bur yang mi bya'o/_/byams pa dge slong khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya ba ma gtogs 
[\[81a.4\]]par skyes gzhan bkur bar mi bya ste/_des ni mang du thos pa dang /_gzhung la shin tu zhugs pa dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_brkam chags med pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa med pa dang /_kha gsag med pa dang /_bdag gir bya ba med par bya zhing chos la dga' ba bskyed nas khyim rnams 
[\[81a.5\]]su 'gro bar bya'o/_/khyim rnams su song nas kyang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing chos 
[\[81a.6\]]kyi gtam bya ba'i skyes ma gtogs par khang khyim gyi ched dam/_zhing las kyi ched dam/_rnyed pa'i ched dam/_reg pa bde ba'i gtam 'am/_rgyal po'i gtam 'am/_chom rkun gyi gtam 'am/_grong gi gtam 'am/_grong khyer gyi gtam 'am/_ljongs kyi gtam 'am/_bu'i 
[\[81a.7\]]gtam 'am/_bu mo'i gtam 'am/_gtam gzhan gyi skyes dag mi bya'o/_/byams pa gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo zhig la byin pa dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur na nor gyi phung po de tsam dang /_bde ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis ni des rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la snying brtse 
[\[81b.2\]]ba'am/_phan btags par mi 'gyur gyi/_de tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam zhig nyan du bcug ste/_de yang de'i rna ba'i rnam par rig par grags shing thos pa tsam kho nar zad kyi/_re shig dad pa thob par ma gyur du zin kyang de ni rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la 
[\[81b.3\]]rgyas pa dang /_phan 'dogs pa dang /_snying brtse ba ches shin tu mang du byed pa yin no/_/byams pa dge slong de dag khyim rnams su zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi bka' spangs te/_'jig rten pa'i gtam nye bar sbyor bar byed cing ji tsam du don med pa chen pos khyim der mngon par brtson 
[\[81b.4\]]par byed pa la ltos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa 'di ltar gser ram/_dngul lam/_nor bu dag gam/_rin po che dag gam/_mu tig dag gam/_baidUr+ya dag gam/_dung dag gam/_man shel dag gam/_byi ru dag gam/_bde ba'i yo byad gzhan dag gis ni 
[\[81b.5\]]sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams skye ba las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur/_sems can na ba'i chos can rnams kyang nad rnams las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur/_sems can rga ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde 
[\[81b.6\]]ba dang /_'khrug pa'i chos can rnams kyang rga ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar par mi 'gyur gyi/_chos thos pas ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyang 
[\[81b.7\]]skye ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur la/_sems can na ba'i chos can rnams kyang na ba las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_sems can rga ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i chos can rnams 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]kyang 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_de las dgongs te de bzhin gshegs pa 'di skad ces/_stong chen 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis/_/bkang ste gang la sbyin par byed pa ni/_/tshig bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig brjod pas/_/
[\[82a.2\]]ji ltar phan 'dogs de ltar 'gyur ma yin/_/phan 'dogs byed par 'dod pa gang zhig gis/_/'jig rten gsum na sems can thams cad kyi/_/bde ba gang dag yod pa de dag kun/_/sems can gcig la sbyin pa byas pa bas/_/gang gis de la sangs rgyas lugs kyi ni/_/tshig 
[\[82a.3\]]bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bsgrags na/_/de ni shin tu phan 'dogs mchog yin te/_/des ni sdug bsngal dag las grol bar 'gyur/_/zhes ston to/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang 
[\[82a.4\]]ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbul bar phul ba bas ni snying rje chen po bskyed de sems can gcig la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig cig bsgrags par gyur na de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mi gang gis ni 
[\[82a.5\]]gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/'jig rten khams mchog rin chen gang byas te/_/dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang /_/gang gis sems can gcig la tshigs bcad byin/_/rin chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya chen des/_/tshigs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes bsgrubs de la/_/char yang mi 
[\[82a.6\]]phod grangs su 'ang ma yin na/_/gnyis sam gsum la bsam du ga la yod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g.yas pa'i dkyil na bsod nams thams cad mngon par 
[\[82a.7\]]bsgrubs pa'i rgyu 'thun pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mngon par grub pa yod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na phyag g.yas pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kun tu yog par mdzad nas sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]par mdzad cing zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/_rin po che 'dod pa rnams la ni rin po che rnams dang /_gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin par yang spyod mod kyi/_de tsam gyis sems can de dag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thog ma dang tha ma med 
[\[82b.2\]]pa nas chu srin 'dzin khri'i sdug bsngal chen po de las thar par mi 'gyur bas byams pa nga ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de lta bu dag rnam par spangs nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba'i chos rin po che yang dag par ston par mdzad de de thos na sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gtan du nye bar zhi 
[\[82b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang nga'i rjes su bslab par bya zhing khyod zang zing la gdu bar mi bya'i/_khyod chos la gdu bar bya'o/_/byams pa yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba kha cig
