[\[146a.4\]]mis ni bu ram ro/_/zhim po rnyed par nus pa ma yin no/_/ji ltar shun pa de bzhin smra ba ste/_/ro lta bu ni 'di la don sems yin/_/de lta bas na smra la dga' spongs te/_/rtag tu bag yod byos la don soms shig_/smra ba'i nyes pa 'di 'dra rtog gyur cing /_/
[\[146a.5\]]don gyi yon tan mchog 'di shes nas ni/_/'di na byang chub mkhas pa gang yin pa/_/des ni don bsam pa la dga' bar gyis/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[146a.6\]]ltar smra ba la dga' ba'i skyon rnams dang /_don la sems pa'i yon tan rnams de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' snying po 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni don bsam pa btang ste snying po ma mchis pa'i 
[\[146a.7\]]smra ba la dga' bar bgyid pa'i rngo mi thog lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnyid kyi dga' bas dga' ba'i skyon ji ltar brtag par bgyi/_byang chub sems dpas ji ltar brtags na rmugs pa dang /_gnyid kyi nongs dmigs 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]mthong nas brtson 'grus rtsom zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'di la gnyid la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs ni rnam pa nyi shur brtag par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 
[\[146b.2\]]'grus rtsom pa la dga' zhing skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gnyid che ba ni rmugs pa dang /_gnyid kyis non te le lo che bar 'gyur ba dang /_lus sha che ba dang /_mdog yongs su ma dag pa dang /_de'i 
[\[146b.3\]]'byung ba chen po rnams nad bzhis non par 'gyur ba dang /_de'i me'i khams chung bar 'gyur ba dang /_de'i kha zas legs par 'ju bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_de'i lus la 'bras dang phol mig 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_le lo can du 'gyur ba dang /_de'i gti 
[\[146b.4\]]mug gi dra ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_de'i shes rab nyam chung bar 'gyur ba dang /_de kha zas 'dod pa las yig 'chu bar 'gyur ba dang /_de gti mug gi mun pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_de la mi ma yin pa rnams bkur sti mi byed pa dang /_
[\[146b.5\]]sems rtul bar 'gyur ba dang /_mi ldang ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang /_de'i sems bag la nyal gyis kun nas dkris shing 'dug par 'gyur ba dang /_de dge ba'i chos la 'dun par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ba dang /_spyod pa 
[\[146b.6\]]zhum par gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi spyod pa la smod pa dang /_'khor gyi nang du song na brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/_byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyid la dga' zhing rmugs pa dang /_gnyid mang ba'i nyes dmigs yin te/_byang chub 
[\[146b.7\]]sems dpa' de dag la rtog na brtson 'grus rtsom pa la dga' zhing yongs su skyo bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/de yi lus ni sha che mkhregs ma 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]yin/_/le lo de che blun zhing 'thun mi byed/_/de yi mdog kyang dag par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/bad kan rlung dang de bzhin mkhris pa rnams/_/de dag de yi lus la shas cher 'byung /_/de yi khams 
[\[147a.2\]]rnams rab tu 'khrug par 'gyur/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/kha zas nyes pas lto ni ma dag cing /_/lus kyang lci la zo bdog bde ma yin/_/de yi tshig kyang gsal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/
[\[147a.3\]]de yi lus la phol mig mang po 'byung /_/de ni nyin dang mtshan du bde bar nyal/_/de la rma rnams mi bzad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/le lo byed cing brtson 'grus yongs su nyams/_/de ni bde las nyams shing nor rnams 
[\[147a.4\]]'gribs/_/de ni rtag tu zhan cing sems kyang rmongs/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/gti mug dra ba chen po 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/de ni the tshom can de lta ba thob/_/de ni lta bar gyur pa mang bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la 
[\[147a.5\]]dga' 'gyur ba/_/de yi shes rab shin tu nyam chung 'gyur/_/de yi blo yang yongs su nyams par 'gyur/_/ye shes las ni rtag tu de nyams 'gyur/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/mi shes le lo snyom las shes rab 'chal/_/mi ma yin 
[\[147a.6\]]pa dag gis glags rnyed de/_/nags na gnas pa'i tshe ni 'tshe bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/sems kyang rtul zhing de yi dran pa rmongs/_/lung nod kha ton byed la de mi gnas/_/chos smra na yang de ni rtag tu thogs/_/gang zhig rmugs 
[\[147a.7\]]dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/de yi nyon mongs kun nas ldang bar 'gyur/_/rnam par 'khor zhing g.yo la rmongs pa dang /_/de yi sems ni rtag tu gdung bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/de yi bya ba mang po nyams shing 'gags/_/lus 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]kyang gdungs shing yid kyang yongs su gdungs/_/bag la nyal ba 'phel bar nges mi shes/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/de ni dge sems rtag tu mi 'dod de/_/de ni chos la 'dud pa skyed mi byed/_/phyir zhing chos ma yin la de dgar 'gyur/_/
[\[147b.2\]]gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/de ni rmongs shing chos la 'dun pa nyams/_/byis pa yon tan kun las yongs su nyams/_/dkar po 'joms shing mun par 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/'jigs par 'gyur 
[\[147b.3\]]zhing sems kyang rab tu zhum/_/de ni rtag par mchog tu dga' mi 'gyur/_/gnyid kyis non pa lus kyang lhod par 'gyur/_/gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/_/bdag nyid mi shes le lo can gyur nas/_/brtson 'grus stobs dang ldan la phrag dog 
[\[147b.4\]]byed/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa rnams la mi snyan smra/_/nyes pa 'di 'dra 'di dag rtogs gyur nas/_/mkhas pa su zhig rmugs gnyid dga' bar byed/_/shin tu gti mug lta ba mang po'i rgyu/_/don bzang dam chos yon tan chud gzon pa/_/gnyid 'di brtson 
[\[147b.5\]]'grus 'phrog par rtogs gyur nas/_/mkhas pa yon tan ldan pa su der dga'/_/sdug bsngal kun dang mun pa sel byed cing /_/ngan song yongs su spong ba'i gzhir gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i brtson 'grus 'phags/_/gang yin de ni rtag 
[\[147b.6\]]tu brten par gyis/_/'jig rten 'di na bzo gang ci yod dang /_/'jig rten 'das bzo gang dag ci yod pa/_/brtson 'grus brtsams la rnyed par mi dka' na/_/mkhas pa su dag brtson 'grus stobs kyis skyo/_/gang dag sangs rgyas byang chub zhugs gyur pa/_/
[\[147b.7\]]de dag rmugs gnyid skyon rnams mthong nas ni/_/rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la gnas par byed/_/'di ni nga yis de dag bskul byas yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas spong bar mi bgyid cing skyo bar mi bgyid pa de dag dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa mi skyed pa de dag de tsam du rmongs par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/
[\[148a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' slob par 'tshal ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba su zhig yang dag pa'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na le lo bgyid cing dge ba'i 
[\[148a.3\]]chos rnams skyed par mi bgyid/_brtson 'grus kyi yon tan dang /_phan yon 'di lta bu thos nas byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du su zhig brtson 'grus rtsom par mi bgyid de/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gnyid la dga' ba'i nongs 
[\[148a.4\]]dmigs dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon 'di dag legs par bka' stsal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas las la dga' zhing 'jig rten pa'i sbag pas sbags pa'i nongs dmigs ji ltar brtags par bgyi/_byang chub sems 
[\[148a.5\]]dpa' gang dag la brtags na 'dod pa chung zhing bgyi ba nyung la/_dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i slad du rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[148a.6\]]chen pos las la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs nyi shur brtag par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung la dam pa'i chos btsal ba'i phyir rtag tu brtson zhing sbyor ba la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_byams 
[\[148a.7\]]pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' ba 'jig rten pa'i las rnams la brtson par 'gyur ba dang /_las ngan pa thams cad la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha don la brtson pa dag gis brnyas par 'gyur ba dang /_nang du yang dag 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]'jog la dga' ba rnams kyis smad par 'gyur ba dang /_'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i las rtsom par 'gyur ba dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyi yon sbyong bar mi byed pa dang /_de'i sems dngos por 'dzin pa la 'jug par 
[\[148b.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_chags pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang /_khyim so rnams la rgyun du sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang /_dbang byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_zlog byed kyi ngang tshul can yid smon mang po la rgyun du gnas pa dang /_khyim gyi bya ba dag la brtson pa dang /_de ro 
[\[148b.3\]]dag la shas cher 'dun cing chags pa skyed pa dang /_len pa med par mi dga' ba dang /_kun nas mnar sems mang ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rgyun du mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma la rton par 'gyur ba dang /_de zas kyi rnam par rtog pas 
[\[148b.4\]]nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i bya ba dag rgyun du 'dri bar byed pa dang /_mi rigs pa'i smra ba dag la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_zhal ta byed pa'i rgyags pas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang phyug gis tshar gcod par byed pa 
[\[148b.5\]]dang /_pha rol gyi 'khrul pa la rtog cing bdag gi 'khrul pa la mi rtog par 'gyur ba dang /_don dang ldan zhing rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag la skyen par brnyas par 'gyur ba ste/_byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' las la dga' zhing zhal ta byed pa'i sbag pas 
[\[148b.6\]]sbags pa'i nyes dmigs yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rtog na 'dod pa chung zhing bya ba nyung bar 'gyur la 'jig rten pa'i bya ba spangs nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[148b.7\]]bka' stsal to/_/de ni las ngan dag la gnas 'gyur zhing /_/las mchog dag las de ni rgyang yang ring /_/'dir ni rnyed pa che las ring bar 'gyur/_/rnam par chags sems nyes pa 'di dag yin/_/dge slong lung nod kha ton dga' rnams kyis/_/de la brnyas shing 'dod par 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]mi byed la/_/bsam gtan byed pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur/_/rtag tu las gnas skyon ni 'di dag yin/_/'khor ba'i las la mngon par brtson pa dang /_/thar pa las ni rgyang ring bcings par gnas/_/de ni yul 'khor zas la mi rigs spyod/_/
[\[149a.2\]]nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin/_/rtag tu dngos po dag ni len par byed/_/yongs su 'dzin pa med la dga' mi skyed/_/nor med nor ni don du gnyer bar byed/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin/_/khyim du rgyu ba dag la chags par 'gyur/_/'du 'dzi 
[\[149a.3\]]dga' bas thams cad 'jig par byed/_/gzeb kyi nang du bya bcug bzhin du 'gyur/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la chags pa'i yin/_/khyim pa'i las la de rtag mya ngan byed/_/yongs su gdungs par gyur kyang yid mi 'byung /_/nams kyang tshig ni btsun par mi 'gyur te/_/
[\[149a.4\]]nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/_/bla mas bskul na bka' blo mi bde zhing /_/rjes su bstan pa 'thun par 'dzin mi byed/_/de ni myur du tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/_/khyim na gnas pa'i las rnams rtag sems pas/_/
[\[149a.5\]]de ni rtag tu 'dod par 'gyur ba ste/_/bsam gtan dang ni spong ba de mi byed/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/_/de yi 'dod chags shas ni che bar skye/_/de ni ro bro rnams la chags shing zhen/_/de ni ngan ngon tsam gyis dgar mi 'gyur/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la 
[\[149a.6\]]dga' ba'i yin/_/de ni 'khor phal che na dgar 'gyur te/_/de nyams na ni shin tu sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/de ni bong bu bzhin du lang long 'gyur/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/_/de sems rtag tu gnod sems ldan par 'gyur/_/las rnams 'phel zhing 
[\[149a.7\]]zad par mi 'gyur te/_/sred pa'i 'khri shing dag gis dam du bcings/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/_/de ni rtag tu bla ma rnams mi sten/_/phyogs 'dod khyim pa la ni sten par byed/_/tshul khrims gnas pa dag la'ang phrag dog byed/_/nyes pa 'di dag 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]las la dga' ba'i yin/_/nyin dang mtshan du sems gzhan med par ni/_/zas dang gos la rgyun du sems par byed/_/de ni rtag tu yon tan 'dod ma yin/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/_/de ni 'jig rten pa yi bya ba 'dri/_/rigs pa min pa'i 
[\[149b.2\]]smra ba rnams la dga'/_/rigs pa'i smra la de ni dga' mi 'gyur/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/_/sdom brtson rnams la de ni rtag tu gshe/_/dbang phyug nyes pas de dag des tshar gcod/_/mi sdug las rnams mngon par 'du byed de/_/nyes pa 'di dag 
[\[149b.3\]]las la dga' ba'i yin/_/de ni rtag tu gzhan gyi skyon rtog cing /_/bdag la yod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong la/_/yon tan ldan pa rnams la 'khrul pa tshol/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/_/byis pa de ni gzhan gyis myur du brnyas/_/de ni pha rol dag la chos ston 
[\[149b.4\]]tshe/_/blo nyams pas na mngon par shes mi 'gyur/_/nyes pa 'di dag las la dga' ba'i yin/_/gnod 'gyur nyes pa 'di dag mthong nas ni/_/las ngan dag la su zhig dga' bar byed/_/dpa' bo dag ni rtag tu las mchog byed/_/byas pa gang yin chud ni gzon mi byed/_/
[\[149b.5\]]lan stong brjod kyang tshig gcig mi 'dzin pa/_/de ni blo can dag gis spyo ba yin/_/gang zhig las ngan dag ni byed pa la/_/dam pa dag gis de ltar rtag tu smad/_/de lta bas na mkhas mis 'di rtag tu/_/las ngan dag ni rnam par spangs nas kyang /_/thub dbang rnams kyis 
[\[149b.6\]]rtag tu bsngags pa yi/_/bzang po'i las rnams gang yin de dag bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas 
[\[149b.7\]]las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa de de bzhin 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]te/_de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las ngan pa rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyis dman par 'gyur ba yin no/_/byams pa gzhan yang khyod 
[\[150a.2\]]mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la sbyor ba med cing bsam gtan med la spong ba med cing 'don pa med pa dang /_mang du thos pa yongs su tshol ba med pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin 
[\[150a.3\]]no/_/byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni bsam gtan dang spong bas phye ba dang /_ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang /_ye shes kyis mnyam par bzhag pa dang /_brtson pas phye ba yin gyi/_khyim pa'i las dang zhal ta byed pas phye ba ni ma yin te/_'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i las de ni mi rigs pa la 
[\[150a.4\]]sbyor ba rnams dang /_'du byed la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang /_'jig rten pa'i bya bas sbags pa ste/_byang chub sems dpas de la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bya'o/_/byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis stong gsum gyi 
[\[150a.5\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang na des ni nga mnyes par byas pa ma yin/_ri mor byas pa ma yin/_bkur stir byas pa ma yin gyi/_byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin 
[\[150a.6\]]tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_'chang na des ni nga la bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyi/_dngos po 
[\[150a.7\]]yongs su 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang /_kha ton byed pa la brtson pa zhal ta byed pa'i sbag pas sbags par byed na bsod nams 'dod pa des ni bsod nams 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]ma yin pa'i phung po chen po skyed par 'gyur te/_las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' zhal 
[\[150b.2\]]ta byed pa la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang /_kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di zhal ta byed pas yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i zhal ta byed pa de dag thams cad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang /_kha ton byed pa 
[\[150b.3\]]la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang /_kha ton byed pa la brtson pa 'dzam bu'i gling gang bsnyed kyis ni byang chub sems dpa' nang du yang dag 'jog la brtson pa gcig la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de ltar byas na de 
[\[150b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang ba dang gnang ba yin te/_de dag gi bsnyen bkur ni legs par byas pa yin no/_/gang zhig shes rab spyod pa la mos nas rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshad med par skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[150b.5\]]'di ltar shes rab kyi las ni dka' ba'i las dang /_bla na med pa dang /_gong na med pa dang /_'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i phyir ro/_/byams pa de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par brtson pa don 
[\[150b.6\]]du gnyer zhing brtson 'grus rtsom par 'dod pas shes rab la brtson par bya zhing shes rab yongs su btsal ba la brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[150b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /_las la dga' ba rnams kyi nongs dmigs rnams ni bka' stsal lags na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nongs dmigs rnams ji ltar brtag par bgyi/_
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]byang chub sems dpas gang dag la brtags na nye bar zhi ba la gnas shing rtsod pa ma mchis par gnas par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpas spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdor bsdu na 
[\[151a.2\]]nyi shu po 'di dag tu brtag par bya'o/_/rgyas par ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtha' yas par bstan te mthar thug par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' spros pa la dga' ba ni tshe 'di nyid la sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba mang bar gnas 
[\[151a.3\]]pa dang /_bzod pa las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba dang /_de'i mi mdza' ba rnams yi rangs par 'gyur ba dang /_de la bdud kyang mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /_de la bdud kyi 'khor kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_de'i dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ba 
[\[151a.4\]]dang /_skyes pa rnams med par 'gyur ba dang /_'thab pa dang 'khon du 'dzin pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa mang bar 'gyur ba dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba dang /_bag 
[\[151a.5\]]med par 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_de'i lce'i dbang po rtsub par 'gyur ba dang /_de'i lung mnos pa'i chos rnams legs par gnas par mi 'gyur ba dang /_mdo sde lung ma mnos pa rnams rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad 
[\[151a.6\]]kyis yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang myur du phrad par 'gyur ba dang /_dka' ba'i lam gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_rgyun mi 'chad par yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig thos par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang 
[\[151a.7\]]der the tshom can du 'gyur ba dang /_de la mi khom pa brgyad po dag nye bar 'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu de'i dkar po'i phyogs la brtson pa la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/_byams pa nyi shu po de dag ni spros pa la dga' ba'i nyes dmigs rnams mdor bsdus pa yin te/_
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]de dag yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/de ni tshe 'dir bde bar mi 'gyur te/_/bzod dang ring zhing khro ba'i phyogs la gnas/_/de yi dgra rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba ste/_/spros spyod 
[\[151b.2\]]de yi nyes pa 'di dag go_/bdud kyang de la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/_/bdud kyi phyogs kyang de la dga' bar 'gyur/_/de yi dge ba'i chos skyes chud zar 'gyur/_/spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go_/de ni nams kyang dge ba mi skyed de/_/'chi kar 
[\[151b.3\]]tha dad rgyu la gnas pa dang /_/ngan song 'gro ba'i las ni byed par 'gyur/_/spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go_/mi mdzes pa dang blta na mi sdug dang /_/de ni rtag tu rus rigs dma' bar 'gyur/_/de yi lce yi dbang po rtsub 'gyur te/_/spros spyod de 
[\[151b.4\]]yi nyes pa 'di dag go_/lung mnos chos rnams legs par mi gnas shing /_/lung mnos ma byas mdo sde thos mi 'gyur/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang rnam par spong /_/spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go_/sdig pa'i grogs po dag dang 
[\[151b.5\]]phrad par 'gyur/_/dka' ba'i theg pas rnam par dag 'gyur zhing /_/mi 'dod pa yi tshig rnams rgyun du thos/_/spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go_/byis pa'i blo can de ni gar skyes der/_/yin nam ma yin snyam du de rtog cing /_/rtag tu des ni the tshom 
[\[151b.6\]]rnyed par 'gyur/_/spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go_/de ni mi khom brgyad dang ring mi 'gyur/_/de ni dal ba ldan pa'i mchog mi 'gyur/_/de la gnod pa 'di dag rtag 'byung ste/_/spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go_/de yi dge ba dag la bar chad mang /_/bgegs 
[\[151b.7\]]su 'gyur bas myur du 'thob mi 'gyur/_/brtson dang ldan yang de la dgra rnams 'byung /_/spros spyod de yi nyes pa 'di dag go_/mkhas pas nyes 'di yang dag rig nas ni/_/spros pa thams cad yongs su spang bar bya/_/spros spyod dag ni gnod pa rnyed par sla/_/de lta 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]bas na spros la gnas mi bya/_/gang la spros pa'am rtsod pa yod pa las/_/dpag tshad brgya yi pha rol 'gro ba mchog_/gang na nyon mongs yod pa de dag tu/_/yud tsam zhig kyang gnas shing 'dug mi bya/_/rab byung don 'dod yon tan 'dod pa rnams/_/
[\[152a.2\]]sdang ba'i sems kyis rtsod par ma byed cig_/khyed la zhing med zhing las tshong byar med/_/gang la nor phyir 'di dag 'byung ba spros/_/khyed la chung ma bu dang bu mo med/_/khyim dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyang yod ma yin/_/bran pho bran mo med cing dbang phyug med/_/rab tu byung nas 
[\[152a.3\]]rtsod par ma byed cig_/zhi zhing rab tu zhi bas bsten pa yi/_/ngur smrig gos rnams dad pas blangs nas ni/_/zhi zhing rab zhi nye bar zhi bar byos/_/spros pa rnam par spongs la bzod pa skyed/_/mi bzad sems ni sbrul dug 'dra ba srungs/_/spros la spyod pa sems can dmyal 
[\[152a.4\]]ba dang /_/dud 'gro gshin rje'i yul dang ring mi 'gyur/_/de lta bas na bzod dang brtson 'grus skyed/_/tshogs pa gzhig phyir spros par byed na ni/_/sdug bsngal gsod dang 'ching ba ci yang rung /_/go ra brdeg dang bsdigs pa de dag ni/_/'jig rten 'di na gnas pa 
[\[152a.5\]]rnams la 'byung /_/tshogs par gyur la nyes pa 'di dag dkon/_/tshogs gyur bag la nyal ba 'phel ba med/_/tshogs gyur rnams la dga' ba 'byung 'gyur na/_/mkhas pa su zhig tshogs pa skyed mi byed/_/glags tshol dag gis skyon rnams rnyed mi 'gyur/_/nams 
[\[152a.6\]]kyang 'khor rnams phyed par mi 'gyur te/_/de yi mdza' bshes dag kyang rgyun du 'byung /_/spros pa spangs pa'i phan yon de dag yin/_/theg pa'i stobs 'di yis ni dag 'gyur zhing /_/las kyi sgrib pa ma lus byang nas ni/_/stobs dang bcas shing bzhon bcas bdud thul cig_/
[\[152a.7\]]brtan pa gang yin des ni bzod pa bskyed/_/spros pa rgyas pa la ni skyon mang chags/_/nyes pa de dag ngas ni bstan mi nus/_/rtag tu spros med bsngags pa mtha' yas 'gyur/_/su zhig don gnyer des ni bzod pa skyed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kun nas nyon mongs pa de tsam du gleng ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs te ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ci lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis tshig gi mchog 
[\[152b.2\]]'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa yang spong bar 'gyur lags sam bka' stsal pa/_byams pa lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams tshig gi mchog 'di lta bu 'di dag thos na skyo bar 'gyur zhing kun 
[\[152b.3\]]nas nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa yang spong bar 'gyur ba 'byung ba de dag ni nyung ngo /_/byams pa gang sems kyi rgyud khengs par 'gyur zhing gus pa med pa dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal la gnas pa dang /_gcig la gcig the tshom za ba mang ba dag ni phal che ste/_de dag ni de bzhin 
[\[152b.4\]]gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo bstan pa'i yon tan dang phan yon zab pa dag lung nod par mi byed/_kha ton du mi byed/_'chang bar mi byed/_kun chub par mi byed de/_de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa shas che bas yon tan de dag dang phan yon de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[152b.5\]]de dag dad pa med pa des mdo sde de dag la the tshom za bar 'gyur te/_phyis kyang lung nod par mi byed/_'chang bar mi byed/_kun chub par mi byed de/_de dag gi drung du bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha lugs su 'dug nas 'di skad du mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa yin te/_'di dag ni 
[\[152b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mdo sde 'di dag las yon tan dang phan yon bshad pa gang yin pa de dag khyed kyi 'di las mi 'byung zhing med pa'i phyir ro zhes mos pa zlog par byed do/_/de dag de ltar mos pa zlog pas mdo sde zab mo dag mi 'dod 
[\[152b.7\]]cing the tshom du 'gyur te/_lung nod par mi byed/_kha ton du mi byed de/_mi blun po de dag gis yon tan dang phan yon de dag thos na 'di ltar chos spong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni sbyang bar mi nus so snyam du mi sems so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi yon tan de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa gang lags pa 'di dag las gang gis sems bskyed pa gang yang rung 
[\[153a.2\]]ba zhig yid la bgyid cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yid la bgyid pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed pa de dag gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[153a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa sems bskyed pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa de dag 
[\[153a.4\]]ni byis pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/_skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sems bskyed pa ma yin te/_byams pa sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin no/_/bcu gang zhe na/_byams pa 'di 
[\[153a.5\]]lta ste/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la zhe 'gras pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar mi nus te/_sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_'tshe ba yongs su spangs te/_sems can 
[\[153a.6\]]thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_zab mo'i bzod pa la nges par gyur pas dam pa'i chos la mngon par zhen pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_rnyed pa dang 
[\[153a.7\]]bkur stis ma gos pas bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_brjed pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rin po cher sems bskyed pa dang /_zhum pa med pas sems can thams cad la bla ma bzhin du gus pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]byang chub kyi yan lag la nges pas nyi tshe ba'i bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar mi bya ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_ma 'dres pas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sems bskyed pa dang /_mtshan ma yongs su spangs te/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i 
[\[153b.2\]]sems bskyed pa ste/_byams pa sems bskyed pa bcu po ni de dag yin te/_sems bskyed pa bcu po de dag las sems bskyed pa gang yang rung ba'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni sems bskyed pa de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar mi 
[\[153b.3\]]'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/
[\[153b.4\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_kun dga' bo legs so legs so/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[153b.5\]]'di zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_
[\[153b.6\]]lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya 
[\[153b.7\]]pa las lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu lnga pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]{D70}]@##/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa ste lag [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]zhus pa/_bam po dang po/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su bA hu pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod 
[\[154a.2\]]skad du/_'phags pa lag [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan 
[\[154a.3\]]da ka'i gnas na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba g.yog dang bcas te/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka'i gnas 
[\[154a.4\]]ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[154a.5\]]po lag [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[154a.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos myur du mngon par rdzogs 
[\[154a.7\]]par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag rtag par rgyun du yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub 
[\[154b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos kyis longs spyod rnams yongs su tshol gyi chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no/_/mnyam pas yin gyi 
[\[154b.3\]]mi mnyam pas ni ma yin no/_/de srog chags gzhan dag dang /_sems can gzhan rnams la gnod pa mi byed/_nyam nga ba mi byed par sbyin pa sbyin te/_brjod pa dang /_sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa'i phyir ma yin/_'dzem pa'i phyir ma yin/_'jigs pa'i phyir ma 
[\[154b.4\]]yin/_lan du phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/_mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/_tshul 'chos pa ma yin/_kha gsag byed pa ma yin/_brnyas pa ma yin pa'o/_/sbyin gnas sam/_sbyin gnas ma yin pa'am/_mngon par shes pa'am/_mngon par shes 
[\[154b.5\]]pa ma yin pa'am/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_tshul khrims 'chal pa'am/_'dris pa'am/_ma 'dris pa'am/_mdza' ba'am/_mi mdza' ba la yang rung ste/_bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_rim gror byed/_mchod par byed cing 'dun pa drag po dang /_
[\[154b.6\]]dga' ba drag po dang /_dad pa drag pos de nyung ngu bdog na yang nyung ngu sbyin/_mang du bdog na yang mang du sbyin/_bzang du bdog na yang bzang du sbyin/_ngan pa bdog na yang ngan pa sbyin/_gya nom pa bdog na yang gya nom pa sbyin no/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ji ltar byang chub sems 
[\[154b.7\]]dpa' brgya stong sbyin pa dang /_rlabs po che'i sems dang /_rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa de bzhin du kA ka ni tsam yang sbyin zhing rlabs po che'i sems dang /_rangs pa'i sems kyis sbyin no/_/des zas 'dod pa rnams la sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]pa'i ye shes bla na med pa'i stobs kyis brtan pa thob par bya ba'i phyir zas sbyin no/_/skom 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i skom pa thams cad bsal ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir skom sbyin no/_/gos 'dod 
[\[155a.2\]]pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa'i gos thob par bya ba'i phyir gos sbyin no/_/bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i 
[\[155a.3\]]phyir bzhon pa sbyin no/_/spos 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir spos sbyin no/_/me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[155a.4\]]bdun gyi me tog bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir me tog rnams sbyin no/_/phye ma 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyes par spyod pa'i dri nga ba'i dri ma gzhom pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir phye ma sbyin no/_/byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad 
[\[155a.5\]]nyes pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang spyod pa'i byug pa thob par bya ba'i phyir byug pa sbyin no/_/gdugs 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir gdugs sbyin no/_/lham 'dod pa rnams la ni 
[\[155a.6\]]sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba mngon par shes pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lham sbyin no/_/mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad lha dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'phags pa'i gnas pa'i mal cha'i bde bar sbyar ba'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir mal cha sbyin 
[\[155a.7\]]no/_/stan 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi phyed pa/_dpa' ba'i stan thob par bya ba'i phyir stan sbyin no/_/gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad skyabs dang /_gnas 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]dang /_mgon dang /_dpung gnyen du gyur pa'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir gnas sbyin no/_/phru tog dang /_bum pa dang /_'tshog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad chos kyi rdzing lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba'i phyir phru tog dang /_bum pa dang /_'tshog chas 
[\[155b.2\]]sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dka' thub kyi nags tshal sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad skyes bu chen 
[\[155b.3\]]po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten rnams la rgyan sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir mun khrod kyi mchod rten nam lam rnams la 
[\[155b.4\]]mar me'i sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnams sam/_chos la mchod pa rnams sam/_dge 'dun la mchod pa rnams la rol mo'i dbyangs sgra sbyin pa sbyin no/_/
[\[155b.5\]]sems can thams cad cha byad dang /_tshul khrims dang /_spyod pa mdzes pa bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang chos gos sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba sbyin pa'i stobs thob par bya ba'i phyir snod tshags sbyin pa sbyin no/_/
[\[155b.6\]]sems can thams cad shes rab chen po'i tshogs yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir myu gu dang /_snag tsha dang /_glegs bu dang /_chos kyi khri stan sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir na ba'i gsos 
[\[155b.7\]]sman dang /_yo byad sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad byang chub rnam pa gsum gyi sa dang /_bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi sa thob par bya ba'i phyir sa sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad slob dpon med pa'i dam pa'i chos mthon po thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]mthon po dang /_sku gzugs mthon po byed do/_/bdog pa lta na sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa myur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir myur zhing yongs su nyon mongs par ma gyur par sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad bar du gcod pa 
[\[156a.2\]]med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rung ba sbyin gyi rung ba ma yin pa ni ma yin no/_/sems can thams cad spobs pa chen po yongs su mi 'chad pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su mi gcod par sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad snying rje chen po 
[\[156a.3\]]mtshungs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems can thams cad bdud dang mu stegs byed thams cad kyis tshar mi chod pa dang /_gnod par mi nus pa'i chos mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir gzhan 
[\[156a.4\]]la mi gnod par sbyin pa sbyin no/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin du nor med cing 'byor ba med par gyur na/_de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la sbyin pa mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa 'di dag 
[\[156a.5\]]sbyin par yid kyis 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debs te/_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa 'di dag sbyin pa'i nus pa dang ldan yang rung /_nus pa dang mi ldan yang rung ste/_gang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can thams cad bdag gi bde 
[\[156a.6\]]ba sbyar ba nyid dang ldan pa dang /_yang dag par ldan par gyur cing 'bad pa med pa dang /_'dod pa med par brnag pa rnams thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing bsam pa ma lus par yongs su rdzogs nas bde ba la 
[\[156a.7\]]reg par gnas par 'gyur bar bdag gi de bzang por gyur cig_/bdag gi de dge bar gyur cig ces de ltar yid kyis 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debs so/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la rin po che'i rgya mtsho yang sbyin par 'dod cing 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]smon la smon lam 'debs so/_/dbyig gi ri dang /_gser gyi ri dang /_gos kyi ri dang /_yo byad thams cad kyi ri dang /_bza' ba rgya mtsho dang /_btung ba rgya mtsho dang /_gnas legs par byas pa/_legs par gnas pa/_mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa 
[\[156b.2\]]dag kyang sbyin par 'dod cing smon la smon lam 'debs so/_/'khor ba'i srid pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_rnam par gtong ba gang yin pa zang 
[\[156b.3\]]zing sbyin pa 'am/_mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa 'am/_chos sbyin pa ma lus pa de dag thams cad la tha na dus gsum du yang mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ngo /_/gal te de la bslangs la nor sbyin mi nus na yang rang gi zan skal sbyin pa'am/_grogs su 'gyur ba 'am/_kun 
[\[156b.4\]]du btsal ba'i thabs kyang de la ston par 'gyur zhing chos kyi gtam gyis de'i 'dod pa sel bar byed do/_/de sbyin par 'dod par gyur pa na yang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba 
[\[156b.5\]]dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/sbyin pa de byin 
[\[156b.6\]]nas kyang sbyin pa de sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[156b.7\]]chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/gal te sbyin pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_rnam par gtong ba de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_dus dus 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]su 'am/_cung zad cung zad du yang chags pa dang /_ser sna dang /_sbyin pas 'jigs pa spang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_bsal bar rtsol lo/_/'bad do/_/dus dus su 'am/_cung zad cung zad du yang sbyin pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_rnam 
[\[157a.2\]]par gtong ba la slob pa dang /_mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/_/'bad do/_/srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub 
[\[157a.3\]]tu sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa dang /_byang chub tu smon pa dang /_byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sbyin pa chen po dang /_gtong ba chen po dang /_rnam par gtong ba chen po grangs med 
[\[157a.4\]]cing dpag tu med pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang /_bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char sbyin par 'dod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa 
[\[157a.5\]]dang /_bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char gtong bar 'dod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi char rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa dang /_bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi char rnam par gtong bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_rnam par gtong ba thams cad kyi nang na mchog yin no/_/
[\[157a.6\]]de ni dam pa yin no/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang /_ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang /_sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems 
[\[157a.7\]]dpa' ni slong ba rnams kyis bslangs pa na yan lag dang nying lag gcod dam/_bcad nas slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gyur ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las chen po rgya cher yongs su mi spong ba'i phyir ro/_/
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/_sems can gzhan gyi ched la de rang gi yan lag dang /_nying lag yongs su mi gtong ba ni ma yin no/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni slong bas bdog pa thams cad bslangs na pha ma la gnod pa byas shing 
[\[157b.2\]]spangs te sdug bsngal bar byas/_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba la gnod pa byas shing spangs te sdug bsngal bar byas nas bdog pa thams cad slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[157b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par snying brtse ba yin te/_ji ltar pha ma la gnod pa mi byed cing mi spong la sdug bsngal bar yang mi byed pa dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba la 
[\[157b.4\]]gnod pa mi byed cing mi spong ste/_sdug bsngal bar mi byed par sbyin pa yang sbyin pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gso bar byed do/_/de ni sems can gzhan gyi phyir ram/_sems can gzhan gyi ched la bdog pa thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba yang ma 
[\[157b.5\]]yin no/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa'i bsngags pa gsung ba ma yin na/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yan lag bcad pa lta la de ltar ga la 'gyur/_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar tshul khrims 
[\[157b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni srog gi phyir yang srog chags gzhan dag dang /_sems can gzhan rnams la mi rdeg mi gsod cing gsod pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/_/srog gi phyir yang 
[\[157b.7\]]ma byin par mi len la/_ma byin par len du mi 'jug cing ma byin par len pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/_/srog gi phyir yang 'dod pa la log par g.yem par mi byed la/_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed du mi 'jug cing 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa la rjes 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]su yi rang bar mi byed do/_/srog gi phyir yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi smra la/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer du mi 'jug cing [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do/_/srog gi phyir yang chang mi 'thung la/_chang 'thung du mi 'jug cing /_chang 'thung ba la rjes su yi rang bar mi 
[\[158a.2\]]byed do/_/de bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po de dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la dam por gnas te mi lhod par gnas shing sgrub po/_/de bzhin du zhing rmed pa dang /_zhing rmed du 'jug pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_'ching du 'jug pa dang /_go rar 'jug pa dang /_go 
[\[158a.3\]]rar 'jug du 'jug pa dang /_rdeg pa dang /_rdeg tu 'jug pa dang /_gcod pa dang /_gcod du 'jug pa dag spang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_bsal bar 'bad par byed do/_/de ltar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag la ring du gnas shing brtan por gnas la dam por gnas te mi 
[\[158a.4\]]lhod par gnas shing sgrub bo/_/de bzhin du phra ma'i tshig dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa spang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_bsal bar 'bad par byed do/_/de srog chags thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad ni bdag gi pha ma ji lta ba bzhin no/_/bu gcig 
[\[158a.5\]]pa phangs pa ji lta ba bzhin te/_ji ltar pha ma dang /_bu gcig pa phangs pa bdag la 'khu yang slar 'khu bar mi bya la/_lag pa'am/_bong ba'am/_dbyug pa'am/_ral gri'am/_mdas brdegs kyang slar brdeg par mi bya/_gsod kyang slar gsad 
[\[158a.6\]]par mi bya zhing ji ltar pha ma dang /_bu gcig pa phangs pa 'khu yang slar 'khu bar mi bya ba de bzhin du bdag srog chags thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyis lag pa 'am/_bong ba 'am/_dbyug pa 'am/_ral gri 'am/_mdas brdegs kyang slar 
[\[158a.7\]]brdeg par mi bya/_gsod kyang slar gsad par mi bya'o zhes de ltar slob bo/_/dper na pha 'am/_ma 'am/_bu gcig pa phangs pa yun ring por yul rgyus te 'ongs pa mthong na dga' zhing yid bde bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po yang srog chags thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba dang /_yid bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims srog gcod pa spangs 
[\[158b.2\]]pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims ma byin par len pa spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams 
[\[158b.3\]]cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims tshangs par spyod pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can 
[\[158b.4\]]thams cad mi slob pa'i tshul khrims chang 'thung ba spangs pa la dgod pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i zhing rmed pa dang /_zhing rmed du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i 'ching ba dang /_
[\[158b.5\]]'ching du 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba thams cad gcad pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i go rar 'jug pa dang /_go rar 'jug tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba lnga dgag pa dang bsal ba'i phyir 
[\[158b.6\]]ro/_/de'i rdeg pa dang /_rdeg tu 'jug pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i bsgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i gcod pa dang /_gcod du 'jug pa 
[\[158b.7\]]spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kun du bsrungs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i phra ma'i tshig spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i tshig rtsub po spangs 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]pa'i tshul khrims ni yan lag lnga pa'i ngag gi lam dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i tshig kyal pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims ni tshig gzung bar 'os pa thogs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i 'chi bas 'jigs 
[\[159a.2\]]skrag pa yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i 
[\[159a.3\]]gzhan gyi nor dang yo byad 'jig cing chud za ba yongs su skyob pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi nor bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i gzhan gyi bud med la 'dzin pa gtong bar byed pa dang /_gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i 
[\[159a.4\]]tshul khrims ni 'khrul pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i 'gugs pa gtong bar byed pa dang /_gtong bar byed du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims ni rang gi sems la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i 'ching ba 'grol ba dang /_'grol du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims 
[\[159a.5\]]ni dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud kyi dmag dang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i khyim nas 'byung ba'i tshul khrims ni sems rnam par grol ba sgrib pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i rdeg pa 'chags pa'i tshul khrims ni mi 
[\[159a.6\]]'jigs pa rnam pa bzhis 'jigs pa yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i gcod pa zlog pa'i tshul khrims ni kun du srung ba'i chos bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i mi slu ba'i tshig smra ba'i tshul khrims ni dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying por bdud dang 
[\[159a.7\]]nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa bar du gcod pa thams cad kyis mi slu ba'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i bye ba rnams kyi sdums byed cing mdza' ba brtan par byed pa'i tshul khrims ni g.yog 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po mi phyed pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i tshig snyan 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]pa dang /_'jam por smra ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad kyi rnar bde zhing snying du 'ong la bden pa'i ngag thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i kun tu 'thun pa'i smra ba'i tshul khrims ni tshar mi chod cing gzung bar 'os la 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa thob par bya ba'i 
[\[159b.2\]]phyir ro/_/de'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshul khrims ni 'phags pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i dge 'dun gyi g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_chos 
[\[159b.3\]]dang /_dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la dus gsum du yan lag lngas gtugs te phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad dpa' bo'i stan byang chub kyi snying 
[\[159b.4\]]por mi phyed cing sra la shin tu brtan pa'i dad pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab mchog gi chos nyid dam pa lnga thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshul khrims ni sangs 
[\[159b.5\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum du chos kyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnas med pa bla na med pa bskor ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum du dge 'dun gyi yon tan brjod pa smra ba'i tshul khrims ni 
[\[159b.6\]]'phags pa'i dge 'dun mi phyed pa'i g.yog 'khor chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la skyabs bla na med pa sbyin pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[159b.7\]]thams cad dkon mchog gsum dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis stongs par mi 'gyur bar gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni bde bar 'gyur bar gcig tu nges par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas thams 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]cad la bskal par chos ston par gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshul khrims ni sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum du sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad so sor 'dor ba dang /_sdig pa thams 
[\[160a.2\]]cad la smod pa'i tshul khrims ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba thob par bya 
[\[160a.3\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum du sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad dang /_sems can 'gro ba thams cad du song ba 'jig rten 
[\[160a.4\]]gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub kyi tshogs mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa bsags pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum 
[\[160a.5\]]du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa'i tshul khrims ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par nges pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i dus gsum du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par yongs su sngo ba'i tshul khrims ni gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_
[\[160a.6\]]mi 'jigs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i pha ma dang /_bla ma dang /_rgan pa dang /_slob dpon dang /_mkhan po la yongs su spyad par byed pa'i bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul khrims ni zil gyis mi non pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[160a.7\]]skrag pa dang /_nyam thag pa dang /_mgon med pa dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul khrims ni dris pa thams cad la mi skyo bar lan 'debs pa la lung bstan pa la mkhas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i rgyal po dang /_chom rkun dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_bgo skal la spyod 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]pa'i sdug bsngal gyi nang du chud pa rnams yongs su bskyab cing grogs bya ba'i tshul khrims ni gnas dang /_sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_
[\[160b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rjes su bsngags pa'i tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i pha rol gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang 'thun pa'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang /_pha rol 
[\[160b.3\]]gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i lus kyi las kyi tshul khrims dang /_pha rol gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang 'thun pa'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims dang /_pha rol gyi sems mngon par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par dga' 
[\[160b.4\]]bar 'gyur ba'i ngag gi las kyi tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol gyi sems mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i tshe 'di'i don dang /_tshe rabs gzhan gyi don dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i don dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i don 
[\[160b.5\]]dang /_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa'i don rnams la bag med pa dang /_brjed pa rnams kyi dran pa yang dag par skyed pa'i tshul khrims dang /_dran pa 'byung bar byed pa'i tshul khrims ni brjed pa med pa'i chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i chos nyan pa'i tshul khrims 
[\[160b.6\]]dang /_chos 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims dang /_chos goms par byed pa'i tshul khrims dang /_chos nye bar ston pa'i tshul khrims ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i tshul khrims yang dag par len par 
[\[160b.7\]]'dod pa dang /_lhag par spyad par 'dod na yang lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_lhag par spyod pa dang /_yang dag par blangs pa dang /_lhag par spyad nas kyang sems can thams cad 
[\[161a.2\]]bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/gal te tshul khrims de ma zhig 
[\[161a.3\]]pa dang /_ma ral ba dang /_'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_dus dus su'am/_cung zad cung zad du yang mi dge ba spang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_bsal bar rtsol lo/_/'bad do/_/dus dus su'am/_cung 
[\[161a.4\]]zad cung zad du yang dge ba la slob pa dang /_mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/_/'bad do/_srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub 
[\[161a.5\]]tu sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems sgom pa dang /_byang chub tu smon pa dang /_byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_dge ba'i tshul khrims 
[\[161a.6\]]la lhag par spyod pa grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_mi slob pa'i tshul khrims bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_zag 
[\[161a.7\]]pa med pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_mi slob pa'i tshul khrims yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni dge ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_dge ba'i tshul khrims la lhag par spyod pa'i mchog yin no/_/de ni dam pa yin no/_/lag 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang /_sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[161b.2\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan dag gi rang gi lus kyi srog gcod dam/_bdog pa thams cad 'phrog gam/_chung ma 'phrog gam/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'am/_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa smra ba'am/_
[\[161b.3\]]gshe 'am/_gsod dam/_'dzin tam/_rdeg gam/_gcod kyang slar gnod par mi byed cing slar mi khro ste shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin par mi byed do/_/de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_bdag nyid kyis sngon gyi srid pa rnams dang /_srid pa 'di la sdig pa mi dge 
[\[161b.4\]]ba'i las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni 'di yin/_de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te/_rang gi las kyi 'bras bu dang /_rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag gis myong ba la ci'i phyir gzhan la slar gnod par bya zhing slar khro ba dang /_shar 
[\[161b.5\]]gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin par bya snyam du sems so/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_gal te bdag gi srog gcod pa'am/_bdog pa thams cad 'phrog pa'am/_chung ma 'phrog pa'am/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'am/_phra ma 
[\[161b.6\]]'am/_ngag rtsub po'am/_tshig kyal pa smra ba'am/_gshe ba'am/_gsod pa'am/_'dzin pa'am/_rdeg pa'am/_gcod pa yang rung ste/_gzhan dag la slar gnod pa byas sam/_slar khro ba'am/_shar gnyer zhing 'khon du bzung na slar gnod pa 
[\[161b.7\]]byas pa dang /_slar khros pa dang /_shar gnyer zhing 'khon du bzung ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba de'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'dod pa/_mi sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba 'di bas bdag la las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /_las kyi rgyu 'thun pa brgya gyur tam/_stong gyur tam/_
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]de bas lhag par mi 'dod pa dang /_mi sdug pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i sdug bsngal gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_srog yod pas srog gcod 
[\[162a.2\]]par 'gyur/_rdzas yod pas rdzas 'phrog par 'gyur/_rna ba'i dbang po yod pas rdzun du smra ba thos par 'gyur zhing /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig kyal pa thos par 'gyur la/_lus yod pas lus 'dren pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_rdeg pa dang /_
[\[162a.3\]]gcod par 'gyur te/_bdag nyid kyis sdug bsngal [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]dngos po/_/sdug bsngal gyi gzhi/_/srog gi dbang po dang /_rna ba'i dbang po dang /_lus blangs par gyur na ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang /_slar khro ba dang /_shar gnyer zhing 'khon du gzung bar bya 
[\[162a.4\]]snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_dper na sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni sra ba ste/_de ni ngo bo nyid/_de ni chos nyid/_de ni rang bzhin no/_/chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid ni gsher ba/_me'i khams kyi mtshan nyid 
[\[162a.5\]]ni tsha ba/_rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid ni yang zhing g.yo ba ste/_de ni ngo bo nyid/_de ni chos nyid/_de ni rang bzhin no/_/de bzhin du srog chags thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos can/_'god pa'i chos can/_'gog pa'i chos can no/_/dbang po thams cad kyang sdug bsngal 
[\[162a.6\]]gyi chos can/_sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/_sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can no/_/lus thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyi chos/_sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos/_sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos te/_de ni ngo bo nyid/_de ni chos nyid/_de ni rang bzhin 
[\[162a.7\]]yin no/_/srog gi dbang po zad pa'i chos can/_'god pa'i chos can/_'gog pa'i chos can/_zad cing dengs la 'gog pa dang /_dbang po drug po sdug bsngal gyi chos can/_sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i chos can/_sdug bsngal myong ba'i chos can rnams la 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]sdug bsngal 'dus te reg pa'i ji ltar gzhan dag la slar gnod pa 'am/_slar khro ba'am/_shar gnyer zhing 'khon du gzung bar bya/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni ngo bo nyid/_'di ni chos nyid/_'di ni rang bzhin yin no snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[162b.2\]]dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_bdag gi mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang bdag med cing bdag gi med pa yin la/_gzhan dag gi mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyang bdag med cing bdag gi 
[\[162b.3\]]med pa yin na/_mkhas pa rig pa dag mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid bdag med cing bdag gi med pa la/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid bdag med cing bdag gi med pa dang /_ji ltar dga' ba'am/_
[\[162b.4\]]rjes su chags pa 'am/_yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba 'am/_rdeg pa'am/_slar gnod par byed pa 'am/_slar khro ba 'am/_shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob 
[\[162b.5\]]ste/_'di lta ste mir skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ni nyung zhing chung gi_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi sdug bsngal ni ches mi bzad la ches bzod par dka' ba yin/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ches mi bzad cing bzod par dka' ba yin 
[\[162b.6\]]na/_bdag gis ji ltar sdug bsngal chung zhing nyung ba tsam gyi phyir gzhan dag la slar gnod pa dang /_slar khro ba dang /_shar gnyer zhing 'khon du gzung bar bya snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_gang bdag 
[\[162b.7\]]gcig pu'i don 'dod pa dang /_bdag gcig pu la phan par 'dod pas gzhan dag la phyir gnod pa byed cing phyir khro ste shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin pa de yang mi rigs te cha ma yin na/_bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi don 'dod pa/_'jig rten thams cad la phan par 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]'dod pa/_go cha chen po bgos pa/_yi dam bcas pa chen pos yi dam bcas pa/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/_mi bzod pa dang /_
[\[163a.2\]]phyir gnod pa byed pa dang /_phyir khro ba dang /_shar gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs pa dang /_'phel ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur gyi/_bzod pa dang /_phyir gnod pa mi byed pa dang /_phyir mi khro ba dang /_shar 
[\[163a.3\]]gnyer zhing 'khon du 'dzin pa mi byed pas sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag sogs shing 'phel te/_yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bskang bar 'dod pas mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[163a.4\]]reg pas reg kyang gzhan dag la slar gnod par mi bya/_slar khro bar mi bya/_shar gnyer zhing 'khon du gzung bar mi bya na/_mi'i sdug bsngal gyis reg pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de spyos sam/_brgyad dam/_smad dam/_mi snyan pa byas kyang byams pa'i sems dang /_
[\[163a.5\]]snying rje'i sems dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs shin tu dri ma med cing dag la dkar ba thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/_/de drud bshal tam/_bcings sam/_bzung yang byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_skad cig gcig la ma rig 
[\[163a.6\]]pa'i sgrib pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gzhom pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/_/de brdegs kyang byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba bzlog pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/_/de rna ba bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /_
[\[163a.7\]]snying rje'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad la dad par bya ba'i chos kyi rna ba bskyed pa'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/_/de sna bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi yon tan mdzes shing bla na med pa la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]bzod cing dang du len to/_/de rkang pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/_/de lag pa bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i 
[\[163b.2\]]sems dang /_sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba'i chos kyi lag pa bkyang pa sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/_/de yan lag thams cad bcad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yan lag dang /_nying lag 
[\[163b.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/_/de mig phyung yang byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad shes bzhin gyi mig g.yung drung thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/_/de mgo gcod kyang byams pa'i sems dang /_
[\[163b.4\]]snying rje'i sems dang /_sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi mgo thob par bya ba'i phyir bzod cing dang du len to/_/de bzod pa 'di dag dang /_ji mi snyam pa 'di dag mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yid la bya bar 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba 
[\[163b.5\]]dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/mngon sum du byed pa dang /_yid la byed 
[\[163b.6\]]pa dang /_mngon sum du byas pa dang /_yid la byas nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 
[\[163b.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/gal te bzod pa 'di dag dang /_ji mi snyam pa 'di dag ma nyams pa dang skyon med pa dang /_'dren ma ma yin par slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_dus dus su'am/_cung zad 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]cung zad du yang mi bzod pa dang /_ji snyam par mi byed pa spang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_bsal bar stsol lo/_/'bad do/_/dus dus su 'am/_cung zad cung zad du yang bzod pa dang /_ji mi snyam pa la slob pa dang /_mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_yongs su 
[\[164a.2\]]rdzogs par bya ba stsol lo/_/'bad do/_/srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems sgom pa 
[\[164a.3\]]dang /_byang chub tu smon pa dang /_byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi bzod pa kun tu spyod pa dge ba dang /_bzod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[164a.4\]]thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i bzod pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_mi slob pa'i bzod pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i bzod pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_mi slob pa'i bzod pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni bzod 
[\[164a.5\]]pa kun tu spyod pa dge ba dang /_bzod pa yang dag par sgrub pa dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no/_/de ni dam pa yin no/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang /_sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par bzod pa'i 
[\[164a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten 
[\[164a.7\]]gyi khams mtha' yas mu med de/_'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang sems can mtha' yas so/_/de ltar sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mu med pa la mtha' yod pa ma yin mu yod pa ma yin te/_bdag ni sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de la phan pa'i phyir go cha bgos 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]la/_sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa la bde ba'i phyir go cha bgos na sems can thams cad la phan par dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bde bar dmigs pa mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' 
[\[164b.2\]]yas pa dag bag med par gyur tam/_sems gzhan du gyur tam/_gnyid kyis log kyang nyin mtshan du sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel ba dang /_rgyas pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' 
[\[164b.3\]]yas pa dag skye ba dang /_byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dag skye bas rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed dka' bar mi 'gyur na bdag gis 'dir sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyas par

[\[164b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i rga ba'i sdug bsngal gcig pu bsal ba dang gzhom par 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/_
[\[164b.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/_gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_
[\[164b.7\]]'dod pa mi 'byor ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sdug 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_gang zhig sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i sdug bsngal sems kyi skad cig gcig pa'i sems kyi skad cig 
[\[165a.2\]]gcig tsam dang 'brel ba bsal bar 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/_gang zhig ma 'ongs shing ma phyin pa'i bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med 
[\[165a.3\]]pa rnams su sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa de'i skye ba'i sdug bsngal nas srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bar du bsal bar 'dod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_gang zhig rang sangs rgyas 
[\[165a.4\]]kyi yon tan nam/_nyan thos kyi yon tan 'dod pa de yang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa 'phel la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gyur na/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang sangs rgyas 
[\[165a.5\]]kyi chos yon tan mtha' yas shing yon tan mu med pa/_stobs mtha' yas shing stobs mu med pa mtha' dag chub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_smon pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_bag med par gyur tam/_gnyid kyis log kyang rgyu bzhi dang /_rkyen bzhi 
[\[165a.6\]]dang /_dmigs pa bzhi po de dag ni de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mu med pa bzhi sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/_sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 
[\[165a.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba'i phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi skye ba dang /_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi skye ba dag gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par mi dka' na/_bdag gis 'dir sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi dang /_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi phung po mtha' yas shing mtha' yas pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su mthong la/_gzhi de las rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par mi dka' bar yang dag par rjes su mthong bzhin du rdzogs pa'i 
[\[165b.2\]]byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir nyams par bya snyam mo/_/rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni shar phyogs kyi mtha' yang mngon zhing mu yang mngon la/_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng gi mtha' yang mngon zhing mu yang mngon 
[\[165b.3\]]la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po mtha' yas mu med pa bzhi po de dag la ni mtha' dang mu yod pa ma yin na/_bdag gis sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'phel zhing rgyas na 
[\[165b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba la srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_gang dag seng ge dang /_stag dang /_khyi dang /_ce spyang dang /_bya rgod dang /_khrung 
[\[165b.5\]]khrung dang /_bya rog dang /_'ug pa dang /_srin bu dang /_sbrang ma dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang du gyur pa de dag gis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur na/_bdag mir gyur bzhin du srog gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus 
[\[165b.6\]]nyams par bya snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_mi brgya 'am/_mi stong gis kyang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs shing thob na bdag gis kyang 'dir ci'i phyir mi rtogs shing thob par mi 'gyur/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin 
[\[165b.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rtogs shing brnyes/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang rtogs shing brnyes par gyur na/_bdag gis 'dir srog 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]gi phyir yang ci'i phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus nyams par bya snyam mo/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/_sangs rgyas ston pa'o/_/zhes ston na sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa'am/_

[\[166a.3\]]phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thob par 'gyur ba dang /_rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de 
[\[166a.4\]]dag mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun tu nyan to/_/nges par byed do/_/rtog go_/mkhas pa le lo med pa ni ru shing bzhin du byed cing yid la byed pas mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun tu chos de dag 'dzin to/_/

[\[166a.6\]]can thams cad kyi don dang /_ci bya ba chos can chos dang ldan pa/_'jig rten 'di la bde ba'am/_'jig rten pha rol tu bde ba dag la rang gi lus nye bar spyod pa dang /_yo byad du gyur par byed do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na 'byung ba chen po bsgribs pa med pa/_yongs su gzung ba med pa bzhi

[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_rgan pa dang /_nad pa dang /_mgon med pa rnams la yongs su spyad par bya ba dang /_sri zhu bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya bas bye brag tu 'gyur ro/_/de mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du gzhan gyi sems dang gzhan

[\[166b.3\]]'os pa rnams ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dzud do/_/'dul lo/_/'god do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa la 'os pa rnams ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa la 'dzud do/_/'dul lo/_/'god do/_/

[\[166b.7\]]yang khyad du gsod do/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang khyad du gsod do/_/mkhas pa le lo med pa ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang de mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]chos yongs su bskang ba thob par bya ba dang /_spyod lam dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtan zhing rtul ba brtan to/_/de'i brtson 'grus 'di dang /_rtul ba 'di mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang /_brtsam par 
[\[167a.2\]]'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed 
[\[167a.3\]]do/_/mngon sum du byed pa dang /_rtsom pa dang /_mngon sum du byas pa dang /_brtsams nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs

[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]'grus yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_mi slob pa'i brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni brtson 'grus dge ba dang /_rtsol ba dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no/_/de ni dam pa yin no/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ltar na

[\[167b.3\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di la byang chub sems dpa' mig gis gzugs rnams mthong na/_mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/_gang gi phyir mig gi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas 'jig rten 
[\[167b.4\]]na brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing srung ste/_mig gi dbang pos mig gi dbang po sdom par byed do/_/de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams thos pa dang /_snas dri rnams tshor ba dang /_lces ro
