[\[167b.5\]]rnams myong ba dang /_lus kyis reg bya rnams la reg pa dang /_yid kyis chos rnams rnam par shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/_gang gi phyir yid kyi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas pas 'jig rten na brnab sems dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_sdig pa 
[\[167b.6\]]mi dge ba'i chos rnams la sems rjes su zag pa de dag bsdam pa'i phyir nan tan byed cing srung ste/_yid kyi dbang pos yid kyi dbang po sdom par byed do/_/de 'gro 'am/_'greng ngam/_'dug gam/_nyal lam/_cang mi smra bar gyur kyang rung ste/_mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas dang /_zhi ba'i 
[\[167b.7\]]gnas kyi gnas mi 'dor ro/_/rnam par mi 'dor ro/_/de lag mi rgod pa dang /_mu cor mi smra ba dang /_tshig mi mang ba dang /_mig mi g.yeng ba dang /_dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang /_mi rgod pa dang /_tom col med pa dang /_lus 'khrul pa med pa dang /_ngag 'khrul ba med pa dang /_sems 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]'khrul pa med pa dang /_dben yang rung /_mi dben yang rung /_spyod lam mi nyams pa yin no/_/bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_gnas dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad ji lta bu yang rung bdag gis chog shes shing gso sla ba dang /_
[\[168a.2\]]dgang sla ba dang /_rim gro bya sla ba dang /_cho ga dang spyod yul dge ba dang /_'du 'dzi las dben pa'i spyod yul yin/_thob pa dang ma thob pa la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de ma khengs ma dud pa yin/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bstod pa dang /_smad pa dang /_grags pa dang /_ma grags 
[\[168a.3\]]pa dang /_'tsho ba dang /_'chi ba la mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de ma khengs ma dud pa yin/_mdza' ba dang /_dgra dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang 'thun pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba dang mi 'thun pa dang /_'phags pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams dang /_
[\[168a.4\]]dben pa dang /_lang long rnams la yang mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med de ma khengs ma dud pa yin/_gzugs sdug pa dang /_mi sdug pa rnams la yang 'thun pa dang mi 'thun pa med pa yin/_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos sdug pa dang /_mi sdug pa rnams la yang 
[\[168a.5\]]'thun pa dang /_mi 'thun pa med pa yin no/_/de'i 'dod pa rnams ni rang gi sems kyis kun tu bslang nas log par rnam par rtog pas ro myong ba yin pas keng rus lta bur yid la byed do/_/'dod pa rnams ni dgra mang ba'i phyir sha snag gu lta bur yid la byed do/_/'dod pa rnams ni 
[\[168a.6\]]blangs na sdug bsngal la yongs su btang na bde ba'i phyir rtswa me lta bur yid la byed do/_/'dod pa rnams ni gnod pa mang ba'i phyir shing gi rtse mo'i shing tog lta bur yid la byed do/_/'dod pa rnams ni dbang byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir slong ba lta bur yid la byed do/_/'dod pa rnams ni skad 
[\[168a.7\]]cig tsam zhig nor pas dga' ba'i phyir rmi lam lta bur yid la byed do/_/'dod pa rnams ni sdug bsngal la bde bar 'du shes pa phyin ci log gis bskyed pa'i phyir mdze lta bur yid la byed do/_/'dod pa rnams ni nyes par spyod pa thams cad kyi dngos po yin pa dang /_ngan 'gro log 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]par ltung ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i mtha' yin pas mchil pa lta bur yid la byed do/_/'dod pa rnams ni ngoms par mi byed pa dang /_skom pa 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir tshwa chu lta bur yid la byed do/_/de 'dod pa dag las dben pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las 
[\[168b.2\]]dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/_dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/_
[\[168b.3\]]dpyod pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/_bde ba lus kyis myong la 
[\[168b.4\]]'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/_bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs te/_snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba yang nub pas 
[\[168b.5\]]bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa/_btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de sems can thams cad la bde ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas byams pa tshad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/
[\[168b.6\]]de sems can thams cad la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas snying rje tshad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de sems can rnams la dga' ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dga' ba tshad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de sems can rnams la 
[\[168b.7\]]sdug bsngal yang med bde ba yang med pa yid la byed pas btang snyoms tshad med pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de gzugs la rags pa'i 'du shes yid la byed cing nam mkha' la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]so/_/de rnam par shes pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de ci yang med pa la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de 'du shes med 
[\[169a.2\]]'du shes med min la zhi ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rang gi dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba ji ltar gnas shing ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin du rgyun thung ba rnams la yang rgyun thung ba'i 'du shes dang /_rgyun ring 
[\[169a.3\]]ba rnams la yang rgyun ring ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba dran pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de sems can gyi lus rnams la mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de 'chi ba'i mtshan 
[\[169a.4\]]ma yid la byed pas 'chi ba'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de na ba dang rga ba'i mtshan ma yid la byed pas nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de kha zas yongs su tshol ba dang 'gyur ba la nad kyi rgyu dang /_gnod pa'i rgyur yid la byed pas kha zas 
[\[169a.5\]]la mi 'thun pa'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de khyim dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs kyi 'jig rten thams cad la 'byor pa dang bral ba'i mtshan mar yid la byed pa dang /_nags tshal rmad du byung ba dang /_kun dga'i ra ba rmad du byung ba dang bral ba'i mtshan mar 
[\[169a.6\]]yid la byed pas 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po rdzogs 
[\[169a.7\]]par byas te gnas so/_/de nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs tshad med pa kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de shi ba'i lus bsregs pa de la rlung ngam chus thal ba yang 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]med par byed pa'i 'du shes dang /_zhigs pa la phye ma yang med pa dang /_rdul du gyur pa la rdul kyang med pa'i 'du shes su rnam par 'jig pa bsgoms shing bsgrubs te nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams 
[\[169b.2\]]la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs tshad med pa kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis 
[\[169b.3\]]gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de de 
[\[169b.4\]]bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po tshad med pa yid du 'ong ba rnams la mtshan mar yid la byed pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa dang /_bdun pa dang /_brgyad pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/des sa 'di 
[\[169b.5\]]mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byed pas zad par sar rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_nam mkha' dang /_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes mtshan mar yid la byas pas 
[\[169b.6\]]zad par chu dang /_zad par me dang /_zad par rlung dang /_zad par sngon po dang /_zad par ser po dang /_zad par dmar po dang /_zad par dkar po dang /_zad par nam mkha' dang /_zad par rnam par shes par rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de snyoms par 'jug 
[\[169b.7\]]pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs te/_snying rje chen po la dmigs pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la dmigs pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku dang rgyan 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]la dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshangs pa'i dbyangs la dmigs pa dang /_sngon gyi smon lam la dmigs pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la dmigs pa dang /_'jig rten rnam par sbyang ba la dmigs pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po'i 
[\[170a.2\]]bkod pa la dmigs pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la dmigs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzhom pa la dmigs pa la sems nye bar 'dogs so/_/de bsam gtan byed pa na rnam par shes pa'i gnas bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan byed do/_/
[\[170a.3\]]sa'i khams la mi gnas/_chu'i khams la mi gnas/_me'i khams la mi gnas/_rlung gi khams la mi gnas/_nam mkha'i khams la mi gnas/_rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas/_'jig rten 'di la mi gnas/_'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas par bsam 
[\[170a.4\]]gtan byed do/_/de ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa bla na med pa thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan la gnas shing bsam gtan la dga'o/_/de bsam gtan de dang /_ting nge 'dzin de la bsam gtan byed par 'dod pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa 
[\[170a.5\]]na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/
[\[170a.6\]]bsam gtan byed pa dang /_bsam gtan byas pa dang /_langs nas kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 
[\[170a.7\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/gal te bsam gtan de dang /_ting nge 'dzin de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_dus dus su 'am/_cung zad cung zad du yang sems rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin ma yin 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]pa spang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_bsal bar rtsol lo/_/'bad do/_/dus dus su 'am/_cung zad cung zad du yang sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dang /_sems mnyam par gzhag par slob pa dang /_mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/_/'bad do/_/srid pa 
[\[170b.2\]]gzhan du gyur pa na zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems sgom pa dang /_byang chub tu smon pa dang /_byang chub tu smon lam 
[\[170b.3\]]'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi sems mnyam par gzhag pa dge ba dang /_sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i sems 
[\[170b.4\]]mnyam par gzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_mi slob pa'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni/_
[\[170b.5\]]sems mnyam par gzhag pa dge ba dang /_sems rtse gcig tu bya ba dge ba mtha' yas mu med pa yin no/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang /_sdug bsngal chung ngus bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[170b.6\]]par byed do/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed ce na/_lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni mdung thung dag gis bzlog kyang gang zag gang dag thos pa mang ba/_thos pa 'dzin pa/_thos pa bsags pa/_don shes pa/_
[\[170b.7\]]bshad pa shes pa/_dpyod pa can/_ji ltar thos pa'i don yongs su rtogs pa de dag la snyen cing sten te bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de thos pa'i ched dang /_bshad pa'i ched dang /_don gyi ched dang /_don la yongs su brtag pa'i ched dang /_slob dpon dang mkhan po la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i ched 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]la grang ba yang khyad du gsod/_tsha ba dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang /_sha sbrang dang /_sbrang bu dang /_rlung dang /_nyi ma dang /_sdig sbrul gyis reg pa dang /_gzhan gyis ngan du smras shing ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang /_lus kyi tshor ba drag pa/_rtsub pa/_
[\[171a.2\]]mi bzad pa/_srog 'chad par 'gyur ba yang khyad du gsod do/_/de chos rnams la ni rin po cher 'du shes nye bar gnas/_chos smra ba rnams la rin po che'i gter du 'du shes/_chos nyan pa la ni dkon pa rnyed par 'du shes/_chos 'dzin pa la ni don yod par srog sogs par 'du shes/_
[\[171a.3\]]chos kyi yon tan mang du byed pa la ni srog don yod par 'du shes/_chos la yongs su rtog pa la ni tshe rabs brgyar mi rnyed par 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/_der chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin la mang du byed cing yongs su rtog na khams rnams kyang rab tu shes/_phung po rnams dang /_skye mched 
[\[171a.4\]]rnams dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_dus dang /_theg pa rnams dang /_dge ba bsags pa yang rab tu shes so/_/khams rnams ji ltar rab tu shes she na/_khams ni gnyis te/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas shes bya ba ste/_
[\[171a.5\]]khams gnyis po de dag go_/'dus byas kyi khams ni gang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams ni gang zhe na/_gang ci yang rung ste/_skye ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'gag pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya'o/_/gang ci yang rung ste/_skye ba med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_'gag 
[\[171a.6\]]pa med pa de ni 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya ste/_de ltar 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams rab tu shes so/_/gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/_dge ba'i khams dang /_mi dge ba'i khams dang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i khams te gsum po de dag go_/dge 
[\[171a.7\]]ba'i khams ni gang /_mi dge ba'i khams ni gang /_lung du ma bstan pa'i khams ni gang zhe na/_gang ci yang rung ste/_chags pa med pa dang /_chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang ci yang rung ste/_zhe sdang med pa dang /_zhe sdang med pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang ci yang rung ste/_
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]gti mug med pa dang /_gti mug med pa dang ldan pa de ni dge ba'i khams zhes bya'o/_/gang ci yang rung ste/_chags pa dang /_chags pa dang ldan pa dang /_gang ci yang rung ste/_zhe sdang dang /_zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /_gang ci yang rung ste/_gti mug dang /_gti mug dang ldan pa 
[\[171b.2\]]de ni mi dge ba'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de gnyis la ma gtogs pa ni lung du ma bstan pa nyid de/_de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so/_/gzhan yang khams gsum rab tu shes te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[171b.3\]]khams so/_/'dod pa'i khams gang zhe na/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul 
[\[171b.4\]]dbang byed kyi lha rnams te/_gang de dag la 'dun pa dang /_chags pa dang /_zhe sdang ba dang /_gti mug pa dang /_yid kyis smon pa dang /_smon lam 'debs pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/gzugs kyi khams gang zhe na/_tshangs ris kyi lha 
[\[171b.5\]]rnams dang /_tshangs pa mdun na 'don rnams dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_'du shes med pa'i sems can dang /_
[\[171b.6\]]mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams te/_gang de dag la 'dun pa dang /_chags pa dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_yid kyis smon pa dang /_smon lam 'debs pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa de ni gzugs kyi khams 
[\[171b.7\]]zhes bya'o/_/gzugs med pa'i khams gang zhe na/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/_gang de dag la 'dun pa dang /_chags pa dang /_zhe sdang ba dang /_gti mug pa dang /_yid kyis smon pa dang /_smon lam 'debs pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i 
[\[172a.2\]]khams zhes bya ste/_de ltar khams gsum rab tu shes so/_/gzhan yang khams bzhi rab tu shes te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya ba khams bzhi po 
[\[172a.3\]]de dag ste/_de ltar khams bzhi rab tu shes so/_/gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/_drug gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gnod sems kyi khams dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i khams dang /_mngon par 'byung ba'i khams dang /_gnod sems med pa'i 
[\[172a.4\]]khams dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba med pa'i khams te/_khams drug po de dag rab tu shes so/_/gzhan yang khams drug rab tu shes te/_drug gang zhe na/_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams 
[\[172a.5\]]dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams te/_khams drug po de dag rab tu shes so/_/de la sa'i khams ni mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o/_/sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med pa'o/_/de bzhin du 
[\[172a.6\]]chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_'gyur ba'i chos can te/_mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba'o/_/sdug bsngal ba gang yin pa de bdag med 
[\[172a.7\]]pa ste/_de ltar khams drug rab tu shes so/_/de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na gzugs kyi phung po dang /_tshor ba'i phung po dang /_'du shes kyi phung po dang /_'du byed kyi phung po dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/_
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]phung po lnga rab tu shes so/_/gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bu dang /_ngan pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_ring du mi gnas pa dang /_tshor ba la ni chu'i chu bur lta bu dang /_ngan pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_ring du mi gnas pa dang /_'du shes la ni smig rgyu lta bu dang /_ngan pa 
[\[172b.2\]]dang /_'jig pa dang /_ring du mi gnas pa dang /_'du byed rnams la ni chu shing lta bu dang /_ngan pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_ring du mi gnas pa dang /_rnam par shes pa la ni sgyu ma lta bu dang /_ngan pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_ring du mi gnas par de ltar phung po lnga rab tu shes 
[\[172b.3\]]so/_/de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na nang gi skye mched drug rab tu shes te/_mig nang gi skye mched dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid nang gi skye mched ces bya ba nang gi skye mched drug po de dag go_/de la 
[\[172b.4\]]mig nang gi skye mched ni na ba'i chos can dang /_rga ba'i chos can dang /_'chi ba'i chos can dang /_bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang /_'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi me kun tu 'bar ba dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang 'chi ba dang /_
[\[172b.5\]]mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams kyis kun tu 'bar ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar bar rab tu shes so/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid nang gi skye mched 
[\[172b.6\]]la yang na ba'i chos can dang /_rga ba'i chos can dang /_'chi ba'i chos can dang /_bdag dang bdag gis stong pa dang /_'dod chags kyi me dang /_zhe sdang gi me dang /_gti mug gi me kun tu 'bar ba dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_
[\[172b.7\]]smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrugs pa rnams kyis kun tu 'bar ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar bar rab tu shes te/_de ltar nang gi skye mched drug po dag rab tu shes so/_/gzhan yang phyi'i skye mched drug rab tu shes 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]te/_mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs rnams phyi'i skye mched dang /_rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang /_snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang /_lces rnam par shes par bya ba ro rnams dang /_lus kyis rnam par 
[\[173a.2\]]shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang /_yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba chos phyi'i skye mched rnams shes bya ba ste/_skye mched drug po de dag go_/de la mig gi rnam par shes par bya ba gzugs phyi'i skye mched la skyabs med pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_stobs med pa dang /_nyam 
[\[173a.3\]]chung ba ste/_de la rtag pa'am/_brtan pa 'am/_ther zug gam/_de bzhin nyid dam/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dam/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/_sgyu ma de ni yod/_sgyu mar byas pa de ni yod/_sems rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de/_gang ci yang yod pa 
[\[173a.4\]]dang /_de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba sgra rnams dang /_snas rnam par shes par bya ba dri rnams dang /_lces rnam par shes par bya ba ro rnams dang /_lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba reg bya rnams dang /_yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba chos phyi'i skye mched la yang 
[\[173a.5\]]skyabs med pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_stobs med pa dang /_nyam chung ba ste/_de la rtag pa 'am/_brtan pa 'am/_ther zug pa 'am/_de bzhin nyid dam/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dam/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ni gang yang med kyi/_sgyu ma de ni yod/_sgyu mar byas pa de ni 
[\[173a.6\]]yod/_sems rmongs par byed pa de ni yod de/_gang ci yang yod par phyi'i skye mched drug po de ltar rab tu shes so/_/de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rab tu shes so/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_sdug bsngal 'phags 
[\[173a.7\]]pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag go_/phung po lnga rnams dang /_khams drug po dang /_nang gi skye mched drug po dag dang /_
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]phyi'i skye mched drug po dag gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal zhes bya ste/_sdug bsngal de ni mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_nad dang /_'bras dang /_zug rngu dang /_sdig pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_rab tu 'jig pa'i chos nyid du blta'o/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_
[\[173b.2\]]gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_nga'o snyam du mngon par zhen pa dang /_bdag gi bdag ni 'di yin no snyam du bdag tu mngon par zhen pa dang /_'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_gzugs can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_gzugs can ma yin par 
[\[173b.3\]]'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_'du shes can du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_'du shes can ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_'du shes can ma yin la/_'du shes can ma yin pa yang ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_phung po rnams bdag go snyam pa dang /_phung po rnams las bdag 
[\[173b.4\]]gzhan no snyam pa dang /_phung po rnams la bdag snyam pa dang /_bdag la phung po rnams so snyam pa dang /_khams rnams dang /_skyed mched rnams bdag go snyam pa dang /_skye mched rnams las bdag gzhan no snyam pa dang /_skye mched rnams la bdag go snyam pa dang /_bdag 
[\[173b.5\]]la skye mched rnams so snyam pa dang /_tshor ba bdag go snyam pa dang /_tshor bar byed pa bdag go snyam pa dang /_gzugs can chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa chung ngu bdag go snyam pa dang /_gzugs can mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang /_
[\[173b.6\]]gzugs can ma yin pa mtha' yas pa bdag go snyam pa dang /_bdag rtag go snyam pa dang /_bdag mi rtag go snyam pa dang /_rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kyang mi rtag go snyam pa dang /_rtag par yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang /_bdag mtha' yod do snyam pa dang /_
[\[173b.7\]]bdag mtha' yod pa ma yin no snyam pa dang /_mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med do snyam pa dang /_mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin no snyam pa dang /_de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_'byung bar mi 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]'byung yang 'byung la mi 'byung yang mi 'byung ngo snyam pa dang /_de bzhin song ba shi nas 'byung ba yang ma yin mi 'byung ba yang ma yin no snyam pa dang /_srog de lus de yin snyam pa dang /_srog kyang gzhan lus kyang gzhan no snyam pa dang /_sems can 'di gang nas 
[\[174a.2\]]'ongs/_de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /_sems can yod pa las chad de 'jig cing med par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_byed pa de myong ba de yin no snyam pa dang /_byed pa yang gzhan/_myong ba yang gzhan no snyam pa dang /_bdag yod pas bdag 
[\[174a.3\]]gi yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_bdag gi yod pas bdag yod par 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_'di na bdag de lta bu'am/_bdag gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/_de bzhin du 'gyur ba zhig gam/_gzhan du 'gyur ba zhig gam/_'dir 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_de ltar 'byung bar 
[\[174a.4\]]'gyur ram/_gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_'dir bdag sngon byung ngam/_bdag da ltar byung ngam/_bdag gzhan du byung ngam/_snyam du de dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen te/_'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /_sems kyi gnas dang /_mngon par 
[\[174a.5\]]zhen pa dang /_nga rgyal gyi bag la nyal ba dang /_snyems pa dang /_nga rgyal byed pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba'i len pa dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal gang yin pa thams cad dang /_lus sam/_ngag gam/_sems kyi las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba 
[\[174a.6\]]'am/_bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'am/_mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'am/_'dod par gtogs pa'am/_gzugs su gtogs pa'am/_gzugs med par gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/gang 'dod chags 
[\[174a.7\]]zad pa dang /_zhe sdang zad pa dang /_gti mug zad pa dang /_nga rgyal zad pa dang /_bdag tu mngon par zhen pa spangs pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba'i len pa spangs pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/gang sdug bsngal la yang sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba la 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]yang kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa la yang 'gog pa dang /_lam la yang lam du yid la byed pa dang /_'du byed rnams la nyes dmigs su lta zhing gnas pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta zhing gnas pa dang /_ji ltar mthong ba dang /_byas pa la so sor rtog pa yang dag pa'i 
[\[174b.2\]]lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[174b.3\]]zhes bya ste/_'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag la dpyod cing rtog la khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig pa na 'dus byas kyi khams la ni mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par mthong ngo /_/
[\[174b.4\]]'dus ma byas kyi khams la ni skyabs dang /_gnas dang /_mgon dang dpung gnyen du yang mthong la/_'dus ma byas kyi khams mngon sum du yang mi byed de/_de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag rab tu shes so/_/de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_mang du byed cing 
[\[174b.5\]]yongs su rtog pa na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rab tu shes te/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams dang /_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs dang /_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug dang /_skye mched 
[\[174b.6\]]drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa dang /_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang /_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang /_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang /_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang /_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi ste/_'di ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/'phags 
[\[174b.7\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes pa dang /_mi mthong ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_/gang cung zad lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba 'am/_bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba 'am/_mi g.yo bar nye 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]bar 'gro ba'am/_'dod pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba'am/_gzugs kyi khams su nye bar 'gro ba'am/_gzugs med pa'i khams su nye bar 'gro ba de dag ni 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o/_/gang cung zad de las byung ba sems zhes bya ba dang /_yod ces 
[\[175a.2\]]bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de las byung ba gang ci yang rung tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa dang /_reg pa dang /_yid la byed pa de ni ming zhes bya'o/_/gang ci yang rung lhan cig byung ba mer mer po'i gzugs dang /_rdzus te byung ba'i gzugs dang /_rnam par 
[\[175a.3\]]rig byed kyi gzugs de ni gzugs zhes bya ste/_de gnyis ni ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o/_/de las byung ba mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid de ni skye mched drug ces bya'o/_/mig la brten cing gzugs la yang brten te mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang /_
[\[175a.4\]]gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o/_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_chos rnams la brten te yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba dang /_gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa ste de ni reg pa zhes bya'o/_/de las byung ba bde ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal 
[\[175a.5\]]yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa de dag ni tshor ba gsum zhes bya'o/_/de las byung ba 'dod chags dang /_chags pa dang /_dga' ba de ni sred pa zhes bya'o/_/de las byung ba kun tu chags pa dang /_lta ba dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_bdag tu smra ba de ni len 
[\[175a.6\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/de las byung ba gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa de ni srid pa zhes bya'o/_/gang srid pa de 'byung ba dang /_skye ba dang /_mngon par 'grub pa de ni skye ba zhes bya'o/_/gang srid pa de 'gyur ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_
[\[175a.7\]]nye bar khrid pa de ni rga ba zhes bya'o/_/gang srid pa de 'chi 'pho ba dang bral ba de ni 'chi ba zhes bya'o/_/de de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la dpyod cing yongs su rtog la khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jig pa na sa rlom sems su mi byed/_sas rlom sems su mi byed/_sa ni 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]bdag gi'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed do/_/sa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do/_/chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_rnam par shes pa la gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang /_mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_mya ngan 
[\[175b.2\]]las 'das pa rlom sems su mi byed/_mya ngan las 'das pas rlom sems su mi byed/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni bdag gi'o snyam du rlom sems su mi byed/_mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do/_/de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par 
[\[175b.3\]]rjes su mthong ba na rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jog go_/de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mthong ba na 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 'gags 
[\[175b.4\]]pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/
[\[175b.5\]]tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag par rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gag pa khong du chud par byed cing rnam par 'jog 
[\[175b.6\]]ste/_de de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su mthong yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa mngon sum du yang mi byed de/_de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'gog pa rab tu shes so/_/de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang mang du byed 
[\[175b.7\]]cing yongs su rtog pa na dus gsum rab tu shes te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'das pa'i dus dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus te/_de dag ni dus gsum rnams zhes bya'o/_/'du byed gang la la 'gag pa de ni 'das pa'i dus zhes bya'o/_/'du byed gang la 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]la ma 'ongs shing ma skyes pa de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus zhes bya'o/_/'du byed gang la la da ltar byung ba da ltar du gyur pa de ni da ltar byung ba'i dus zhes bya'o/_/de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rjes su dran na smod cing bshung ste nges par spong ngo /_
[\[176a.2\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rdul tsam la yang gcig tu rnam par smin par mthong /_mi sdug par rnam par smin par mthong yid du mi 'ong bar rnam par smin par mthong /_'jigs par mthong zhing gnas so/_/da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bdag gi mi dge ba'i rtsa ba skye ba'i 
[\[176a.3\]]skabs mi 'byed de/_lus sdom pas bsdams/_ngag sdom pas bsdams/_yid sdom pas bsdams/_dbang po drug sdom pas bsdams so/_/de 'das pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems la smon pa dang /_
[\[176a.4\]]byang chub kyi sems la smon lam 'debs pa rjes su dran zhing 'dun pa drag po dang /_dga' ba drag po dang /_dad pa drag pos sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[176a.5\]]nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub tu smon pa dang /_byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa yang 
[\[176a.6\]]'dun pa drag po dang /_dga' ba drag po dang /_dad pa drag pos sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs 
[\[176a.7\]]su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dod do/_/mos so/_/yid kyis smon to/_/da ltar byung ba'i bdag gi dge ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang /_sems kyi rgyud kyang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir rtag par rgyun tu mi 'dor ro/_/nyams par mi byed do/_/brjed par mi byed do/_/bag med par mi byed do/_/gang 'das pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_
[\[176b.2\]]skye mched de ni 'das pa/_'gags pa/_med pa/_yod pa ma yin pa ste/_de ni da ltar bdag med pa/_bdag gi med pa'o/_/gang ma 'ongs pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched de ni ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_yod pa ma yin pa ste/_de ni da ltar bdag med pa/_bdag gi 
[\[176b.3\]]med pa'o/_/gang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched de ni mi gnas pa/_mi 'dug pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten ni skad cig las lhag par mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/skad cig pa de'i skye ba'i dus kyang gzhan/_gnas pa'i dus kyang gzhan/_
[\[176b.4\]]'gag pa'i dus kyang gzhan gang yin pa'i skad cig de ni gnas pa med pa/_'dug pa med pa'o/_/skad cig gi dus gang yin pa de ni nang dang phyi'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched do/_/nang dang phyi'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched gang yin pa de ni dus so/_/da ltar 
[\[176b.5\]]byung ba'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched gang yin pa de ni skad cig tsam yang mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa ste/_mi gnas pa mi 'dug pa la ni bdag gam bdag gi ba med do/_/de yang gang gi tshe ma 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba yod pa ma yin pa'o/_/
[\[176b.6\]]bdag tu ma gyur cing bdag gir ma gyur pa'o/_/gang gi tshe 'das te 'gags pa dang /_ma byung ste yod pa ma yin par 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang bdag med pa dang /_bdag gi med pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/gang yang dus gsum dag tu bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de ni ma byung zhing yod pa ma yin pa'i 
[\[176b.7\]]phyir mkhas shing rig pa rnams kyis 'di ni bdag gi'o/_/'di ni nga'o/_/bdag gi 'di ni yod do zhes bdag tu lta bar 'os pa ma yin no/_/de srid pa thams cad dang /_'du byed thams cad la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /_spangs 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]pa'i 'du shes dang /_'gog pa'i 'du shes can du gnas te/_'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin no/_/gang de ltar dus gsum rab tu shes pa de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa dang /_mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/_
[\[177a.2\]]gsum gang zhe na/_lha'i theg pa dang /_tshangs pa'i theg pa dang /_'phags pa'i theg pa ste/_de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o/_/bsam gtan dang po ni lha'i theg pa ste/_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa yang lha'i theg pa'o/_/byams pa ni tshangs 
[\[177a.3\]]pa'i theg pa ste/_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyang tshangs pa'i theg pa'o/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang 
[\[177a.4\]]dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni 'phags pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o/_/de dus dus su lha'i theg pa sgom ste sems can rnams kyang de la 'god/_dus dus su tshangs pa'i theg pa sgom ste/_sems can 
[\[177a.5\]]rnams kyang de la 'god/_dus dus su 'phags pa'i theg pa sgom zhing sems can rnams kyang de la 'god la/_rnam par grol ba 'phags pa mngon sum du yang mi byed do/_/gzhan yang theg pa gsum rab tu shes te/_gsum gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[177a.6\]]theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po ste/_de dag ni theg pa gsum zhes bya'o/_/mos pa dman pa dang /_dbang po dman pa skad cig tsam yang srid pa la mos par mi byed/_srid par mi byed kyi 'dor te/_skad cig de la de ma thag tu mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phan yon mthong bas mgo dang 
[\[177a.7\]]gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag khong du chud pa dang /_rtog par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa dang /_rtsol ba'i shas che ba de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes bya'o/_/mos pa 'bring dang /_dbang po 'bring dang /_dben par dga' ba dang /_rang gi don lhung len pa dang /_bsam 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]gtan dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas par brtson pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang /_rang byang chub tu smon pa dang /_rang byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zhes bya'o/_/mos pa khyad par du 'phags 
[\[177b.2\]]pa/_dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa/_sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang bar 'dod 
[\[177b.3\]]pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bskang bar 'dod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi don du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la mi lta ba dang /_'khor ba'i bde ba la yang dmod pa mang ba yin na 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la dmod pa mang ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_tshul khrims dang spyod pa 
[\[177b.4\]]khyad par du 'phags pa la rnam par gnas pa dang /_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi theg pa can gyi mdo sde rnams klog pa dang /_kha ton du byed pa dang /_lung nod pa dang /_yid la byed pa rnams la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin pa 
[\[177b.5\]]de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pa dang /_de dag gi byin gyi rlabs bzhi po bden pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_shes rab la slob pa dang /_shes bya thams cad nyen pa dang /_len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_dpyod par dga' ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms 
[\[177b.6\]]par 'jug pa thams cad yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_rang gi don la mi lta ba dang /_'jig rten gyi don lhur len pa dang /_stobs ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad theg pa gsum po dag la dgod par 'dod pa dang /_dgod par spro ba dang /_bdag nyid 
[\[177b.7\]]kyang byang chub kyi theg pa la shin tu gnas pa dang /_mi phyed pa dang /_mi bskyod pa dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang /_rtag par rgyun tu byang chub tu smon cing byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bya ste/_de ltar theg pa gsum po dag rab tu shes so/_/
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]de chos de dag nyan cing 'dzin pa mang du byed cing yongs su rtog pa na dge ba'i thabs rab tu shes te/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das pa dang /_
[\[178a.2\]]ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_chos thams cad dang /_dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes dmigs par byed do/_/de phyag lan cig 'tshal ba na mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par phyag 'tshal bar bya'o snyam du 
[\[178a.3\]]sems bskyed do/_/de byang chub tu smon pa na sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su 
[\[178a.4\]]rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/de bzhin du skyabs su 'gro ba na yang sems bskyed do/_/de 'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dang /_khrus byed pa dang /_za ba dang /_'thung ba dang /_zhing rmed pa dang /_sa bon 'debs pa dang /_las 
[\[178a.5\]]thams cad byed pa na yang mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam gdab par bya'o zhes sems bskyed do/_/mang du byed do/_/snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan byed pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_
[\[178a.6\]]sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas shing dpag tu med par byang chub tu smon lam gdab bo zhes sems bskyed do/_/mang du byed do/_/
[\[178a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog dang /_sems can thams cad gdul ba dang /_mtshungs pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]bzla ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gdab po zhes sems bskyed do/_/mang du byed do/_/de dge ba gang ci spyod kyang de sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa med 
[\[178b.2\]]par bya ba dang /_ngan 'gro'i rgyud gcad pa dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa can da ltar byung 
[\[178b.3\]]ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar 
[\[178b.4\]]byed do/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can da ltar byung ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa 'das 
[\[178b.5\]]pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams bskal par bzhugs pa dang /_bskal par chos ston pa dang /_bskal par dge 'dun 'thun par gyur par yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/mtho ris kyi lam la dgod pa'am/_nyan thos kyi 
[\[178b.6\]]lam la dgod pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la dgod pa'am/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa'am/_sbyin pas rjes su 'jug pa'am/_snyan par smra bas rjes su 'jug pa'am/_don spyod pas rjes su 'jug pa'am/_don 'thun pas rjes su 'jug 
[\[178b.7\]]pa'am/_ji lta ji ltar gzhan dag dge ba'i phyogs yang dag par skyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes so/_/de chos kyi tshig 'di dag la nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum du 'jug go yid la byed do/_/de 'di lta ste/_'jig rten dag gi 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]khams rnams thams cad na/_/yang dag bzhugs pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/chos dang dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' la/_/gan 'gro mgo bos mtha' yas phyag kyang 'tshal/_/'gro ba'i nang na yon tan mnyam med cing /_/mi 
[\[179a.2\]]mnyam mnyam pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas po/_/yon tan dpag med de dag thams cad la/_/bdag ni mgo bos mtha' yas skyabs su mchi/_/sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang tshogs rnams dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'jig rten khams/_/gang yang 
[\[179a.3\]]brgya lam stongs par mi 'gyur bar/_/de ltar gsol ba mtha' yas rab tu 'debs/_/zhi ba'i chos ni rab tu ston mdzad cing /_/bskal pa ma lus rnams su bzhugs par yang /_/'jig rten khams rnams kun gyi bde gshegs la/_/mgo bos gsol ba 
[\[179a.4\]]mtha' yas rab tu 'debs/_/sngon dang 'di dang skad cig tsam yang rung /_/bdag gis sdig pa gang dang gang bgyis pa/_/sdig pa de dag thams cad smad par bgyi/_/sdig pa thams cad bdag gis spang bar bgyi/_/skad cig tsam yang bdag gis dge ba 'di/_/ma lus 
[\[179a.5\]]par ni yang dag gzung bar bgyi/_/tshe yis ji tsam thub kyi bar du ni/_/dge ba kun la gnas par 'gyur bar 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas dag dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/_/'jig rten 'dir ni byung dang byung 'gyur dang /_/'byung 'gyur 
[\[179a.6\]]rnams kyi dge ba thams cad dang /_/rgyal ba rnams dang 'phags pa thams cad kyi/_/tshul khrims dang ni ye shes ting 'dzin dang /_/rnam grol tshe dang chos rnams gang yin pa/_/de dag 'jig rten rnams la phan gyur cig_/'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad dag_/
[\[179a.7\]]byung dang byung gyur 'byung bar 'gyur rnams kyi/_/dge ba dag la bdag ni phyi phyir zhing /_/mgo bos mtha' yas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/yon tan yang dag dge ba mtha' yas pa/_/de dag thams cad 'gro ba ma lus pas/_/sems can re re dang ni bdag nyid la'ang /_/yod 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]par bdag ni smon lam mtha' yas 'debs/_/bdag gi dge ba dag ni 'das pa dang /_/ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar thams cad kyis/_/'jig rten dag gi khams ni thams cad du/_/dkon mchog gsum po rtag tu 'byung bar shog_/dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/
[\[179b.2\]]bskal par bzhugs pas phongs par ma gyur cig_/bar du gcod pa med par byang chub dang /_/pha rol phyin pa rnams ni rdzogs par shog_/sems can dag ni thams cad bde ba dang /_/'jigs pa med cing ngan 'gro 'das pa dang /_/mi dge thams cad dang ni bral ba dang /_/
[\[179b.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rdzogs gyur cig_/theg pa gsum po dag la ci rigs par/_/de dag la ni smon lam mthar phyin cing /_/tshe ring ba dang rnam par grol ba dang /_/khyad par can gyi don kun rdzogs par shog_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub smon lam 'debs pa na/_/mtha' 
[\[179b.4\]]yas dpag tu med par rab tu 'debs/_/sems can thams cad dag gi sdug bsngal dang /_/nyon mongs dag ni nye bar zhi gyur cig_/chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba rnams kyi phyir/_/'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi/_/rgyal ba kun dang byang chub sems dpa' la/_/
[\[179b.5\]]rang gi lus ni nges par dbul bar bgyi/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur bar du/_/ma 'ongs pa na smon lam mtha' yas gdab/_/skye dang skye bar dkon mchog gsum po la/_/bdag ni yongs su spyad par bgyid par shog_/'jig rten dag gi khams rnams thams cad kyi/_/
[\[179b.6\]]dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems dpa' la/_/nam mkha' mnyam pa'i lha yi spos mchog dang /_/phreng ba me tog chun pos mchod byed shog_/lhun po mnyam pa'i gser dang dngul dag dang /_/gos dang rin po che yi phung po dang /_/gzhal med khang bcas gzhon dang mal cha dang /_/
[\[179b.7\]]bza' ba mtha' yas dag ni sbyin par shog_/'gro ba'i bsam pa lam gyis rdzogs byed cing /_/skyabs dang lus dang pha 'drar gyur par shog_/bzod la dga' zhing tshul khrims gtsang ba dang /_/'gro la chos ni rab tu ston gyur cig_/byang chub theg pa mchog ni rnyed pa dang /_/
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]dkon mchog gsum phyir go cha sra ba bgo_/pha rol phyin pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing /_/sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs su rdzogs byed shog_/sdig pa kun dang bral zhing lus ngag dang /_/yid kyi las mtha' dge ba mchog gyur cig_/byang chub las ni mi 
[\[180a.2\]]ldog bdag gyur cing /_/byang chub dga' dang byang chub sems dpar gyur/_/srid dang srid par byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi dge ba kun la slob/_/bdag gis chos rnams de dag kun la yang /_/'jig rten thams cad rab tu dgod par bgyid/_/
[\[180a.3\]]de de ltar bdag dang gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rab tu shes so/_/de shes rab de dang ye shes de mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa dang /_yid la bya bar 'dod pa na yang sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams 
[\[180a.4\]]cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/mngon sum du byed pa dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_mngon sum du byas pa dang /_yid la byas nas kyang 
[\[180a.5\]]sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang /_sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/gal te 
[\[180a.6\]]shes rab de dang /_ye shes de la slob pa'i nus pa dang mi ldan par gyur na de 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste/_dus dus su'am/_cung zad cung zad du yang 'chal ba'i shes rab dang /_mi shes pa spang ba dang /_dor ba dang /_bsal bar rtsol lo/_/'bad do/_/dus dus su'am/_cung 
[\[180a.7\]]zad cung zad du yang shes rab dang /_ye shes la slob pa dang /_mngon par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par bya bar rtsol lo/_/'bad do/_/srid pa gzhan du gyur pa na yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing sgyid lug phar mi 'gyur ro/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems sgom pa dang /_byang chub tu smon pa dang /_byang chub tu smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de nyid de dag gi shes rab dge ba dang /_ye shes dge ba grangs med cing dpag tu med pa yin 
[\[180b.2\]]no/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad la zag pa med pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_mi slob pa'i shes rab bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i shes rab yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa dang /_mi slob pa'i 
[\[180b.3\]]shes rab yang dag par bskyed par 'dod pa de ni shes rab dge ba dang /_ye shes dge ba thams cad kyi mchog yin no/_/de ni dam pa yin no/_/lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bde ba dang ldan la yid bde ba dang ldan zhing tshegs chung ngu dang /_sdug bsngal chung ngus myur du skyen par shes rab kyi pha 
[\[180b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i sems can 
[\[180b.5\]]grangs med dpag tu med pa dag theg pa gsum dang /_mtho ris su skye pa'i don byas par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_
[\[180b.6\]]lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lag [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[180b.7\]]kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shrI la dang /_dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas [(]btan [,]gtan [)]la phab pa//_//
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]{D71}]@##//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ste nges pas zhus pa/_bam po gcig pa/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su ra tA pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma mA hA ya na sU tra/_/bod skad du/_
[\[181a.2\]]'phags pa nges pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[181a.3\]]dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_'khor bzhi dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_ljongs kyi mi rnams kyis bkur 
[\[181a.4\]]stir byas/_bla mar byas/_rim gror byas/_mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer na grong khyer gyi mi dbul po des pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/_chos la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/_dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[181a.5\]]bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa/_byams pa la gnas te sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/_snying rje la gnas te yid yongs su skyo ba med pa/_dga' ba la gnas te chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/_btang snyoms la 
[\[181a.6\]]gnas te bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi bskyod pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/_sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pa/_thabs la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed cing dbul por ming du chags pa zhig gnas te/_lha'i dbang 
[\[181a.7\]]po brgya byin gyis lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas grong khyer gyi dbul po nges pa shin tu 'dod pa chung ba/_chog shes pa/_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pa/_yid 'khrugs pa med pa/_rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa/_gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag la skyon du mi lta ba/_
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems srung ba/_brkam pa med pa/_shes bzhin du spyod pa/_chog shes shing dgang sla la gso sla ba/_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa/_g.yo med pa/_nga rgyal med pa/_bka' blo bde ba/_'thun par 'dzin pa/_rtag tu gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad 
[\[181b.2\]]dang ldan pa/_lag na shing lo'i snod thogs pa/_rtswa bting ba la nyal ba/_gos ngan pa gyon pa/_rnyed kyang mi len pa/_bzang yang rung ngan kyang rung bgo bsha' byas nas za ba/_dus gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/_chos nyan par 'dod pa/_gtam sna tshogs 'byung ba 
[\[181b.3\]]la spobs pa dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/_ci grong khyer gyi dbul po 'di yi dam la brtan nam mi brtan bdag gis brtag go snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi mang po mngon par sprul 
[\[181b.4\]]nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa la tshig ngan pa dag gis gshe zhing spyo bar byed do/_/bong ba dang /_dbyug pa dang /_mtshon cha dag kyang bstan na des pa de bzod pa'i stobs kyis dang du len par byed de/_mi 'khrug cing gnod sems mi skyed do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mi gzhan 
[\[181b.5\]]dag cig sprul nas des pa'i mdun du bzhag ste/_des pa de la dga' ba'i tshig gis kho bo cag ni khyod kyi don byed par 'dod pa yin gyis/_ci ste khyod 'dod pa lta na khyod la sdigs pa'i dgra gang yin pa de dag kho bo cag gis tshar gcad par bya'o zhes smras so/_/des pas smras pa/_
[\[181b.6\]]grogs po dag thong de skad ma zer cig_/gal te mi 'di dag gis kho bo'i lus dum bu brgyar dum bu dum bur btubs su zin kyang kho bo ni mi 'di dag la sdig pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/grogs po dag 'jig rten dag ni dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i phyogs gnyis la gnas la de'i 
[\[181b.7\]]'gro ba ni gnyis kho na ste/_dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni bde 'gro'o/_/mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi ni ngan 'gro'o/_/de bas na kho bo ni sems can pha rol tshig pa za bar byed par yang mi 'dod na gtse ba lta ci smos/_de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sa bon tsha ba rnams kyis ni/_/
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]'bras bu tsha ba skye bar 'gyur/_/sa bon mngar ba rnams kyis ni/_/'bras bu mngar ba skye bar 'gyur/_/dpe zlar bya ba 'di yis na/_/sdig pa'i rnam smin tsha ba dang /_/dkar po'i 'bras bu mngar ba dag_/mkhas pa'i mis ni shes par 'gyur/_/rtag tu 
[\[182a.2\]]lus dang ngag yid kyis/_/sdig pa rnam gsum mi bya zhing /_/gzhan dag byed kyang mkhas pa yis/_/rjes su dga' bar mi bya'o/_/lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/_/dkar po rnam gsum rtag tu bya/_/gang dag dge ba spyod byed pa/_/gzhan dag la yang yi rang bya/_/de nas 
[\[182a.3\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na des pa la dbyig dang /_gser mang po bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa'o ni las khyer la sbyin pa dag byin cig_/bsod nams dag gyis shig_/gos dang rgyan dag kyang thogs shig_/khyod ngan cing dbul bas ci zhig bya/_
[\[182a.4\]]des pas smras pa/_grogs po dag sngon sems can rnams la lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyad pas 'dir dbul po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de bas na kho bo ni ma byin par len pa byed par mi 'dod do/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_des pa khyod da ltar ji 
[\[182a.5\]]bde bar 'tsho par gyis shig_/'jig rten pha rol bsam pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_des pas smras pa/_grogs po gang tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa 'di ni byis pa'i chos yin gyis mkhas pa rnams ni tshe phyi ma ched cher 'dzin to/_/'dod pas zil gyis non pa dang /_zhe sdang gis zil 
[\[182a.6\]]gyis non pa dang /_gti mug gis zil gyis non pa dang /_'dod chags kyis zil gyis non pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyis mkhas pa dag ni brkam pa ma yin no/_/sogs 'jog ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni sogs 'jog mi byed do/_/
[\[182a.7\]]bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni bdag tu mi 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do/_/lus dang srog la lta ba dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o/_/
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]ngoms mi shes shing chog mi shes pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni ngoms shes shing chog shes pa yin no/_/'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa yin no/_/las ma mthong ba dag ni ma byin par len 
[\[182b.2\]]par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni las mthong ba yin no/_/rnam par 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni rnam par mi 'tshe ba ched cher 'dzin to/_/byams pa'i sems med pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni byams pa'i sems dang ldan no/_/
[\[182b.3\]]phyin ci log bzhis sems bslad pa dag ni ma byin par len par byed kyi mkhas pa dag ni sems phyin ci ma log pa yin no/_/gzhan yang sems can dbul po gang yin pa de dag kho bos tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bshad kyis nyon cig_/bye ba phrag stong gter yod kyang /_/gang dag la ni 
[\[182b.4\]]gtong med pa/_/de dag 'jig rten 'dir dbul zhes/_/thos mang rnams kyis de skad bshad/_/gang la zan cig med bzhin du/_/de ni gtong la rab gnas na/_/de ni 'jig rten nor che zhes/_/yang dag gzigs pa rnams kyis bshad/_/gang la sdig med 
[\[182b.5\]]'phags pa ni/_/rnam pa kun gyis mdzes pa yin/_/byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni/_/shin tu brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin/_/mkhas pa dag gis spyos sla yi/_/byis pas bsngags pa de lta min/_/byis pa sdig pa bsngags par byed/_/mkhas pa dag ni sdig la smod/_/de nas lha'i dbang 
[\[182b.6\]]po brgya byin gyis dus gzhan zhig na mi gzhan zhig sprul to/_/de nas mi des gser mang po khyer te des pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye des pa gser khyer la kho bo mi gzhan zhig dang rtsod pa de la khyod gcig pus che gzhi bya bar kho bos byas kyi der kho bo'i che gzhi gyis 
[\[182b.7\]]shig des pas smras pa/_grogs po thod khyod de skad ma zer cig_/kho bo ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer du mi 'dod do/_/kye grogs po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ni bdag la yang slu zhing pha rol la yang slu la 'phags pa la slu ba yin te/_grags pa nyams par byed pa dang /_yid mi ches pa dang /_yid du mi 'ong 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]bar byed pa dang /_brnyas par byed pa dang /_sems yongs su gdung bar byed pa yin no/_/kye grogs po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ni kha mnam par byed pa dang /_lus smad par byed pa dang /_lha'i yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa yin no/_/kye grogs po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ni dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[183a.2\]]ba rnams la rku ba dang /_dran pa rmugs par byed pa dang /_mtho ris kyi lam la sgrib pa yin no/_/kye grogs po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyis btson par mi bya ba dang /_yang dag par smra ba rnams kyi nang du tshig mi mdzes pa dang /_mkhas pa rnams kyis smad pa 
[\[183a.3\]]dang /_sdig pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba dang /_brtul zhugs yongs su skong ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i kha nas ni/_/
[\[183a.4\]]rul pa'i dri yang mnam par 'gyur/_/dgon pa ji ltar bcom pa bzhin/_/sngon gyi dkar rnams spong bar byed/_/rmongs pas bdag dang lha rnams dang /_/'phags rnams yid kyang 'byung bar byed/_/mi ni gang zhig [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer ba/_/de ni rtag tu dogs par 'gyur/_/
[\[183a.5\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bar byed pa de/_/sdig pa kun gyi rtsa ba dang /_/dka' thub can gyi rtsa gcod dang /_/ngan 'gror 'gro ba zhes kyang bya/_/gal te 'dzam gling gang ba yi/_/gser dag khyod kyis byin na yang /_/kho bo chos ni bsrung ba'i phyir/_/rtag tu [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni smra mi byed/_/de nas 
[\[183a.6\]]brgya byin gyis sprul pa'i mis des pa [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer du gzhug ma nus nas song ngo /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu mo nyi 'od dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed gnyis song la brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub byed pa 'di ci 'dod pa la 
[\[183a.7\]]longs spyod pa zhig gam/_'on te 'dod pa don du mi gnyer ba zhig yin pa rtogs shig_/de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang /_lha'i bu mo nyi 'od nam nangs nas phyogs gang na des pa 'dug pa'i phyogs der song nas des pa la tshig snyan par smras te/_des pa bzhengs/_
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]bdag cag gnyis ni khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags so/_/des pa bdag cag gnyis kyi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs sha tshugs dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_lus byugs pa dang /_rgyan dang /_chas dang /_lhab lhub dag la gzigs/_
[\[183b.2\]]na tshod dang po'i lang tsho la bab pa la gzigs/_des pa khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 'di 'dra ba bdag nyid kyi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa la gzigs/_des pas bltas nas smras pa/_khyed gnyis ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin 
[\[183b.3\]]rje'i 'jig rten du zhugs pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi lha dang mir zhugs pa dag gi ni ma yin no/_/khyed gnyis kyi lus ni sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bur kho bos mthong ngo /_/khyed gnyis kyi gzugs ni dbu ba dang /_chu bur dang /_smig rgyu lta 
[\[183b.4\]]bur mthong ngo /_/khyed tsan dan gyi 'de gus lus byugs pa ni lpags pa rlon pa shas yog pa lta bur mthong ngo /_/khyed kyi rgyan dang lhab lhub ni mig slu ba'i sgyu ma byas pa lta bur mthong ngo /_/khyed kyi lang tsho ni mi rtag pa dang /_'gyur ba'i chos can du mthong ngo /_/
[\[183b.5\]]bsod nams ma yin par mthong ba'i phyir khyed gnyis la kho bo ma chags so/_/khyed gnyis ni spre'u dang /_bud med kyi sems lta bur gyur pa rnams kyi bsnyen bkur byed pa yin gyi sems dran pas kun nas bsrungs pa dag gi ni ma yin no/_/che zhe dag 'dod pa la sten pa ni 
[\[183b.6\]]mi sdug pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni dri nga ba'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni rul pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni shin tu sdug bsngal ba'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni bde ba thams cad yongs su 'grib par byed pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 
[\[183b.7\]]'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sten pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni ngan 'gro na gnas pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dag la sten pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni mi 'thun pa dang go ran gnas pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]ni phyin ci log skyed pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni srid pa'i bag la nyal ba la gnas pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni rnam par rmongs shing shin tu rmongs la kun tu rmongs pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni nye bar gzir cing rnam par gzir la rab tu gzir ba'o/_/'dod pa la 
[\[184a.2\]]sten pa ni kun tu gdungs shing rnam par gdungs la yongs su gdungs pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug cing dge ba yongs su nyams par byed pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni mi dge ba'i sprin gyi 
[\[184a.3\]]dra bas kun nas khebs pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni srin mo dang 'dris par byed pa dang /_gzugs mi sdug pa dang 'dris par byed pa dang /_sha za ma dang 'dris par byed pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni/_ba lang dang /_bong bu dang /_khyi dang /_
[\[184a.4\]]phag dang /_rnga mo dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_lug dang /_wa la sten pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa la sten pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba yongs su 'dor ba la sten 
[\[184a.5\]]pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub 'dor ba'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni shin tu bag med pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/'dod pa la sten pa ni shin tu bar du gcod par byed pa'o/_/de nas de'i tshe grong 
[\[184a.6\]]khyer gyi dbul po des pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'dod pa mi rtag rtag tu smad pa ste/_/shin tu sdug bsngal bde ba 'jig par byed/_/rtag tu ngan song sa rnams khyim du gyur/_/sems rmongs gyur pa dag gis rtag tu bsten/_/'thab rtsod can de 
[\[184a.7\]]mi bde mtshang du gyur/_/rtag tu 'gyed cing mi 'thun go rar gnas/_/'di dag phyin ci log skyed gzhi yin te/_/'dod sten sred pa 'phel byed bde ba med/_/rnam rmongs rab rmongs de bzhin kun tu rmongs/_/'dod sten rtag tu gzir cing gnod pa ste/_/'di ni kun 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]gdungs rnam gdungs yongs su gdungs/_/sdig par sbyor zhing dge ba chud gzon pa/_/'di ni mi dge kun gyi rtsa ba ste/_/'dod sten dper na sprin [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]dra ba 'dra/_/'dod sten sha za mo dang srin mo dang /_/bud med gzugs mi sdug dang 'dris byed bzhin/_/'di ni ba lang bong bu 
[\[184b.2\]]rta dag dang /_/phag dang khyi dang wa dang rnga mo dang /_/glang chen lug rnams kyis kyang bsten pa ste/_/'dod pa skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis spangs/_/'dod sten tshul khrims thos dang gtong ba dang /_/dka' thub brtul zhugs rnams ni 'joms pa ste/_/'di la rtag tu bag med 
[\[184b.3\]]nyes pa 'phel/_/de phyir thar 'dod rtag tu bud med spong /_/gal te 'jig rten 'di dag khyed 'dra ba'i/_/mdangs ldan gzugs can dag gis gang gyur kyang /_/yon tan gnas pa kho bo'i sems gcig kyang /_/'dod chags la ni nams kyang rton mi 'gyur/_/de nas lha ma yin 
[\[184b.4\]]gyi bu mo bde sogs dang /_/lha'i bu mo nyi 'od song nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_des ni 'di na bud med rnams kyi skyon yang dag_/gang lags de dag shin tu mthong bar dogs ma mchis/_/ji ltar de yi sems ni yul las log gyur pa/_/
[\[184b.5\]]de ltar 'dod pa rnams la sems ni chags ma mchis/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa'i thad du song nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ci zhig don gnyer des pa chos spyod pa/_/brtul zhugs spyod pa de ni rnam dag smros/_/'di yis nyi zla 'am ni yang 
[\[184b.6\]]na dbang po 'am/_/tshangs pa 'am lha rgyal ci zhig khyod slong byed/_/des pas smras pa/_nyi ma zla ba de bzhin brgya byin dang /_/tshangs pa 'am rgyal po 'am 'di na gzhan dag kyang /_/'gro ba rgya chen gang yod de dag kun/_/gar byed lta bzhin mi rtag mi brtan na/_/mkhas 
[\[184b.7\]]pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed/_/gang la skye med rga med 'chi ba med/_/sdug dang mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa 'ang med/_/'gro ba grol mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur bya zhes/_/de thob bya phyir sems kyi spyod pa nges/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_phan byed khyod kyi tshig la rjes 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]su yi rang ste/_/khyod kyis smon lam btab pa legs par grub gyur cig_/bdud rnams sder bcas myur du nges par bcom nas ni/_/shAkya seng ge rgyal ltar byang chub thob gyur cig_/de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas dus gzhan zhig na nor bu 
[\[185a.2\]]rin po che rin thang med pa zhig rnyed nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu gyur pa 'di bdag gis mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang yin pa de la sbyin gor ma chag go snyam nas de grong bar du song ste/_thams cad kyi nang na 
[\[185a.3\]]dbul po su yin pa de la rin po che 'di sbyin no zhes sgra bsgrags pa dang /_dbul po mgon med pa phal po che der 'dus te/_bdag cag dbul po yin gyis bdag cag la byin cig ces 'dzer to/_/des pas smras pa/_khyed ni dbul po ma yin gyi/_mnyan yod 'di na ches 
[\[185a.4\]]dbul ba gzhan zhig yod kyis de la sbyin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_gang yin/_des pas smras pa/_rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_khyod de skad ma zer cig_/rgyal po gsal rgyal ni phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yin gyi/_/bdag cag ni 
[\[185a.5\]]dbul zhing mgon med pa yin no/_/des pas smras pa/_nor mang gis ni ci zhig bya/_/rgya mtsho la ni klu rnams bzhin/_/gang dag la ni chog med pa/_/ma bsdams de dag dbul po yin/_/gang dag 'dod pa rab 'phel zhing /_/ya nga yid ni skye 'gyur ba/_/rmongs pa de dag 
[\[185a.6\]]tshe 'di dang /_/pha rol du yang dbul por 'gyur/_/de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa skye bo phal po che de dag gis yongs su bskor cing nor bu rin po che de khyer nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi don bya ba'i sa ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang tshong dpon dang /_
[\[185a.7\]]khyim bdag rigs dang ldan pa'i mchog lnga brgya tsam zhig g.yon chung ngu'i phyir bdog pa thams cad phrogs so/_/grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas nor bu rin po che de rgyal po la phul te/_rgyal po chen po nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa 'dzam bu gling thams cad ri ba bdag gis rnyed pa 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]'di la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/_mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal to snyam mo/_/de la bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/_khyod ni 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po lags so snyam bgyid kyis/_kye nor bu rin po che 'di bzhes su gsol/_
[\[185b.2\]]de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal yul yul por gyur cing ngo tsha bar gyur nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa cing khyod pas kyang ches dbul lam/_des pas smras pa/_lha de lta lags te/_bdag bas khyod ches dbul ba lags so/_/rgyal pos 
[\[185b.3\]]smras pa/_rnam grangs gang gis dbul/_des pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang gi 'dod pa rab mang rnam par 'phel zhing longs spyod dag gis chog ma 'tshal/_gnod pa bgyid pa'i slad du rgyal srid 'khrug cing bdag nyid kyang ni 'dor bgyid pa/_/de ni 'di na 'jig rten 
[\[185b.4\]]mi srung yon tan chung ngu dag la mchog tu 'dzin/_/de phyir 'di na de la rtag tu chos 'dod rnams ni dbul po lags par sems/_/gang zhig byams pa rab tu bsgoms te sems can rnams la tha ba ma mchis shing /_rtag par rgyun du ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing 'dod 
[\[185b.5\]]pa ma mchis la/_/nyam thag mthong na rtag tu snying rje bgyid cing shar gnyer bgyid pa ma mchis pa/_/de ni phyug cing nor bzang shin tu nor che dad pa la sogs longs spyod gnas/_/gang zhig 'gro ba 'di na dbang phyug rgya chen ldan la chos srung mi bgyid dang /_gang zhig 'di na 
[\[185b.6\]]skye bo dman zhing sdug bsngal gzir ba bzung nas chad pas gcod/_/gang zhig chung ma dag gis mdun bltas dga' zhing 'jig rten pha rol mi lta ba/_/de ni chos srung mi bgyid shin tu dbul zhing dman pa'i mi zhes rig par bgyi/_/dad pas bsam pa dri ma med cing rab brtan tshul 
[\[185b.7\]]khrims dag la yang dag gnas/_/rtag tu ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod thos pa 'dzin te gtong la dga' ba dang /_/shes rab kyis ni mthar phyin blo gros ldan zhing 'jig rten kun la lta bgyid pa/_/de dag rtag tu mi dbul thob cing chos 'dod rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa lags/_/gang 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]dag longs spyod rnams la rab chags bde la dga' zhing gtong ba ma mchis la/_/lus dang srog la snying por 'dzin cing rtag par snying po don du mi gnyer dang /_/gang dag glang chen myos pa lta bur rtag tu yid myos rnam par rgyu ba dang /_/lha gcig gang dag dran pa ma 
[\[186a.2\]]mchis de dag dbul ba nyid ni thob pa lags/_/gang dag dkon mchog gsum po dri ma med la gus pa shin tu che ba dang /_/lus dang srog dang nor rnams las ni rtag tu snying po sgrub pa'i mkhas pa dag_/rtag tu mi brkam sdang bar mi bgyid glen pa ma lags rab tu rgyags ma mchis/_/
[\[186a.3\]]lha cig gang dag chos kyis brgyan pa de dag nor che skyes bu dam pa lags/_/lha cig me ni rtag tu nags kyi sban sbun skam po sreg pas chog ma 'tshal/_/lha gcig 'di na rgya mtsho chu klung rnams kyi chu 'dzin pas kyang chog ma 'tshal/_/'di na nyi ma zla ba 'di dag mkha' la mthar gyis rgyu bas 
[\[186a.4\]]chog ma 'tshal/_/rgyal po brkam phyir rtag tu longs spyod dag gis chog mi mkhyen pas brlag par 'gyur/_/zhugs ni gum par gyur pas rtswa mang dag gis slar yang 'bar bar yang mi bgyid/_/de bzhin mkhas pa shes rab chog par mi 'dzin nyon mongs rnams kyis 'bar mi bgyid/_/
[\[186a.5\]]chu yi thigs pa bzhin du rgyal srid dag kyang mi brtan 'jig par rab phyogs na/_/gnod pa'i rtsa bar gyur cing dge ba 'joms pa'i rgyal srid de ni su zhig 'tshal/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal sems 'khrugs nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa de 
[\[186a.6\]]ltar nga ni dbul la khyod ni phyug par khyod la dpang su yod/_/des pas smras pa/_lha de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyan yod 'di na bzhugs pa khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_ngas mthong yang ma mthong ngo /_/des pas smras pa/_
[\[186a.7\]]lha de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mig tu gyur cing tshad mar gyur pa ste/_de ni bdag gi dpang lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_song la de bzhin gshegs pa de spyan drongs shig dang des ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du ngas gzung bar bya'o/_/des pas smras pa/_ston pa de la ngan 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]bu'am/_pho nya gzhan gtang 'os ma lags/_/'dir ni bdag gis bsam bgyis na/_/de mkhyen nas ni gshegs par 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'di 'am pha rol la/_/de ni mi mkhyen cang mi mnga'/_/thugs kyis bsam pa mkhyen nas kyang /_/'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur/_/
[\[186b.2\]]sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas/_/de la nga rgyal skyon mi mnga'/_/sems can rnams la legs dgongs pas/_/shin tu ring du'ang gshegs 'gyur gyis/_/rgyal chen bdag gis gsol ba la/_/da ni legs par thugs ches mdzod/_/gang gis ston pa 'dir gshegs 
[\[186b.3\]]pa'i/_/bden pa'i byin rlabs bgyi bar 'tshal/_/me tog spos dang me tog phreng /_/rgyal mtshan gdugs dang byug pa dang /_/sil snyan sta gon mdzod cig dang /_/'dren pa de ni gshegs par 'gyur/_/des pas thal mo sbyar nas kyang /_/phrag pa gcig tu gos gzar 'dug_/
[\[186b.4\]]pus mo sa la btsugs byas nas/_/'di skad du ni tshig kyang smras/_/kun mkhyen bden pa gang gis su/_/bdag gis bsam pa mkhyen ce na/_/bden pa'i tshig ni 'di nyid kyis/_/thub pa bdag gi mdun du bzhugs/_/de nas tshig 'di smras nas kyang /_/sa ni rab tu g.yos 
[\[186b.5\]]par gyur/_/sa gzhi rnam par brtol nas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byung bar gyur/_/rdzu 'phrul dag dang ldan pa yi/_/nyan thos lnga brgyas yongs su bskor/_/brgya phrag bcu gnyis snyed dag gi_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni/_/skyod pa dang ni lha klu dang /_/brgya byin 
[\[186b.6\]]tshangs pas mdun gyis bltas/_/de 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul mthong nas ni/_/de tshe 'jig rten ngo mtshar 'dzin/_/rgyal po dpung bcas blon por bcas/_/ston pa'i zhabs la 'dud par byed/_/der ni srog chags stong dag gis/_/ston pa la ni mchod pa byas/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[186b.7\]]mchod byas nas/_/byang chub don du yid btud do/_/de nas grong khyer gyi dbul po des pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag mnyan yod 'di na 'khyam zhing mchis 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]mchis pa las nor bu rin po che rin thang ma mchis pa zhig rnyed nas de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_mnyan yod 'di na thams cad kyi nang na dbul po gang lags pa de la stsal to snyam nas de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni thams cad kyi nang nas 
[\[187a.2\]]ches dbul ba ste/_'di ni pha rol gyi nor 'phrog par bgyid pas na ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags so/_/slar zhing don du gnyer bar bgyid pas na chog ma 'tshal ba lags so/_/gzhan gyi longs spyod dag gis ngoms ma 'tshal ba lags so/_/sdug bsngal ba rnams la rnam 
[\[187a.3\]]par mtho 'tsham pa lags so/_/skyid pa rnams thal mar 'byin pa lags so/_/dbul po rnams rab tu phung bar bgyid pa lags so/_/phyug po rnams tshar gcod pa lags so/_/shin tu rab tu myos pa lags so/_/rgyal po'i longs spyod rnams dang sred pas 
[\[187a.4\]]rnam par bcings pa lags so snyam nas de la bdag gis stsal na len par mi bgyid par 'di skad du de ltar nga ni dbul la khyod ni 'byor bar khyod la dpang su yod ces kyang mchi'o/_/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs snyoms pa/_ngo zlog gi spyod 
[\[187a.5\]]pa mi mnga' ba/_tha ba dang /_dri ma dang /_khong khro ba mi mnga' ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di legs par lung bstan par gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod ni tshe 'di'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi longs spyod gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_
[\[187a.6\]]bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta dang /_dpung bu chung dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mdzod dang /_bang mdzod thob pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag phyug go snyam du sems so/_/rgyal po chen po des pa ni sbyin pa dang /_
[\[187a.7\]]dul ba dang /_legs par sdom pa dang /_bzod pa dang /_des pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub dang /_bag yod pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la gnas pa dang /_
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dang ba dang /_dad pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_shes rab dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_sdom pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis bdag phyug go snyam du sems so/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[187b.2\]]khyod kyi 'og tu gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag 'di ltar khyod dang 'dra bar nor dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag ni des pas gom pa bdun bor ba'i bar gyi tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub dang /_bag yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang 
[\[187b.3\]]mi phod ba nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag gnas pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po 
[\[187b.4\]]chen po khyod kyi yul na sems can yon tan gyi che ba nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag mang du gnas so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis des pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod kyis glengs pas kho bo'i nga rgyal nges bcom phyir/_des pa khyod ni kho bo'i ston pa gnyis pa ste/_/
[\[187b.5\]]rgyal srid 'di kun khyod sbyin kho bo dpung dang bcas/_/khyod kyis slob ma yin gyis khyod kyis bdag slobs shig_/kho bo yun ring dag tu nga rgyal gyis kyang bslus/_/sdig pa'i grogs po dag gis bskor cing bzung ba las/_/des pa khyod nyid las ni chos 'di thos pas na/_/rab tu 
[\[187b.6\]]bsdams te kho bos chos bzhin spyad par bya/_/khyim na gnas pa brgya phrag lnga po 'di dag ni/_/nor gyi ched du kho bos go rar bcug pa ste/_/kho bos thams cad btang gis bde bar 'khod par gyis/_/phyin cad 'di 'dra ba dag kho bo yod mi bgyid/_/lnga brgya btang bar gyur pa gang 
[\[187b.7\]]yin de dag kyang /_/des pa la ni zhe sa legs par bskyed nas kyang /_/sems mi skyo bar gyur cing ci la'ang mi lta bar/_/bde ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam btab/_/nga ni dbul ba ma yin khyod ni dbul po zhes/_/des pa khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras pa ste/_/des pa 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]la ni gang zhig dbul po zhes brjod pa/_/mi de rgyal po'i khrims dang 'gal bar byed pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu des pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la lta bas
