[\[188a.2\]]chog ma 'tshal ba lags na bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du ci nas 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don mchis par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'di dag la legs par chos bstan du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_des pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na de 
[\[188a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_yid ches pa dang /_dad pa dang /_phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_gus pa ste/_chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/_/gzhan yang bzhi ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[188a.4\]]gzugs kyi sku mthong na bdag kyang 'di 'dra bar gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa ni slu bar mi mdzad pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag par sems bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad ston cing cher na rab tu 
[\[188a.5\]]grol bar bya ba'i phyir yang sems de bskyed pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar yang sems de bskyed pa ste/_bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/_/gzhan yang bzhi ste/_gzugs 
[\[188a.6\]]dben par mthong ba dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dben par mthong ba dang /_khams bzhi nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang /_skye mched grong stong pa lta bur mthong ba ste/_bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/_/
[\[188a.7\]]gzhan yang bzhi ste/_bdag med pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pa dang /_sems can med pa'i phyir sems can rnam par dag pa dang /_srog med pa'i phyir srog rnam par dag pa dang /_gang zag med pa'i phyir gang zag rnam par dag pa ste/_bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]par mthong ba yin no/_/gzhan yang bzhi ste/_lha'i mig mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_shes rab kyi mig kun tu spyod pa dang /_chos kyi mig gis so sor rtog pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan rjes su rtogs par byed pa ste/_bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba 
[\[188b.2\]]yin no/_/gzhan yang bzhi ste/_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang /_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa'i phyir shes rab kyi phung po yongs 
[\[188b.3\]]su dag pa dang /_de'i rnam par grol ba mthong ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa ste/_des pa rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos 
[\[188b.4\]]kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas dad pa'i rgyal po ltar 'khor dang bcas te bar snang la gshegs so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rigs kyi bu des pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/des pa khyod nam de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'gro ba de'i tshe kho bo la yang 
[\[188b.5\]]sbron cig dang /_kho bo yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'gro'o/_/des pas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de ltar bgyi'o/_/bdag ni khyod bud med dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas te de bzhin gshegs pa la gzigs su gshegs par 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub 
[\[188b.6\]]sems dpa' rnams ni bdag gcig pu la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma lags te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'khor phal che na mdzes so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_des pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gang yin/_des pas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /_gdul ba'i 
[\[188b.7\]]slad du sems can thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du gzhan dag kyang byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]sems can g.yon can 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po phyir mi zlogs par 'gyur ba'i 'dun pa drag po ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po sems can ser sna can yongs su 
[\[189a.2\]]smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po sems can gnod sems can yongs 
[\[189a.3\]]su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po sems can le lo can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po sems can sems rnam par 
[\[189a.4\]]g.yengs ba yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po sems can 'chal pa'i shes rab can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po 
[\[189a.5\]]sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i byams pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po 'khor ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i snying rje ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa'i dga' ba ni byang 
[\[189a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spong ba'i btang snyoms ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag ni byang chub 
[\[189a.7\]]sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i stong pa nyid 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po tshig btsun par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang mi rtsub pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po spobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i mi 'phya ba dang 'thing 
[\[189b.2\]]slad mi bgyid pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ba'i thos pa'i yo byad sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du slob dpon dang mkhan po la gus pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[189b.3\]]'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i thos pa 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub 
[\[189b.4\]]sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i dgon pa la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po sems can ma dad pa dad par 'gyur ba'i 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[189b.5\]]'khor lags so/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sgrub par 'gyur ba'i bag yod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor lags so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po la 'os pa'i 
[\[189b.6\]]ras bcos bu zung stong chos la dgab pa'i phyir des pa la byin no/_/des pas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bdag la bkur sti dang mchod pa mdzad pas 'tshal to/_/gang gis bdag la 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gos ras rul ba'i dum bu brgya btsems pa bdag la mchis kyis bdag 
[\[189b.7\]]ni bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po chen po dpyid kyi dus na ras rul pa'i dum bu'i gos 'di shing gi yal ga la bkal te dgung gcig gam/_dgung gnyis sam/_dgung bcu 'am/_dgung brgyar mchis kyang de la su yang len pa ma mchis shing 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]de la su yang chags pa'i sems skyed pa ma mchis te/_bdag kyang de bor nas mi lta bar mchi ba'i dus de mchis so/_/rgyal po chen po bdag ni bdag gir 'dzin pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i gos rnams mi 'tshal lo/_/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpas ni gang la 
[\[190a.2\]]bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur zhing gzhan yang 'dod pa skyed par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gos bcad par bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_des pa gal te de ltar ras bcos bu zung 'di dag khyod mi len na kho bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rkang pas rdzis shig_/des pas lha de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas ras 
[\[190a.3\]]bcos bu zung de dag la rkang pas brdzis te song ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_des pa ras bcos bu zung khyod kyi rkang pa'i dman mar gyur pa 'di rnams ji ltar bya/_des pas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po sems can dbul po gcer bu gos ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag la stsol cig_/rgyal pos des pa de ltar bya'o 
[\[190a.4\]]zhes smras nas rgyal po'i mi rnams la bsgo ste/_de dag gis kyang ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du byas so/_/ras bcos bu zung de dag dbul po de dag gis bgos ma thag tu 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/_bdag cag gis des pa la ji ltar lan glan par bya snyam pa las sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /_
[\[190a.5\]]des pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyis de dag gis bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos so/_/'dod pa bzhin du lan ni glan bya ba/_/me tog dang ni spos dang byug pa dang /_/zas skom nor rnams kyis kyang mi nus te/_/byang chub sems kyis des pa dga' bar 'gyur/_/des pa zas dang gos 
[\[190a.6\]]'dod ma yin te/_/rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa 'dod ma yin/_/des pa byang chub sems las chos 'dod de/_/byang chub sems kyis des pa dga' ba skye/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rigs kyi bu des pa dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/_blon po dang bcas/_'khor dang 
[\[190a.7\]]bcas pa dang /_mnyan yod kyi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir dong ngo /_/de nas mnyan yod dang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'khor gyi khyams chen po bkra ba blta na sdug 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]pa yangs shing mtho la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'di lta ste dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal ba lta bu zhig sprul te/_dbus su shing yongs 'du sa brtol sprul to/_/yongs 'dus brtol gyi drung du yang bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan 
[\[190b.2\]]seng ge'i khri bkra ba blta na sdug cing chu zheng gab pa la lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba mngon par sprul to/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stan drug khri dag kyang mngon par sprul to/_/lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs la sogs pa lha'i bu mo khri nyis stong yang me tog dang /_
[\[190b.3\]]bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag khyer nas sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dag byed cing des pa'i g.yog bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri brgyan par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po 
[\[190b.4\]]de dag 'ong bar thugs su chud nas gtsug lag khang nas byung ste byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od la smras pa/_bzang mo tshur shog_/des pa'i g.yog bya ba'i 
[\[190b.5\]]phyir rgyud kyi sgra dang /_glu'i sgra dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/_/de nas lha'i bu mo nyi 'od kyis lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam dang thabs cig tu rgyud kyi sgrar sbyar ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bstod pa/_/khyod kyis bskal pa brgyar ni sngan chad dka' thub spyad/_/khyod 
[\[190b.6\]]ni bsdu ba dag dang dul dang sbyin la dgyes/_/khyod kyi sku gsung thugs rnams yongs su dag pa ste/_/srid gsum 'jig rten bla ma la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/khyod ni tha ba mi mnga' bzod dang byams la dgyes/_/khyod ni brtson 'grus brtan dang stobs kyi pha rol gshegs/_/khyod ni 
[\[190b.7\]]bsam gtan blo dang tshul rnams snang la dgyes/_/dri ma gsum gyi nyes pa sel la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sel la dgyes/_/khyod kyi thugs ni zhi zhing snyoms la thugs rje ldan/_/khyod ni yang dag gsung zhing dam pa'i don yang mkhyen/_/srid pa gsum po thar 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]bar mdzad la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi the tshom sel bar mdzad/_/khyod ni mthong ba rnams kyi skyon rnams mtha' dag sel/_/khyod ni mthong ba rnams la mchog tu dga' bar mdzad/_/bdag ni rgyal la srog gis skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/_/lha'i bu 
[\[191a.2\]]mo mchog ni 'dod chags chags gyur pa/_/gang gis mthong ba de yang chos la dga' bar 'gyur/_/dga' bas dran pa shin tu rgya cher thob 'gyur te/_/dga' bas sdug la 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral bar 'gyur/_/mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis dag gi rgyan rnams kyis/_/legs par 
[\[191a.3\]]brgyan pa gsal ba'i yon tan mchog mnga' ba/_/gsung mchog mi yi dam pa gsung ni rnam par dag_/mtshungs pa med pa'i 'od mnga' khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/'phags pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog phyag mthil sdug_/thub pa'i sku stod seng ge'i 'dra zhing glang chen stabs/_/smin tshugs 
[\[191a.4\]]legs shing shangs legs tshems snyoms thags bzang mdzes/_/dpal gyi snying po shAkya thub mchog khyed la 'dud/_/rgyal ba yon tan brgya phrag dag gis rgyas gyur pa/_/bde gshegs shin tu dga' ba skyed mdzad bstod pa yi/_/bsod nams yon tan mtha' yas bsgrubs pa 
[\[191a.5\]]gang lags pa/_/de yis 'dir ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas mnyam gyur cig_/de nas rigs kyi bu des pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag gis yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig 
[\[191a.6\]]tu 'dug go_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rigs kyi bu des pa la khri'u stan bzang po bdag nyid kyis byin te 'di la 'dug cig ces byas nas rigs kyi bu des pa khri'u stan bzang po de la 'dug go_/rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[191a.7\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i bu gang dag gis rigs kyi bu des pa sngon ma mthong ba de dag 'di skad du dbul po gos ngan pa gyon pa 'di la 'di lta bur mchod pa byed do zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]smras so/_/grogs po dag 'di la brnyas par ma byed cig_/rigs kyi bu 'di yon tan gyi che ba nyid ji snyed pa dang ldan pa de ni kho bo'i mngon sum du gyur to/_/grogs po dag khyed re shig sdod cig dang /_rigs kyi bu 'di'i yon tan gyi bkod pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rigs kyi bu des 
[\[191b.2\]]pas lha'i bu de dag gi bsam pa rtogs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i bkod pa'i thabs dang /_ye shes kyi bkod pa'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_/
[\[191b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las 'od phyung ste/_'od des des pa'i lus la reg nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ci 'dra ba de las 'bum gyur pas kyang ches lhag par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag ya mtshan du 'dzin par gyur te/_des pa la me tog dag 
[\[191b.4\]]gis gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa la bka' stsal pa/_des pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu'i mthu la gnas pa'i tshe yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dman par ston cing dman pa'i mthu la gnas kyang sems can yongs su 
[\[191b.5\]]smin par bya ba'i phyir mchog tu ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/_/ye shes la gnas kyang mi shes par ston cing mi shes par ston kyang shes par snang ba 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/_/ye shes ma thob pa rnams la yang lus kyi spyod pa dang /_spyod lam gyis dad pa skyed par byed cing ye 
[\[191b.6\]]shes thob pa rnams la yang spyod pa thams cad yang dag par ston pas rdzu 'phrul ston par byed pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/_/rtag tu sems la dbang byed pas ngan cing dbul bar ston kyang tshangs pas kyang mchod pa dang /_mchog gi bkod pa la gnas kyang skye bo phal gyis kyang mchod pa 'di ni 
[\[191b.7\]]de'i bkod pa yin no/_/sems can bsdu ba'i phyir ngan cing dbul bar yang nye bar ston la sems can rnams la mngon par 'byung ba bskyed pa'i phyir longs spyod rgya chen po dang ldan yang mngon par 'byung bar ston pa 'di ni de'i bkod pa yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu des pas ji srid cig nas byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu des pa ni sangs rgyas bye ba mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pa/_
[\[192a.2\]]bzod pa gsum thob pa/_spobs pa thob pa/_mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar byas pa/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa ste/_ngan cing dbul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dis ngan cing dbul ba 'dis sems can ji snyed 
[\[192a.3\]]cig btul lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo lha'i bu 'bum phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas te/_mi rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ji srid cig na 
[\[192a.4\]]ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa rnams ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/_ming ni ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig tu 'gyur lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 
[\[192a.5\]]tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_sems can don la brtson dang brtul zhugs brtan pa dang /_/grags pa rgya chen dag gis bsam pa khyab byas dang /_/byang chub yon tan gnas pa spyod pa ci 'dra ba/_/ngas ni khyod la bshad kyis kun dga' khyod nyon cig_/'di na rgyal la mchod mchog phyir 
[\[192a.6\]]ni gus byed cing /_/dam pa'i chos ni bsrung phyir rab tu brtson byed pa/_/des pa yi ni spyod pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa/_/de dag 'dir ni bgrang bar nus par mi 'gyur ro/_/pha rol phyin pa 'di dag la ni legs par bslabs/_/mngon par shes pa dag gis sngan chad rtse bar byas/_/tshangs pa'i 
[\[192a.7\]]gnas rnams kyis ni mtha' mar phyin par song /_/thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dag la legs par bslabs/_/'dir ni de yis 'dus byas skyon rnams legs par mthong /_/sangs rgyas byang chub kyang ni mngon sum gyur par byas/_/'dis ni sems can ji lta ji ltar thar 'gyur ba'i/_/rnam par smin 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]pa'i mtshan nyid la yang legs par bslabs/_/'jigs pa med cing blo dang rtogs dang dran dang ldan/_/spobs pa dang ni gzungs rnams dang yang ldan pa ste/_/bdud kyi lcags kyu nyon mongs rdzab las nges byung zhing /_/sangs rgyas spyod yul don chen la ni rab tu gnas/_/'jig rten chos rnams mang 
[\[192b.2\]]po dag gis ma gos la/_/chags pa la sogs rnams kyis brag ltar yong mi g.yos/_/su yi drung du mi 'gro ring bar byed pa 'ang min/_/nam mkha' lta bur bcings dang grol ba med pa yin/_/snying rjer gnas shing sems kyang yongs su skyo ba med/_/shin tu bsdams shing nem nur can 
[\[192b.3\]]la byams sems ldan/_/sems can kun la bdag dang 'dra bar sdug par lta/_/skyon la mi lta 'khrug pa dag dang ldan ma yin/_/ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa rnams la gnas/_/'di ni ji skad smras pa bzhin du spyod par byed/_/chos nyid la ni chos kyi tshul gyis legs par bslabs/_/
[\[192b.4\]]stong pa nyid la mos shing gnyis las rnam par grol/_/bzod pa gsum thob skye bo'i spyod yul ma yin te/_/sangs rgyas tshul dang yon tan dag la rab tu gnas/_/'di ni 'jig rten gang du rgyu ba byed pa na/_/der ni skye bo mang po rnam par grol bar byed/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sras 'di gang du 
[\[192b.5\]]gnas pa der/_/de bzhin gshegs pas yul ni stongs pa ma yin te/_/de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma lus pas/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas bzhin du 'di la gus par gyis/_/nga ni mya ngan 'das nas nyams pa'i dus bab tshe/_/des pa 'di ni sangs rgyas spyad pa spyod nas kyang /_/sngon chad 
[\[192b.6\]]gnas pa mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten khams/_/mi 'khrugs 'jig rten nyid du phyir yang 'gro bar 'gyur/_/brtan po srog chags rnams la phan par bya ba dang /_/zhing gi 'byor pa dag ni yongs su btsal ba dang /_/byang chub tu ni sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/bskal pa 
[\[192b.7\]]grangs med gsum du spyad pa spyod par byed/_/de yi 'og tu de ni skyob pa rgyal bar 'gyur/_/ming ni 'jig rten rgyal po dbang phyug ces kyang bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba yi/_/zhing dang de yi 'jig rten du ni mtshungs pa yin/_/'jig rten khams de legs par sprul pa 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]zhes bya ste/_/yon tan thams cad dang ni ldan par 'gyur ba yin/_/de yi tshe yi tshad ni lo khri thub par 'gyur/_/de yi dge 'dun shin tu mang ste bgrang las 'das/_/nyan thos theg pa can gyi dge 'dun nyung bar 'gyur/_/phal cher byang chub don du brtson pa byas nas su/_/
[\[193a.2\]]de dag thams cad ye shes stobs dang rdzu 'phrul ldan/_/rnam par thar pa rnams dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med/_/gcig tu nges par chos ni legs par bshad rnams kyis/_/'jig rten khams der rtag tu sgra chen sgrogs par 'gyur/_/de na bdud rnams med cing srid par chags pa med/_/
[\[193a.3\]]de dag thams cad yang dag rig cing rnam par dag_/bde bar gshegs de yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur nas/_/lo ni brgyad cu dag las bzhi lhag rnams su yang /_/de yi dam pa'i chos ni rab tu spyod par 'gyur/_/de tshe de yi chos kyi tshul ni 'khrugs pa med/_/des pa de yis gang dag yongs su 
[\[193a.4\]]smin byas pa/_/de dag byang chub bla na med pa'i don du spyod/_/zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams/_/de dag thams cad skyon rnams dang ni bral ba yin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa'i lung bstan pa bshad ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[193a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_/lha'i me tog dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_rgyan gyi char yang mngon par bab bo/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis kyang rang rang gi gos rnams rigs kyi bu des pa la bkab bo/_/tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_bram ze brgya phrag mang 
[\[193a.6\]]po dag kyang rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la des pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu dbyung bar gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu des pa'i mgo bo la phyag gis byugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[193a.7\]]rigs kyi bu des pa'i mgo bo la reg ma thag tu gos ngur smrig bgos shing dge slong du snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo snyigs ma lnga po dus kyi snyigs ma dang /_sems can gyi snyigs ma dang /_
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]zhing gi snyigs ma dang /_tshe'i snyigs ma dang /_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'i dus su nga byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas der des pas ji ltar 'dul ba las rnam pa gzhan gyis gdul bar mi bya'o/_/kun dga' bo nga ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 
[\[193b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi 'dul bas sems can rnams 'dul bar mi byed kyi/_/kun dga' bo nga ni ngan cing dbul ba dang /_ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas bsdigs pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/_/kun dga' bo gal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ngas sangs 
[\[193b.3\]]rgyas kyi yul gyis chos bstan cing sangs rgyas kyis yul nye bar bstan du zin na sems can gcig kyang 'dul bar mi 'gyur la chos kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na nga dang des pa ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can 'dul 
[\[193b.4\]]bar gyis shig_/kun dga' bo sems can dad pa can dang /_rtogs pa mang ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas dad pa rnyed cing de bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang 
[\[193b.5\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' des pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 
[\[193b.6\]]'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las des pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste 
[\[193b.7\]]nyi shu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]{D72}]@##/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa ste khyim bdag dpas byin gyis zhus pa/_bam po gcig pa/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bI ra dat+ta gr-i ha pa ti pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA 
[\[194a.2\]]na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa khyim bdag dpas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod 
[\[194a.3\]]na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu 
[\[194a.4\]]rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba/_yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin 
[\[194a.5\]]tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du sems pa/_mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa sha stag ste/_gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya thams cad 
[\[194a.6\]]kyang gzungs thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe grong khyer chen po mnyan yod na khyim bdag dpas byin zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor che ba/_bdag dbang ba mang ba/_nor dang yo byad mang ba/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_
[\[194a.7\]]bang ba'i tshogs mang ba/_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_ra lug dang /_ba lang mang ba/_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba/_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul mang ba zhig gnas pa de khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/_/de dag 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe bar skabs su 'di lta bu'i gtam rjod de/_kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas 
[\[194b.2\]]'byung ba rnyed par dka'/_mir skye ba rnyed par dka'/_dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/_rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka'/_dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/_nan tan byed pa rnyed par dka'/_
[\[194b.3\]]sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes la gang dag byas pa chung ngu yang chud mi gzon na mang po lta ci smos te/_de dag ches rnyed par dka'/_de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/_de 
[\[194b.4\]]bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches nas nan tan gyis sgrub pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/_de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mdzes pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/_'khor ba las grol ba rnyed par 
[\[194b.5\]]dka' na/_ci bdag cag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'am/_'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam/_'on te theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya zhes 'thun par 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad de lta 
[\[194b.6\]]bu'i dpyod pa skyes nas bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni mchog yin gyi/_nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas khyim bdag dpas byin khyim bdag lnga brgya 
[\[194b.7\]]tsam de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu grong khyer chen po mnyan yod nas byung ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du khyim bdag dpas byin dang /_khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/_khyim 
[\[195a.2\]]bdag khyed don gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du lhags/_de nas khyim bdag dpas byin dang /_khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[195a.3\]]btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dus gcig cig na/_bdag cag khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam gcig tu 'dus te mchis par gyur nas de'i tshe bdag cag 'dus te 
[\[195a.4\]]mchis pa thams cad bar skabs su 'di lta bu'i bka' mchid brjod pa byung ste/_kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/_mir skye ba rnyed par dka'/_dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par dka'/_rab 
[\[195a.5\]]tu byung ba rnyed par dka'/_dge slong gi dngos po rnyed par dka'/_nan tan byed pa rnyed par dka'/_sems can gang dag byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes la gang dag byas pa chung ngu yang chud mi gzon na mang po lta ci smos te de dag ches rnyed par dka'/_de bas kyang sems can gang dag 
[\[195a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/_de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yid ches nas nan tan gyis sgrub pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/_de bas kyang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[195a.7\]]bstan pa la mdzes pa de dag ches rnyed par dka'/_'khor ba las grol ba rnyed par dka' na/_ci bdag cag nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'am/_'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sam/_'on te theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]las 'da' bar bya zhes bka' mchid bgyis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'di lta bu'i rtog pa skyes te/_bdag cag theg pa chen po bla na med pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba ni mchog lags kyi/_nyan thos kyi theg pas ni ma lags/_rang 
[\[195b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ni ma lags pa snyam bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos kyi skyes 'di dang chas te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[195b.3\]]po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar gnas par bgyi/_ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag 
[\[195b.4\]]dpas byin dang /_khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_khyim bdag rnams legs so legs so/_/khyim bdag rnams khyed 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[195b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thad du lhags pa khyed yang legs so/_/khyim bdag rnams de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[195b.6\]]'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji ltar bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang /_ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ngas khyed la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_khyim bdag dpas byin dang /_khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar 
[\[195b.7\]]nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas sems can thams 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya/_kun tu bsten par bya/_nges par bsten par bya/_bsgom par bya/_mang du bya'o/_/khyim bdag rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des lus la chags par mi bya/_srog la chags 
[\[196a.2\]]par mi bya/_de bzhin du nor dang /_'bru dang /_khyim dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo rnams la chags par mi bya/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_byug 
[\[196a.3\]]pa dang /_phreng ba rnams la chags par mi bya/_yo byad thams cad la chags par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyim bdag rnams sems can dag ni phal cher lus dang srog la chags par gyur nas sdig pa'i las rnams byed de/_de dag sdig pa'i las byas 
[\[196a.4\]]shing bsags pa des ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye'o/_/sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/_lus dang srog la ma chags par byas na bde 'gro rnams su skye'o/_/khyim bdag rnams de lta bas na byang 
[\[196a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/_lus la chags par mi bya/_srog la chags par mi bya/_de bzhin du nor dang /_'bru 
[\[196a.6\]]dang /_khyim dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang bu mo rnams la chags par mi bya/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams la chags par mi bya/_yo byad thams cad la chags 
[\[196a.7\]]par mi bya/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar yongs su gtang ba mang ba dang /_rnam par smin pa la re ba med par bya/_tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par bya/_sems can thams cad kyis nyes pa byas pa la ji mi snyam par bzod pa dang 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]des pa phun sum tshogs par bya/_lus dang srog la mi lta bar brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po bgo bar bya/_rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i sems kyis sems rtse gcig tu bya/_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las 
[\[196b.2\]]skyes dang /_shed bur lta ba dang bral bas shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas par bya/_des sbyin pa sbyin na sems can thams cad yid la byas te sbyin pa sbyin par bya/_sems can thams cad yid la byas te tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/_sems can thams cad yid la byas te bzod 
[\[196b.3\]]pa bsgom par bya/_sems can thams cad yid la byas te brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/_sems can thams cad yid la byas te bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag par bya/_sems can thams cad yid la byas te shes rab bsgom par bya/_sems can thams cad yid la byas te 
[\[196b.4\]]thabs la mkhas pa bslab par bya'o/_/de nas khyim bdag dpas byin dang /_khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni lus la lta zhing gnas pa lags/_srog la lta zhing gnas pa lags/_de 
[\[196b.5\]]bzhin du nor dang /_'bru dang /_khyim dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo rnams la lta zhing gnas pa lags/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams la 
[\[196b.6\]]lta zhing gnas pa lags/_yo byad thams cad la lta zhing gnas pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' so sor rtog cing lus la mi lta ba lags/_bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar srog la mi lta ba lags/_de bzhin du nor dang /_'bru dang /_khyim dang /_chung 
[\[196b.7\]]ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo rnams la mi lta ba lags/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams la mi lta ba lags/_yo byad thams cad la mi lta ba lags/_de nas 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpas byin dang /_khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus 'di la rnam pa du mar so sor brtag par bya'o/_/rnam pa du 
[\[197a.2\]]ma gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus 'di mthar gyis grub pa dang /_mthar gyis 'jig pa dang /_rdul phra rab bsags pa dang /_khong stong dang /_gye gu can dang /_bu ga dgu dang /_spu'i khung bu nas zag pa dang /_grog mkhar ltar sbrul gdug pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang /_
[\[197a.3\]]sbrul gdug pa ltar byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_ma skyes dgra'i spre'u ltar grogs la 'khu ba dang /_bshes gnyen ngan pa ltar 'drid pa'i bdag nyid can dang /_dbu ba rdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba dang /_chu'i chu bur ltar byung nas 'jig cing 'ju ba dang /_smig rgyu ltar 
[\[197a.4\]]slu ba'i bdag nyid can dang /_chu shing ltar bshig na snying po med pa dang /_sgyu ma ltar slu ba'i bdag nyid dang /_rgyal po ltar bgo blag mang ba dang /_dgra ltar glags lta ba dang /_rkun po ltar yid brtan du mi rung ba dang /_gshed ma ltar rjes su chags pa med pa dang /_
[\[197a.5\]]mi mdza' ba ltar mi phan par 'dod pa dang /_gsod pa ltar shes rab kyi srog gi bar chad byed pa dang /_phyir rgol ba ltar dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos kyi bar chad byed pa dang /_grong stong ltar bdag dang bral ba dang /_rdza mkhan gyi snod ltar mthar 'jig pa dang /_spyang ltar mi gtsang 
[\[197a.6\]]ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang /_sbang ma'i snod ltar mi gtsang ba zag pa dang /_sbrul dang /_mi dang /_khyi'i ro ltar dri mi zhim pa dang /_ngan skyugs kyi khung bu ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'byung gnas dang /_rma ltar bskyod mi bzod pa dang /_zug rngu ltar gnod pa'i 
[\[197a.7\]]bdag nyid can dang /_rje bo sdang ba ltar bsnyen par dka' ba dang /_khang rnying ltar bcos legs bya zhing bsten pa dang /_gru rnying ltar bcos legs bya zhing spyad pa dang /_bum pa so ma btang ba ltar nan tan gyis bag bya dgos pa dang /_grogs po mi srun pa ltar rtag tu rjes 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]su bsrung dgos pa dang /_chu 'gram gyi shing ltar g.yo zhing 'gul ba dang /_chu klung chen po'i rgyun ltar mthar mchi ba'i rgya mtsho la thug pa dang /_blo bur ba'i khyim ltar sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa dang /_mgron po med pa'i gnas khang ltar yongs su gzung ba 
[\[197b.2\]]med pa dang /_btson srungs ltar gsug gis bsgrub par bya ba dang /_mtha' 'khob kyi grong khyer ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang /_bye ma'i grong khyer ltar rtag tu 'jig pa'i bdag nyid can dang /_me ltar chog mi shes pa dang /_rgya mtsho ltar dgang dka' ba dang /_sbrul gyi 
[\[197b.3\]]gzeb ltar nan tan gyis bag bya ba dang /_byis pa chung ngu ltar rtag tu yongs su bskyang dgos pa dang /_snod chag pa ltar rtag tu bag bya dgos pa dang /_yul ngan pa ltar rtag tu gnod pa 'byung ba dang /_zas dug can ltar rtag tu yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /_re shig dgos 
[\[197b.4\]]pa'i phyir snod brnyan ma lta bu dang /_khur bkur ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu yin pa 'ba' zhig blos gzung bar bya'o/_/khyim bdag rnams gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas lus 'di thog ma dang tha ma'i rgyu la so sor brtag par bya'o/_/pha ma'i khu chu dang khrag 'dus pa las 'byung 
[\[197b.5\]]ste/_'di la khu chu dang khrag ni lus kyi thog ma'i rgyu yin no/_/tha ma'i rgyu ni zas 'ju ba la sogs pa ste/_kham gyis bza' ba'i zas zos ma thag tu bad kan gyi gnas su 'gro'o/_/bad kan gyi gnas su phyin nas bad kan gyis rkyang rkyang por byas te shin tu mi gtsang bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[197b.6\]]de'i 'og tu mkhris pa'i gnas su 'gro ste/_mkhris pa'i gnas su phyin nas zhu zhing skyur por gyur te/_rlung gi gnas su 'gro'o/_/zhu ste rlung gi gnas su phyin nas rlung gis tshigs ma logs shig_/dngas ma logs shig tu rnam par 'byed de/_tshigs ma las ni gcin dang /_
[\[197b.7\]]ngan skyugs la sogs te dri ma rnams 'byung /_dngas ma las ni khrag tu 'gyur te/_khrag las sha'o/_/sha las tshil lo/_/tshil las rus pa'o/_/rus pa las rkang ngo /_/rkang las khu chu'o/_/khu chu las lus 'di lta ste/_de ltar thog ma dang tha ma'i rgyu mi gtsang ba'i phyir lus mi 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]gtsang bar byang chub sems dpas bsam par bya'o/_/lus la mi gtsang bar lta ba na byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/_lus zhes bya ba 'di ni rus pa sum brgya drug cus khog pa bslang ba/_shing ngan pa'i khyim ltar tshigs sum 
[\[198a.2\]]brgyas sbyar ba/_rtsa'i dra ba bzhi brgyas glags pa/_sha spar tshad lnga brgyas g.yogs pa/_sdom rtsa drug gis khebs pa/_rtsa bdun brgyas gang ba/_rgyus pa bdun brgyas 'brel ba/_chu ba bcu drug gis brten pa/_chu ba gnyis kyis khyab par dkris pa/_rgyu ma 'dom phyed 
[\[198a.3\]]dang bzhis nang khrol byas pa/_long ka dang /_pho ba dang 'brel ba'i gnye ma rim pa bcu drug tu 'khyil ba/_rtsa phran nyis stong lnga brgyas skar khung byas pa/_gshis brgya rtsa bdun gyis snod chag pa ltar/_shig shig por gyur pa/_spu'i khung bu bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cus 
[\[198a.4\]]rtsa ltar khebs pa/_dbang po lnga'i bu ga dgu yod pa/_gnas bdun dang ldan pa/_mi gtsang bas yongs su gang ba/_klad pa snyim pa gang dang /_tshil snyim pa gang dang /_zhag snyim pa gsum dang /_bad kan snyim pa drug dang /_mkhris pa snyim pa drug dang /_rlung 
[\[198a.5\]]gis mtha' dag drangs pa dang /_khrag bre gang dang /_ngan skyugs phul gang dang /_de dag thams cad kyis bang ba bar chad can ltar so sor yongs su gang ba/_pags pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba/_ro bro ba drug gis gso ba/_lus kyi me la ngan skyugs kyi sbyin sreg 
[\[198a.6\]]byed pa/_rtag tu mthar 'dzag pa/_lus kyi yan lag de dag thams cad kyis blta na mi sdug pa/_dri nga ba/_rnag gi rang bzhin yin na 'di la su zhig gus par byed de/_skad cig dgos pa'i phyir snod brnyan ma tsam du zad pa dang /_khur bkur ba'i phyir shing rta lta bu 
[\[198a.7\]]'ba' zhig yin par chos kyi blos gzung bar bya'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_'di ltar mi gtsang phung po'i lus la ni/_/gzugs mngon nga rgyal can gang gus byed pa/_/byis pa'i blo can de ni mngon bzhin du/_/mi shes ngan skyugs bum pa thogs shing 'gro_/de yi 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]sna nas rnag gi rnam pa 'dzag/_/kha nas dri mi zhim pa rtag tu 'byung /_/mig rdul chags shing skye bo srin bu can/_/de la su zhig chags shing gus par byed/_/dper na byis pa sol ba thogs nas su/_/'di ni dkar por bya zhes 'dar byed kyang /_/dkar po'i dngos por 
[\[198b.2\]]mi 'gyur zad par 'gyur/_/byis blo phyin ci log gi nga rgyal can/_/de ltar mi gang gtsang sbra'i blo gros can/_/nga yis lus 'di gtsang mar bya zhes te/_/bskus phyis 'bab stegs brgyar ni khrus byas kyang /_/'chi bdag dbang gis zad 'gyur gtsang mi 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[198b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis yang khyim bdag dpas byin dang /_khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag la bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[198b.4\]]'dod pas rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhis lus la brtag par bya ste/_rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_khyim bdag rnams 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_rang bzhin gyis mi 'thun pa ste/_smad par brtag par 
[\[198b.5\]]bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus rnag zag pa ste/_dri mi zhim par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus mthar 'jig pa ste/_snying po med par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus rgyus pa'i bog res sbrel ba ste/_nyam chung bar brtag par bya/_byang 
[\[198b.6\]]chub sems dpas lus mi gtsang ba zag pa ste/_mi gtsang bar brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/_sgyu ma lta bur brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus skye bo mi mkhas pa byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'khrug par byed par 
[\[198b.7\]]brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus 'jig pa dang /_bu ga dgu'i sgo nas 'dzag par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi mes kun tu 'bar bar brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus zhe sdang gi mes tshig par brtag par bya/_byang 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]chub sems dpas lus gti mug gi mes me lce gcig tu gyur par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams kyis ldongs par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod chags kyi dra 
[\[199a.2\]]bas khebs shing sred pa'i dra bar chud par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus kun nas bu gas yongs su gang bas bu ga'i gnas su brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhes gtses par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus srin bu'i 
[\[199a.3\]]rigs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnas su brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus 'chi ba'i chos nyid yin pas mi rtag par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus chos la rmongs pas bems po yin par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus mthar 
[\[199a.4\]]gyis 'grub cing tha mar 'jig pas bum pa lta bur brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus mya ngan gyis gnod pa mang pos gang bas nyam thag par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar rga shir 'gyur bas rton pa med par brtag par bya/_byang chub 
[\[199a.5\]]sems dpas lus g.yo dang sgyu'i nye bar spyod pa dag gis glags par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus dgang dka' bas sa'i gting lta bur brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus dga' ba'i gzugs dang /_bde ba'i gzugs la zhen pas me lta 
[\[199a.6\]]bur brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis chog mi shes par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dag gis 'joms par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus bsti stang dang /_gnod 
[\[199a.7\]]pa myong bas mi brtan par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus chu klung gi rgyun bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan 'byung bas rkyen gzhan dang gzhan du brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]gis yid kyi sems pa yin par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus tha mar dur khrod la thug pas byas pa mi gzo bar brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus spyang ki dang /_ce spyang dang /_khyi rjen sha za ba dag gi zas su brtag par bya/_byang 
[\[199b.2\]]chub sems dpas lus rus pa dang /_rgyus pa'i bog res sbrel bas 'khrul 'khor lta bur brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus bshang ba dang /_gci ba dang /_mchil ma dang /_snabs dang /_rnag dang /_khrag gis yongs su gang ba ste/_blta 
[\[199b.3\]]ba'i 'os ma yin par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus zas dang skom las byung ba ste/_rang gi kha na las pa ma yin par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus mi rtag pa ste/_shin tu zad pa'i chos nyid yin pas don med pa'i glags pas glags 
[\[199b.4\]]par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bas dgra lta bur brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus yang dang yang du sdug bsngal myong bas gsod pa lta bur brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus sdug bsngal gsum gyis gtses te/_
[\[199b.5\]]gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid dang /_'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid dang /_sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis te sdug bsngal gyi snod yin par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus phung po lnga mngon par grub pas sdug bsngal gyi gong bu 
[\[199b.6\]]yin par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus rkyen tha dad pa las byung bas bdag med pa dang /_bdag po med par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus skyes pa dang /_bud med dang bral bas srog med par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus phung 
[\[199b.7\]]po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams kyis stong par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus rmi lam lta bu ste/_gsog tu brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus sgyu ma lta bu ste/_yang dag pa ma yin par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]smig rgyu lta bu ste/_'khrul par byed par brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus brag ca lta bu ste/_slu bar brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpas lus mig yor lta bu ste/_slu ba'i bdag nyid du brtag par bya ste/_khyim bdag rnams byang chub 
[\[200a.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag gis lus la brtag par bya'o/_/de ltar rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus la lus su 'dun pa dang /_lus la dga' ba dang /_lus bdag gir byed pa dang /_lus la sred 
[\[200a.3\]]pa dang /_lus la gnas pa dang /_lus la zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ngo /_/srog la srog tu 'dun pa dang /_srog la dga' ba dang /_srog bdag gir byed pa dang /_srog la sred pa dang /_srog la gnas pa dang /_srog la zhen pa gang yin pa dang /_de 
[\[200a.4\]]bzhin du nor dang /_'bru dang /_khyim dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams dang /_yo byad thams 
[\[200a.5\]]cad kyi bar dag la 'dun pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_bdag gir byed pa dang /_sred pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_zhen pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad spong ste/_de lus dang srog la mi lta'o/_/de bzhin du nor dang /_'bru dang /_khyim dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_
[\[200a.6\]]bu mo dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bgo ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_mal cha dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams la mi lta bar pha rol tu phyin pa drug myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/khyim bdag rnams 
[\[200a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus rgya cher yongs su bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mi nyid shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed pa la/_/lus kyi phyir ni sdig pa ma byed cig_/'di ni dur khrod pa ste ce spyang zas/_/lus kyi phyir ni ya ngar ma 'jug cig_/g.yo ldan lus la sred pa bskyed nas ni/_/byis pa rtag tu rnam par rmongs te 'khyam/_/
[\[200b.2\]]lus 'di byas pa mi gzo dngos yin pas/_/nyin dang mtshan du sdug bsngal tshor ba myong /_/rtag tu nad 'dra sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor te/_/lus 'di ngan skyugs rnams dang mchil mas gang /_/bkres dang skom pas rtag tu mngon par gtses/_/mkhas pa su zhig lus 
[\[200b.3\]]la sred pa skyed/_/lus ni sa gting 'dra ste chog mi shes/_/gshed ma mi mdza' 'dra yang byis pas gso/_/lus kyi ched du sdig pa'i las kyang byed/_/de phyir de dag sdug bsngal tshor ba myong /_/lus 'di rdo rje lta bur sra ma yin/_/lus kyi ched du sdig pa ma byed cig_/
[\[200b.4\]]'chi bar rtogs nas bsod nams myur du byos/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas bstan la dad pa skyed/_/zas dang skom dang byug pa gos rnams kyis/_/lus 'di ji srid yun ring bsnyen bkur te/_/brtan par byas kyang 'jig par 'gyur yin na/_/'di la 'bad pa don med ci 
[\[200b.5\]]phyir bya/_/bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu rnyed dka' ba/_/thub pa'i 'byung 'di khyed kyis rnyed pa la/_/sangs rgyas bstan la de bzhin dad pa skyed/_/shin tu 'jigs pa'i ngan 'gror ma 'gro shig_/lo stong bye bar su zhig 'tsho gyur pa/_/des kyang chags pa yongs su spang bya na/_/
[\[200b.6\]]su zhig lo brgya thub par mi 'gyur ba/_/de phyir dga' ba mi rnyed smos ci dgos/_/ma bsdams mi rnams kha cig 'di skad du/_/mir rnyed shin tu dka' ba rnyed pa la/_/gzhon tshe rtsed mo dag dang dga' bya zhing /_/nor btsal bde ba myong bar bya zhes zer/_/nor tshol ba la bde ba ga 
[\[200b.7\]]la yod/_/bsrung ba'i phyir yang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_/de phyir mkhas pas chags pa yongs spangs la/_/ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes thob par byos/_/longs spyod sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs/_/'di dag byis pa'i skye bo 'drid pa yin/_/skad cig 'byung zhing 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]skad cig 'jig par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa su zhig longs spyod sred pa skyed/_/sgyu ma 'dra zhing gar mkhan lta dang mtshungs/_/dri za'i grong khyer sna tshogs ci 'dra ba/_/longs spyod de dag 'di 'dra byis pa 'drid/_/de ltar log pa tshol zhing byis pa 'khyam/_/sdug 
[\[201a.2\]]bsngal brgya yis longs spyod btsal btsal ba/_/lus la gnod pa mtshungs med bskyed byas nas/_/rgyal po'i mthu yis de dag phrogs gyur pa/_/de dag la ni mkhas gang dga' ba skyed/_/bu dang chung ma'i dbang du mi 'gyur bar/_/rgyal pos nyes pa byung ba'i nor phrogs pa/_/
[\[201a.3\]]nyes pa de dag 'di 'dra rig nas su/_/mkhas pa rnams ni khyim la sred mi skyed/_/rtag tu brnab cing longs spyod tshol byed pa/_/de ni pha dang ma la mi gus shing /_/bu dang chung ma rnams la mi byams par/_/de dag rtag tu chags la 'jug par byed/_/bdag gi longs spyod 
[\[201a.4\]]'grib par 'gyur 'ong zhes/_/brnab mo byas gzo nams kyang rnyed mi 'gyur/_/g.yo dang sgyus ni nor rnams tshol byed pa/_/brnab mo dag la mkhas pa yid mi rton/_/sems can brnab mo g.yo ldan 'drid pa nyid/_/yid gzhan sems la tshig gis dga' bar byed/_/yid brtan 
[\[201a.5\]]kyang ni de la yid mi rton/_/'on kyang bu 'drar sdug par ston par byed/_/sems can brnab mo 'jig rten gang rgyu ba/_/sman dang bstan bcos dag la mkhas ston cing /_/smad 'tshong lta bur tshig gis 'drid byed la/_/khong nas mi bde shin tu rtsub pa yin/_/brnab mo dag la mdza' 
[\[201a.6\]]bo nams kyang med/_/nye du med cing snying slebs grogs kyang med/_/'on kyang de dag nor phyir sten par byed/_/skye bo brnab la mkhas pa yid mi rton/_/brnab mo longs spyod ched du bya min byed/_/shin tu mi bzad sems ni kun tu skyed/_/de phyir mkhas pas yang dag rtogs 
[\[201a.7\]]byas la/_/ngan ngon ci yang rung bas chog shes gyis/_/gser dang mu tig nor bu byi ru dang /_/las dges de dag lbu ba las kyang 'byung /_/de dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ma rtogs nas/_/de dag phyir ni 'thab cing rtsod pa byed/_/byams pa zhes bya gang zhig 'dir 'byung ste/_/de 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'byung ba'i tshe/_/sa 'di gser gyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur/_/de yi tshe na de ni ga las 'byung /_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag 'byung ba ste/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'i chos can 'khrul byed rmongs par byed/_/dper na sos ka'i nyi ma gung dus na/_/smig rgyur 
[\[201b.2\]]chur snang 'dod pa de bzhin no/_/bskal pa gcig lon nas ni 'jig rten 'di/_/nam mkha'i rang bzhin nam mkhar 'gyur bar 'ong /_/lhun po dag kyang 'tshig cing rnam par 'jig_/de dag gang nas 'ongs shing gang du 'gro/_/chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing dang rgya mtsho rnams/_/de 
[\[201b.3\]]dag med 'gyur skams 'gyur 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'dod pa gsog ste snying po med/_/mkhas pa su zhig de la dga' bar byed/_/mkhas pa gang dag blo yi stobs ldan pa/_/de dag rtag tu khyim gyi skyon la rtog_/'di la ro myong byed pa su yod na/_/'di dag ci 
[\[201b.4\]]phyir khyim ni spong mi byed/_/'dren ma'i las kyis longs spyod tshol byed cing /_/bu dang de bzhin chung ma gso bar byed/_/shin tu sdug bsngal gyur pa de dus na/_/bu dang chung ma skyabs su 'gyur ma yin/_/ji ltar sna tshogs las byas blangs pa bzhin/_/bu dang chung ma 
[\[201b.5\]]dag kyang 'dor bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid gcig pus sdug bsngal myong bar 'ong /_/de dag de tshe bdag gi skal mi len/_/mya ngan rnams kyis bde phyir de dag blangs/_/'di na de dag sdug bsngal mya ngan 'gyur/_/srid gsum 'jigs pa 'di na bshes kyang med/_/de 
[\[201b.6\]]bzhin bu dang chung ma rtsa lag med/_/pha ma spun dang bu dang chung ma dang /_/bran dang nor dang rtsa lag tshogs kyi rnams/_/shi ba'i gshin phyir de dag 'gro ba med/_/las rnams rjes su 'brang zhing byis pa 'gro/_/las ni rjes su 'brang zhing mi kun 'dong /_/las kyis 
[\[201b.7\]]gnas pa 'jig rten rnam par rgyu/_/skye 'di las kyi bdag nyid rig gyur nas/_/mkhas pa dag ni dge ba'i las rnams byed/_/mnar med song tshe de dag skyabs min pas/_/pha ma spun dang snying sdug bu rnams dang /_/rtsa lag nye du snag gi gnyen mtshams dang /_/de dag 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]ched du mkhas pa sdig mi byed/_/las de yongs su zad pa ma gtogs par/_/rab tu mi bzad 'jigs las mi mi 'grol/_/de phyir sdig pas 'jigs pa'i mi rnams kyis/_/bsgrims te sdig pa yongs su spang bar bya/_/ji ltar las rnams byas pa 
[\[202a.2\]]ma gtogs par/_/gshin rje dang ni gshin rje'i rang rta dang /_/mdza' bshes dag dang rtsa lag tshogs dang spun/_/pha ma bu dang chung ma srung mi byed/_/khyod kyis mi yi lus ni thob gyur la/_/thob nas sdig pa spang ba ma byas pas/_/kye ma da ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad 
[\[202a.3\]]myong /_/'di ni mi dge'i las kyi rnam smin yin/_/las kyi rnam par smin la yid ma ches/_/khyod ni rang gi sems kyis mi dge byas/_/'di la ngas ni ci yang ma lan zhes/_/de la chos rgyal gshin rje de skad smra/_/rang gis las byas rang la rnam par smin/_/rang gi las 
[\[202a.4\]]kyis khyod ni 'dir 'ongs kyis/_/ji ltar sngon chad mi 'dod las byas pa/_/sdug bsngal de ni nyid kyis myong bar gyis/_/de tshe pha ma rang gi chung ma rnams/_/sdug bsngal nyen pa yongs su thar mi byed/_/legs pa'i las byas pas ni grol bar 'gyur/_/de ltar khyim ni 
[\[202a.5\]]yongs su spang bar bya/_/khu sgo dbyug pa ltung gi chad pa rnams/_/su zhig spong 'dod zhi ba don gnyer bas/_/khyim la 'jigs par gyis te spang byos la/_/'jig rten mkhas pa'i bstan la chos spyod cig_/khyim ni rab 'bar sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa/_/sems las byung 
[\[202a.6\]]ba rnams kyis rtag tu 'bar/_/me mur 'obs 'dra 'jigs par byed pa la/_/mkhas pa su zhig de la sred pa skyed/_/khyim gnas bu dang chung ma'i mya ngan byed/_/khyim gnas de bzhin longs spyod mya ngan byed/_/nyes pa 'di dang gzhan yang dpag med de/_/de ltas khyim ni 
[\[202a.7\]]yongs su spang bar bya/_/'dren pa rnams kyi bstan la dga' byed pa/_/ma btab ma rmos bde dang yid bde'i rgyu/_/sdug bsngal mang po'i rtsa ba khyim 'di la/_/blun po dga' yi mkhas pa gzhar mi dga'/_/pags pa chu rgyus sha dang rus pa'i lus/_/'di ni nga yi chung ma 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]'du shes bskyed/_/byis pa rmongs pa 'dod chags skyed par byed/_/bud med sgyu ma lta bur yong ma shes/_/shes rab ldan pas khyim gyi nyes rig nas/_/de phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun spangs te/_/chos la sman gyi 'du shes bzhag byas nas/_/ma chags khyim nas myur du 
[\[202b.2\]]'byung bar byed/_/de nas khyim bdag dpas byin dang /_khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de dag bzod pa thob nas mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu bar gyur te de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[202b.3\]]gsol to/_/sangs rgyas chos la 'dod gyur nas/_/gang dag gis ni sems bskyed pa/_/kye ma rnyed pa rnyed pa che/_/'di ni rnyed pa kun gyi mchog_/byang chub sems ni dga' ba ste/_/sems can thams cad bde bgyid pa'i/_/sems 'dir su dag dga' skyed pa/_/de 
[\[202b.4\]]dag 'tsho ba legs par 'tsho/_/sems can kun la phan bgyid pa'i/_/sems 'di gang dag bskyed gyur pa/_/de dag sems can thams cad dga'/_/de dag mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems la su dga' ba/_/de dag lus ni gser 'dra zhing /_/mtshan 
[\[202b.5\]]gyis shin tu spras pa dang /_/'jig rten snang bar byed par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems ni sems che ste/_/sems kun nang na dge ba mchog_/yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs/_/nad kun rab tu zhi bar bgyid/_/sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams/_/byang chub 
[\[202b.6\]]sems ni 'dod mi bgyid/_/'khor ba la ni mi rtog pa/_/byang chub sems kyis skyo bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang /_/de la gal te gzugs mchis na/_/nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/_/de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur/_/gang gA'i bye ma'i 
[\[202b.7\]]grangs snyed kyi/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams mi gang gis/_/rin chen dag gis rab bkang ste/_/'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/_/gang gis thal mo sbyar bgyis te/_/byang chub tu ni sems btud na/_/mchod pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags/_/de la mtha' ni ma mchis 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]so/_/byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba/_/drang srong mchog gis bstan mdzad pa'i/_/de 'dra'i mchod pa gzhan ma mchis/_/dpal yang gzhan ni mchis ma lags/_/sman gyi dam pa nad ma mchis/_/byang chub sems ni yon tan ldan/_/nad kun 
[\[203a.2\]]rab tu zhi bar bgyid/_/sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid/_/me gsum dag gis gdungs pa yi/_/sems can sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/_/bskal pa dpag tu med par spyod/_/mkhas rnams skyo bar yang mi 'gyur/_/gang dag byang chub spyad spyod pa/_/dpa' 
[\[203a.3\]]bo sman pa'i rgyal po 'dra/_/de dag sems can sdug bsngal skyob/_/skyo ba rtag tu rnam par spangs/_/dpa' bo sangs rgyas chos 'tshal ba/_/'gro ba'i skye ba thams cad du/_/sems de 'dor bar mi bgyid cing /_/de dag brtul zhugs de yang ston/_/sems 'di 
[\[203a.4\]]la ni gang dga' ba/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/sangs rgyas ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur/_/bdag cag rnyed pa legs par rnyed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa na sangs 
[\[203a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma byung ba 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /[ (]leb rgan [,]le brgan [)]dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag 
[\[203a.6\]]ste/_'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste nyi zla rnams kyi gzi brjid zad par byas nas slar log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[203a.7\]]dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyu ma mchis/_rkyen ma mchis par ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang 
[\[203b.2\]]gsol to/_/rgyu ma mchis par rnam 'dren rgyal ba mchog_/sangs rgyas skyob pa 'dzum pa mi ston na/_/ci slad bcom ldan khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa/_/'jig rten phan dgongs thugs brtse bdag la gsungs/_/khyod kyis ci slad de ring 'dzum bstan gsungs/_/
[\[203b.3\]]bka' mchid che ldan nor mchog sbyin mdzad pa/_/dbul por gyur pa nor dang ldan par mdzod/_/'jig rten ldongs la myur du mig kyang stsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod 
[\[203b.4\]]kyis gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du lhags pa'i khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/
[\[203b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/_kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di dag thams cad ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[203b.6\]]ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dag ste/_khyim bdag 'di dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas nam du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing phyis kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong nas mthar gyis de bzhin 
[\[203b.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed de bsti stang byed par 'gyur/_btsun par byed par 'gyur/_rim gro byed par 'gyur/_mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed de bsti stang byed par 'gyur/_btsun par byed par 'gyur/_rim gro byed par 'gyur/_mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyang nyan 
[\[204a.2\]]par 'gyur te/_thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/_kun chub par byed par 'gyur/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shu rtsa lnga na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[204a.3\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar mtshan 'thun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[204a.4\]]kye ma chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'di ltar rgya che ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i 
[\[204a.5\]]phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/dpas byin gyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_
[\[204a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_khyim bdag lnga brgya tsam de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dkon mchog 
[\[204a.7\]]brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las khyim bdag dpas byin gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//[{D73}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu dgu pa ste bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa/_bam po gcig pa/_
[\[204b.2\]]rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya u da ya na bad sa rA dza pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma pa ri brta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[204b.3\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das kau sham+bI na/_dbyangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe na ma du'i bu mo btsun mo dpe 
[\[204b.4\]]med phrag dog dang /_ser snas zin pas btsun mo sngo sangs can la lhag par dmigs nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_btsun mo sngo sangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya ni dge sbyong gau ta ma dang lhan cig tu rab tu skyon chags par bgyid 
[\[204b.5\]]de/_de'i slad du bdag gis lha la gsol ba lags kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa de bzhin du mdzad du gsol zhes [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig gis dbyen byas par gyur to/_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed ma du'i bu mo btsun mo dpe med kyis dbyen byas pas bcom ldan 'das dang /_nyan 
[\[204b.6\]]thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la tha ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_khro ba skyes par gyur to/_/de yi ma rangs shing khro ba dang /_rngam pas zil gyis non pas btsun mo sngo sangs can gsad pa'i phyir gzhu bdungs nas mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma blangs te 'phangs so/_/de nas de'i mod la 
[\[204b.7\]]btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas shing bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa brjod nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma de de nas phyir log ste/_bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed de nyid kyi mgo'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu mched de 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur te phar 'gro tshur 
[\[205a.2\]]'gro zhing 'dug 'dug nas/_bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed ga la ba der song nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyi g.yon rol logs su 'dug par gyur te/_de lus la ni ma phog go_/lan gnyis lan gsum du de ltar gyur pa dang /_de nas btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis bad sa'i 
[\[205a.3\]]rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po de lta lags pas gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal na khyod la yang bde legs su 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed 'jigs shing dngangs la sgyid lug cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur te 
[\[205a.4\]]sa la 'gyel nas btsun mo sngo sangs can la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod ni lha mo 'am dri za mo/_/sha za mo 'am srin mo'am/_/ngas ni ji ltar gzung bar bya/_/nga yis dris pa de smros shig_/gang la mtshon gyis mi gnod pa'i/_/bud med 'ga' yang yod min te/_/ngas 
[\[205a.5\]]ni 'di la gang du yang /_/thos sam mthong ngam shes pa'ang med/_/nga ni stobs ldan brtson 'grus can/_/'phong gi shes pa legs bslabs pas/_/nga yi mda' ni gdon mi za/_/nam yang mi phog yod min te/_/spre'u 'am yang na bya dang ni/_/mi'am yang na 'bem kyang rung /_/
[\[205a.6\]]gang la nga yis mda' 'phangs pa/_/nam yang mi phog yod min na/_/de ring mda' 'di 'phangs pa ni/_/bzlog pa'i tshul du phyir 'ongs te/_/lus la gnod pa med par ni/_/nga yi mdun du 'dug par 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi tshig ni mnyan nas kyang /_/nga ni khyod la gsod 'dod pa/_/
[\[205a.7\]]nga ni khyod la skyabs su 'gro/_/sdug bsngal gyur pa nga la skyobs/_/phyin cad 'di 'dra mi byed kyis/_/sdug bsngal ba la deng bzod kyis/_/khyod sngon dga' ba dran byos la/_/dang bar gyis shig khro thul cig_/de nas btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/bdag ni lha min dri za min/_/sha za mo min srin mo min/_/bdag ni btsun mo sngo sangs can/_/'jig rten mgon po'i nyan thos ma/_/lha khyod la ni snying brtse bas/_/bdag gi sems ni mnyam bzhag gis/_/khyab bdag 'jig rten 
[\[205b.2\]]mgon po la/_/thugs ni rab tu dang bar mdzod/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/gang gis byams pa legs bsgoms te/_/byams la gnas pa'i skyes bu dang /_/bud med dag ni mi sod gsungs/_/gang zhig lo tog smin pa la/_/ser ltar yang dag ji bzhin 
[\[205b.3\]]mkhyen/_/bud med rnams kyis gnod med pa/_/de yi bstan la bdag dga' lags/_/'jig rten mgon po thams cad kyis/_/bud med rnams ni smad par gsungs/_/bud med rnams la mi lta ba/_/'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsngags/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[205b.4\]]rnams dang rang sangs rgyas/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos rnams/_/bud med bsten par mi mdzad de/_/de ni byis pa'i spyod yul lags/_/bud med rnams la bsten pa ni/_/kun nas bdud kyi zhags par gsungs/_/sdig pa rnams la chags pa ni/_/kun 
[\[205b.5\]]'joms dkrugs pa'i shul dang 'dra/_/mi mkhas bud med chags pa dang /_/sdig pa'i las ni bgyis pa dang /_/ye shes spong bar 'tshal ba yis/_/sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror khrid/_/mkhas pa thar bar 'tshal ba yis/_/bud med bsten par mi bgyi ste/_/
[\[205b.6\]]zhugs gtams ngu ba ma mchis pa'i/_/dong du mchongs pa mi dngo lags/_/yid 'ong bka' mchid bgyis pa dang /_/bltas pas kyang ni 'ching bgyid cing /_/mi bzad dmyal bar ltung bas na/_/khyod ni bud med tshig ma gsan/_/bdag ni khro ba ma mchis te/_/
[\[205b.7\]]bdag gi yid ni rab tu dang /_/khyab bdag 'jig rten mgon po la/_/thugs ni rab tu dang bar mdzod/_/rgyal po chen po bzhud mdzod de/_/khyod kyis rkang gnyis mchog gzigs la/_/de yis chos ni gang bstan pa/_/g.yel ma mchis par khyod kyis gson/_/de nas 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed btsun mo sngo sangs can gyis bskul bas rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /_rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_skye bo'i tshogs phal po ches yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas brtad cing myur ba myur bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[206a.2\]]sngar song ba dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/_dang bar 'gyur ba/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs zhi ba/_dul ba dang /_zhi gnas kyi mchog dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/_bsam gtan dam pa rnams kyi pha rol du gshegs pa/_gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 
[\[206a.3\]]'phags pa/_dpal gyis mdzes shing /_lham me lhan ne lhang nge ste/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis 
[\[206a.4\]]yongs su bskor ba/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas pa mthong bar gyur to/_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[206a.5\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon ma mthong ba'i rmad du byung ba zhig mthong ba bcom ldan 'das la gsol bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 
[\[206a.6\]]la skabs dbye bar ci gnang /_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar smros shig_/zlos shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed 
[\[206a.7\]]kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang /_'dod pa'i gzhi dang /_'dod pa la lhag par zhen pas deng ma du'i bu mo dpe med kyi tshig gis khros shing rngam pas zil gyis non nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la tha ba dang zhe sdang gi 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]sems kyang bskyed/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang sngo sangs can dgum pa'i slad du mda' ste'u ka nya rnga ma zhig 'phangs na/_de bar snang la 'bar/_rab tu 'bar/_kun tu rab tu mched de 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur nas bzlog pa'i tshul du slar log ste bdag gi 
[\[206b.2\]]g.yon rol logs su mchis par gyur cing lus la ni ma phog nas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mchis brang sngo sangs can gyi sug pa rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/_mchis brang sngo sangs can la 'di skad du khyod lha mo zhig gam/_'on te klu mo'am/_dri za mo'am/_sha 
[\[206b.3\]]za mo'am/_srin mo'am/_su zhig lags zhes bgyis pa dang /_de bdag la 'di skad du rgyal po chen po bdag ni lha mo yang ma lags/_klu mo yang ma lags/_dri za mo yang ma lags/_sha za mo yang ma lags/_srin mo yang ma lags kyi/_bdag ni bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[206b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos ma lags te/_khyod nyid la snying brtse ba'i slad du sems mnyam par bzhag pa lags so zhes mchi nas/_de nas mchis brang sngo sangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa rnam grangs 
[\[206b.5\]]du mas brjod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i nyan thos ma 'di yang de lta bu'i snying rje'i bsam pa dang /_de lta bu'i byams pa thob pa dang /_de ltar rdzu 'phrul 
[\[206b.6\]]che ba dang /_de ltar mthu che ba dang /_de ltar dbang che bar grags pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam du sems par gyur lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di ltar byis 
[\[206b.7\]]pa lta bu dang /_'di ltar rmongs pa dang /_'di ltar mi gsal ba dang /_'di ltar mi mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bdag gis tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pa de bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol zhing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]mdun du yang nongs pa 'chags shing mchis na/_thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis nongs pa nongs par bshags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par rjes su gzung bar gsol/_deng slan chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[207a.2\]]'das kyis rgyal po chen po khyod longs la rang gi stan gang yin pa la 'dug shig ces bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis nyes pa bshags pa rjes su gzung bar gnang ngo /_/de nas bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[207a.3\]]te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni gtum zhing gzu lums che la drag shul can lags pas bdag gis bud med kyi tshig gis sdig pa'i 
[\[207a.4\]]sug las mngon par 'dus bgyis pa des bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar bdag gis yang dag par 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du ci nas kyang bdag slan chad bud med kyi dbang du mchis nas sdig pa'i sug 
[\[207a.5\]]las mngon par 'du bgyid par mi 'gyur zhing /_sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ba dang /_bdag dang sems can thams cad la yun ring po'i don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med kyi skyon de dag legs par yang dag par rab tu 
[\[207a.6\]]bshad cing bud med kyi spyod pa rnams dang /_bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang /_bud med kyi sgyu rnams dang /_bud med kyi g.yo rnams dang /_bud med kyi gya gyu rnams dang /_bud med kyi mi brtan pa rnams dang /_bud med kyi 'gyur ldog rnams dang /_bud med kyi sten 
[\[207a.7\]]pa rnams dang /_bud med kyi tshig rnams dang /_bud med kyi 'khrul pa rnams yang dag par rab tu bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po gnas de lta bu 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]yongs su zhus pas khyod la ci zhig bya/_bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bud med kyi dbang du mchis par gyur na bud med ni ma rungs ma/_'khon can/_gtum mo drag shul 
[\[207b.2\]]can lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bud med de ni bdag sems can dmyal bar mchi bar bgyid 'tshal ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das las bdag don de nyid nyan par 'tshal lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char 
[\[207b.3\]]byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis je rang gi skyon rnams yongs su rtogs shig dang /_de nas phyis bud med kyi skyon rnams yongs su rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char 
[\[207b.4\]]byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/_/skyes pa skyon ji lta bu dag dang ldan na skyes pa bud med kyi dbang du mchi bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyon rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la yang dag par rab tu bshad du gsol/_
[\[207b.5\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis bcom 
[\[207b.6\]]ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po skyes pa skyon gang dag dang ldan na skyes pa bud med kyi dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon ni bzhi 
[\[207b.7\]]po 'di dag yin no/_/bzhi po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyal po chen po 'di la skyes pa 'dod pa rnams la chags par gyur cing /_de 'dod pa rnams la bag med par gyur nas phyir zhing bud med la lta 'dod de/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_shes 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la lta bar mi 'dod cing /_des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag mthong na snyen par mi byed/_sten par mi byed/_bsnyen bkur mi byed pas 
[\[208a.2\]]de tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_shes rab dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis yongs su spangs pas dad pa las yongs su nyams/_tshul khrims las yongs su nyams/_gtong ba las yongs su nyams/_shes rab las yongs su nyams 
[\[208a.3\]]shing dad pa dang bral ba/_tshul khrims 'chal ba/_thos pa nyung ba/_ser sna can du gyur pa/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yon tan gyi chos la kun tu spyod pa/_shes rab 'chal ba/_rma la chags pa/_btsog pa'i spyod yul can/_bshul bar mnam pa la mngon par dga' 
[\[208a.4\]]ba/_mi gtsang ba la dga' ba/_bud med la dad che ba/_zhi ba yongs su mi tshol ba chags pa'i spyod yul can/_'gro bar bya ba ma yin par song ba/_smad par 'os pa/_mi gtsang ba'i srin bu dang 'dra ba/_snyigs ma len pa/_'dod pa la brkam pa/_khrel 
[\[208a.5\]]dang ngo tsha bor ba/_lha dang mi'i chos las nyams pa/_ngan par smad pa'i 'tsho bas 'tsho ba/_mkhas pas smad pa/_byis pa'i skye bo la sten pa/_sdig pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/_sdig pa'i grogs po la sten pa/_sdig pa la kun tu 'jug pa/_sdig pa la gzhol 
[\[208a.6\]]ba/_bud med kyi thul 'og tu chud pa/_bud med kyis 'khol ba/_bud med kyi dbang du song ba/_bud med la gzhol ba/_bud med dang gnas pa/_rma'i sgo'i spyod yul can/_rma'i sgo la rten pa/_rma'i sgo la gnas pa/_kha chu dang /_snabs dang /_mchil ma 
[\[208a.7\]]dang /_ngar snabs dang /_rnag dang /_she'u rul dang /_glad rgyas dang /_mi gtsang ba'i spyod yul can/_lug dang /_ba lang dang /_bya gag dang /_khyi dang /_phag pa dang /_wa dang /_bong bu'i chos spyod pa/_gnod pas 'tsho ba/_pha ma la phangs par mi 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]'dzin pa/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_sbyin gnas la phangs par mi 'dzin pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dad pa yongs su nyams pa/_mya ngan las 'da' ba la yongs su nyams pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_
[\[208b.2\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten la zhugs shing gzhol ba/_seng ge dang /_nam mkha' lding gi lus la yang dag par zhugs pa/_lcags kyi shing shal ma li mthon po dang /_me ma mur la gzhol ba/_sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /_thig nag dang /_bsdus 'jom dang /_
[\[208b.3\]]ngu 'bod dang /_ngu 'bod chen po dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por zhugs pa ni bud med kyi skyon 'di lta bu 'di dag thos kyang bud med la chags shing bud med dang sten pas bgad pa dang /_ngus pa dang /_ca co 'don 'dod
