[\[208b.4\]]pa dang /_bro brdungs pa dang /_glu blangs pa dang /_rol mo byas pa dag rjes su dran par byed cing skyo ba mi skyed yid byung bar mi byed de/_rgyal po chen po byis pa'i chos la kun tu spyod cing kun tu spyod pa de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa ni ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_
[\[208b.5\]]rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa la rten cing /_ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon dang po yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'dod pa dri nga mi gtsang smad par 'os pa 
[\[208b.6\]]dang /_/mi mthun 'jigs byed mi rtag las byung sdug bsngal byed/_/don med phung bar byed cing dman pa yin pas na/_/mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la sten par byed/_/btsog pas gang ba'i chab khung dri nga lta bu dang /_/mnam par gyur cing rul pa'i khyim 
[\[208b.7\]]rnams ji bzhin dang /_/shi ba dur khrod sa na shin tu smad pa ltar/_/de bzhin 'dod pa rnams kyang mchog tu smad pa yin/_/sbrang bu rma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang /_/phag ni ngan skyugs mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang /_/khyi ni sha yi don du shen sar 'gro ba ltar/_/de 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]bzhin mi mkhas bud med dag la dga' bar byed/_/grags pa med cing mi snyan yon tan 'bri ba dang /_/de las tshul khrims dam pa nyams par 'gyur ba dang /_/mtho ris nyams shing dmyal ba dag tu ltung bas na/_/mkhas pa su zhig 'dod pa'i skom la rten par 
[\[209a.2\]]byed/_/ji ltar ha la ha la'i dug ni zos pa na/_/lus dag rmya zhing rmongs pa skye ba 'gyur ba ltar/_/de bzhin 'di na byis pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i rgyus/_/rang gi lus kyi dbyibs ni dug tu mi rig go_/ji ltar sgyu ma shin tu bslab pa'i mi zhig gis/_/rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 
[\[209a.3\]]brgya dag dga' byed ltar/_/de bzhin byis pa bdag la bde bar 'dod pa rnams/_/'dod la dga' ba'i rgyu las ngan 'gror rab tu ltung /_/zas skom ston mo bzang po tha dad pa dag dang /_/glu bro sil snyan bzang po tha dad pa dag gis/_/khang pa mchog nas byung ba'i chung ma len pa 
[\[209a.4\]]ni/_/gnod pa rnyed pa yin zhing sdug bsngal sogs pa yin/_/'dod pa'i dga' la brkam pa dag ni gnod yin te/_/mi gtsang mtshon 'dra rmongs gyur dag la bsngags pa rjod/_/'dod pa dman pa dag la bsngags shing bsten pas ni/_/dman pa de dag ngan 'gror rab tu ltung 
[\[209a.5\]]bar 'gyur/_/gnod pa 'dod pa dag gis yul rnams rab bsngags shing /_/'dod pa gnod pa yid la dga' ba'i byis pa rnams/_/de dag don med 'tsho ba rnam par spangs nas ni/_/mi bzad g.yang sa chen por rab tu ltung bar 'gyur/_/nga rgyal rmongs pas bcom pa'i skyes bu 
[\[209a.6\]]'di dag ni/_/rgya mtsho'i pha rol ma mthong ba yi bya bzhin du/_/lcags kyi me lce lnga po dag la chags gyur na/_/byis pa rnams ni rab tu 'bar zhing 'khyam par 'gyur/_/'di ni byis pa myos shing shin tu rmongs pa rnams/_/shel du mi mthong snod mchog yin par sems pa 
[\[209a.7\]]ltar/_/lam la rnam par rmongs rnams 'dod pa'i ched kyi phyir/_/rtag tu 'dir gnas 'di ni gya nom yin zhes 'dzer/_/gang phyir rnam pa sna tshogs las dag mi shes pas/_/'gro ba thams cad rab nyams gus pa yod min pas/_/pha dang ma dang bu dang bu mo dag la ni/_/don 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]gyis mchod pa mi byed gnod pa thob pa yin/_/de dag rtag tu bud med 'dris pa rjod byed cing /_/de 'dra'i las kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug par byed/_/de dag gti mug dra ba sdig pa rab sogs shing /_/ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam yang sogs par byed/_/mi rnams de dag der 
[\[209b.2\]]chags bde bar 'du shes shing /_/pha dang ma yang yongs su rab tu spong bar byed/_/de dag mchod 'os rnams la mchod pa mi byed cing /_/smad par 'os pa'i 'dod pa dag la sten par byed/_/phan tshun gdungs par 'gyur ba la ni gzhol byed cing /_/rnam rtog mu yis nges bcom 
[\[209b.3\]]mi rnams nyon mongs pa/_/bkur sti yongs su tshol la dga' zhing ma 'phags rnams/_/chos ma yin par 'jig rten rab tu 'dzud par byed/_/gzhi de las ni mtshon cha dag dang lcags rnams dang /_/de bzhin bcing ba dang ni 'thab cing rtsod pa dang /_/nges par 'chi ba'i sdug 
[\[209b.4\]]bsngal rab tu myong bar 'gyur/_/shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'jigs su rung bar 'gro/_/tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin sdug bsngal 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/nor nyams snying du sdug pa rab tu 'jig 'gyur la/_/mtho ris nyams shing dmyal bar rab tu ltung bas na/_/mkhas pa su zhig 'dod 
[\[209b.5\]]pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed/_/lcags las grub pa'i nags tshal sngon po'i khrod dag tu/_/mkhas pas bdag nyid rab tu bor ba de bla zhing /_/mdzangs pa spu gri'i so yis bcad pa byas bla la/_/ral gri dag gi khrod du mal yang bcas sla zhing /_/rab tu me 'bar thu lum bzung 
[\[209b.6\]]ba de sla la/_/de bzhin lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba za sla zhing /_/me dong 'jigs su rung ba rnams la reg sla yi/_/lag pa gnyis kyis nam yang bud med reg mi bya/_/mis ni ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa rnam sten pa/_/de lta de ltar bde ba thams cad rab spong zhing /_/'di ltar 'dod 
[\[209b.7\]]rnams gcig tu sdug bsngal mi gtsang bas/_/'dod pa sdug bsngal mi gtsang ba dag rnam par spongs/_/'dod pa sdug bsngal kun gyi gzhi bor gyur pa dang /_/gang phyir nor ni chud zad 'gyur bar byed pa dang /_/yid 'ong skye bo rnams kyi nyams pa'i rtsa ba bas/_/bud med nges par sten 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]pa gnod pa thob pa yin/_/skyes bu gang gis de 'dra'i chos tshul rig nas ni/_/bud med rnams la rab tu bag med mi 'gyur ba/_/des ni rtag tu mtho ris lam yang rnam sbyangs shing /_/des ni byang chub dam pa rnyed par dka' ma yin/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang 
[\[210a.2\]]mi'i pha ma dag ni dka' ba byed pa dag yin te/_zla ba dgu 'am zla ba bcur mngal na bzung ste shin tu sdug bsngal bar gsos shing /_gcin dang phyi sa yang 'phyi bar byed/_pang du blangs nas nu zho ldud par byed/_phung po rnams skyed par byed/_khams rnams gso bar byed/_'jig 
[\[210a.3\]]rten ston par byed/_'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston par byed/_don du 'dod/_phan par 'dod/_grub pa dang bde bar 'dod/_'jig rten la yang phan par 'dod pa ste/_sbyin pa'i gnas yin la/_bu la phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pas de dag gis rang gi nor gyi tshogs kyis 
[\[210a.4\]]gzhan gyi khyim nas gzhan gyi bu mo blangs pa dang /_de de la chags shing myos la 'chums shing brgyal ba dang /_lhag par zhen pa dang /_lhag par zhen cing 'dug par gyur nas/_gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med de la chags shing myos pas sbyin pa'i gnas pha ma rgas 
[\[210a.5\]]'khogs pa/_gtugs la lus nyam chung zhing mig mi mthong ba dag la brnyas shing longs spyod med pa dang /_nor med par byas nas rang gi khyim nas phyung ste skrod par byed do/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar pha ma dga' ba byed byed pa sbyin pa'i gnas la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yang dag pa'i 
[\[210a.6\]]bde bas bsti stang du bya/_bla mar bya/_brjed par bya/_mchod par bya ba'i rigs na/_des de'i tshe pha ma dag rang gi khyim nas phyung ste bskrad nas gzhan gyi khyim nas blangs pa'i bud med la bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gos rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing bsti stang du byed/_
[\[210a.7\]]gces su byed/_rim gro byed la mchod pa byed cing yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed kyi pha ma la ni mi byed pa'i mi snying brtse ba med pa dang /_mi lta ba dang /_ngan pa'i sems dang ldan pa la ltos/_rgyal po chen po des bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni spangs la/_
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]ngan [(]'grong [,]'gror [)]'gro ba'i chos gang yin pa de ni yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa'i mi de la yang ltos/_rgyal po chen po bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa rnams la sten cing pha ma la brnyas pa dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gnyis pa yin no/_/de 
[\[210b.2\]]nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/_/de dag rtag tu bde zhing yid kyang bde 'gyur la/_/'di la lha dang bcas pa dang ni dbang po dang /_/de bzhin 'di la tshangs par bcas pa'i rigs su 
[\[210b.3\]]'gyur/_/gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/_/de dag song na phyir 'ong ba yang 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/rgya mtsho chen po nas kyang bde zhing legs 'ong ste/_/de ltar byed pa dag ni rab mchog rnyed pa yin/_/gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa yi/_/tshong pa de dag yon 
[\[210b.4\]]tan kun gyi gtsor 'gyur zhing /_/de bzhin zhing las 'bras bu phun sum tshogs 'byung ste/_/bsod nams bgrang ba'i don du brjod par mi nus so/_/gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/_/de dag khur rnams khyer ba'i rnga mo rnams dang yang /_/yang na glang dang bong bu 
[\[210b.5\]]dag tu'ang mi 'gyur te/_/mi rnams de dag spu gri'i so la rdzi mi 'gyur/_/gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/_/de dag chu bo rab med dang ni me mur dang /_/spu gri'i so dang ldan pa la yang [(]me [,]mi [)]rgal te/_/de dag zangs khu bskol ba 'thungs par yong mi 'gyur/_/gang 
[\[210b.6\]]dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/_/de dag nor dang 'bru ni mi nyung ba dag dang /_/chung ma dang ni bu dang bu mo dag dang yang /_/bai dUr+ya dang rin chen sa le sbram yang rnyed/_/gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni/_/de dag rab 'phrul lha'i pho brang dag dang ni/_/rtsub 
[\[210b.7\]]'gyur dang ni 'dres pa'i tshal yang mthong 'gyur te/_/lha rnams du mas rtag tu mdun du bdar bar 'gyur/_/mi yi gtso bor gyur cing lha yi lhar gyur pa/_/thub pa chen po 'di 'dra'i gsung ni thos gyur na/_/rgas shing dbang po shin tu nyam chung gyur pa yi/_/pha ma sbyin 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]gnas dam pa su zhig gso mi byed/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i las byed cing log par lta ba la mngon par zhen pa yin te/_de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba gang yin zhes bdag gi don mi shes shing mi brtan 
[\[211a.2\]]pa yin pas skye bo mang po rnams mi dga' zhing byis pa'i skye bos bsngags pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dag gis rmongs par gyur pa dang /_skyes bu mdzangs pa dag gis smad pa dang /_khro bas zil gyis non cing sdig pa'i las byed pa dang /_sangs 
[\[211a.3\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang /_longs spyod kyi rgyags pas myos pa dang /_ser sna can du gyur pa dang /_gzhan la gnod par mngon par dga' zhing chos sgom par mi dga' ba yin te/_rgyal po chen po skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa skyes bu 
[\[211a.4\]]dam pa ma yin pa'i las la mngon par dga' zhing skyes bu dam pa'i las la mi dga' ba de la ltos/_rgyal po chen po 'dod pa rnams la sten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyes bu'i skyon gsum pa yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[211a.5\]]dag bka' stsal to/_/'dod pa rnams kyi gzhis ni skyes bu rnam nyams shing /_/gzhi de las ni sdig pa dag kyang rab tu byed/_/log par lta bas rmongs nas 'dir ni 'khyam 'gyur zhing /_/de ni rnam par 'khrul pas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/log dang ldan pas yon tan 
[\[211a.6\]]kun gyis rnam spangs shing /_/de ni rtog pa med cing blo yang nor pa yin/_/gang dag chu klung dag tu ud pal rtswa tshol ltar/_/log par lta bas yongs su 'khor bar byed pa yin/_/bde ba'i don du bdag nyid yongs su skyong byed cing /_/chos ma yin la chags pa'i 
[\[211a.7\]]mi rnams mang po dag_/de bzhin bde ba'i rgyu phyir 'dod pa rnams tshol ba/_/de dag gti mug rmongs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/gang dag 'dod pa rnams kyi don du rtag tu ni/_/de bzhin sems la gcags pa'i skyes bu tha ma dang /_/'dod pa'i bdag nyid can dang skye 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]bo sdig can dang /_/'du shes log pa dag la bde ba ga la yod/_/mi rnams de dag byas pa mi gzo sdig bcas shing /_/dad pa rnam nyams tshul 'chos gus pa med pa dang /_/'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rtag tu rnam par spangs pas na/_/dmyal ba bzod brlag shin tu 
[\[211b.2\]]'jigs su rung bar ltung /_/gzugs dang sgra dang ro la chags pa'i mi rnams ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mkhas pa mi mchod cing /_/log par lta bas chos kyang nyan par mi byed la/_/lan 'ga' 'ang dge 'dun legs par mchod par mi byed pas/_/'phags pa 
[\[211b.3\]]rnams kyis rnam spangs ngan song ltung bas na/_/de phyir mi'i srid pa 'di ni rnyed pa la/_/sbyin dul yang dag sdom la nges par sten cig dang /_/de las byang chub dam pa mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang skyes pa ni bzo'i gnas sna tshogs dang /_las 
[\[211b.4\]]kyi gnas sna tshogs 'di dag gis 'tsho bar byed de/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yi ge'am/_/rtsis sam/_grangs sam/_lag rtsis sam/_mtshon cha'am/_rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho ba'am/_zhing las sam/_tshong byed pa'am/_ba lang 'tsho ba'am/_de lta bu'i bzo'i 
[\[211b.5\]]gnas sna tshogs dang /_las kyi gnas sna tshogs dag gis 'tsho bar byed cing 'di lta ste/_nor gyi phyir lam ma yin par yang 'gro bar byed/_lam ngan par yang 'gro bar byed/_gcong rong dang chu klung can gyi lam du yang 'gro bar byed/_mtshon cha'i lam du yang 'gro bar byed/_
[\[211b.6\]]rgya mtshor 'jug par yang 'jug par byed/_grang ba'i dus na yang lhags pas gnod par byed/_dro ba'i dus na yang tsha bas gnod par byed cing bkres pa dang /_skom pa dag gis gnod bzhin du 'gro ba la yang spro bar byed de/_longs spyod yongs su tshol ba na de lta bu'i sdug bsngal 
[\[211b.7\]]dag gis longs spyod yongs su btsal nas kyang rang gi 'tsho ba dag gi phyir nye bar sgrub par byed pas dge sbyong dang bram ze dag dang /_bkren pa dang /_sdug phongs pa dang /_slong mo ba dag la sbyin pa sbyin par mi bzod cing bud med rnams kyis dbang du byas pa dang /_bud med rnams 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]kyis thul 'og tu chud pa dang /_bud med rnams kyis bskol ba dang /_bud med rnams la byams pa de nyid kyis bud med de dag nyid gso ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims yang dag par len par mi nus shing de de la chags la bud med rnams kyis spyos 
[\[212a.2\]]pa bzod par byed cing bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang /_bltas pa dang /_brgyab pa dag kyang bzod par byed de/_de skyes par gyur kyang bud med kyis bsdigs pa dang du len cing /_mi dga' ba med par de'i ngor lta bar byed pa ni 'dod pa'i gzhis bud med kyi dbang du song ba yin te/_
[\[212a.3\]]rgyal po chen po bud med la sten cing ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa bud med la brkam zhing ngan skyugs kyi sgo la gdu ba dang /_mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang /_shes bzhin med par spyod pa'i skyes bu'i skyon bzhi pa yin te/_rgyal po chen po skyon de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes pa 
[\[212a.4\]]ni 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du 'gro ba yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'dod pa rnams ni tshol ba dang /_/rab tu myos pa ga la bde/_/'dod pa dman pa rnams sten pa/_/de ni gang gis bde bar 'gyur/_/skyes 
[\[212a.5\]]bu dam pa ma yin pa'i/_/las rnams byed cing mi sdom la/_/'dod pa'i 'dod chags tshol byed pa/_/de dag rab nyams chud kyang za/_/mi rnams gang dag mi mkhas pa/_/rnga mo bong bu'i chos spyod cing /_/bud med mthong na rab snyegs pa/_/ngan skyugs gnas la phag 
[\[212a.6\]]rnams bzhin/_/gang la byis pa gus bcas pa'i/_/'dod rnams dri nga mi gtsang yang /_/'dod pa'i skyon rnams mi mthong ba/_/sa yi steng na dmus long bzhin/_/gzugs kyi 'ching bas bcings pa rnams/_/'dod pa'i 'du shes rab tu 'jug_/byis pa 'dod rnams 
[\[212a.7\]]sten pa dag_/khyi dang wa rnams ji bzhin no/_/sgra dri ro dang reg rnams kyis/_/gang la so so'i skye bo rnams/_/byis pa 'khor ba yongs 'khor ba/_/spre'u rnams phur la btags pa bzhin/_/byis pa ma rig khebs pa rnams/_/mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs gyur cing /_
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]bud med rnams la chags pa ni/_/mi gtsang gnas la khwa bzhin no/_/gang gis ngan 'gror rab 'jug pa/_/de ni bdud kyi spyod yul yin/_/ro myang 'du shes chags gyur pa/_/ngan skyugs gnas la srin bu bzhin/_/gsang ba'i gshed ma rnams kyis ni/_/ji ltar mi 
[\[212b.2\]]zhig bor ba ltar/_/shes na thar pa thob 'gyur zhing /_/bud med dbang du 'gro mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa bud med lta byed pa'i/_/kun tu sbyor las 'jigs pa skye/_/byis pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams/_/'dod pa'i sred pa rab tu 'phel/_/sos ka'i dus na mi zhig ni/_/
[\[212b.3\]]dgon pa chen por song gyur nas/_/byis pas lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs na/_/skom pa phyir zhing rab skyed ltar/_/de bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba'i/_/byis pa rmongs pas 'tsho ba rnams/_/'di na phyir zhing bud med la/_/'dod pa'i sred pa brtan par 'gyur/_/ji ltar mi lus 
[\[212b.4\]]mdze can la/_/srog chags rnams ni za ba ltar/_/'dod brkam so so'i skye bo rnams/_/de bzhin bud med rnams kyis zos/_/mi gtsang bum pa khra bo zhig_/kha dog ldan par snang mod kyi/_/nang na ha la ha la'i dug_/drag po chen po yod pa ltar/_/de 
[\[212b.5\]]bzhin bud med brgyan pa dag_/gang dang gang na snang ba yang /_/gcin dang phyi sas gang ba yi/_/rkyal ba rlung gis gang ba bzhin/_/'bru mar gyis ni bdar ba'i mtshon/_/gos kyis dkris pa ji bzhin du/_/de bzhin bud med brgyan pa yang /_/ral gri rling ba 
[\[212b.6\]]g.yogs pa bzhin/_/ji ltar me dong gang gyur la/_/du ba med cing 'bar ldan ltar/_/bud med de bzhin me 'dra zhing /_/srin bu gtum po bzhin du g.yo/_/sreg pa'i bskal pa 'dir byung na/_/sa 'di kun tu 'bar gyur la/_/rtswa dang gel pa 'jig 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[212b.7\]]chu klung dag kyang skams par 'gyur/_/'byung po chen po'i gnas gyur pa/_/rgya mtsho yang ni skam 'gyur zhing /_/ri bo chen po rnams sreg la/_/de bzhin lhun po'ang 'jig par 'gyur/_/rgyal chen 'byung po 'dzin pa yi/_/sa 'di'ang rnam par 'jig 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]brag chen rnams ni 'jig 'gyur yang /_/skyob par byed pa yod ma yin/_/ji ltar me yis rir bcas dang /_/rgya mtshor bcas pa sreg pa ltar/_/de bzhin bud med me 'dra ste/_/gtum zhing skyes bu g.yo bar byed/_/snabs dang mchil ma kha chu 
[\[213a.2\]]dang /_/klad rgyas rul pa'i klad pa dang /_/lus las dri nga 'dzag de la/_/byis pa rnams ni sbrang rtsi bzhin/_/kha sgo rus pas gang ba dang /_/sha dang lpags la sogs bsags shing /_/de bzhin lus ni 'bras 'dra ste/_/dri nga smad par bya ba yin/_/mi gtsang sna 
[\[213a.3\]]tshogs gang ba dang /_/'bras ni smin par gyur pa ltar/_/de ltar lus 'di mi gtsang ba/_/sna tshogs rnams kyi snod yin no/_/lto ni gnye ma mtsher pa dang /_/glo bas gang zhing mkhal ma dang /_/khrag dang mkhris pas gang gyur la/_/klad rgyas kyis ni klad pa gang /_/
[\[213a.4\]]khong pa'i nang na srin bu'i rigs/_/brgyad khri po dag gnas gyur kyang /_/gti mug dra bas bsgribs pa yi/_/byis pa rnams kyis mi mthong ngo /_/rma sgo dgu nas rtag tu ni/_/mi gtsang rul ba zag gyur kyang /_/smra ba dag dang lta ba la/_/byis pa rnams ni mtshan 
[\[213a.5\]]mar 'dzin/_/gang zhig kun gyis smad pa'i yul/_/chags pa rnams kyis phyis mi shes/_/mi gtsang spyod yul byis pa rnams/_/snabs dang mchil ma za bar byed/_/smad par 'os la chags byed pa/_/sbrang bu rnams kyis rma mthong bzhin/_/mchan 
[\[213a.6\]]khung dag nas rdul 'dzag cing /_/smad pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/byis pa sdug bsngal chags byed pa/_/de dag bdag la gnod phyir g.yo/_/des ni myur du phongs gyur te/_/nya rnams chu nas bton pa bzhin/_/'jigs rung lag na mtshon thogs kyis/_/
[\[213a.7\]]ji ltar mi zhig gtses pa ltar/_/mtshon 'dra'i bud med sdig can gyis/_/'dod la chags rnams de bzhin no/_/rnam rgyal lag na mtshon thogs pas/_/ji ltar rgyal po gtses pa ltar/_/'dod chags me dang 'dra ba yis/_/'dod la chags rnams de bzhin 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]sreg_/shen pa'i gnas la khyi rnams ltar/_/myang bar 'du shes byis pa rnams/_/ji ltar sgra yis skrag pa ltar/_/myur du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_/rang gi las kyi nyes pa yis/_/de la skyob pa med pa ltar/_/de bzhin bdag gi 
[\[213b.2\]]nyes pa yis/_/sems can rnams ni ngan 'gror 'gro/_/de dag sangs rgyas chos spangs nas/_/bud med rnams kyi rnag la sten/_/sems ni ro la chags gyur pa/_/de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar spre'u zhig shing las ni/_/
[\[213b.3\]]shing gzhan du ni rgyu ba'i tshe/_/de ni gnas der gtses gyur na/_/de nyid du ni sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'dod la brkam pa dang /_/sdug bsngal 'dod chags sten pa dang /_/gti mug rgya la thogs pa rnams/_/dus ni yang dang yang du 
[\[213b.4\]]'da'/_/mi bkren rnams ni gsal shing la/_/rab tu btsugs nas 'phyang ba ltar/_/de bzhin 'dod la chags pa rnams/_/shal ma li ni mtho la 'phyang /_/ji ltar mon sran sde'u dang gre'u/_/lcags zangs rnams su blugs byas nas/_/
[\[213b.5\]]mes ni rab tu bsregs pa na/_/dbu bar bcas shing khol ba ltar/_/de bzhin dge ba ma mthong zhing /_/'dod la chags pa'i skye bo rnams/_/shi nas ngan song 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/lcags zangs rnams su btso bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams gang dag 
[\[213b.6\]]sdig byed pa'i/_/sems can sdig pa rnams kyi gnas/_/zangs ni bye ba drug cu dang /_/gzhan yang bzhi po dag yin no/_/zangs ni so so re re la/_/tshad ni dmigs su yod min zhing /_/me yi phung por ldan rnams su/_/bskal pa du mar 
[\[213b.7\]]btso bar 'gyur/_/kha cig zangs rnams de dag tu/_/rang gi las kyis bskal brgya 'am/_/nyis brgya sum brgya tshang bar 'tshed/_/yang na bzhi brgyar btso bar 'gyur/_/phra skam rnon po rnams kyis ni/_/bzung zhing yang dang yang smyugs pas/_/
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]de dag sha ni yod min zhing /_/dung ltar dkar ba rnams su 'gyur/_/lcags kyi gzhong par 'jug nas ni/_/rab tu tsha zhing 'dren pa med/_/shi zhing shi zhing skye 'gyur te/_/rang gi las kyis gnas par 'gyur/_/
[\[214a.2\]]gang tshe dmyal ba'i srungs rnams kyis/_/ngan pa'i mi rnams de dag ni/_/gtun la sogs pas brdungs pas ni/_/sha rkang rus pa phye mar 'gyur/_/de yis tshe na de dag la/_/shin tu grang ba'i rlung yang ldang /_/des ni dmyal ba'i sems 
[\[214a.3\]]can rnams/_/sdug bsngal gyur pa de las 'tsho/_/mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/_/gtun bu drag po rnams kyis 'joms/_/sta re rnams kyis gsheg pa dang /_/de bzhin gsal shing 'dzugs par 'gyur/_/mi rnams gang 
[\[214a.4\]]dag sdig byed pa'i/_/sems can rnams kyi lus la ni/_/lcags mdung rtse mo bzhi pa dang /_/rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga 'bab/_/mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/_/ral gri'i mchu can khwa rnams kyis/_/mgo dang [{]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]btogs 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[214a.5\]]wa dang spyang kis zos par 'gyur/_/mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/_/ngan skyugs rul pa dri nga zhing /_/kun gyis smad par ltung 'gyur la/_/spu gri'i chu klung rnams su ltung /_/mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/_/rab tu tsha bar sreg 
[\[214a.6\]]'gyur zhing /_/ngu 'bod dang ni ngu 'bod che/_/thig nag tu yang sreg par 'gyur/_/mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/_/thig nag tu ni skyes nas kyang /_/yang dang yang du me mur dang /_/spu gri'i chu klung rnams su ltung /_/gang tshe lcags 
[\[214a.7\]]kyi zangs po cher/_/mi rnams de dag 'tshed pa na/_/khyi rnams kyis ni gtses gyur nas/_/de dag bde ba tshol bar byed/_/mi rnams gang dag sdig byed pa/_/dmyal ba drag po chen por ni/_/lhung nas dpung gnyen yod min zhing /_/
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams sdig pa byed pa dag_/lcags las grub pa'i brag chen dang /_/mi sdug ri bo rnams kyis ni/_/de tshe kun nas lus 'joms byed/_/des ni rang gis las byas pa'i/_/'bras bu de 'dra thob gyur 
[\[214b.2\]]cing /_/de yis tshor ba myong bas na/_/de la skyob pa 'ga' yang med/_/ji snyed rten pa thams cad ni/_/bdag gi mdun der 'ga' yang med/_/der ni mgon med bdag gcig pu/_/sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar byed/_/gang dag bde 
[\[214b.3\]]phyir don min par/_/sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang /_/pha ma de dag de ring ni/_/rnam par grol ba'i mthu yang med/_/gang dag bde phyir don min pa/_/sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang /_/bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams/_/de ring 
[\[214b.4\]]bdag la 'grol mi nus/_/gang dag bde phyir don min par/_/sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang /_/mdza' bshes nye du de dag kun/_/rnam par dgrol bar yong mi nus/_/gang dag bde phyir don min par/_/sngan chad nyes par spyad byas kyang /_/
[\[214b.5\]]bdag gi rtsa lag de dag kun/_/de ring 'grol bar mi nus so/_/'dod pa dman pa rnams sten cing /_/dman pa'i chos rnams bsten nas ni/_/nyes pa'i las rnams byed pa dag_/de yis ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/shes rab 'chal 
[\[214b.6\]]pa mnar med par/_/song nas sdug bsngal tshor ba myong /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bud med dag_/phyi sa'i dri ltar dman par bsgrags/_/de phyir dman pa rnams dang ni/_/dman pa'i bud med rnams sten pa/_/byis pa de ni phyi sa yi/_/
[\[214b.7\]]rkyal pa bzung nas gnas pa yin/_/ci 'dra'i las ni byed pa ltar/_/de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob 'gyur te/_/rgyal po yi ni chad pa dang /_/sdug bsngal bcing ba'ang myong bar 'gyur/_/bud med gzhi las skyes pa yang /_/gsang dang bcing ba myong 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]'gyur zhing /_/dmyal srungs rnams kyis sreg pa dang /_/nges par 'ching ba'ang myong bar 'gyur/_/bud med rnams la brkam pa yi/_/blo ngan de dag bde mi 'gyur/_/gsal shing mthon po rnams su ni/_/
[\[215a.2\]]btsugs shing chur yang bcug par 'gyur/_/sa yi ser kar bcug nas ni/_/de bzhin ral gris gdab par 'gyur/_/de 'dra ba dag thos nas ni/_/de dag yi chad bde mi 'gyur/_/rmongs pa bud med lhan cig tu/_/yang dang yang du 'du 
[\[215a.3\]]'dzi byed/_/sdug bsngal 'dod pa rnams sten cing /_/smad pa rnams kyang smra bar byed/_/rmongs pa rnams kyis chos thos nas/_/dge bar gsungs zhes rjod byed kyang /_/de sems bud med phyi bzhin song /_/byi ba la ni byi la bzhin/_/
[\[215a.4\]]rgyal bas gsungs pa thos gyur nas/_/yud tsam zhig ni yid byung yang /_/ha la ha la'i dug 'dra ba'i/_/'dod chags kyis ni de yang 'khrugs/_/ji ltar phag ni yud tsam zhig_/dngangs shing skrag par byung gyur kyang /_/des ni 
[\[215a.5\]]phyi sa mthong na yang /_/chags pa skyed par byed pa ltar/_/de bzhin byis pa bde 'dod rnams/_/rgyal ba'i bstan pa spangs nas ni/_/'dod pa dman pa rnams bsten pas/_/des ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa rnams la 
[\[215a.6\]]chags myos nas/_/shin tu sdig pa'i las byas shing /_/tshul khrims can dag bslus byas nas/_/phyis ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/shes rab can gyis dal rnyed cing /_/de 'dra'i chos ni thos gyur nas/_/'dod kun spangs nas 'di la 
[\[215a.7\]]ni/_/mkhas pa mngon par rab byung shig_/rgyal po chen po skyes pa 'dod pa la sten pa rnams kyi skyon ni de dag yin te/_'dod pa'i gzhi dang /_'dod pa'i rma dang /_'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa rnams ni sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi tshor ba 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis rtag par rgyun tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/khyod kyis lus su gtogs pa'i sems rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bad sa'i rgyal po 'char 
[\[215b.2\]]byed la de lta de ltar chos bstan par mdzad de/_chos bstan pa des bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed 
[\[215b.3\]]kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skyes pa dang /_bud med rnams kyi skyon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar de dag bka' stsal cing legs par 
[\[215b.4\]]gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi ste/_mtshon cha spangs shing dbyug pa spangs la ngo tsha mchis shing srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse bar 
[\[215b.5\]]zhugs pa lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang mi dang 
[\[215b.6\]]lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed 
[\[215b.7\]]kyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]{D74}]@#/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu pa ste bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa lung bstan pa/_bam po phyed pa/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su ma ti dA ri ka pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA 
[\[216a.2\]]yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 
[\[216a.3\]]bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na khyim bdag drag shul can 
[\[216a.4\]]gyi bu mo blo gros bzang mo zhes bya ba btsas nas lo brgyad lon pa 'dra ba/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas 'bum 
[\[216a.5\]]phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_sangs rgyas 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa zhig 'dug pa de 'khor dang bcas pa bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 
[\[216a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_gal te skabs phye bdag gis ni/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[216a.7\]]rgyas rkang gnyis mchog_/'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa la/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang zhu/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/yid la ci 'dod thams cad ni/_/bu mo khyod kyis dri bar gyis/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun/_/ci 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]'dra khyod la bstan par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_gang gis su ni mdzes par 'gyur/_/gang gis nor ni che ba dang /_/mi phyed 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur/_/thub pas 'di ni bdag la 
[\[216b.2\]]gsungs/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni/_/gang gis rdzus te skye 'gyur zhing /_/'dab ma stong ldan pad+ma la/_/mchis par yang ni gda' ba dang /_/zhing rnams bye ba dpag yas par/_/sangs rgyas phyag bgyir mchi ba yi/_/rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin 
[\[216b.3\]]'gyur ba'i/_/spyod pa rgyal bas lung bstan gsol/_/dgra zla ma mchis gang gis 'gyur/_/tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur ba dang /_/las kyi sgrib pa ma mchis dang /_/bdud kyi las kun ma mchis dang /_/'chi ba'i dus ni bgyid pa na/_/mngon sum sangs 
[\[216b.4\]]rgyas mthong ba dang /_/de las chos kyang nyan pa dang /_/sdug bsngal tshor ba myong mi 'gyur/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 
[\[216b.5\]]dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/bu mo blo gros bzang mos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[216b.6\]]kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tha na dgra la yang khro bar mi byed pa dang /_byams pa la gnas pa dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[216b.7\]]pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gnod pa'i rtsa ba khro ba 'phel mi byed/_/byams la gnas par byed dang chos 'dod dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]sku gzugs byas na ni/_/mdzes par 'gyur te blta bar 'os pa yin/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na nor che bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dus su sbyin pa dang /_'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang /_
[\[217a.2\]]yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa mi re bar sbyin pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na nor che bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dus su byin dang 'gyod pa med pa dang /_yid 'ong sbyin dang rnam smin mi re ba/_/
[\[217a.3\]]dpa' bo rnams ni las 'di byas pas na/_/rtag tu longs spyod chen po thob pa yin/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phra ma'i tshig spangs pa dang /_sems can log par lta 
[\[217a.4\]]ba rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos srung ba dang /_sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jog par byed pa ste/_bu mo byang 
[\[217a.5\]]chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_phra ma de bzhin log par lta ba spong /_/dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe na srung ba byed/_/sems can byang chub yang dag 'dzin 'jug na/_/'khor rnams mi phyed 
[\[217a.6\]]phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad du rin po che chen po'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phye ma 'am/_me tog ud pa la 'am/_pad+ma 'am/_
[\[217a.7\]]ku mu da'am/_pad+ma dkar pos lag pa bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la 'bul ba dang /_gzhan dag la yang gnod sems mi skyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad+ma'i gdan 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]la bzhugs pa byed du 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la nges pa rgya cher mos pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad du rin po che chen po'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di 
[\[217b.2\]]skad ces bya ste/_phye ma me tog bkang ste 'bul ba dang /_/gnod sems spong zhing sku gzugs byed pa dang /_/mos pa rgya chen la ni gnas byed na/_/rgyal ba dag gi thad du rdzus te skye/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[217b.3\]]zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzhan dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad mi byed pa dang /_gzhan dag chos nyan pa la bar chad mi byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul ba dang /_ting 
[\[217b.4\]]nge 'dzin sgom pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dge ba dag gi bar chad mi byed dang /_/gzhan gyi chos gtam dag 
[\[217b.5\]]la mi smod dang /_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag la mar me 'bul/_/ting 'dzin bsgoms pas de ni zhing du 'gro/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dgra zla med par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_g.yo med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[217b.6\]]dag la sten pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba la ser sna mi byed pa dang /_gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba dang gnas pa thams cad la khong khro bar mi byed cing mi snyan pa mi sgrogs pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi 
[\[217b.7\]]po de dag dang ldan na dgra zla med par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la de g.yo med/_/gzhan gyi rnyed la dga' zhing ser sna med/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mi smod na/_/rtag tu dgra zla med par spyod par 'gyur/_/
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshig btsun par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang mdza' bo dag la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab pa dang /_klan ka mi tshol bar chos nyan pa dang /_
[\[218a.2\]]gzhan chos smra ba dag la dpya skur mi byed pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshig btsun par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang /_/mdza' la yod pa'i rang bzhin mi 'chab cing /_/klan ka mi tshol 
[\[218a.3\]]chos ni nyan byed na/_/'jigs pa med cing tshig kyang btsun par 'gyur/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing /_/yongs su dag pa yang myur du rtogs par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pa 
[\[218a.4\]]bsgrubs pas sdom pa gsum yang dag par len pa dang /_mdo sde zab mo rnams mi spong ba dang /_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes skyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la byams pa sgom pa ste/_bu mo byang chub 
[\[218a.5\]]sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na las kyi sgrib pa med par 'gyur zhing yongs su dag pa yang myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pas sdom pa gsum la gnas/_/mdo sde zab mo rnams la rtag tu mos/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[218a.6\]]sras la thams cad mkhyen ltar lta/_/sems can rnams la byams pas las dag 'gyur/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud kyi las med par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sgom pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[218a.7\]]brtsams pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud kyi las med par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_chos rnams la ni chos kyi tshul rtogs 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]la/_/brtson 'grus brtsams shing sangs rgyas rjes su dran/_/yongs su sngo zhing bshags dang phyag 'tshal ba/_/de la bdud kyis glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas 
[\[218b.2\]]bzhugs shing de las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_gzhan dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_mos pa mang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa bkod pa sna tshogs nye bar sgrub 
[\[218b.3\]]pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la brtson pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun du sangs rgyas bzhugs shing de las chos kyang nyan la sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces 
[\[218b.4\]]bya ste/_de ni gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed cing /_/mos pa dang ni sbyin pa rgya che ba/_/mkhas pa de ni rtag tu sbyin par byed/_/de phyir de mdun de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo blo gros bzang mos 
[\[218b.5\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji skad bcas pa 'di dag la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis bzhi pa bcu po ji skad du bka' stsal pa 'di dag las chos gcig 
[\[218b.6\]]cig ma spyad na yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bslus par gyur cig_/de nas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni nyams 'og tu chud par dka' na 
[\[218b.7\]]khyod 'di lta bu yang dag par len par byed na/_/ci khyod kyis sems la dbang thob bam/_/de skad ces smras nas bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la/_'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]gang gis bdag gis chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur cig_/
[\[219a.2\]]ma dkrol bar yang sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bu mo blo gros bzang mos de ltar bden pa'i byin brlabs byas ma thag tu de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_lha'i me tog gi 
[\[219a.3\]]char bab par gyur cing /_ma dkrol bar lha'i sil snyan gyi sgra yang byung bar gyur to/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/_da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ji lta ba de 
[\[219a.4\]]bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag la bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ngan song rnams kyi ming yang med pa dang /_bud med kyi skyon rnams med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i 
[\[219a.5\]]tshig des/_'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig_/bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi kha dog can du gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te chos 
[\[219a.6\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste 
[\[219a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bu mo blo gros bzang mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/blo gros bzang mo khyod chos gang la gnas te bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di byas/_blo gros bzang mos smras pa/_'jam 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]dpal chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa ma mchis pas de la gnas par mi nus te 'di la dri ba ma mchis so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_blo gros bzang mo byang chub ces bya ba 'di gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_blo gros bzang mos smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub ces 
[\[219b.2\]]bgyi ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_blo gros bzang mo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_blo gros bzang mos smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi 
[\[219b.3\]]ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]chos kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_blo gros bzang mo ci de bzhin gshegs pa yang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa mdzad dam/_blo gros bzang mos smras pa/_'jam dpal dper na smig rgyu dang brag cas byang 
[\[219b.4\]]chub kyi phyir spyod pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_blo gros bzang mo khyod kyis ci las bsams te de skad ces smras/_blo gros bzang mos smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di la chos 'ga' la yang bsam pa 'am/_
[\[219b.5\]]bsam pa ma lags pa ma mchis so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_blo gros bzang mo bsam pa de lta bu yin du zin na byis pa thams cad kyang byang chub tu 'gyur ro/_/blo gros bzang mos smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs/_byis pa rnams kyang gzhan la 
[\[219b.6\]]mkhas pa rnams kyang gzhan te byang chub kyang gzhan par de ltar gzigs sam/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul du 'di ni dbyings gcig pa lags te/_blang ba ma mchis shing dor ba ma mchis la sgro btags pa ma mchis so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[219b.7\]]gyis smras pa/_blo gros bzang mo bshad pa 'di'i don shes pa ji snyed cig yod/_blo gros bzang mos smras pa/_'jam dpal bshad pa 'di'i don 'tshal ba ni sgyu ma sprul pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba ji snyed mchis pa de snyed do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]blo gros bzang mo sprul pa nyid kyang med na de'i sems dang sems las byung ba lta ga la yod/_blo gros bzang mos smras pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni mchis pa yang ma lags/_ma mchis pa yang ma lags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang de 
[\[220a.2\]]dang 'dra'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bu mo blo gros bzang mo 'di zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[220a.3\]]de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_bu mo blo gros bzang mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas bskal pa sum cu lon pa'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/khyod kyang bu mo blo gros 
[\[220a.4\]]bzang mo 'di nyid kyis mi skye ba'i chos la zhugs par byas so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bu mo blo gros bzang mo la phyag byas nas tshig 'di skad du bdag gis slob dpon yun ring mo zhig na mthong zhes kyang smras so/_/blo gros bzang mos smras pa/_
[\[220a.5\]]'jam dpal ma rtog shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ci'i phyir slob dpon gyis bud med kyi lus las da dung ma bsgyur/_blo gros bzang mos smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di ni bud med 
[\[220a.6\]]do/_/'di ni skyes pa'o zhes bya ba de ni dmigs pa ste/_'on kyang khyod kyi the tshom med par bya'o/_/bden pa gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bden pa des bdag skyes par gyur cig_/
[\[220a.7\]]bu mo blo gros bzang mos tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la de'i bud med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur nas skyes par red de chos gos ngur smrig gyon nas des 'di skad du bden pa gang gis bdag gis byang chub thob pa na dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu 'byung bar 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]'gyur ba dang /_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_ngan song gi ming yang med pa dang /_bud med kyi skyon rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam 
[\[220b.2\]]ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur cig ces byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig 'di skad smras ma thag tu de'i mod la dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo sum cu lon pa'i spyod lam ci 'dra ba de lta bur gyur to/_/'jam dpal bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang 
[\[220b.3\]]gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can rnams kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'gyur ba dang /_bsam pas bza' ba dang btung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ba dang /_/
[\[220b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ngan song gsum yongs su spangs par 'gyur ba dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa dang /_rin po che'i dra bas yongs su bskor cing rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma dag gis rgyas la steng rin po che'i bla re bres te/_'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra ba kho na 
[\[220b.5\]]dang mnyam zhing mi lhag pa de lta bur 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des 'khor 'di gser gyi kha dog can du gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang pos tshig de skad smras ma thag tu de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de gser gyi 
[\[220b.6\]]kha dog can du gyur to/_/de nas sa bla'i lha rnams kyi lha'i lus kyis gcig nas gcig tu sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis go bar byas te/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni de lta bur 
[\[220b.7\]]'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin chen dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[221a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/_srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa nyid la yang dag par gnas par gyur to/_/lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing 
[\[221a.3\]]dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/srog chags brgya stong gis ni ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'dod pa lnga stong tsam yang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po'i lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[221a.4\]]pa rtogs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i che ba nyid mthong nas de dag rang rang gi bla gos bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/_lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nas tshig 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[221a.5\]]'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig ces smras so/_/dge slong de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ma thag tu bskal pa dgu bcu'i 'khor ba bsnyil te bor nas bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[221a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gnas par gyur to/_/de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/_'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni bskal pa bcu gnyis na bskal pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' 
[\[221a.7\]]ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa'i rgyan ces bya bar thams cad ming 'thun par 'jig rten du 'byung bar 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams la rdzu 'phrul chen po byed pa yin no/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa gang gis bskal pa stong gi bar du 
[\[221b.2\]]thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad la gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris nas zla ba phyed kyi bar du lan re blags na bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas ni bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi phod/_stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye 
[\[221b.3\]]ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do/_/'jam dpal de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la gtad kyis khyod 'dun par gyis la sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las byung ba'i mdo 'di lta bu 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 
[\[221b.4\]]zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/chongs shig_/shod cig_/lhogs shig_/ston cig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/'jam dpal dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ji srid du gnas pa de srid du rin po che sna bdun med par mi 'gyur la/_'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[221b.5\]]rgyal po shi na rin po che sna bdun med par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che sna bdun dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi tshul thams cad med par mi 
[\[221b.6\]]'gyur la/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di med par gyur na dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bas na mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu 'di yi ger bri ba dang /_lung 'bogs pa dang /_bcang ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i 
[\[221b.7\]]phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsam par bya'o/_/'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa yin no/_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re/_'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo byang chub 'dod pa la ngas bstan pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[222a.2\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar 
[\[222a.3\]]gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//[ {D75}]@##/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu rtsa gcig 
[\[222a.4\]]pa ste/_gang gA'i mchog gis zhus pa lung bstan pa/_bam po phyed pa/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya gang+go t+ta ra pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gang gA'i mchog gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[222a.5\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe grong khyer chen po mnyan yod na dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i mchog ces bya ba zhig gnas 
[\[222a.6\]]so/_/de nas dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i mchog mnyan yod nas byung nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_
[\[222a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i mchog la gang gA'i mchog khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs zhes smras so/_/gang gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gis sprul pa la smras te/_khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs zhes de skad bgyis na ji skad 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog sprul pa la ni 'greng ba med/_'dug pa med/_nyal ba med/_'ong ba med/_'gro ba med/_'chi 'pho med/_skye ba med na 'di nas 'ongs so zhes de ci zhig ston par 'gyur/_gang gA'i 
[\[222b.2\]]mchog gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/_gang gA'i mchog khyod da gzod gang nas 'ongs 
[\[222b.3\]]zhes ci'i slad du smra/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog sprul pa ni ngan song du mi 'gro_/mtho ris su mi 'gro_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro na ci gang gA'i mchog kyang ngan song du mi 'gro_/mtho ris su mi 'gro_/yongs su mya ngan 
[\[222b.4\]]las 'das par mi 'gro 'am/_gang gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags par mthong na ni dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i mchog ngan song du mchi ba 'am mtho ris su mchi ba 
[\[222b.5\]]'am yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags so zhes bdag sprul pa dang bstun du yang mi rung lags na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i mchog sprul pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan lags par ma mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis ma 
[\[222b.6\]]mthong na dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i mchog ngan song du mchi ba 'am/_mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba zhes ji skad bstan par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das de lta lags kyis kyang g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems dang /_bskyod pa dang /_spros pa mchis na ji 
[\[222b.7\]]ltar 'di snyam du bdag ngan song du 'gro ba 'am/_mtho ris su 'gro ba 'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'o snyam du sems lags te/_bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni nams kyang ngan song du mchi ba 'am/_mtho ris su mchi ba 'am/_yongs su 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i mchog kyang de lta bu'i dbyings can lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog khyod ci yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag 
[\[223a.2\]]par ma zhugs sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis mi skye ba la smras te/_khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam zhes de skad bgyis na ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang 
[\[223a.3\]]gA'i mchog mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin na de ci zhig lan 'debs par 'gyur/_gang gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i 
[\[223a.4\]]mchog de de bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa lags na gang gA'i mchog khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam zhes 
[\[223a.5\]]nga ci zhig smra ste/_bcom ldan 'das su zhig gis sprul pa la smras te/_khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par ma zhugs sam zhes de skad bgyis na ji skad lan 'debs par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog dri ba 'di 
[\[223a.6\]]ni dmigs pa med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_ci bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i smra bas smras lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog dri ba 'di ni dmigs pa med mod kyi/_'on kyang 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo 'du ba dag 
[\[223a.7\]]yod de/_de dag gi don chen por 'gyur bas dris so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang gA'i mchog de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos nyid ces bya ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na gang de las byung ba'i chos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lta ga la yod/_gsol pa/_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyid ces bgyi ba yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/_de las byung ba'i chos lta gang zhig mchis par gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi slad du ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[223b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog gang dmigs pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni gang gi tshe yang dag par sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid mi 'dor ro/_/gang gi tshe yang dag par mi sgrub pa de'i tshe yang bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[223b.3\]]pa nyid mi 'dor ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog chos 'di ni sems 
[\[223b.4\]]pas thob par bya ba ma yin te/_sems pas thob par byar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'di la ni sems nyid kyang mi dmigs na gang sems las rab tu byung ba'i chos lta ga la yod/_gang gA'i mchog sems mi dmigs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces 
[\[223b.5\]]bya'o/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de ni thob pa ma yin/_mngon par rtogs pa ma yin/_shes pa ma yin/_mngon sum du byas pa ma yin te/_de ni thob par bya ba ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin rnam par byang ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[223b.6\]]na/_gang gA'i mchog 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar nges par thugs su chud de/_gang gA'i mchog chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po med pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad 
[\[223b.7\]]nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gnyen po ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs zhes btags pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa zhes btags pa dang /_phung po rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa ma mchis pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes btags pa ji lta bu lags/_
[\[224a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog 'di lta ste dper na bdag bdag ces 'dogs kyang bdag gang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du gang gA'i mchog ngas gzugs zhes btags te gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du ngas tshor ba dang /_'du 
[\[224a.3\]]shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes btags te rnam par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so/_/phung po rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_
[\[224a.4\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba yang ngas btags te mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang mi dmigs so/_/gang gA'i mchog 'di lta ste dper na smig rgyu rnams la ni chu yod med de mi dmigs so/_/gang gA'i 
[\[224a.5\]]mchog de bzhin du ngas gzugs zhes bya bar btags kyang gzugs gang yang mi dmigs so/_/ngas tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa zhes btags kyang rnam par shes pa gang yang mi dmigs so/_/phung po rnams dang /_khams 
[\[224a.6\]]rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya bar ngas btags kyang don dam par na de 
[\[224a.7\]]dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so/_/gang gA'i mchog gang chos la mchog tu 'dzin pa med par tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de lta bu ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa yin no/_/gang gA'i mchog mngon pa'i nga rgyal can 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]gnas dmigs nas tshangs par spyad par spyod pa de dag gi tshangs par spyod pa de ni yongs su ma dag pa'o zhes nga smra'o/_/gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa de dag ni zab mo rgyud chad pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos na dngangs skrag par 'gyur te/_de dag skye ba dang /_
[\[224b.2\]]rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su mi 'grol te/_de dag ni sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o/_/gang gA'i mchog da 
[\[224b.3\]]ltar ram nga 'das pa'i phyi na yang rung ste/_gang dag zab mo rgyud chad pa 'di lta bu'i chos ston pa de dag la mi gti mug pa dag gsod pa po'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te/_de ltar mi gti mug pa de dag log par zin pas bsad pa'i zhe sdang bskyed nas ngan song du 'gro 
[\[224b.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gA'i mchog gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgyud chad pa rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du rgyud chad pa zhes bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog chos 'di ni rgyud gcad pa'am/_dbye ba 'am/_rnam 
[\[224b.5\]]par gzhig pa ma yin te/_de'i phyir rgyud chad pa zhes bya ste/_'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud ces bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha 
[\[224b.6\]]dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas te 'od kyis khyab par 
[\[224b.7\]]byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par byung ste slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor nub bo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[225a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ngas mngon par shes te/_sa phyogs 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa stong gis gang gA'i mchog ces bya ba kho na'i dge bsnyen ma sha stag las brtsams te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do/_/dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad ni rab tu 
[\[225a.3\]]byung nas phung po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_ji ltar gzung bar 
[\[225a.4\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni dri ma med pa zhes bya ste/_'di dri ma med pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na dge slong bdun brgya dang /_dge slong ma bzhi brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams 
[\[225a.5\]]las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i me tog rnams dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma rnams mngon par sprul te/_bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas tshig 'di skad ces 'di ltar grong khyer mnyan yod 
[\[225a.6\]]na dge bsnyen ma 'di lta bu gnas la de de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig tu smra yang de'i lus ngal bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar yang gang gA'i mchog 'di sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_yun ring po nas dge ba spyad pa dang /_/
[\[225a.7\]]yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to zhes smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/_'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_yun 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]ring du tshangs par spyad pa la gnas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge bsnyen ma gang gA'i mchog dang /_lha dang /_mi dang lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 
[\[225b.2\]]bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las gang gA'i mchog gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_
[\[225b.3\]]dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//[ {D76}]@##/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya 
[\[225b.4\]]pa las le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ste 'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa/_bam po gcig pa/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a sho ka dat+ta byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen 
[\[225b.5\]]po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das [(]rgyas [,]rgyal [)]po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[225b.6\]]dpa' brgyad stong thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_mngon par shes pa sgrub pa la mkhas pa/_chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa/_mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/_smon pa med pa la gnas pa/_mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[225b.7\]]chos la gnas pa/_mi gnas par chos ston pa/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' lhun po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes lhun po dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]dpa' rin chen seng ge dang /_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag bsgreng dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtson dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 
[\[226a.2\]]'dzum zhing rab tu dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang po las 'das pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gdung dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen 
[\[226a.3\]]thogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkra ldan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[226a.4\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa brgyad la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phug sbas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang po'i lha dang /_
[\[226a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' chu lha'i lha dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros yangs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros khyad par can dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 'phel dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu 
[\[226a.6\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na gnas shing bzhugs pa la rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_rgyal po'i bka' la gtogs pa dang /_blon po dang /_sna chen po la gtogs pa dang /_zhang blon gyi bu tsha dang /_zhabs drung na 'khod pa 
[\[226a.7\]]dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/_
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba rab tu ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 
[\[226b.2\]]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_
[\[226b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_de dag dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i 
[\[226b.4\]]khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar 'khod do/_/yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang na bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba btsas nas lo 
[\[226b.5\]]bcu gnyis lon pa 'dra ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_bla na med pa'i byang chub 
[\[226b.6\]]las phyir mi ldog pa de rang gi pha'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na khri gser gyi rkang pa can yod pa la 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong na khri de las ma langs te bstsur yang mi 'gro_/phyag kyang mi byed/_gtam yang mi zer/_stan yang mi 'ding 
[\[226b.7\]]bsod snyoms yang mi 'bul bar kha rog ste 'dug go_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras nyan thos chen po de dag rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs zhes thos nas rang gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]snga khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas nyan thos chen po de dag la mchog tu sdug par 'dzin pas mngon par dga' 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]zhing stan yang bting ngo /_/rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas nyan thos chen po de dag mthong bzhin du kha rog ste 'dug pa mthong nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[227a.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i nyan thos chen po ste/_che ba nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid pa kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang 
[\[227a.3\]]dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa/_snying brtse ba can yin te/_'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba khyod kyis mi shes sam/_ci na khyod kyis de dag mthong la/_mthong bzhin du khri las kyang mi ldang /_bstsu bar 
[\[227a.4\]]yang mi byed phyag kyang mi 'tshal/_gtam yang mi zer/_stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan mi 'dren/_dad pa dang gus pa yang mi skyed par ci'i phyir ma gus pa ston cing kha rog ste 'dug_/khyod kyis don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong /_de skad ces smras pa dang /_bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin 
[\[227a.5\]]pas rang gi pha rgyal [(]pho [,]po [)]ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab 'di ji snyam du dgongs/_ci 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal phran la ldang ba'am/_bstsur mchi ba nam yang gsan tam/_gzigs sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo de ni ma yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab 
[\[227a.6\]]ci lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha gzhan dag la ldang ba'am/_bstsur mchi 'am/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo de ni ma yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab ci mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha gzhan dag la ldang ngam/_bstsur mchi'am/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo de ni ma yin no/_/bu 
[\[227a.7\]]mos smras pa/_yab ci rgya mtsho chen po mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dang /_chu mig dang /_mtsho bran dang /_lteng ka dang /_khron pa la phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/_gzigs sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo de ni ma yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab ci ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan dag 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]la 'dud pa'am/_phyag 'tshal ba gsan tam/_gzigs sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo de ni ma yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab ci nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_skar ma'i tshogs srin bu me khyer gyi 'od 'dod pa gsan tam/_gzigs sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu 
[\[227b.2\]]mo de ni ma yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab ci [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge wa la ldang ba'am/_bstsur mchi ba gsan tam/_gzigs sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo de ni ma yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab de bzhin du su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[227b.3\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i seng ge'i sgra bsgrags la dman pa la mos pa'i nyan thos wa lta bur gyur pa byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang bral ba dag la dga' zhing ldang ba'am/_bstsur mchi ba'am/_phyag 'tshal ba'am/_
[\[227b.4\]]bkur sti bgyid/_yab chos kyi rgyal po chen po su zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor tam/_skor bar bgyid pa na nyan thos dman pa/_zhan pa zhum pa/_nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la dga' bas phyag 'tshal ba'am/_'dud pa bgyid/_yab lha'i 
[\[227b.5\]]bdag po lha'i dbang po lta bu su zhig rnam par dag pa'i lha'i bdag po don du gnyer ba na dge ba chung ba'i lha lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/_phyag 'tshal ba'am/_ldang ba'am/_bstsur mchi bar bgyid/_yab mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lta bu su zhig 'jig rten na 
[\[227b.6\]]tshangs pa'i snga khang bla na med pa don du gnyer ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/_ldang ba'am/_bstsur mchi ba'am/_phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/_yab su zhig ye shes rgya mtsho dpag tu med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos rtogs pa 
[\[227b.7\]]tshol ba na ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chu lta bu'i tshul khrims kyi rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag la 'dod pa'am/_ldang ba'am/_bstsur mchi ba'am/_phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/_yab su zhig ri rab lta bu'i bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]gzugs kyi sku don du gnyer ba na yungs 'bru lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang ldan pa'i nyan thos dag la ldang ba'am/_bstsur mchi ba'am/_phyag 'tshal ba'am/_'dud pa'am/_'dod pa skyed par bgyid/_yab su zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[228a.2\]]rnams kyi che ba nyid shes rab dang /_bsod nams dang /_ye shes dang /_yon tan nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba dpag tu med pa lta bu thos nas srin bu me khyer gyi 'od lta bu rang gi rgyud la snang ba gnas pa gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su song ba'i nyan thos dag gi rnam par grol ba la 'dod pa skyed par 
[\[228a.3\]]bgyid/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang nyan thos rnams la phyag mi 'tshal na bzhugs bzhin du lta ci smos/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_su zhig zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btang ste srin bu me khyer la phyag 'tshal bar bgyid/_yab gang nyan 
[\[228a.4\]]thos la sten pa ni nyan thos kyi sems dang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sten na thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che'i sems bskyed pa dang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[228a.5\]]'di ltar khyod nyan thos 'di dag mthong bzhin du mi ldang zhing bstsur mi 'gro la phyag mi 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur mi byed de/_'di dag stan dang /_bsod snyoms la spyan mi 'dren pa ni bu mo khyod lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhig go_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin 
[\[228a.6\]]pas rang gi pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab bdag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_yab khyod nyid grong khyer gyi dbul po rnams la mi bzhengs/_bstsur mi bzhud/_stan mi 'dings pa las na khyod nyid lhag pa'i nga rgyal can 
[\[228a.7\]]lags pa snyam bgyid do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo de dag ni nga dang mtshungs pa ma yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mtshungs pa ma lags so/_/rgyal pos smras 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]pa/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni nga rgyal dang dregs pa spangs te sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar mi byed dam/_bu mos smras pa/_yab byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khon du 'dzin pa dang /_tha ba dang /_khro ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_nyes pa 
[\[228b.2\]]spang pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i slad du sems can thams cad la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/_/yab nyan thos chen po 'di dag la ni 'khon du 'dzin pa dang /_tha ba dang /_khro ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_nyes pa bsal bar bgyi ba ma mchis/_
[\[228b.3\]]spang bar bgyi ba dang /_dge ba 'phel bar bgyi ba yang ma mchis te/_yab nyan thos thams cad la ni sangs rgyas 'bum gyis nyan thos kyi tshul khrims ji snyed pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang /_shes rab ji snyed pa'i chos bstan du lags kyang /_yab de dag la ni tshul 
[\[228b.4\]]khrims kyang ga las mchi/_ting nge 'dzin kyang ga las mchi/_shes rab kyang ga las mchi/_rnam par grol ba yang ga las mchi/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang ga las mchi/_yab 'di lta ste dper na bum pa chab kyis gtams pa'i nang du char bab na de chab kyi 
[\[228b.5\]]thigs pa gcig kyang mi len la/_der gnas par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/yab de bzhin du nyan thos rnams la gal te sangs rgyas 'bum gyis chos bshad du lags kyang de dag 'dzin par yang mi 'gyur la tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam 
[\[228b.6\]]par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de dag la gnas par mi 'gyur zhing rnam par 'phel bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/yab 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu klung thams cad dang /_char gyi rgyun thams cad 'dzin cing der gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[228b.7\]]zhe na/_rgya mtsho chen po ni tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/yab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya mtsho lta bu de dag kyang de bzhin te/_chos bstan pa'i chu thams cad yang dag par 'dzin cing chos bstan pa thams cad de la yang dag par gnas so/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]du zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi snod de ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur pa ni/_/mya ngan med byin yon tan gzi brjid 
[\[229a.2\]]brgyan/_/nyan thos lnga brgya dag ni lhags gyur kyang /_/de la phyag bya'i phyir ni de ma langs/_/ma skyes dgra yis de la smras pa ni/_/bu mo don 'di nga las mnyan par gyis/_/khyod kyis nyan thos lnga brgya mthong bzhin du/_/phyag bya'i phyir na ci phyir ldang mi byed/_/bu mo mya ngan med 
[\[229a.3\]]kyis byin na re/_/nyan thos 'di dag bdag gis mthong ba na/_/ci phyir phyag 'tshal bsam pa mi skye ba/_/bdag mchis yab cig tshig ni gsan par gsol/_/dper na mi zhig rgya mtshor mchis nas kyang /_/rin chen 'byung khung nas ni mching bu blangs/_/de bzhin bdag ni nyan 
[\[229a.4\]]thos thams cad kyang /_/ye shes dbyings nas nyan thos blangs snyam bgyid/_/dper na rgyal po nor gyi dbang phyug po/_/sa bdag 'khor los sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas/_/kAr Sha pA Na gcig tsam gsol na ni/_/de yis rgyal po bsten pa don ma mchis/_/gang gis 
[\[229a.5\]]'khor los sgyur ba mnyes bgyis nas/_/bye ba phrag stong gsol ba bgyis na ni/_/des ni dbul mang nor dang ldan par bgyid/_/des ni rgyal po legs par bsten pa lags/_/kAr Sha pA Na slong ba'i mi bzhin du/_/gang gis sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rnams/_/
[\[229a.6\]]thos nas theg pa dman la 'dod skyed pa/_/nyan thos kun la bdag ni de snyam bgyid/_/nor rnams sgrub bgyid mi ni ji lta ba/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de 'dra ste/_/rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po mnyes bgyis shing /_/byang chub reg nas sems can 'dul bar bgyid/_/
[\[229a.7\]]dper na nad pa nad brgyas gzir rnams sman pa yis/_/grol bgyid de bzhin gzhan gyi sgra phyir 'brang ba yi/_/nyan thos nyon mongs rnams kyis gzir ba thams cad kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sman pa lta bus grol bar bgyid/_/sems can mang po grol bgyid sman pa btang 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]nas ni/_sos gyur sems can la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/_/de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman par gnyer ba na/_/sos gyur nyan thos la ni su zhig 'dud par bgyid/_/'di ltar nad pa sos par gyur pa thams cad la/_/sman pa dag gis gso bar nus par 
[\[229b.2\]]mi 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin nyan thos thams cad sos par gyur pa la/_/sangs rgyas sman pa dag gis gso bar mi spyod do/_/'di na sman pa gang zhig bdag gis bdag nyid la/_gso bar sems kyi sems can gzhan la ma lags te/_/de 'dra'i bdag nyid 'gengs 
[\[229b.3\]]par bgyid pa'i nga rgyal gyi/_/sman pa de dag la ni 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed/_/sman pa gang zhig snying rje bskyed nas bdag nyid ji lta bar/_/de bzhin pha rol rnams kyang nad las grol bgyid pa/_/de ni mchod par 'os shing bsngags par bgyi ba dang /_/'jig rten kun gyis
