[\[229b.4\]]'dud par bgyi ba'i gnas kyang lags/_/gang zhig ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/_/bdag nyid grol bar bgyid kyi sems can gzhan ma lags/_/de ni sman pa bdag nyid grol bar bgyi ba ltar/_/mkhas pa dag gis mchod par bgyi ba'i gnas ma lags/_/
[\[229b.5\]]gang zhig ye shes rig pa gtso bo rtogs gyur nas/_/sems can grangs med sdug bsngal dag las grol bgyid pa/_/de dag byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed pa ste/_/de ni 'jig rten kun gyis bsngags par bgyi ba lags/_/e ran da yi shing sdong mdzes pa ma lags la/_/
[\[229b.6\]]de dag rnams kyi grib ma 'ang yangs pa ma lags te/_/e ran da yi shing 'dra nyan thos thams cad kyi/_/rnam par grol ba'i grib ma nye bar bsten ma lags/_/tsan dan mchog gi sdong chen dag ni tsha ba yis/_/gdungs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi nye bar bsten pa lags/_/de bzhin bdag 
[\[229b.7\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gi don bgyid snyam/_ba lang rmig rjes chu ni yangs ma lags/_/tsha bas gdungs pa zhi bar mi bgyid la/_/gang gA'i klung ni sems can bye ba stong /_/tshim par bgyis nas rgya mtsho chen por mchi/_/ba lang rmig rjes 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]chu 'dra'i nyan thos kun/_/sems can kun gyi tsha ba zhi mi bgyid/_/gang gA'i klung 'dra byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/sems can mtha' yas chos kyis tshim par bgyid/_/ji ltar rin chen char ni 'bab pa na/_/dbul po dag ni 'gron bu len par 
[\[230a.2\]]bgyid/_/gang zhig nor mang de dag blangs nas ni/_/sems can dbul po nor dang ldan par bgyid/_/de ltar sangs rgyas rin chen chos char 'bebs/_/nyan thos rnams ni dam chos rin chen las/_/chung ngu 'dzin te byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/sems can don slad mang du len 
[\[230a.3\]]par bgyid/_/ji ltar sems can dag ni ri rab kyi/_/drung du mchis na gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/_/ri bo gzhan la sems can rnams mchis na/_/gser gyi kha dog can du yong mi 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ri rab bzhin/_/gang dag mthus ni lhar bcas skye dgu 
[\[230a.4\]]rnams/_/rnam grol mdog tu kha dog gcig tu 'gyur/_/nyan thos rnams kyi ye shes 'dod mi bgyid/_/yab cig ji ltar rtswa bran rtse mo yi/_/zil pa'i thigs pas lo tog rgyas mi bgyid/_/rab tu khebs pa'i sprin gyis sa steng 'di/_/tshim par bgyid cing lo tog 'phel bar 
[\[230a.5\]]bgyid/_/nyan thos thams cad zil pa'i thigs pa bzhin/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab khebs sprin dang 'dra/_/snying rje mngon byas gang dag bsten na ni/_/stong gsum dam chos chu yis tshim par bgyid/_/ka ra bi ra'i me tog dri mchog min/_/des ni skyes pa bud med dga' mi 
[\[230a.6\]]'gyur/_/tsam pa ka yi me tog dri la dga'/_/ud pal bal shi ka yang de bzhin no/_/nyan thos ka ra bi ra'i dri bzhin te/_/de dag shes pas skye dgu dga' mi 'gyur/_/kun mkhyen dri can byang chub sems dpa' la/_/lha dang mi rnams rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/gcig pu mchi 
[\[230a.7\]]ba de la mtshar ci mchi/_/gang zhig sems can mtha' yas khrid pa rmad/_/nyan thos mi reng gcig pu mchi ba bzhin/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ded dpon 'dra/_/'gron zhig gzhan gyis stsal pa 'tshal ba dang /_/skye bo kun la stsol bgyid kun 'gron bzhin/_/sgra 'brang 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]nyan thos kun ni 'gron dang 'dra/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun la 'gron bgyid bzhin/_/gzings la brten pas chu bo chen po las/_/gzhan dag bsgral bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi/_/brtan bgyis gru yi nang du zhugs nas ni/_/sems can bye ba mang po sgrol bar bgyid/_/nyan 
[\[230b.2\]]thos gzings la brten pa lta bu ste/_/sems can gzhan dag sgrol bar ji ltar nus/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub grur zhugs byang chub sems/_/sdug bsngal mtsho las sems can sgrol bar bgyid/_/ji ltar g.yul ngor bong bu zhon na ni/_/dgra las rgyal bar nus par mi 'gyur gyi/_/
[\[230b.3\]]glang chen rta dang shing rta zhon na ni/_/g.yul du lhags pa'i dgra rnams choms par nus/_/nyan thos rnams ni bong bu zhon pa bzhin/_/byang chub sems dpa' glang chen zhon 'dra ste/_/sems can kun la phan dang bde slad du/_/de dag shing dbang drung du bdud kyang 'joms/_/
[\[230b.4\]]ji ltar bar snang skar mas rgyas gyur kyang /_/de dag gis ni mtshan mo mdzes mi 'gyur/_/zla ba rab tu rgyas pa shar bas ni/_/mtshan mo mkha' la thig le bzhin du mdzes/_/yab cig nyan thos 'di dag skar ma 'dra/_/rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bzhin/_/gang dag 
[\[230b.5\]]sems can kun la sman slad du/_/ye shes shar bas skye bo snang bar bgyid/_/yab cig srin bu me khyer tshogs 'od kyis/_/las rnams la ni 'jug par mi nus kyi/_/'dzam gling 'di na nyi ma'i 'od rnams kyis/_/bya ba sna tshogs brgya dag bgyid par 'gyur/_/nyan thos 
[\[230b.6\]]'di dag srin bu me khyer 'dra/_/de dag shes 'od yang dag mthong mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnam grol nyi ma lta bu yi/_/shes rab ye shes kyis ni sems can 'grel/_/yab cig wa brgya dag gis skad phyung yang /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tshogs rnams 'drog par mi 'gyur gyi/_/seng 
[\[230b.7\]]ge'i skad kyis glang chen [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_/byar bcas rnams kyang phyogs su 'byer bar 'gyur/_/yab cig de ltar nyan thos wa 'drar gzigs/_/de dag skad kyis bdud rnams skrag mi 'gyur/_/rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyad pas/_/bdud dang de bzhin bdud rig skrag 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]par 'gyur/_/yab cig rgyu 'di bdag gis mthong bas na/_/theg pa dman pa dag la 'dod mi skyed/_/su zhig bla med byang chub spangs nas ni/_/theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid/_/gang zhig byang chub dam pa yongs spangs nas/_/theg pa dman la 'dod pa skyed 
[\[231a.2\]]par bgyid/_/de dag 'tsho ngan rnyed pa thob ma gyur/_/de dag mir skyes pa ni nyes par mchis/_/gang dag lhar bcas 'jig rten sman slad du/_/byang chub mchog la 'dun pa skyed par bgyid/_/de dag legs 'tsho rnyed pa legs par rnyed/_/de dag mi lus thob pa legs par mchis/_/gang dag 
[\[231a.3\]]lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang /_/'jig rten sman slad las bgyid yid kyang rton/_/gang dag rtag tu sems can sman slad brtson/_/de dag u dum ba ra'i me tog bzhin/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di dag thos nas cang mi 
[\[231a.4\]]smra bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma bu mo 'di spobs pa thogs pa med pa zhig na/_ci bzod pa thob pa'am ma thob pa bdag gis 'di brtag par byar nges so snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces 
[\[231a.5\]]smras so/_/ci bu mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/_smras pa ma yin no/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam/_smras pa ma yin no/_/bu mo khyod ci zhig don du gnyer na 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par byed/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa 
[\[231a.6\]]shA ri'i bu gal te bdag chos 'ga' zhig don du gnyer na ni bdag seng ge'i sgra ci yang mi sgrog pa zhig na/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar bdag ni chos gang yang don du mi gnyer te/_de'i phyir bdag seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu yang gang 'di skad du ci bu mo khyod nyan thos 
[\[231a.7\]]kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs sam zhes zer ba ni btsun pa shA ri'i bus chos gang mngon du byas pa'i chos de la ci nyan thos zhes bya ba'am/_rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i theg pa rnam par gzhag pa yod dam/_gnas brtan shA ri'i 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]bus smras pa/_bu mo chos de dag la ni theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/_chos de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la don du gnyer ba ci zhig yod/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_bu mo chos de la ni don du 
[\[231b.2\]]gnyer ba ci yang med do/_/gnas brtan shA ri'i bus bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la bye brag ni ci yod/_tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 
[\[231b.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa nyid la bye brag ni ci yod/_/tha dad du dbye ba ni ci yod/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid dang /_dben pa nyid la ji ltar bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang 
[\[231b.4\]]med pa de bzhin du btsun pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' dang bla gab med pa la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/_/
[\[231b.5\]]btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_so so skye bo'i chos rnams la yang bye brag med cing tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/_/gnas brtan shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di 
[\[231b.6\]]skad ces smras so/_/bu mo ci khyod de skad ces zer ba las na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu ches lhag pa zhig tu mthong la/_nyan thos kyi chos rnams ni shin tu dman par mthong ngam ci na khyod nyan thos chen po rnams mthong na ldang bar yang mi byed/_phyag kyang mi 'tshal/_stsur yang 
[\[231b.7\]]mi 'gro_/gtam yang mi zer/_stan dang bsod snyoms la yang spyan 'dren par mi byed de skad ces smras pa dang /_bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]khams na skar ma'i gzugs su gtogs pa ji snyed cig yod pa shes sam/_maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_bu mo snyoms par zhugs na ni kho bos grangs shes kyi snyoms par ma zhugs na ni mi shes so/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de 
[\[232a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pas ni lan cig mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa yang rab tu mkhyen na/_stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[232a.3\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi lta ci smos te/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_nyan thos rnams kyi khyad par yin te/_'di ni tha dad du dbye ba yin no/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[232a.4\]]rten na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_'chags pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/_maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_bu mo de ni mi shes so/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_ma byon pa ni 
[\[232a.5\]]ji snyed cig yod/_da ltar bzhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/_maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_bu mo de ni mi shes so/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_zhe sdang la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_gti mug 
[\[232a.6\]]la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_cha mnyam pa la spyod pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/_maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_bu mo de ni mi shes so/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni ji snyed cig 
[\[232a.7\]]yod/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/_maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_bu mo de ni mi shes so/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/_rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]cig yod/_sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/_maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_bu mo de ni mi shes so/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/_log pa nyid du nges pa'i 
[\[232b.2\]]sems can ni ji snyed cig yod/_ma nges pa'i sems can ni ji snyed cig yod shes sam/_maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_bu mo de ni mi shes so/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pas ni de dag dang gzhan yang de'i gong du gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 
[\[232b.3\]]thams cad kyis ma yin pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen na/_sems can gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla ma'i khyad par yin no/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas khyod rdzu 'phrul chen po 
[\[232b.4\]]rnams kyi mchog tu bstan gyis/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub 
[\[232b.5\]]sems dpa' rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na shing ljon pa thams cad las tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i spos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de khyab par 'gyur ba'i spos kyi ngad ldang ba yod pa der song shig_/gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_bu mo 
[\[232b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i ming yang kho bos dag dod thos na sangs rgyas la blta ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir ji ltar 'gro bar bya/_de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas khri de las ma langs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras te/_bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems 
[\[232b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa lta na/_bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des bdag nyid dang /_rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]chen po 'di dag la ston par gyur cig_/tsan dan gyi dri de dag kyang nyan thos chen po 'di dag gis tshor bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs des bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[233a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis de nyid kyi tshe 'od gang gis nyan thos chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer de chos ston cing 
[\[233a.3\]]bzhugs par mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od sku las bkye'o/_/chos bstan pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir thos so/_/tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir khyab par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[233a.4\]]pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer des kyang gsung gi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu nyan thos 
[\[233a.5\]]dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas pas tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri tshor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tsan dan 
[\[233a.6\]]sbrul gyi snying po'i dri 'di ga las byung lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'dis nyan thos chen po rnams kyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags 
[\[233a.7\]]te/_des nyan thos chen po de dag la bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston cing bzhugs pa yang bstan/_'jig rten 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]gyi khams spos kyi 'od de'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas so/_/de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po mkhas pa su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[233b.2\]]dpa' chen po dag gi cho 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu dag mthong ngam thos na nyan thos dman pa/_zhan pa/_zhum pa/_nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa rnams la ldang ba'am/_stsur 'gro ba 'am/_phyag 'tshal 
[\[233b.3\]]bar byed/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od de ji tsam du thag ring ba shes sam/_maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_bu mo de ni mi shes so/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gal te khyod 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul can sha stag gis 
[\[233b.4\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_'od ma'i tshal lam/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_'bras sA lu'i zhing bzhin du mtshams med par gang bar gyur nas de dag thams cad kyis bskal par rtsis kyang 'jig rten 
[\[233b.5\]]gyi khams spos kyi 'od ces bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig 'das pa'i pha rol na 'dug pa bgrang ba'i thabs kyis rtogs par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu 'gyed pa'i 'od zer gyis 'od de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/_sangs 
[\[233b.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar mdzad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon mthong 
[\[233b.7\]]ngam/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar nus sam/_de bzhin gshegs pas/_gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong /_/gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa/_/log pas spong bar zhugs pa ste/_/skye bo de dag nga mi mthong /_/
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid blta/_/'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku/_/chos nyid shes par bya min pas/_/de ni rnam par shes mi nus/_/zhes ma gsungs sam/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bu mo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[234a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de sngon mthong ngam zhes de skad zer ba ni btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mod kyi/_sha'i mig gis ma yin te gzugs su ma yin no/_/lha'i mig gis ma yin 
[\[234a.3\]]te tshor bar ma yin no/_/shes rab kyi mig gis ma yin te 'du shes su ma yin no/_/chos kyi mig gis ma yin te 'du byed du ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi mig gis ma yin te rnam par shes par ma yin no/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de 
[\[234a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/_dper na gnas brtan gyis ma rig pa dang srid pa la sred pa mthong ba bzhin no/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po gzhan yang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/_dper na gnas brtan gyis ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa 
[\[234a.5\]]mthong ba bzhin no/_/gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo 'di ltar ma rig pa dang /_srid pa la sred pa dang /_ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa'i chos 'di gnyis ni med pa yin no/_/chos gang med pa de ni blta bar mi nus so/_/bu mo mya ngan med 
[\[234a.6\]]kyis byin pas smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po de de bzhin no/_/chos thams cad ni med pa yin te/_de dag ni blta bar mi nus so/_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo ci sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang med dam/_bu mos smras pa/_gnas brtan sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[234a.7\]]rnams sam so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rung ste/_chos 'ga' zhig yongs su grub par 'dod dam 'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo kho bo ni so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams la yang yongs su grub par mi 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lta la ci smos/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]pa 'od srung chen po chos gang dag yongs su grub pa med pa'i chos de dag ci yod pa yin nam/_'on te med pa yin/_'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo med pa de dag ni med pa yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po de bas na chos thams cad ni med pa nyid 
[\[234b.2\]]do/_/med pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya ba med do/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas ni bdag la lta ba rnam par sbyang bar bya'o/_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo 
[\[234b.3\]]bdag la lta ba ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe bdag rang bzhin med pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa nyid du mos na de tsam gyis na bdag la lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo 
[\[234b.4\]]bdag gi rang bzhin ci yin/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag gi rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do/_/bdag gi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag dben pa yang yin no/_/rang bzhin med pa des bdag dben no/_/rang bzhin med pa des chos thams cad dben 
[\[234b.5\]]no/_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis su la chos thos na 'di ltar khyod kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba skyes par gyur/_bu mo yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang rkyen gnyis yod de/_gzhan gyi sgra dang bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa las 'byung ngo zhes de skad 
[\[234b.6\]]gsungs so/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can de dag ni gzhan gyi sgra dang /_bdag nyid kyi tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa las lta ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang dag gzhan gyi 
[\[234b.7\]]dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab can dag ni gzhan gyi sgra mi tshol lo/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar na dge slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/_'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo gang gi tshe dge slong ji skad thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don la nye bar rtog par byed pa de ltar na dge 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]slong tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad dang lhan 
[\[235a.2\]]cig gnas kyang sems can du 'du shes skyed par mi byed pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ni sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no/_/chos thams cad ni phyi ma'i mtha'i de 
[\[235a.3\]]bzhin nyid dang ldan no/_/chos thams cad ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang ldan no zhes btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba de lta bus sbyor bar mi byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du zhugs pa yin no/_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_
[\[235a.4\]]bu mo chos de dag la ji ltar sbyar bar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po ji ltar de bzhin nyid la sbyor ba yang med/_mi sbyor ba yang med par mthong ba de bzhin du chos thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo ji ltar mthong na chos 
[\[235a.5\]]thams cad mthong ba yin/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po chos thams cad la gnyis su med par mthong la mi byed cing 'jig par yang mi byed na de ltar na chos thams cad mthong ba yin no/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po mthong zhes bya ba de ni mthong ba med pa'i tshig bla 
[\[235a.6\]]dgas so/_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo bdag ji ltar blta bar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo kho bos ni bdag dang bdag gi ma mthong ngo /_/bu mos smras pa/_
[\[235a.7\]]btsun pa 'od srung chen pos ji ltar bdag med cing bdag gi med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bya'o/_/gtam de skad brjod pa'i skabs su gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod kyis spobs pa 'di 'dra ba rnyed pa ni 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]khyed kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor rnyed pa las ni spobs par mi 'gyur gyi gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa de spobs pa dang ldan zhing gang gis nang ngam phyi rol ci yang mi dmigs pa de spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/
[\[235b.2\]]rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_bu mo gang ma rnyed na spobs pa dang ldan pa yin/_bu mos smras pa/_gang gis bdag ma rnyed cing gzhan ma yin/_dge ba ma yin/_mi dge ba ma yin/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ma yin/_kha na ma tho ba med pa ma yin/_zag pa dang bcas pa ma yin/_
[\[235b.3\]]zag pa med pa ma yin/_'dus byas ma yin/_'dus ma byas ma yin/_'jig rten pa ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin te/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ma rnyed la so so'i skye bo'i chos 
[\[235b.4\]]mi dmigs shing 'phags pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs te sangs rgyas kyi chos mi dmigs na/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na gang gis ci yang ma rnyed pa spobs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_ji ltar spobs par 'gyur/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[235b.5\]]gyis ji ltar chos thams cad ma rnyed pa de bzhin du de spobs par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang gis gnas brtan nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid de ci brjod cing smrar rung ngam/_nyon mongs pa med pa de dang chos kyi de bzhin nyid de la ci spobs pa 
[\[235b.6\]]ci yang yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_de bzhin nyid ni bstan pa'am brjod par mi nus so/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa yin na khyod kyis bu mo khyod spobs pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ni khyod kyis 
[\[235b.7\]]rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar med pa'i spobs pas ston to/_/bu mos smras pa/_gnas brtan rab 'byor chos thams cad la brag ca lta bur mos sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_bu 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]mo mos so/_/bu mos smras pa/_gnas brtan rab 'byor ci brag [(]cal [,]ca la [)]spobs pa ci yang yod dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_bu mo de ni med de/_bu mo rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las sgra 'byung bar zad do/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[236a.2\]]brten nas sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa de la ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ci yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar gang brten nas 'byung ba de la ni skye ba ci yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_bu mo chos thams cad ni brten nas 'byung ba'o/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun 
[\[236a.3\]]pa rab 'byor de bas na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_bu mo gal te chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa yin na bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'das te gshegs so/_/
[\[236a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni da ltar bzhugs so zhes ci'i phyir bstan/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor mi skye ba ni skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[236a.5\]]zhe na/_btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la ni skye ba 'am nub par 'gyur ba mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa don dam pa'i tshig ston to/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor bstan pa thams cad ni bstan tu 
[\[236a.6\]]med pa'o/_/ci'i phyir bstan pa thams cad bstan du med ce na/_de ni bstan kyang rung /_ma bstan kyang rung dngos po ma yin te/_dngos po med pa dang brjod du med pa'i mtha' mi spong ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod khyim na gnas bzhin du 'di lta bu'i 
[\[236a.7\]]chos la gnas shing 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dag ston pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ni khyim pa'am/_rab tu byung ba zhes gzung bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni bsam pas phye ba 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]yin/_shes rab kyis phye ba yin/_ye shes kyis phye ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa khyod kyis shes sam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis shod cig dang kho bos mnyan to/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa rab 
[\[236b.2\]]'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad dang ldan na khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/_spyod lam gang dang gang gis gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[236b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te/_lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir ro/_/sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa'i phyir byams pa la gnas pa yang yin no/_/'jig 
[\[236b.4\]]rten pa'i dga' ba dang spyod pa dang bral ba'i phyir snying rje chen po la gnas pa yang yin no/_/lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i phyir btang snyoms la gnas pa yang yin no/_/yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa shin tu rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa yang yin no/_/lta ba thams cad 
[\[236b.5\]]dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba yang yin no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba tshol ba la brtson pas chog mi shes pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yang yin no/_/bzod pa shin tu thob pa'i phyir ma bstan par shes pa yang yin te/_btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[236b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba zhes mi bya ste/_spyod lam gang dang /_gang gis gnas kyang thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin 
[\[236b.7\]]pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod mal khri gser gyi rkang pa can la 'dug cing stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug nas nyan thos chen po dag dang gtam zer ba de ni rung ba ma yin par gnas pa yin no/_/bu mo min par stan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug pas 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]chos bshad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ci khyod kyis ma thos sam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'jig rten na gang dag ni rung ba yin/_'jig 
[\[237a.2\]]rten na gang dag ni rung ba ma yin pa khyod kyis shes sam/_sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/_bu mo kho bos shes te/_gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob cing bslab pa de las 'gal bar mi byed pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o/_/gang dag bslab pa de las 'gal 
[\[237a.3\]]bar byed pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/_btsun pa sgra gcan zin thong de skad ma zer cig_/btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag ji ltar bcas pa'i bslab pa la slob pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[237a.4\]]ltar de dag ni rtog cing rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro/_/btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang dag mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa sgra gcan zin rung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin te/_de dag 
[\[237a.5\]]ni bslab pa las 'gal bar mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir te/_de dag ni phyir yang bslab pa 'dod pa ma yin pas de ni rung ba yin no/_/de dag ni khams gsum du phyir mi 'ong ba 
[\[237a.6\]]yin/_de dag ni bslab pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/_mi slob pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar na de dag gi bslab pa ni mi dmigs te/_khams gsum pa btags pa tsam du shes so/_/de'i phyir de dag ni rung ba zhes bya'o/_/sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/_bu 
[\[237a.7\]]mo rung ba dang /_rung ba ma yin pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci zhig yod/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di lta ste dper na gser dngul rgyan du byas pa dang /_rgyan du ma byas pa la tha dad du dbye ba ci yod/_sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/_bu mo tha dad du dbye ba 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]ci yang med do/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa sgra gcan zin de bzhin du rung ba dang /_rung ba ma yin pa la yang yi ge'i tha snyad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir tha dad du dbye ba ci yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni ci dang yang bral ba'i phyir te/_rang bzhin gyis 
[\[237b.2\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin no/_/btsun pa sgra gcan zin yang 'di skad du stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug ste chos nyan tam zhes zer ba la byang chub sems dpa' ni rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin no/_/sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/_rnam 
[\[237b.3\]]grangs gang gis khyod de skad smra/_bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa sgra gcan zin 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa' gang la 'dug ste byang chub thob par gyur/_sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/_rtswa bting ba la bzhugs nas byang chub thob bo/_/bu mos smras pa/_
[\[237b.4\]]btsun pa sgra gcan zin ci byang chub sems dpa' rtswa bting ba la 'dug pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na tshangs pa'am/_brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ngam/_de las gzhan pa 'og min man chad kyi lha gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis lus btud de thal 
[\[237b.5\]]mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la gtug par byed dam/_sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/_bu mo de de bzhin te/_khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_btsun pa sgra gcan zin de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[237b.6\]]chen po rtswa bting ba la 'dug kyang stan shin tu mtho ba la 'dug pa yin gyi/_nyan thos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa ni de lta ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo btsun pa sgra gcan zin ni 
[\[237b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de nyid kyi sras yin te/_bslab pa 'dod pa rnams kyi mchog yin na ci khyod kyis mi shes sam/_bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas smras pa/_yab thong shig thong shig_/'di ltar btsun pa sgra gcan zin bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]de'i sras yin zhes ma gsung shig_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod pan btags pa lta bus/_bu wa skyed par gyur pa nam yang gsan tam/_gzigs sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bu mo de ni ma yin no/_/bu mos smras pa/_yab de bzhin 
[\[238a.2\]]du de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal lta bus gshegs pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i zhabs 'bring ba ni nyan thos mdzes pa ma lags so/_/yab de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras gang yin zhes yang dag pa'i smra bas gang smra na byang chub sems dpa' nyid yin no zhes de dag 
[\[238a.3\]]yang dag pa'i smra bas smra'o/_/yab de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su khas len par 'tshal bas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/gtam 'di brjod pa'i skabs su rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo'i 'khor nas btsun mo 
[\[238a.4\]]nyi shus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/lha'i bu brgya tham pas kyang bu mo de'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de tshig 'di skad du bdag cag 'di rnams 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da 
[\[238a.5\]]ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sras su khas len to zhes kyang smras so/_/lha'i bu de dag gis 'di ltar bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad lha'i me tog dag gis mngon par gtor to/_/de nas bu mo mya ngan med 
[\[238a.6\]]kyis byin pa khri gser gyi rkang pa can las babs te nyan thos chen po de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_bldag pa dang /_gzhib pa dang /_myang bar bya ba bsod pa mang po dag gis bkur sti byas te/_dad pa dang gus pas rang gi lag nas 
[\[238a.7\]]nyan thos chen po de dag tshim par byas nas 'di skad du btsun pa dag rang dgar slad dro bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du bzhud cig_/btsun pa dag bdag kyang mchi bar 'tshal lo zhes kyang smras so/_/de nas bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang /_skye bo 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]phal po ches yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnang 
[\[238b.2\]]ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/nyan thos chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[238b.3\]]ldan 'das bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu bu mo 'dis ni thog ma nyid du byang chub don du gnyer ba na sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do/_/shA 
[\[238b.4\]]ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bu mo 'dis bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pa la bud med do snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[238b.5\]]dpa' dag ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyis bdag nyid bud med kyi gzugs su ston to/_/de nas de'i tshe bu mo mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byas te/_bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs gang gis chos thams cad skyes pa yang ma yin/_
[\[238b.6\]]bud med kyang ma yin pa lta na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag skyes pa'i lus su gyur cig_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dis kyang mthong bar gyur cig_/tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu bud med kyi mtshan ma mi snang bar gyur te/_skyes pa'i mtshan ma byung bar 
[\[238b.7\]]gyur nas steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du 'phags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa steng gi bar snang la 'phags pa khyod kyis mthong ngam/_shA 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa bdun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od 
[\[239a.2\]]ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyar 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa bcur gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i dge 'dun ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig tu 
[\[239a.3\]]'gyur te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams de yang bai dUr+ya las grub pa rin po che sna bdun gyis bkra bar byas shing mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su bres la rin po che'i pad+mas khebs pa dang /_ngan 
[\[239a.4\]]song thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi longs spyod dag kyang khyad par med de/_shA ri'i bu dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nye bar spyad pa dang /_longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du mi rnams kyi yang der de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[239a.5\]]sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i ma rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo dam pa zla ba can zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skyes bu dam pa 'di dgung zla dgur rum na bzung ba ni bdag 
[\[239a.6\]]gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od de nyid du 'di'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[239a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu btsun mo zla ba can 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam/_shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhing lha'i bu rin chen mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe byang 
[\[239b.2\]]chub sems dpa' byams pas byang chub thob par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po dung zhes bya ba de'i bu rgyal po gzhon nu mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la mchod pa byas te rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i dam pa'i 
[\[239b.3\]]chos thog ma dang /_bar dang /_tha ma'i bar du 'dzin par 'gyur te/_bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang mnyes par byed cing mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de mthar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 
[\[239b.4\]]med pas byang chub thob pa na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin ces bya bar 'gyur te/_des de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa dag byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[239b.5\]]bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu 'od zer zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo zla ba can gyis bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba phul te tshangs par spyod par rgyal 
[\[239b.6\]]pos gnang nas bslab pa'i gzhi dag bzung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas lhas phul ba'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor thams cad la gtor to/_/de nas bar snang las babs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshig 
[\[239b.7\]]'di skad du bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi byang chub thob pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad rdzus te skye zhing chos gos ngur smrig gyon la rin po che'i pad+ma dag la skyil mo krung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ba lta na/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des dper 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]na dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgyad lon pa'i spyod lam ji lta ba bzhin du bdag gnas par gyur cig ces smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs byas ma thag tu dge slong gi spyod 
[\[240a.2\]]lam dang ldan par snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pas pha rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab 'di ltar chos thams cad ni bcos ma ste rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_yongs 
[\[240a.3\]]su brtags pa las langs pa med bzhin du phyin ci log dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so/_/rgyal po chen po gzigs shig dang de ring kho na'i gdugs gcig la bu mo'i gzugs su yang gzigs khye'u'i gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs/_da ni bdag la dge slong gi 
[\[240a.4\]]gzugs su yang khyod kyis gzigs na 'di la gang yang dag pa'i gzugs lags/_rgyal po chen po de ltar na ya ma brla'i chos thams cad la 'di na kha cig lta ba'i kun nas dkris pas kun nas glags shing mchis te/_rang gi rgyud la mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis yongs 
[\[240a.5\]]su sreg go_/yongs su bsregs pas chos 'dul ba 'di ma 'tshal te 'gyod pa ma lags pa la 'gyod par sems so/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar na khyod kyis bag yod par mdzod la/_rgyal srid nyam nga ba na bzhugs bzhin du rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du bzhud cig dang /_'jam dpal 
[\[240a.6\]]gzhon nur gyur pas khyod kyi yod pa ma yin pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i 'gyod pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po khyod ni bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang ba lags kyis bzhud cig_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_btsun mo zla ba can dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyis bcom ldan 
[\[240a.7\]]'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bgyi ba mang zhing bgyid pa mang ba lags kyis bdag cag mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]pa/_rgyal po chen po da de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig ces bka' stsal nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra btsun mo zla ba can la sogs pa btsun mo'i 'khor chen po dag dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang 
[\[240b.2\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis 
[\[240b.3\]]gzung lags na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mya ngan med kyis byin pa'i seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba dang /_mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes 
[\[240b.4\]]bya bar zung shig_/gzhan dag la yang ston cig kun dga' bo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na rna lam du thos na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed 
[\[240b.5\]]na gang 'dzin pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_rjod pa dang /_lung ji skad phog pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrub pa lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med kyis byin pa dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag 
[\[240b.6\]]dang /_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa 
[\[240b.7\]]las mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]{D77}]@#/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa ste 'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa lung bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bi ma la da ta ta pa ri pr-its+tshA nA 
[\[241a.2\]]ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu 
[\[241a.3\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par 
[\[241a.4\]]grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad 
[\[241a.5\]]kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/_gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu phal cher thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 
[\[241a.6\]]'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' grags pa'i blo gros dang /_spobs pa brtsegs dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_byams pa dang /_mya ngan med kyis byin dang /_
[\[241a.7\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_gom pa 'dor ba don yod dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_ngan song spong dang /_mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang /_yon tan rin po che'i me tog gis rtag tu brgyan dang /_gser gyi phreng ba'i 'od kyi dpal can dang /_sgrib pa thams 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]cad rnam par sel ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems thogs pa med pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri dang yang thabs cig go_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe 
[\[241b.2\]]dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_nyan thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong 
[\[241b.3\]]dang /_rin po che'i tog dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_spobs pa brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad 
[\[241b.4\]]po de dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed thogs te/_bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du zhugs nas/_de dag lam gyi bar skabs su gtam 'di skad ces/_gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis 'phags pa'i 
[\[241b.5\]]bden pa'i gtam thos par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o zhes brjod par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_gang gis grong khyer du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi shes rab 
[\[241b.6\]]thogs pa med de/_de dag gi shes rab la mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la/_kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/_gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la bdud kyi las 
[\[241b.7\]]rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/_ci nas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu ba dang /_gcer bu pa dang /_'tsho ba pa dang /_bram ze dang /_
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]khyim bdag gang dag grong khyer na 'khod pa de dag sdig pa can gyi lta ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/_ci nas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa dang /_
[\[242a.2\]]bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gang dag bdag cag la bsod snyoms sbyin par byed pa 'khod pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la thug gi bar du longs spyod zad mi shes pa rnyed par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug 
[\[242a.3\]]par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa nam grus smras pa/_gang gis grong 
[\[242a.4\]]khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/_gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad nad med pa'i bde ba thob par 
[\[242a.5\]]'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_gang gis grong khyer du skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams mngon du 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la kho bo 
[\[242a.6\]]snyoms par zhugs te grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/_ci nas kyang gang gis grong khyer na sgo dang /_skar khung dang /_rtsig pa dang /_snod dang /_rgyan dang /_shing dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_gos rnams las 
[\[242a.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang /_smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /_skye ba med pa'i sgra dang /_dngos po med pa'i sgra dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ngan 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]song spong gis smras pa/_gang gis grong khyer na sems can rnams kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/_ci nas 
[\[242b.2\]]kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog gis smras pa/_gang gis grong 
[\[242b.3\]]khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/_gang gis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi 
[\[242b.4\]]sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang /_gsad par bkri ba de dag thams cad 
[\[242b.5\]]thar pa dang 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jig pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/_gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun du tshigs su bcad pa'i 
[\[242b.6\]]dbyangs dang /_byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang /_spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/_ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag kho bo'i 
[\[242b.7\]]mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnam pa de lta bu'i gtam 'di brjod 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]cing mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por phyin to/_/yang de'i tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_
[\[243a.2\]]chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga po thob pa zhig yod de bu mo des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag mthong zhing de dag lam gyi bar skabs su gtam ci brjod pa de dag thams cad 
[\[243a.3\]]kyang thos so/_/bu mo de yang gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_pha ma dang nang mi la byams pa/_btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa ste/_de dpyid zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]tshes brgyad skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par pha mas dge mtshan 
[\[243a.4\]]dang /_bkra shis byed du gnang nas bram ze zho dang /_rtswa ku sha dang /_me tog dang /_yam sreg shing dang /_mar dang /_bum pa thogs pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te khrus bya bar khrid pa las bram ze de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag mthong ngo /_/
[\[243a.5\]]mthong nas kyang bkra mi shis so snyam pa'i 'du shes kyis gnas par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze de dag gi nang nas bram ze ches bgres tshangs pa'i lha zhes bya ba des bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo dge slong dag mdun na 'khod pa ni bkra mi shis te/_de 
[\[243a.6\]]dag mthong na dgos pa'am/_nor ram/_brtul zhugs sam/_mchod sbyin nam/_bkra shis kyang rung ste mi 'grub kyis grong khyer du slar bzhud do/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'di dag chags med mchog 
[\[243a.7\]]tu dge shis pa/_/skye bo mang po'i sdig pa 'jig par byed/_/'di dag rnam par dag cing bden bzhi mthong /_/dul la grol bar gyur cing mnyam par bzhag_/'di dag rkang gnyis dam pa bsod nams zhing /_/'di la yon phul mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'di la yon 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]phul 'bras bu 'chi med 'thob/_/byin nas sems can ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims dang ni dul bar ldan pa yin/_/'dod las rgal cing sdig med re ba med/_/'di dag sman pa mchog ste 'jig rten rgyu/_/sdug bsngal gzir ba'i srog chags thar bar byed/_/
[\[243b.2\]]sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag na chos kyi rje/_/de sras 'di dag rdul med nyon mongs med/_/'di dag byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang mang /_/shes rab ldan mis 'di dag ji ltar spang /_/'di dag brtul zhugs spyad cing 'dod chags zhi/_/bkra shis gyur cing 
[\[243b.3\]]mkhas pa sbyin char phab/_/'di dag rnams la bkur sti chung byas kyang /_/mi rnams chos dang de bzhin nor yang 'grub/_/'di dag mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs dge shis ldan/_/'di dag zhing mchog rnam dag sems dang ldan/_/bram ze 'di la su zhig dad byed pa/_/de ni 
[\[243b.4\]]bsod nams mang po skyed par 'gyur/_/de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/_byis pa'i sems kyis dbang du ma bzhud cig_/mchod sbyin dus 'dir dge slong ma gzigs shig_/ngur smrig gos can de bzhin mgo bregs 
[\[243b.5\]]pa/_/de dag don 'dod pas ni blta mi bgyi/_/yab dang yum yang dgyes par mi 'gyur zhing /_/bdag kyang mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur/_/khyod kyang mchod sbyin 'grub par mi 'gyur gyis/_/de bas dge slong rnams ni shin tu spongs/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis 
[\[243b.6\]]byin pas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/_yon tan ldan pa 'di dag ma gtogs par/_/pha dang ma yang kho mo'i skyabs ma yin/_/gnyen gyi tshogs dang nor dang lang tsho min/_/'di dag 'khor bar bying ba rnams kyi skyabs/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' 
[\[243b.7\]]bas lus btang zhing /_/de bzhin srog dang longs spyod rnams kyang btang /_/dkon mchog gsum nyid skyabs yin ma gtogs par/_/kho mo'i skyabs rten sems can 'di na med/_/de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]mo btsas nas khyod kyis sngon sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs/_sngon chos kyang ma gsan/_sngon dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur kyang ma mdzad na khyod ci'i slad du sangs rgyas la dad par gyur/_/bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/_bram ze kho mo btsas nas 
[\[244a.2\]]zhag bdun lon pa na tsan dan gyi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]nang na gser gyi khri la bzhag pa'i tshe lha'i bu lnga brgya steng gi bar snang la 'dong ba kho mos mthong ste/_de dag rnam grangs du mas sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rjod/_/chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rjod pa kho mos thos so/_/
[\[244a.3\]]de nas lha'i bu de dag gi nang nas gang gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba gcig po de la lha'i bu rnams kyis dris pa/_grogs po de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci 'dra ba zhig de ni ji ltar shes par bya/_de nas lha'i bu des kho mo'i bsam pa shes nas lha'i bu de dag kyang dad pa 
[\[244a.4\]]bskyed pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/de yi dbu skra dri med snum zhing mdzes/_/gtsang 'jam g.yas su 'khyil ba'i lcang lo can/_/zhal mdog pad ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra/_/zla nya mtshan mo nam mkhar mdzes pa bzhin/_/de yi mdzod spu kha ba shel 
[\[244a.5\]]mdog bzang /_/smin mtshams bar nas 'khyil cing shin tu mdzes/_/de yis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug_/rgyal ba'i zhal yang shin tu mdzes par byed/_/mi dbang spyan mdzes 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra/_/sems stobs mi zhum tshems mnyam thags kyang 
[\[244a.6\]]bzang /_/de yi ljags che zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs/_/de yi zhal ni dri med rnam par mdzes/_/de yi gsung ni phan zhing snyan la ran/_/tshig rtsub spangs shing mi 'byed sdig pa med/_/skye bo dpag tu med pa dang mdzad cing /_/'gro la phan phyir rgyal ba'i gsung yang 
[\[244a.7\]]sgrogs/_/de yi mgur ni dung dang mtshungs shing 'dra/_/de bzhin mi dbang phyag gi sor mo ring /_/de yi phyag ni glang chen sna dang 'dra/_/brang yangs dri med lte ba gzhol zhing zab/_/rta mchog lta bur mdoms kyi sba ba nub/_/de bzhin spu yi khung bu gser dang 'dra/_/brla yi dbyibs 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]ni glang po'i lag dang mtshungs/_/zhabs ni legs gnas byin pa e na'i 'dra/_/thub pa'i dbang po bden gsung rgyags pa'i skyon dang bral/_/ngan ltas bcom pa rnams kyi sdig pa'i lta ba 'jig_/'khor gyi nang du dri ba bye ba dris byas kyang /_/'khrul med skyon dang bral 
[\[244b.2\]]bas sems can kun tshim mdzad/_/gya gyu med drang tshig gis lus ni tshim mdzad cing /_/mya ngan 'das pa bde mchog yid 'ong yang dag zhi/_/skye bo kun gyi yid 'ong mya ngan 'das ston cing /_/mtha' gnyis dag dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i lam yang ston/_/de ni rang 
[\[244b.3\]]gis sangs rgyas gyur pa ste/_/bdag nyid rgal cing pha rol rnams kyang sgrol/_/'gro ba'i skyob dang skyabs dang dge shis shing /_/'jig rten kun la thugs brtse phan pa mdzad/_/ston pa de yi yon tan 'di dag dang /_/gzhan yang mtha' yas kho bos de ma brjod/_/
[\[244b.4\]]thos nas lha rnams yid dga' dad gyur nas/_/rgyal ba la ni dang ba'i yid kyang sgom/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze kho mo btsas nas zhag bdun lon nas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[244b.5\]]yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos so/_/mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to/_/nam yang 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /_'tshe ba'i rnam par 
[\[244b.6\]]rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma byas so/_/mngon par dran te de tshun chad nam yang pha la dga' ba 'am/_ma la dga' ba 'am/_ming po la dga' ba 'am/_spun la dga' ba 'am/_nye du la dga' ba 'am/_nor la dga' ba 'am/_rgyan la dga' ba 'am/_gos la dga' ba 'am/_
[\[244b.7\]]lus la dga' ba 'am/_srog la dga' ba 'am/_grong khyer la dga' ba 'am/_skye mched la dga' ba ma bskyed kyi/_bram ze gzhan du na sangs rgyas nyid rnam pas rjes su dran no/_/bram ze kho mos ni gsum sems la yid la bya ba yid la byas te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]pa phyogs gang na bzhugs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bshad pa de thams cad kho mos legs par yongs su bzung zhing kho mos don tam tshig 'bru las yi ge dang tshig gcig kyang chud ma zos par byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge 
[\[245a.2\]]slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba kho mos nam yang yid la ma byas par ma gyur to/_/kho mos nyin mtshan gang du yang sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang /_chos ma thos pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma byas par ma gyur to/_/bram ze kho mo ni sangs rgyas la 
[\[245a.3\]]blta ba dang /_chos mnyan pa dang /_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya bas chog pa med do/_/de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lhas bram ze'i khye'u zhig la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod song la lo rgyus 'di rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol cig_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u de [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[245a.4\]]pa'i tshul du song ste ji ltar mthong ba'i lo rgyus thams cad rgyal po dang btsun mo la gsol to/_/bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas kyang ji ltar bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 
[\[245a.5\]]de ltar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod/_chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa shing rta las babs nas bram ze de dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag ga la ba 
[\[245a.6\]]der song ste phyin nas de dag gi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_gus pa dang bcas/_rje sa dang bcas par tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[245a.7\]]so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu bud med ni shes rab sor gnyis pa/_nyon mongs pa drag pa/_bag med pa mang ba/_dman pa la mos pa/_tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i dbang du mchis pa lags na/_bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste ci nas bdag gi yun 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]po'i don dang sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du btsun pas de ltar bdag la chos legs par bstan du gsol/_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gtam byung ba 'di dang /_bram ze'i tshig thos nas myur ba'i tshul gyis phyogs der phyin te/_des nyan thos de dag dang 
[\[245b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phyag byas nas rang gi bu mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod na re kho mo nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to/_/nam yang dga' ba dang rtse ba dang ldan pa'i sems ma bskyed do zhes zer ba de ltar khyod bde ba dang yid bde 
[\[245b.3\]]ba la brtson nam/_'on te 'di ltar yid byung ba'i tshul gyis smra/_de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rang gi bu mo la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod kyi gzugs byang lha yi bu mo mtshungs shing 'dra/_/rgyan rnams kyis ni de nyid chas pa'i cha byad 'dzin/_/ji ltar khyod ni 
[\[245b.4\]]nam yang gnyid kyis ma non pa/_/ci phyir bu mo khyod ni 'di 'dra'i yid byung gyur/_/khyed kyi rgyal srid rgyas shing shin tu legs par 'byor/_/ma ni rtag tu khyod kyis dbang du gyur pa yin/_/bu mo dga' ba de las ci 'dra gzhan yod na/_/de yis khyod kyi lus ni dga' ba 
[\[245b.5\]]rnyed ma gyur/_/sdug cing phangs la yid du 'ong ba ste/_/skye bo kun la dga' ba skyed yin na/_/yon tan brgya phrag du mas brgyan pa khyod/_/ci yi phyir na khyim 'dir dga' ba med/_/bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig thos gyur cing /_/ci zhig mthong na 'di ltar yid mi bde/_/yongs 
[\[245b.6\]]su nyams shing yid byung sems su gyur/_/khyod kyi 'dod pa ci 'dra nga la smros/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi pha rgyal po gsal rgyal la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_yab cig phung po nyes dmigs snod rnams dang /_/khyim gyi skyon rnams thugs su ma chud dam/_/
[\[245b.7\]]'khor ba'i gnas ni gar la lta dang mtshungs/_/'tsho ba'i 'jig rten mi gnas 'jig pa can/_/sbrul gdug nang na gnas pa'i khyim 'di la/_/gnyid dang 'dod pa'i 'dun pa ga la mchis/_/khams 'di dag ni gdug pa'i sbrul bzhi ste/_/srid pa sems pa bde ba ga la 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]mchis/_/mi mdza' tshogs kyis rab tu gtses gyur cing /_/dgon par phyin la dga' ba ga la mchis/_/kun nas nyon mongs dgra yis yongs bskor ba/_/ji ltar bde 'thob rgyal po bka' stsol cig_/dug 'thungs pa la bde ba ga la mchis/_/gsad 
[\[246a.2\]]par bkri la dga' ba ga la mchis/_/g.yang sa chen 'dir su zhig yid rton bgyid/_/rgyal po 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten de dang mtshungs/_/blo ngan dag gis lus rnams bor ba ni/_/ri rab tsam gyi phung por gyur to zhes/_/de bzhin gshegs pas dpe ni bka' stsal na/_/
[\[246a.3\]]'dus byas slu ba'i chos la su yid rton/_/pha dang ma dang sdug dang ming po dang /_/bu dang rtsa lag gnyen tshogs 'gro ba kun/_/'dus byas thams cad me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/_/'di 'dra'i mi sdug gang la su yid rton/_/gang tshe bdag gis rang byung rgyal ba mthong /_/
[\[246a.4\]]de tshe sangs rgyas 'gyur snyam sems kyang skye/_/byang chub sems dpa' bag med 'gyur ba ni/_/yab cig bdag gis ma thos ma mthong ngo /_/bdag ni mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba blta 'tshal gyur/_/bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos kyang thos/_/rgyal ba rgyal 
[\[246a.5\]]ba'i sras po 'di dag mthong /_/yab cig ji ltar 'dod pa bsten par bgyi/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bu mo'i tshig 'di thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas rang gi pha cang mi smra bar gyur par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad 
[\[246a.6\]]ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod la zhu ba zhus thugs brtse bar dgongs te lan gdab tu gsol/_'di ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/_ci shes rab de 'dus byas lags sam 
[\[246a.7\]]'on te 'dus ma byas lags/_de gal te 'dus byas lags na de bzhin gshegs pas 'dus byas thams cad ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos can yin no zhes bka' stsal to/_/ci ste 'dus ma byas lags na/_'dus ma byas la ni skye ba ma mchis so/_/gang la skye ba ma 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]mchis pa de la ni phrad pa ma mchis na/_phrad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyis ji ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu shes rab chen po zhes bgyi/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di 
[\[246b.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/shA ri'i bu bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_bu mo ni 'dus byas mi 'dri'i/_bu mos ni skye ba med pa dris te/_de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad 
[\[246b.3\]]ces smras so/_/'di ltar btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/_ci tshe dang ldan pa sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 'phrul ston tam/_'on te chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te rdzu 
[\[246b.4\]]'phrul ston/_/gal te sems can du 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na sems can ni ma mchis pa ste/_de lta bas na rdzu 'phrul de yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste chos su 'du shes pa la gnas te ston na chos nyid ni 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'o/_/'gyur ba ma mchis pa 
[\[246b.5\]]gang lags pa de la ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis na rnam par mi rtog pas ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'byor par gyur/_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces 
[\[246b.6\]]smras so/_/maud gal gyi bu chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig_/maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_bu mo ni 'gyur ba mi 'dri'i/_/bu mos ni 'gyur ba med pa dris te/_'gyur ba med pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yin pas de ni lan 
[\[246b.7\]]gdab par mi nus so/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gang po ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/_ci tshe dang ldan pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]ston tam/_'on te dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston/_gal te dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i chos ston na ni khyod byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i slad du 
[\[247a.2\]]ste/_de lta bas na btsun pa yang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi chos rnams dang ma bral ba lags so/_/ci ste dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i chos ston na ni chos smra ba nyid dngos po ma mchis par 'gyur te mi 'thad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po yang cang mi smra bar 
[\[247a.3\]]gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob cig_/tshe dang ldan pa gang pos smras pa/_bu mo ni kun rdzob mi 'dri'i/_bu mo ni don dam pa dris te/_de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/_/de nas bu mo dri 
[\[247a.4\]]ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar btsun pa 'od srung chen po ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la snyoms par zhugs nas langs te gzhan dag la chos ston cing gang dag las tha na gzar bu gang tsam gyi bsod snyoms yongs su 
[\[247a.5\]]blangs pa de dag thams cad mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhe na/_de ci btsun pas lus kyis sbyin pa sbyong ngam/_'on te sems kyis sbyin pa sbyong /_gal te lus kyis sbyong na lus ni bems po g.yo ba ma mchis pa byed pa ma mchis pa ste/_rtswa dang /_shing dang /_rtsig 
[\[247a.6\]]pa'i chos lta bu mig yor dang mtshungs pas des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so/_/ci ste sems kyis sbyong na sems ni sgyu ma lta bu gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/_des kyang sbyong bar mi nus so/_/ci ste lus dang sems kyi phyi rol gyis sbyong na de ni ma mchis pa ste/_ma mchis pas ji 
[\[247a.7\]]ltar sbyong bar bgyid/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig_/'od srung chen pos smras pa/_bu mo ni len pa mi 'dri'i/_bu mos ni len pa med pa dris 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]shing yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dri bas de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar btsun pa rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan 
[\[247b.2\]]pa lags na/_ci nyon mongs pa med pa de dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags sam/_'on te chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags/_gal te dngos pos rab tu phye ba lags na ni 'dus byas su 'gyur ro/_/ci ste chos nyid kyis rab tu phye ba lags na ni chos nyid ni skye ba ma mchis 
[\[247b.3\]]pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de/_skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do/_/mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid do/_/de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni 'gyur ba ma 
[\[247b.4\]]mchis pa'o/_/'gyur ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni tha snyad ma mchis pa'o/_/tha snyad ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o/_/bstan du ma mchis pa gang lags pa 
[\[247b.5\]]de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/dngos po ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni ma byung ba'o/_/ma byung ba gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa rnams mi ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa nam grus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[247b.6\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_'di la brjod du ci yang med/_/cang mi smra ba de 'thob byed/_/spros pa med pa'i chos 'di dag_/bu mo yongs su 'dri bar byed/_/ji srid dngos po skye 
[\[247b.7\]]yod pa/_/de srid skyon gyis gos par 'gyur/_/chos kyi dbyings ni tha snyad med/_/'di ni nyon mongs med pa'i tshul/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/_ci sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam/_'on te sems ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad/_gal te sems la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na sems ni brjod du ma mchis shing sgyu 
[\[248a.2\]]ma lta bu ste/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa lags na/_ci yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad dam/_ci ste sems ma mchis pa la gnas te bsam gtan mdzad na ni rtswa dang /_shing dang /_rtsig pa dang /_rdo la 
[\[248a.3\]]sogs pa byung ba dang zhig pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni sems ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa nam gru yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa nam gru 
[\[248a.4\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nam gru bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig_/nam grus smras pa/_bu mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul yongs su 'dri ste/_de ni nyan thos rnams kyis bstan par mi nus so/_/bu mos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru chos 
[\[248a.5\]]kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang gzhan la/_nyan thos rnams kyi yang gzhan lags sam/_gal te chos kyi dbyings gzhan lags na ni tha dad du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su ma mchis te/_de bas na de bzhin nyid dang gnyis ni bye brag ma 
[\[248a.6\]]mchis na ci'i slad du tshe dang ldan pa nam gru de skad gsung nam gru yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams 
[\[248a.7\]]kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na lha'i mig gis dngos po gzigs sam/_'on te dngos po ma mchis pa gzigs/_gal te dngos po gzigs na ni rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste dngos po ma mchis pa gzigs na ni chad par lta bar 'gyur te/_de yang mi rigs 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]so/_/ma 'gags pa yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas smras pa/_bu mos 
[\[248b.2\]]ni shes rab kun tu 'jom pa dris pas de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu 
[\[248b.3\]]bstan pa lags na/_ci mang du thos pa nyid de don du blta 'am/_'on te tshig 'brur blta/_gal te don du blta na don ni brjod du ma mchis shing bsnyad du ma mchis pa ste/_de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[248b.4\]]bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/_rnam pa de lta bu gang lags pa de ni bstan du ma mchis pa'o/_/ci ste tshig 'brur blta na ni bcom ldan 'das kyis don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'brur rton pa ma yin no zhes gsungs pas de bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[248b.5\]]bo'i mang du thos pa nyid ni rton pa ma lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bu mos dris pa'i lan thob 
[\[248b.6\]]shig_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_bu mo ni yi ge dang bral ba 'dri ste/_de ni sgras tshim par byed par mi nus so/_/bu mo ni sems dang bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid 'dri ste/_slob pa rnams kyi sa ma yin na de ji ltar bstan par bya ste/_chos kyi mnga' bdag de bzhin gshegs 
[\[248b.7\]]pa la zhu dgos pa'o/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pas zab mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags na/_ci rten cing 'brel 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]bar 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab bam/_'on te ngo bo nyid zab pas zab/_gal te rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pas khyod zab na ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i chos gang yang ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar rten cing 
[\[249a.2\]]'brel bar 'byung ba ni song ba ma lags/_'ong ba ma lags te/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis shes par bgyi ba ma lags shing gnyis su ma mchis la kun tu 'byung 
[\[249a.3\]]ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/ci ste ngo bo nyid zab pas zab na ni ngo bo nyid gang yang sus kyang brtag par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pas kho bo zab bo/_/bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/_'jam dpal yang 
[\[249a.4\]]dag pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma lags te/_de'i slad du rnam par shes pas 'tshal ba ma lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs su med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/_
[\[249a.5\]]'jam dpal dmigs su ma mchis pa ni gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]kyang ma lags te/_dmigs su ma mchis pa ni tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]las yang dag par 'das pa lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_bu mo 'di ji ltar gzhan dag la bstan par bya/_bu mos smras 
[\[249a.6\]]pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni bstan pa las yang dag par 'das pa lags te/_de ni brjod pas bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[249a.7\]]mthong ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na skyes pa 'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa de ci de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad dam/_'on te chos kyi skur mthong bar mdzad/_gal te gzugs kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma lags te/_
[\[249b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di skad du/_gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong /_/gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa/_/'dun pa 'dod chags ldan pa ste/_/skye bo de dag nga mi mthong zhes gsungs so/_/ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi skur mthong bar mdzad na chos kyi sku ni bstan 
[\[249b.3\]]du mi nus pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni mig gi rnam par shes pa las yang dag par 'das pa ste blta bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o/_/mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog gis 
[\[249b.4\]]smras pa/_mthong ba don yod bu mos dris pa'i lan thob shig_/mthong ba don yod kyis smras pa/_bu mo ni dngos po med pa 'dri ste de ni bstan par mi nus so/_/bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/_bdag ni dngos po 'am dngos po ma mchis pa mi 'dri'o/_/bstan pa slobs 
[\[249b.5\]]la de nas ston cig_/mthong ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer na khyim thams cad du rin po ches gang ba'i gter 
[\[249b.6\]]rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa de ci zang zing dang bcas pa'i phan 'dogs par mdzad dam/_'on te zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs par mdzad/_gal te zang zing dang bcas pas phan 'dogs na ni byis
