[\[249b.7\]]pa so so'i skye bo'i phan 'dogs pa dang bye brag ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dga' ba ni zang zing dang bcas pa'i slad du'o/_/ci ste zang zing ma mchis pas phan 'dogs par mdzad na zang zing ma mchis pa ni bsgrub tu ma 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]mchis pa lags so/_/rin po che tog kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer 'di na sems can rnams 
[\[250a.2\]]kyi las ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba gang yod pa de tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa de/_de bzhin gshegs pas las ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du bstan pa de ni khyod kyis bsam par 
[\[250a.3\]]mi spyod do/_/gal te spyod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bsam par mi spyod na mi mkhyen bzhin du mang po myong bar 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la yang zhing chung ngu myong bar ji ltar mdzad de/_bdag po ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la bdag 
[\[250a.4\]]po rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te de ltar mdzad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro/_/ngan song spong gis smras pa/_kho bos ni smon lam gyi dbang gis mang du myong bar 'gyur ba'i las nyung ngu myong bar 'gyur bar byed do/_/bu mos smras pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[250a.5\]]bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur du mi nus lags so/_/gal te nus par gyur na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i dgongs pa de smon lam gyi dbang gis ji ltar mi 'grub ste/_rnam grangs 'dis na 
[\[250a.6\]]smon lam gyi dbang gis bsgyur bar mi nus par rig par bgyi'o/_/ngan song spong yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'di skad du gang gis 
[\[250a.7\]]mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga po dag rnam par sel bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci ting nge 'dzin de bdag la rag las pa lags sam/_'on te gzhan la rag las pa lags/_
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]gal te bdag la rag las pa lags na ni mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags te/_ji ltar khyod snyoms par zhugs pas gzhan dag gi sgrib pa rnams rab tu zhi bar mdzad/_ci ste gzhan la rag las pa lags na ni ting nge 'dzin de khyod kyi ma lags so/_/gang khyod kyi ma lags pa 
[\[250b.2\]]des ni gzhan la phan par mdzad par mi spyod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/_bu mo kho bo'i sbyor ba 'di ni byams pa sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams 
[\[250b.3\]]cad kyang byams pa la gnas lags na sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na sems can dag la sgrib pa rnams kyis gnod pa yang ma mchis so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba yang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub 
[\[250b.4\]]sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer na sems can gang dag bcings pa dang /_gsad par bkri ba de dag thar pa dang /_'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyang 'jigs pa med pa thob par 
[\[250b.5\]]'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa de ci khyod kyi sbyor ba 'di len pa dang bcas pa lags sam/_'on te len pa ma mchis pa lags/_gal te sbyor ba de len pa dang bcas pa lags na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang len pa dang 
[\[250b.6\]]bcas pa lags te/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na de yang mi rigs so/_/ci ste sbyor ba de len pa ma mchis pa lags na ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa lags te/_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa la ni nye bar sgrub pa ma mchis so/_/byang 
[\[250b.7\]]chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bu mos dris pa'i lan 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]thob shig_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_bu mo ni skye ba dang 'gag pa mi 'dri ste/_de ni lan gdab par mi nus so/_/bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na skye ba ma mchis 
[\[251a.2\]]pa dang 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni dri ba ma mchis so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/_bu mo gang na skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa de ni yi ge 'jug pa med do/_/bu mos smras pa/_'jug pa ma mchis pa dang /_yi ge ma mchis 
[\[251a.3\]]pa'i chos thams cad la ni mkhas pa dag yi ge dang 'jug pa mi ston te/_yi ge rnams la mi chags so/_/chags pa ma mchis pa ni chos kyi dbyings te/_de la ni rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du chags pa ma mchis so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[251a.4\]]phyug kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du gang gis grong khyer na skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phan tshun tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang /_
[\[251a.5\]]byams pa'i sems kyis smra bar 'gyur ba dang /_spobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o/_/zhes gsungs pa'i khyod kyi spobs pa nye bar sgrub pa gang lags pa de ci rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags sam/_'on te rgyu ma mchis 
[\[251a.6\]]pa las byung ba lags/_gal te rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags na ni 'dus byas thams cad kyang rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa lags te/_de lta bas na rnam par zhi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ci ste rgyu ma mchis pa las byung ba lags na ni ma byung ba la sgro 'dogs par 'gyur 
[\[251a.7\]]ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/_bu mo sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad spobs pa thob par gyur cig ces bya ba'i kho bo'i smon lam 'di ni dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste btab bo/_/bu mo dri ma 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]med kyis byin pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sems bskyed pa gang gis smon lam btab pa'i sems bskyed pa de mchis sam/_'on te ma mchis/_gal te mchis na ni rtag par lta ba lags so/_/ci ste ma mchis na ni chad par lta ba lags te/_de gsung na ni khyod kyi 
[\[251b.2\]]gsung ba log pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad du ci nas kyang grong khyer 
[\[251b.3\]]na sems can gang dag kho bo'i mig lam na snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa kho bos bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci byang chub de mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi 'am/_
[\[251b.4\]]'on te ma mchis pa zhes brjod par bgyi/_gal te mchis na ni rtag pa ste yod pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so/_/ci ste ma mchis na ni chad pa ste med pa'i mthar 'dzin pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' gom pa 'dor ba don yod kyis smras pa/_bu mo byang chub 
[\[251b.5\]]ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/_ci ye shes de skye bas rab tu phye ba lags sam/_'on te zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags/_'on te skye bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa las byung ba 'dus 
[\[251b.6\]]byas su 'gyur te/_shes pa de ni byis pa rnams kyi lags so/_/ci ste zhi bas rab tu phye ba lags na ni de la dmigs pa ma mchis so/_/gang la dmigs pa ma mchis pa de la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o zhe 'am/_nyan thos so zhe 'am/_rang sangs rgyas so zhe 'am/_byang chub 
[\[251b.7\]]sems dpa'o zhe 'am/_sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par rtog pa mi skye'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang chub ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni byang chub la rnam par rtog ste/_mkhas pa rnams ni mi rtog pa'i slad du'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gom 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]pa 'dor ba don yod kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bsod snyoms kyi phyir grong khyer du 'jug par mi bya'i slar 'dong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_deng bu mo dri ma med kyis 
[\[252a.2\]]byin pa las chos thos pa gang yin pa 'di ni mkhas pa'i zas yin pas chog par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/_chos kyi zas bza' bar bya'o/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang na gdeg pa med pa dang /_
[\[252a.3\]]gzhag pa med pa de la ci zhig khyod kyis btsal bar sems/_btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi tshul ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags kyi spros pa la dga' ba'i ni ma lags so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi chos ni gnas pa ma mchis pa/_gnas par mi bgyi ba lags te/_
[\[252a.4\]]'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ni mi 'khrugs pa lags so//_//bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_de nas nyan thos chen po brgyad po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po de dag dang /_bram ze lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang /_bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[252a.5\]]po gsal rgyal dang /_de las gzhan pa skye bo phal po che rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom 
[\[252a.6\]]ldan 'das la lan stong bskor ba byas te gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/_ting 'dzin stobs ldan grags pa 
[\[252a.7\]]mtha' yas mnga'/_/'jig rten mgon po bdud rtsi dga' stsol ba/_/mtshungs med ye shes bde gshegs khyod la zhu/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar spyad pa spyod/_/ji ltar shing dbang drung mchis bdud rnams 'joms/_/ji ltar ri rab bcas sa rnams g.yo bar bgyid/_/
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]grags pa mtha' yas ji ltar 'od zer gtong /_/byang chub spyod tshul legs par bshad du gsol/_/sangs rgyas nor gyi gzungs ni ji ltar 'thob/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba dam pa ji ltar bsgom/_/mi yis rdzu 'phrul stobs ni ji ltar 'thob/_/sems can rin chen rnams kyi 
[\[252b.2\]]spyod pa gsungs/_/gang gis dran dang rtogs dang blo gros 'gyur/_/spobs pa mdzes dang ldan par gang gis 'gyur/_/gang dang rab tu ldan na 'khor nang du/_/snyan cing shin tu mdzes pa smra bar bgyid/_/gang gis mi ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/dri ma ma 
[\[252b.3\]]mchis lha yi mig kyang 'thob/_/lha rna 'thob cing pha rol sems tshul rig_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni zhing rnams brgyar yang mchi/_/ji ltar sbyin pa gtong la brtson par 'gyur/_/rtag tu tshul khrims dag cing bzod la dga'/_/ji ltar brtson 'grus bsam gtan 
[\[252b.4\]]mkhas par 'gyur/_/shes rab la yang ji ltar shin tu brtson/_/mngal gyi gnas ni ji ltar rnam spangs nas/_/pad ma las ni rtag tu rdzus te skye/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar mchis par bgyid/_/bdag med stong pa nyid kyi sgra yang brjod/_/ji ltar 
[\[252b.5\]]de yid dga' dang mi dga' mtshungs/_/sred pa spangs shing tha ba zhe sdang spong /_/mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems ma mchis/_/sems brtan g.yo ba ma mchis ri rab mtshungs/_/rnyed dang ma rnyed grags dang ma grags dang /_/bstod dang smad dang bde 
[\[252b.6\]]dang sdug bsngal dang /_/ji ltar 'jig rten chos rnams zil mnan gnas/_/'jig rten kun na zla ba lta bur spyod/_/nga yi ma mchis tshul 'chos g.yo ma mchis/_/ji ltar rdul bral nga rgyal rgyags pa spong /_/zhi dang rab tu zhi dang zhi gnas brtson/_/blo 
[\[252b.7\]]ldan ji ltar ye shes mchog tu 'gyur/_/chung ma bu nor mdza' la dga' ma mchis/_/ji ltar bas mtha'i mal la mngon par dga'/_/rtag tu bya dang mtshungs shing zla ba 'dra/_/ji ltar chos kyi nor la dga' zhing mos/_/chu dang mtshungs shing sa 'dra rlung dang 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]mtshungs/_/mkhas pa ji ltar me dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu ci yang ma mchis mi rtog lags/_/mnyam pa nyid la dga' zhing nam mkha' mtshungs/_/ji ltar rtag tu chos ni spong mi bgyid/_/bdag 'dor bgyid kyi chos mchog yongs mi 
[\[253a.2\]]gtong /_/'jig rten dag tu ston pa'i sems bskyed nas/_/ji ltar gnas te byang chub 'jug par bgyid/_/zhing gi bkod pa ji ltar gnas par 'gyur/_/dge 'dun dag par ji ltar 'gyur ba lags/_/ji ltar dus gsum du yang chos thos shing /_/ji ltar tshe 
[\[253a.3\]]ring sems can bde bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu sred pa 'gog pa'i pha rol son/_/dgra bcom dul bar bden bzhi ji ltar mthong /_/sems can brgya dag byang chub 'jog par bgyid/_/spyod cing rtag tu dga' mos ji ltar 'gyur/_/gang gis shin tu mdzes par 'gyur/_/
[\[253a.4\]]brdzus te skye bar gang gis 'gyur/_/longs spyod che dang shes rab che/_/kun mkhyen rtogs par khong du chud/_/gang gis sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'thob/_/bsod nams kun la mkhas pa lags/_/spobs pa gang gis skye bar 
[\[253a.5\]]'gyur/_/zhing ni ji ltar dga' gyur lags/_/dge slong dge 'dun phun sum tshogs/_/gang du de yis smon btab pa/_/der ni ji ltar skye 'gyur lags/_/tshe rabs dran par ji ltar 'gyur/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams 
[\[253a.6\]]su/_/ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur lags/_/rnam par 'dren pa ji ltar na/_/mdog dang gzi brjid snyan grags 'thob/_/stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus rnams/_/ji ltar thub par mi 'gyur lags/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas chos dang yang /_/dge 'dun la ni 
[\[253a.7\]]skyabs su mchi/_/lus dang srog ni gtong bgyid kyi/_/de dag chos ni 'dor mi bgyid/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod bgyid cing /_/the tshom ma mchis ji ltar 'gyur/_/'gyod pa thams cad spangs nas su/_/srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston/_/khyod la mi mkhyen cang 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]mi mnga'/_/thub chen khyod ni thams cad mkhyen/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang lags/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bstan du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo legs 
[\[253b.2\]]so legs so/_/bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di lta bu 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni khyod yang legs so/_/bu mo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te bcom 
[\[253b.3\]]ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang /_/phra ma'i tshig yongs su spong ba dang /_
[\[253b.4\]]skye bo mang po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i byams pa sgom pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud 'dul bar byed do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_phrag dog mi bya phra ma smra mi bya/_/skye bo mang po dge ba rnams 
[\[253b.5\]]la sbyar/_/phyogs bcu rnams su byams pa bsgoms byas na/_/bdud 'dir btul nas byang chub reg par 'gyur/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_ji skad smras pa 
[\[253b.6\]]de bzhin byed pa dang /_chos zab mo la mos pa dang /_yi dam la brtan pa dang /_skye bo mang po byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dag g.yo bar byed do/_/
[\[253b.7\]]de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/_/mkhas pa zab mo'i chos la bzod/_/yi dam la yang shin tu brtan/_/dkar po'i chos la 'dzud par byed/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med la/_/skye bo mang po dga' bar byed/_/de ltar chos bzhi 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]de dag gis/_/zhing rnams bye ba g.yo bar byed/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_mar me sbyin pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin 
[\[254a.2\]]pa dang /_sems can bag med par gyur cing mi khom par gyur pa rnams kyi gan du song ste chos ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la rin po che'i dra bas 'gebs pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' 
[\[254a.3\]]yas mu med pa rnams su 'od zer dag gtong ngo /_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mar me byin pas 'od ni rnam par dag_/zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs su 'dzin/_/bag med gyur pa rnams la chos sbyin byed/_/mchod rten dag la rin chen dra ba 'bul/_/des na bye ba 
[\[254a.4\]]bsam yas zhing 'gro zhing /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong bar byed/_/reg nas sems can bde dang ldan par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa byang chub bla med don du gnyer/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na gzungs 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rgyan 
[\[254a.5\]]sna tshogs gtsang zhing dag pa sbyin pa dang /_bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te 'dod pa rnams la sbyin pa dang /_rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mang du gnas pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[254a.6\]]chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na gzungs 'thob bo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sna tshogs byin pas gzungs ni thob par 'gyur/_/slong ba rnams la bu mo brgyan te sbyin/_/rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod/_/rgyal ba'i ye shes don du shes rab 
[\[254a.7\]]bsgoms/_/chos bzhi 'di dag gis ni gzungs 'thob 'gyur/_/bskal pa brgyar yang thos pa chud mi za/_/phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'chad pa/_/de dag thams cad dran pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]ldan na ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'khor ba la yid 'byung ba mang ba dang /_gcig pur kun tu dga' zhing mgu la mos pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_las kyi mtha' shin tu yongs su mthar phyin pa yin te/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos 
[\[254b.2\]]bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_srid pa'i 'gro ba kun la yid kyang 'byung /_/bse ru lta bur gcig pur spyod la dga'/_/rtag tu shin tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/_/de yi las rtag shin tu mthar yang phyin/_/rtag tu 
[\[254b.3\]]chos bzhi dag la zhugs nas su/_/byang chub spyod pa zhi ba myur tshol byed/_/byang chub sems dpa' ting 'dzin la gor 'thob/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul byang chub rtogs/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lus 
[\[254b.4\]]yang ba dang /_sems yang ba dang /_chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_khams bzhi nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul 'thob bo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_
[\[254b.5\]]lus yang ba dang de bzhin sems kyang yang /_/chos rnams kun la gnas pa med pa nyid/_/nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs shing 'dra nyid du/_/khams bzhi po dag byin gyis rlob par byed/_/chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/_/blo ldan de yis rdzu 'phrul mtha' 
[\[254b.6\]]yas 'thob/_/skad cig gcig la zhing rnams stong du 'gro_/sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po rnams kyang mthong /_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_khro ba med de rtsod pa dang /_tha ba dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_
[\[254b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'phyag par mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba dang /_tshul khrims kyi sdom pas bsdams shing tshur shog_/legs par 'ongs so zhes rtag tu smra ba dang /_chos smra ba rnams la khro gnyer dang bral zhing zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pa yin te/_bu mo 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gzhan la khro dang khon du 'dzin mi byed/_/nga rgyal rgyags dang tha ba zhe sdang bral/_/rtsod pa med la dga' zhing snyan par smra/_/gus par rgyal ba'i mchod rten 
[\[255a.2\]]'phyag par byed/_/de ni tshul khrims rnam dag rtag tu srung /_/de ni rtag tu legs par 'ongs zhes smra/_/chos smra rnams la de ni tha ba med/_/de yi sems ni rdo rje ri rab mtshungs/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/_bzhi 
[\[255a.3\]]gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad ma'i steng na bzhugs pa byed du 'jug cing me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis lag pa bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mngon par 'thor 
[\[255a.4\]]ba dang /_phan pa'i dngos po mang zhing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul can dang /_gzhan dag gi skyon mi 'dzin pa dang /_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa ste/_
[\[255a.5\]]bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sangs rgyas sku gzugs pad ma mchog bzhugs byed du 'jug_/chu skyes me tog lag pa bkang ste 'bul bar byed/_/pha rol dag la dga' ba skyed pa'i 
[\[255a.6\]]tshig kyang smra/_/dga' bar byed la mngon par brtson gyi skyon mi 'dzin/_/sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams yongs su sngo/_/thub mchog rnams kyi sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa shes/_/sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i yon tan 'di bzhi bsten na de/_/rgyal ba 
[\[255a.7\]]mchog rnams drung du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na longs spyod chen por 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_brnyas pa med par sbyin pa'i tshul can dang /_chags pa med par dngos po yongs su gtong ba dang /_mos pa mang ba dang /_
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na longs spyod chen por 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_des pa brnyas pa med par sbyin pa sbyin par byed/_/de ni dngos po kun la rtag tu 'dzin pa med/_/
[\[255b.2\]]rgyal ba'i ye shes mchog la mos pa bskyed byas na/_/de ni phyir zhing longs spyod chen po thob par 'gyur/_/dad dang ldan par 'gyur zhing g.yo med sgyu yang med/_/pha rol dag gi skyon ni 'dzin par yong mi byed/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas gang gi lta ba drang gyur pa/_/des 
[\[255b.3\]]na de 'dir longs spyod bzang po rnams dang ldan/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_chos la ser sna mi byed pa dang /_mi 'thun par mi 'jug pas 'gyod pa sel ba dang /_gsol ba 'debs pa la 
[\[255b.4\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gdams ngag ston pa dang /_stong pa nyid bsgom pa la mang du gnas pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mkhas pa nam yang ser sna yong mi byed/_/
[\[255b.5\]]mi 'thun 'jug pa med pas 'gyod pa sel/_/yang dag rab ldan gdams ngag ston par byed/_/rgyal ba'i spyod pa gang yin stong nyid bsgom/_/chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/_/rgyal bas bzhed pa'i byang chub myur du 'thob/_/sangs rgyas rjes su 
[\[255b.6\]]bstan nas bslab byas nas/_/rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas de 'gyur ro/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton la brtson pa rnams lung mnos pa dang gdams ngag brjed nas 
[\[255b.7\]]yun ring du lon te gsol ba 'debs pa la lung 'bog cing dran par byed pa dang /_'di ltar kun dga' ba'i tshig gis gzhan dag la dang ba nye bar sgrub pa dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las nges par 'byung ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]gzhan dag la chos ston pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par brtson zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma la mkhas pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_lung mnos kha ton 
[\[256a.2\]]brjed la dran par byed/_/gzhan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang sgrogs/_/skyo ba med par chos kyang rjod par byed/_/ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i mtshan ma legs par 'dzin/_/chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/_/mthu chen ldan pa tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/bskal 
[\[256a.3\]]pa stong phrag bsam yas rjes su dran/_/rnam par 'dren pa'i mchog nyid myur du 'thob/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad pa 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos mi spong ba dang /_srog gi phyir yang 
[\[256a.4\]]sdig pa'i grogs po rnams dang mi sten pa dang /_srog gi phyir yang chos smra ba la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/de la 
[\[256a.5\]]'di skad ces bya ste/_sangs rgyas byang chub [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]tshom spong mi byed/_/chos smra ba la skur pa yong mi 'debs/_/des na sdig pa'i grogs rnams rnam par spong /_/g.yel ba med par rtag tu sangs rgyas dran/_/chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/_/bde gshegs 
[\[256a.6\]]rnams dang phrad pa des 'thob po/_/bla med byang chub ma thob bar du yang /_/'dren pa gang na bzhugs pa der de skye/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[256a.7\]]pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rin po che spar gyis 'thor ba dang /_'bru mar dri zhim po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'khru bar byed pa dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs 'bul ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]'khor gyis mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la bsnyen bkur bya bas rim gro byed pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po dag 'thob bo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mchod rten la ni spar gyis dbyig rnams 
[\[256b.2\]]'thor/_/dri zhim 'bru mar rnams kyis mchod rten 'khru/_/spos dang me tog sil snyan sna tshogs 'bul/_/yid du 'ong bas mkhan po slob dpon sten/_/de'i lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/_/rab tu mdzes shing yon tan kun dang ldan/_/gang gis shes rab 
[\[256b.3\]]mchog ldan rgyal mdzes pa/_/chos de dag gis skyes chen mtshan du 'gyur/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_stan rgyu sna tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul ba dang /_gzhan la bsti stang byed 
[\[256b.4\]]pas mi skyo ba dang /_/chos smra ba la 'thab mo mi rgol ba dang /_sems can rnams byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag 'thob bo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_stan rgyu sna 
[\[256b.5\]]tshogs chos kyi stan du 'bul/_/gzhan la bsti stang byed pas skyo ba med/_/chos smra ba la 'thab mo yang mi rgol/_/sems can rnams ni byang chub 'dzin du 'jug_/'di bzhis lus la dpe byad bzang po rnams/_/'di na de yis rnyed par dka' ba med/_/yon tan 
[\[256b.6\]]'di dag rtag tu bsten byas na/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di na brgyan par 'gyur/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na spobs pa 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa dang /_nyin mtshan du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam 
[\[256b.7\]]grangs kha ton byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa skye ba med cing 'gag pa med par nges pa la mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas 'dzin pa dang /_lus dang srog dang yo byad rnams la mi lta ba ste/_bu mo byang chub sems 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na spobs pa 'thob bo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/_/nyin mtshan rab tu 'don par byed/_/'jig rten kun dang mi 'thun pa/_/skyo ba med par rab tu sgrogs/_/mchog tu dga' ba 
[\[257a.2\]]rnyed gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin par byed/_/lus dang srog la mi lta bar/_/de ni byang chub lta bar byed/_/bzhi po 'di dag bsten byas na/_/de yi spobs pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun/_/sna tshogs phreng 'dras tshim par byed/_/
[\[257a.3\]]bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_phrag dog med pa dang /_ser sna med pa dang /_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /_'khor dang 'dre ba med pa ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[257a.4\]]chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gzhan gyi rnyed la nam yang phrag dog med/_/mthong nas dga' bar 'gyur te ser sna med/_/sems can kun la de yi sems kyang snyoms/_/'khor dang 'dre bar de ni yong 
[\[257a.5\]]mi byed/_/chos bzhi 'dis ni zhing gi bkod 'thob cing /_/myur du byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang /_mi 'thun pa 
[\[257a.6\]]rnams kyi sdums byed pa dang /_lung nod pa dang kha ton byed du 'jug pas phan 'dogs pa dang /_phra ma'i tshig yongs su spong ba ste/_bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa 'thob bo/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gzhan gyi 
[\[257a.7\]]'khor ni nam yang yong mi 'byed/_/skye bo mi 'thun pa dag 'dun par byed/_/lung nod kha ton byed la yang dag 'dzud/_/pha rol dag la dbyen gyi tshig mi smra/_/chos bzhi 'di dag nges par bsten byas na/_/dge 'dun rgya chen rnam dag thob par 'gyur/_/de bas dge 'dun 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir/_/mkhas pas chos 'di rtag tu bsten par bya/_/bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gzhan dag gi shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa la phrag dog mi skyed pa dang /_lhag pa'i 
[\[257b.2\]]bsam pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po yongs su dag pa yongs su tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed de tha na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang bsti stang byed pa dang /_shes kyi khe'i phyir tshul 'chos pa med pa ste/_
[\[257b.3\]]bu mo byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du sems bskyed pa der skye'o/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gzhan la mchod pa mthong na phrag dog med/_/pha rol phyin pa dag pa yongs su 'tshol/_/byang chub sems dpa' ston par rtag tu sems/_/
[\[257b.4\]]shes khe bde ba'i don du tshul 'chos med/_/yon tan 'di dag rtag tu bsten byas na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de phrad 'gyur/_/zhing gang dag tu smon lam btab byas pa/_/'dod pa bzhin du zhing der skye bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bu mo dri ma med 
[\[257b.5\]]kyis byin pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar chos brtags pa 'di dag bdag gis yang dag par blangs te gnas par mi bgyis na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[257b.6\]]na 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod de skad smra ba ni ngo mtshar te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[257b.7\]]spyod pa bsgrub dka' bar mi shes sam/_de nas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pas gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar da ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]pa mngon sum du bzhugs pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar brtags pa'i chos 'di dag kyang yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur zhe na/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des stong gsum 
[\[258a.2\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur cig_/sems can gang la yang gnod pa med par gyur cig_/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar brtags pa'i chos 'di dag yang dag par blangs te gnas par 
[\[258a.3\]]'gyur zhe na/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des lha'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab par gyur cig_/ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sgra 'byin par gyur cig_/bdag kyang bud med kyi lus las gyur te skyes pa'i lus su red cing lo bcu drug lon pa 'dra bar gyur 
[\[258a.4\]]cig_/smon lam de skad btab cing bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di byas ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_/ma dkrol bar sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra yang byung /_lha'i me tog gi char yang 
[\[258a.5\]]mngon par bab bo/_/bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa yang bud med kyi lus mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas lo bcu drug lon pa tsam gyi gzhon nu 'dra bar snang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[258a.6\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngo mtshar che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar 'di'i bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 
[\[258a.7\]]kyis rgyu 'di dag so sor yongs su rdzogs pas bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa/_'di ltar mthu che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]bzhin te/_dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dang sbyin gnas yin te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[258b.2\]]'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/_gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_
[\[258b.3\]]dkar po dang /_le brgan dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/_'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par mdzad nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i 
[\[258b.4\]]gtsug tu nub par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de 
[\[258b.5\]]gsol pa/_lha dang tshangs pa'i sgra dang mi mjed bdag po'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dbyangs ldan pa/_/mgon po lha sgra yid 'ong ldan zhing 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi bar mdzad pa po/_/gti mug spong ba 'jig rten dag na dga' ba bzang po gzhal yas skyed mdzad pa/_/stobs 
[\[258b.6\]]bcu yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba gang gi don du 'od btang bstan du gsol/_/rir bcas nags tshal bcas shing chab dang bcas pa'i sa rnams rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_/lha rnams nam mkhar gnas shing lha yi me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char pa 'bebs/_/seng ges wa pham 
[\[258b.7\]]bgyis pa bzhin du khyod kyis mu stegs gzhan kun pham par mdzad/_/dpa' bo gang gi don du 'od kyi ltas 'di bstan pa mdzad pa bka' stsal gsol/_/nyi zla bye ba stong gis 'od bkye ba dang glog dang nor bu rnams 'od dang /_/lha dang klu dang dri za gnod sbyin dag gi 'od 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]rnams 'bar ba gang lags pa/_/shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas dge zhing dag pa'i 'od byung ba dang mjal gyur nas/_/'od rnams thams cad mog mog bgyis na sangs rgyas 'od ni phyogs bcu rnams su mdzes/_/khyod kyi smin mtshams bar gyi mdzod 
[\[259a.2\]]spu rab mdzes dkar zhing dri ma ma mchis bzang /_/'bar zhing pad ma'i rtsa dang dung dang me tog kun da 'dra bas phyogs gsal bgyid/_/thams cad mog mog bgyis nas gdugs kyi srin bu me khyer bzhin du rgyal ba mdzes/_/mi yi seng ge thub 'di gang gi don chen bzang por der 
[\[259a.3\]]'gyur bstan du gsol/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di byin gyi rlabs gang gis bud med kyi dngos po bsgyur te skyes pa'i dbang 
[\[259a.4\]]po thob par gyur pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag brgyad cur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir 
[\[259a.5\]]spyad de/_bskal pa grangs med pa 'bum phrag drug cur spyad nas phyis bu mo 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri 
[\[259a.6\]]dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yod pa de 'dra ba dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis 
[\[259a.7\]]byin pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar yun ring du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyod spyod na/_de ci'i phyir khyod kyis de'i tshe bud med kyi dngos po ma bsgyur byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas smras pa/_gnas brtan maud 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]gal gyi bu chen po ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na/_btsun pa khyod ci'i phyir skyes pa'i lus las ma bsgyur/_gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med kyis byin pas 
[\[259b.2\]]maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bud med kyi lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang ma yin/_skyes pa'i lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[259b.3\]]byang chub ni ma skyes pa ste/_de ni lus sam sems kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[259b.4\]]dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di zab mo la mos pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu'i thad na tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[259b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin bsgoms so/_/bskal pa brgyad cur mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bsgoms so/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zab mo'i tshul dang ldan pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dris so/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 
[\[259b.6\]]brgyad cu la na bza' dang /_zhal zas kyis bkur sti byas so/_/spobs pa rnam par nges par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang yongs su dris so/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[259b.7\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/_len tam/_
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgrub pa 'dis ni byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas yang bcom 
[\[260a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[260a.3\]]'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spobs pa rnam par 
[\[260a.4\]]nges par bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/gzungs kyi rdo rje'i tshig ces bya bar yang zung shig_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig_/dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan 
[\[260a.5\]]pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu las srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[260a.6\]]dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag grangs 
[\[260a.7\]]med pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams med pa tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/_lha'i longs spyod pas shin tu lhag pa dang ldan pa/_yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya bar 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhad cing 'dzum pa dri ma med pa'i tog gi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pas bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang /_
[\[260b.2\]]mchog tu dga' ba des ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'od kyis khyab par byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i gdugs tshad dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa byin gyis brlabs te/_
[\[260b.3\]]rin po che'i gdugs des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khebs so/_/des kyang nam mkha' de nyid na rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa byas nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la bstod cing phyag 'tshal te bsti stang byas nas nam mkha' 
[\[260b.4\]]de las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan stong bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/de nas bram ze tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa bram ze lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yang mthong /_lung bstan 
[\[260b.5\]]pa de yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas bde ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas sgra skad 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_gang dag sangs rgyas gus 
[\[260b.6\]]mchis dang /_/gang dag sangs rgyas chos slad du/_/blo ni shin tu nges gyur pa/_/de dag rnyed pa chen po rnyed/_/sngon chad sdig pa'i las bgyis pas/_/bdag cag bram ze'i khyim du skyes/_/ston pa'i nyan thos mthong gyur na/_/bkra mi shis zhes tshig tu 
[\[260b.7\]]brjod/_/sangs rgyas sras dag mthong gyur na/_/bkra mi shis zhes bgyis pa yi/_/tshig tu brjod pa gang mchis pa/_/btsun pa nongs pa bshags par bgyid/_/tshogs kyi rgyal po mchog gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas gang dag ma mthong ba/_/mi de 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]dag gis nongs pa rnyed/_/de dag kha zas ngan pa 'tshal/_/dri med byin pas mchod sbyin slad/_/bdag cag 'gron du bos par gyur/_/ston pa'i nyan thos rnams mthong nas/_/ma gus pas ni sdod cing mchis/_/de la bdag cag 
[\[261a.2\]]rnams kyis dris/_/khyod kyis 'dren pa gang na mthong /_/des smras btsas nas zhag bdun na/_/kho mos sangs rgyas mtshan thos mchi/_/de yis sangs rgyas bsngags mang ba/_/de bzhin gzhan du mi 'gyur brjod/_/de yi tshig thos bdag cag kun/_/
[\[261a.3\]]byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs/_/bdag cag sngon gyi bsod nams dang /_/sangs rgyas zhes bgyi'i sgras bskul bas/_/shAkya seng ge'i zhabs la ni/_/phyag bgyi'i slad du lhags pa lags/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong phyag bgyis/_/chos 
[\[261a.4\]]kyi dam pa thos par gyur/_/rkang gnyis dam pa 'di mthong bas/_/bdag cag sdug bsngal kun las grol/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/_/chos gang bshad pa mdzad pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi don slad du/_/bdag cag de la slob par bgyid/_/
[\[261a.5\]]sangs rgyas chos thob bgyi slad du/_/byang chub spyod pa thos gyur nas/_/bdag cag yang dag nan tan gyis/_/spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod gang dang /_/lam dang sgo yang bstan pa la/_/nan tan gyis ni gnas par bgyi/_/'jig rten 
[\[261a.6\]]rnams kyi mchod rten 'gyur/_/de dag lhag pa'i bsam mkhyen nas/_/thub pas de tshe 'dzum pa mdzad/_/thub chen lung bstan mdzad gsol zhes/_/sangs rgyas la ni kun dgas zhus/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' la/_/'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to/_/
[\[261a.7\]]bram ze lnga brgya 'di dag dang /_/bram ze tshangs pa'i lha de dang /_/de kun bskal pa gcig gi tshe/_/rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas lnga brgya tham pa la/_/tshe rabs snga mar mchod byas pa/_/de nas phyin chad spyod tshe yang /_/sangs rgyas bye 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]ba mthong bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba brgyad cur ni/_/de dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/de dag bskal pa re re la'ang /_/sangs rgyas bye ba mthong bar 'gyur/_/de dag bskal pa gcig de la/_/rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog 'gyur te/_/'od byed ces 
[\[261b.2\]]bya'i bskal gcig la/_/tshangs pa'i sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur/_/de dag tshe tshad mtshungs 'gyur te/_/bskal pa bye ba brgyad cu thub/_/zhing mtshungs dge 'dun mtshungs 'gyur te/_/dge slong bye ba brgyad cu yod/_/sems can rnams kyi don spyod cing /_/chos 
[\[261b.3\]]'di la yang spyad byas nas/_/de dag thams cad mthar gyis su/_/mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'thob/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med kyis byin pa dang /_'jam 
[\[261b.4\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_bram ze de dag dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[261b.5\]]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las dri ma med kyis byin pas zhus pa zhes bya ste le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo 
[\[261b.6\]]ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//[{D78}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa ste yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa lung bstan pa/_bam po 
[\[261b.7\]]phyed/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya gu Na rat+na sang ku su mi ta pa ri pr-its+tshA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang po rnams 
[\[262a.2\]]dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grong khyer yangs pa'i lid tsa byi gzhon nu yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[262a.3\]]chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[262a.4\]]gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags 
[\[262a.5\]]so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[262a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig dang /_zhu ba de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[262a.7\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da ltar na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de rnams kyi mtshan bzung na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta dag bzhugs lags sam/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[262b.2\]]to/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa legs so legs so/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[262b.3\]]dpa' rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di zhu bar sems pa ni yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod yang legs so/_/de'i phyir yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa khyod 
[\[262b.4\]]legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /_
[\[262b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa shar phyogs na chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon 
[\[262b.6\]]tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/_/bskal pa de ni rgyas pa thams cad kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o/_/de na sems can rnams kyi tshe ni dpag tu med do/_/bcom 
[\[262b.7\]]ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor dpag tu med do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni bskal pa stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor ba snyil bar byed do/_/tshe rjes nas kyang sgrib pa med par ston pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag bcu rnams kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[263a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis spobs pa nye bar sgrub par mdzad do/_/chos ston pa na bag tsha ba yang med par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa/_/de la yon tan 'di rnams myur du 'byung /_/de la de bas lhag 
[\[263a.3\]]pa gzhan yang 'byung /_/de la bla med byang chub dka' ma yin/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa lho phyogs na yon tan rin chen bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen 
[\[263a.4\]]dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/_/bskal pa de ni yon tan rgyas pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan 
[\[263a.5\]]rin chen dpal bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po lta bu de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can ni tshe rjes ma thag tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon 
[\[263a.6\]]tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rjes ma thag tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam 'debs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der skye bar 
[\[263a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/skye ba gcig gis thogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mi 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa/_/de la ting 'dzin bsam yas de skye zhing /_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan lus 'thob la/_/de ni byang chub skye ba gcig thogs 'gyur/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa nub phyogs na mya ngan dang 
[\[263b.2\]]mun pa thams cad dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/_/bskal 
[\[263b.3\]]pa de ni shAkya mngon par mdzes pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa 
[\[263b.4\]]can ni mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/dug gis ma yin/_chus ma yin te/_mes kyang 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rdzus te skye bar yang 'gyur ro/_/tshe rjes ma thag tu yang shugs brgya pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 
[\[263b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa/_/'di la mi de'i lus mes mi 'chi zhing /_/mtshon gyis min la chus min dug gis min/_/de ni rdzus te skye ba kho nar 'gyur/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa 
[\[263b.6\]]byang phyogs na mun pa dang rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag med bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa'i blo zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa 
[\[263b.7\]]yod do/_/bskal pa de ni grags pa chen po 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa dpag med bkod pa yang dag par spyod pa'i blo de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]kyi bu mo dad pa can ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur ba nas 
[\[264a.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yang 'gyur ro/_/ngan song gsum po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der ngan song 
[\[264a.3\]]du skyes pa'i sems can rnams yongs su thar bar byed do/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mi gang sangs rgyas mtshan 'di rjod byed pa/_/de yi yon tan bgrang bar mi nus shing /_/
[\[264a.4\]]de ni byang chub 'thob par the tshom med/_/de la the tshom med par gzungs skye'o/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa shar lho'i mtshams kyi phyogs na shin tu mdzes pa bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[264a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/_/bskal pa de ni yon tan 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[264a.6\]]'brug stong bsgrags pa'i sgra skad kyi rgyal po de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe rjes ma thag tu mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa chen po dang /_snying 
[\[264a.7\]]rje chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bud med kyi tshe rjes nas skyes pa'i 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]lus 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan 'di 'dzin byed pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpas yon tan 'di dang gzhan/_/bsam gyis mi khyab rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas mang po 
[\[264b.2\]]mthong /_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs na bkod pa dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba zhig da ltar 
[\[264b.3\]]bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/_/bskal pa de ni chos thams cad yang dag par skyed pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser mchog 'od dpal de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs 
[\[264b.4\]]kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de mtshan thos pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag dgu mnyes par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgyu gang gis na sems can 
[\[264b.5\]]thams cad mchog tu 'gro bar byed ces bya zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas/_chos ston par 'gyur zhing /_de chos ston pa na ting nge 'dzin de'i chos nyid thob pas/_stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[264b.6\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid 'ong gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/_sems can rnams 
[\[264b.7\]]gcig tu bde ba dang ldan zhing /_sems can ngan song du skyes pa thams cad yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_de dag de nas yongs su grol nas lha dang mi'i lus thob par 'gyur zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba bzhin 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gser mchog 'od dpal gyi ni mtshan 'dzin pa/_/de la gzi brjid dpal mdog stobs dbang po/_/tshe rabs kun tu rnyed par dka' ma yin/_/de la blo thogs med pa mtha' yas 'gyur/_/
[\[265a.2\]]yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa nub byang mtshams na sdig pa dang bral ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs 
[\[265a.3\]]te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/_/bskal pa de ni khyim rgyas pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po rnam mang dpal snang de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[265a.4\]]bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe rjes ma thag tu spobs pa dpag tu med pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshegs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi 
[\[265a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i chos ston pa yang thos par 'gyur/_'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'di 'dzin pa/_/tshe 
[\[265a.6\]]dpag med kyi sangs rgyas zhing du de/_/de ni tshe dpag med ldan chos shes 'gyur/_/skye gcig thogs pas byang chub rdzogs 'tshang rgya/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs na mya ngan thams cad las rgal ba'i 'jig 
[\[265a.7\]]rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/_/bskal pa de ni 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[265b.2\]]kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshe rjes ma thag tu rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya 
[\[265b.3\]]ste/_sgra dbyangs yan lag drug cu phun tshogs ldan/_/de ni kun tu shes pa 'ang pha rol phyin/_/rgyal ba bye ba brgyad cu mchod byed pa'i/_/bsod nams gang yin bsam yas des 'thob 'gyur/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa 
[\[265b.4\]]steng gi phyogs na yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang /_nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od ces bya 
[\[265b.5\]]ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa yod do/_/bskal pa de ni tshad med len ces bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang po dang /_nam mkha' nges 
[\[265b.6\]]par sgrogs pa bkod pa'i 'od de'i mtshan 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang /_shes rab kyi phung 
[\[265b.7\]]po dpag tu med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/sa nas sa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshig gzung bar 'os pa nyid kyang 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/spobs pa bul ba med pa phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/yi ge dang sgra'i brda yang 'thob 
[\[266a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rigs mthon po dang rigs chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa lnga yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[266a.3\]]la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang zhig rgyal ba'i mtshan mchog 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni yan lag brgyad dbyangs phun sum 'thob/_/de ni sangs rgyas bral bar yang mi skye/_/mi de mi thogs byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/_/yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas 
[\[266a.4\]]pa 'og gi phyogs na/_tha dad pa med pa nyid la dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od ces bya ba zhig da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho 
[\[266a.5\]]zhing gzhes pa yod do/_/bskal pa de ni ye shes kun nas bsdus pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od de'i mtshan 
[\[266a.6\]]'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can de'i tshe rjes ma thag tu sangs rgyas yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/skye ba gcig gis thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[266a.7\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i chos bstan pa yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/thos nas kyang thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sangs rgyas mtshan 'dzin sangs rgyas bye ba phrag_/
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]dgu bcu rnams kyi chos bstan thos 'gyur zhing /_/skye ba gcig thogs bla na med pa yi/_/byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[266b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen thams cad dang ldan pa'i spobs pa'i skad kyis gzungs 'thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 
[\[266b.3\]]thob bo/_/lha dang mi'i skye dgu sum khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas 
[\[266b.4\]]pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog 
[\[266b.5\]]brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/_yon tan rin chen me tog kun tu rgyas pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_pra dz+nya bar ma dang /_zhu 
[\[266b.6\]]chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//[{D79}]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi yul 
[\[266b.7\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa lung bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a tsin t+ya bud d+ha bi Sha ya ni ra de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[267a.2\]]kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong du tshang pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa lha'i bu rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang yang 
[\[267a.3\]]thabs cig go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/yang de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go_/lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs kyang [,]bzang yang [}]'khor de 
[\[267a.4\]]nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ngas khyod la bskul gyis/_khyod kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam las brtsams te/_lha'i 'khor 'di dang byang chub 
[\[267a.5\]]sems dpa' 'di dag la spobs par gyis shig_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ci las brtsams te spobs par bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul 
[\[267a.6\]]las brtsams te spobs par gyis shig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni gang mig gi yul ma lags pa dang /_gzugs kyi yul ma lags pa dang /_rna ba'i yul ma lags pa dang /_sgra'i yul ma lags pa dang /_sna'i yul ma lags 
[\[267a.7\]]pa dang /_dri'i yul ma lags pa dang /_lce'i yul ma lags pa dang /_ro'i yul ma lags pa dang /_lus kyi yul ma lags pa dang /_reg bya'i yul ma lags pa dang /_yid kyi yul ma lags pa dang /_chos kyi yul ma lags pa ste/_de sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yul 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]khyad par ma mchis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo sangs rgyas kyi yul khong du chud par 'tshal bas/_khong du chud pa ma mchis pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi yul de ltar khong du chud par bgyi'i/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa'i 
[\[267b.2\]]yul ci lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal lta bar gyur pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa nyid ni ngas byang chub thob pa'i yul lo/_/mtshan ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan ma med pa ni yul lo/_/khams gsum pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir smon pa med pa ni yul lo/_/'du byed mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par 'du bya ba 
[\[267b.3\]]med pa ni yul lo/_/'dus byas mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir skye ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang /_'du byed pa med pa ni yul lo/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis kyi yul gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sems med pa ni 'dus ma byas kyi yul lo/_/gsol pa/_
[\[267b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das sems ma mchis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags te/_de la brjod pa ma mchis lags so/_/brjod pa ma mchis pa la bstan pa ma mchis lags so/_/bstan pa ma mchis pa la mngon par brjod pa ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mngon par brjod pa ma mchis pa'i yul ni sangs rgyas 
[\[267b.5\]]kyi yul lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du btsal bar bya/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su btsal bar bgyi lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_sems 
[\[267b.6\]]can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma lags kyi/_gang 'di sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su rtogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul la 
[\[267b.7\]]'jug pa'am ldog pa yod dam ci na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su btsal/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul ni 'jug pa ma mchis ldog pa ma mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gal te 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa med cing ldog pa med na sangs rgyas kyi yul ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las yongs su shes/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin 
[\[268a.2\]]gang lags pa de yang 'jug pa ma mchis shing ldog pa ma mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin lags so/_/bcom 
[\[268a.3\]]ldan 'das gal te nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin kyang gzhan du gyur la/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin kyang gzhan zhig lags na ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes kyang bstan par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nyon mongs 
[\[268a.4\]]pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rang bzhin lags te/_de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes ston lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid du gang gis 
[\[268a.5\]]gnas pa shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa nyid gang gis gnas/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas nas/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug kun 
[\[268a.6\]]tu 'byung ba'i mnyam pa nyid des de bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mnyam pa nyid gang la gnas te 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug kun tu 'byung /_gsol pa/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_smon pa ma 
[\[268a.7\]]mchis pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid des de bzhin gshegs pa gnas lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci stong pa nyid la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mchis pa gang gis stong pa nyid mchis pa'i mchis 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]pa des 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal yod pa gang gis stong pa nyid yod cing yod pa gang gis 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams yod/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yi ge dang /_skad dang /_sgra dang /_brjod pa'i 
[\[268b.2\]]mchis pas stong pa nyid mchis lags so/_/yi ge dang /_skad dang /_sgra dang /_brjod pa'i mchis pas 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams mchis lags so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma byas pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[268b.3\]]'dus ma byas pa dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/_dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma byas pa dang /_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni med pa ma yin no/_/dge slong dag gal te ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma byas pa dang /_mngon par 'dus 
[\[268b.4\]]ma byas pa dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa med du zin na/_skyes pa dang /_byung ba dang /_byas pa dang /_mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na dge slong dag 'di ltar ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma byas pa dang /_mngon par 'dus 
[\[268b.5\]]ma byas pa dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni yod de/_de'i phyir skyes pa dang /_byung ba dang /_byas pa dang /_mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags so zhes bka' stsal pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das gal te stong pa nyid ma mchis su lags na/_'dod 
[\[268b.6\]]chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nyon mongs pa 'di dag las 'byung bar gdags par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar stong pa nyid ni mchis te/_de'i slad du 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams las 'byung bar gdags lags so/_/bcom 
[\[268b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa de de lta yin du zin na/_gang su dag stong pa nyid la gnas pa de dag thams cad 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor spyod pa gang 'dod chags 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug las gud du stong pa nyid tshol ba de ni rnal 'byor la mi spyod pa lags te/_rnal 'byor ma lags pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug las gud du stong pa nyid btsal bar bgyi ba ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 
[\[269a.2\]]'das 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug nyid stong pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug dang bcas pa yin nam/_'on te 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba yin/_gsol 
[\[269a.3\]]pa/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de dang bdag mnyam ste/_gang mnyam pa nyid de thob pa de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang ma lags/_'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma lags/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang ma lags/_zhe sdang 
[\[269a.4\]]dang bral ba yang ma lags/_gti mug dang bcas pa yang ma lags/_gti mug dang bral ba yang ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gang dag bdag la 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su lta zhing pha rol la 'dod 
[\[269a.5\]]chags dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang /_gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de dag ni lta bar gyur pa gnyis la chags pa lags so/_/gnyis gang lags she na/_chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gang bdag la 'dod chags 
[\[269a.6\]]dang bral ba dang /_zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /_gti mug dang bral bar yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag gi chad par lta ba lags so/_/gang pha rol la 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas par yang dag par rjes su lta ba de ni de dag gi rtag par lta ba lags so/_/
[\[269a.7\]]yang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge slong ni pha rol dman pa dang /_bdag khyad par du 'phags par yang dag par rjes su mi lta lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de gang du zhugs pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang yang dag 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]par zhugs pa de ni gang du yang zhugs pa ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang yang dag par zhugs pa de lam la zhugs pa ma yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang lam la zhugs pa de ni 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa lags te/_gang 'dus bgyis la zhugs pa de mnyam pa nyid du 
[\[269b.2\]]ga la 'gyur lags/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus bgyis na skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_gnas pa dang ldan pa'i slad du'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'dus ma byas la grangs gang yang yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis la grangs gang yang ma 
[\[269b.3\]]mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus ma bgyis la/_grangs mchis par gyur na de 'dus bgyis nyid du 'gyur gyi 'dus ma bgyis ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang 'dus ma byas thob pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la grangs gang yang yod par 'gyur ba'i rnam 
[\[269b.4\]]grangs yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams la grangs gang yang ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rnams ni grangs ma mchis pa/_grangs dang bral ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci khyod 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin nam/_'on te 'phags 
[\[269b.5\]]pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags so/_/ci lags gang bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa de 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags sam/_'phags 
[\[269b.6\]]pa ma lags pa'i chos dang ldan pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sprul pa ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bstan pa lags sam/_
[\[269b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de lta'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyis mtshan nyid lags na bdag kyang de'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid lags te/_de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lags/_'phags pa ma lags pa'i chos 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]dang ldan pa yang ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci dang ldan/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid dang mi 'gal ba dang ldan lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul rnyed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[270a.2\]]'das gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis brnyes na bdag gis kyang rnyed lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi yul ma brnyes sam/_smras pa/_gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi 
[\[270a.3\]]yul gang yang rnyed dam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med/_yul rnyed pa yang med do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i yul yang med/_yul brnyes pa yang med do/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ni rjes su 
[\[270a.4\]]bsrung ba med par chos ston te/_khyod ni las dang po pa rnams rjes su mi srung ngo /_/smras pa/_de bas na gnas brtan nyid la yongs su dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin du lan thob shig_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang sman pa mkhas pas nad pa yongs su srung zhing kha ba dang /_skyur ba 
[\[270a.5\]]dang /_tsha ba'i sman ma byin na ci des nad pa de la nad med pa'i bde ba byin pa yin nam/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du gang chos smra bas las dang po pa yongs su srung zhing zab mo'i gtam bcabs te/_gtam sna tshogs bstan na des de yang dang yang 
[\[270a.6\]]'chi ba las thar bar byas par mi 'gyur/_shin tu bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu bzhag par mi 'gyur ro/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lha'i bu brgyad brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang 
[\[270a.7\]]bral ba rnam par dag go_/lha'i bu bdun brgyas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa thob nas 'dod cing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas sems can 'dul na/_ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yin nam/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol te/_btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba yang yin/_kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas 
[\[270b.2\]]kyi theg pas rnam par grol ba'ang yin/_btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni theg pa chen pos rnam par grol ba'ang yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci nyan thos sam/_'on te rang sangs rgyas sam/_'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni nyan thos yin 
[\[270b.3\]]te/_pha rol las mnyan pa'i sgra la sbyor bar brtson pa ni ma yin no/_/kho bo ni rang sangs rgyas yin te/_snying rje chen po dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang bral ba ni ma yin no/_/kho bo ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin te bya ba'i rgyun bcad pa ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ji ltar nyan thos 
[\[270b.4\]]yin/_smras pa/_chos ma thos pa mnyan pa/_sems can thams cad la thos par byed de/_des na kho bo nyan thos yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ji ltar rang sangs rgyas yin/_smras pa/_kho bos chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rtogs te/_des na kho bo rang sangs 
[\[270b.5\]]rgyas so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ji ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/_smras pa/_kho bos chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par khong du chud de/_des na kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_
