[\[270b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/_'on te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/_sa gang la nges pa yin pa gzung bar bya/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo ni sa thams cad la nges pa yin par zung shig_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod so so'i skye bo'i sa la yang nges par gzung bar bya 
[\[270b.7\]]'am/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa'o/_/nges pa der sems can thams cad kyang nges pa ste/_kho bo yang nges pa der nges pa nyid do/_/des na kho bo so so'i skye bo'i sa la yang nges par 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]gzung bar bya'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gal te chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa yin na 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o/_/'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]sa'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes sa rnam par gzhag 
[\[271a.2\]]pa gdags par ga la 'gyur/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_dper na/_phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' la 'di ni shar phyogs kyi nam mkha'o/_/'di ni lho phyogs kyi'o/_/'di ni nub phyogs kyi'o/_/'di ni byang phyogs kyi'o/_/'di ni shar lho yi'o/_/'di ni lho nub kyi'o/_/'di ni 
[\[271a.3\]]nub byang gi'o/_/'di ni byang shar gyi'o/_/'di ni 'og gi'o/_/'di ni steng gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'o zhes brjod kyang phyogs cha la tha dad pa yod kyi/_nam mkha' la ni tha dad pa med do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par nges pa la/_de bzhin gshegs pa thabs 
[\[271a.4\]]la mkhas pas 'di ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o/_/'di ni nyan thos kyi sa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/_/zhes sa rnam par 'jog kyang sa rnam par gzhag pa la tha dad pa yod kyi yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la ni tha dad pa med do/_/
[\[271a.5\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs sam/_/smras pa/_zhugs pa yang yin la/_byung ba yang yin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na khyod zhugs pa yang yin la/_byung ba yang yin/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[271a.6\]]kyi thabs dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes blta bar bya ste/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di na skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig bshad pa'i don dpes shes par 'gyur ba yod de/_de'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon chen po zhig la sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_blta na sdug 
[\[271a.7\]]pa'i bu gcig pa zhig kyang yod/_de la mi sdug pa/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_phyir rgol ba zhig kyang yod pa las/_des bu gcig pa de thag ring po lam gol ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du de ni bdag la phyir rgol ba yin no snyam du sems skyes te/_des de gsad pa'i phyir mda' 'phangs nas 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]'phangs ma thag tu bu gcig pa yin pa'i 'du shes skyes te/_de sngon goms pa byas pas shin tu brgyugs te/_mda' de bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog pa nyid du lag gis 'dzin pa 'di ni don rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir dper byas pa'o/_/'di la don du blta ba gang zhe na/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'phong gi 
[\[271b.2\]]slob dpon zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor bu gcig pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' bu gcig pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog pa yin no/_/gsod pa'i phyir rgol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/
[\[271b.3\]]btsun pa rab 'byor mda' zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi slob dpon gyis mda' 'phangs la bu gcig pa'i lus la ma phog par shin tu brgyugs te 'dzin pa de bzhin du/_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[271b.4\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par so sor rtog go_/yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la rnam par bltas nas snying rje chen po dang /_thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs bskyed pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byed kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi 
[\[271b.5\]]gnas kyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang 'dzud do/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi yul yin/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten na yang spyod la 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis 
[\[271b.6\]]kyang mi gos shing 'jig rten na yang snang la chos thams cad la snang ba med pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa thams cad la yang snang las ngan pa la yang mi gnas pa dang /_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[271b.7\]]gang dag sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir yang brtson la/_chos kyi dbyings zad par ni yang dag par rjes su mi lta ba dang /_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus byas las kyang bskyod la 'dus ma byas kyang yang dag par ma rnyed pa dang /_btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khor ba la skyed mos tshal dang gzhal med khang du yang 'du shes la mya ngan las 'das pa yang don du gnyer zhing bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang /_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag med pa'i bzod pa yang thob la sems can yongs 
[\[272a.2\]]su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson pa dang /_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yang shes la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yang brtson pa dang /_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas thams 
[\[272a.3\]]cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par yang mthong la/_sangs rgyas kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyan gyi phyir brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yul lo/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di dag ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'o/_/
[\[272a.4\]]smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos yongs su shes pa dang ldan yang 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da' ba las 
[\[272a.5\]]rtsoms te spobs par gyis shig_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi chos las yang dag par 'da'/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o/_/lnga gang zhe na/_gzugs kyi phung po dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par 
[\[272a.6\]]shes pa'i phung po'o/_/de la gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o/_/tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o/_/'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni chu shing lta bu'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/dbu ba dang /_chu'i chu bur dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu shing dang /_sgyu ma gang yin pa de 
[\[272a.7\]]la 'jig rten yang med/_'jig rten du gdags pa yang med/_phung po rnams kyang med/_phung por gdags pa yang med par gang phung po'i rang bzhin la de ltar mos pa de ni yang dag par zhugs pa'o/_/gang yang dag par zhugs pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa'o/_/gang 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]'jig rten gyi chos rnams dang ma 'dres pa de 'jig rten gyi chos rnams las yang dag par 'da'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /_/gang rang bzhin gyis stong pa de la gnyis su med do/_/gang gnyis su med pa de la ngar 'dzin pa med/_nga yir 'dzin pa med do/_/gang la ngar 
[\[272b.2\]]'dzin pa med pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de la chags pa med de/_chags pa med pa rnyed pa ni 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rkyen la rag lus pa'o/_/gang dag rkyen la rag lus pa de dag rag lus pa med pa'o/_/gang dag rag lus pa 
[\[272b.3\]]med pa de dag bdag po med pa'o/_/gang dag bdag po med pa de dag bdag gi ba med pa'o gang dag bdag gi ba med pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de la 'thab pa med do/_/gang la 'thab pa med pa de la rtsod pa med do/_/gang la rtsod pa med pa de dag dge 
[\[272b.4\]]sbyong gi chos rtsod pa med pa'o/_/gang dag dge sbyong gi chos mi rtsod pa de dag nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs te/_chos thams cad kyang nam mkha' la lag pa dang mtshungs par shes nas 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang phung po lnga ni chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam 
[\[272b.5\]]pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings kyang dbyings med pa ste/_gang dbyings med pa de la mig gi khams med do/_/gzugs kyi khams med do/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/rna ba'i khams med do/_/sgra'i khams med do/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/sna'i 
[\[272b.6\]]khams med do/_/dri'i khams med do/_/sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/lce'i khams med do/_/ro'i khams med do/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/lus kyi khams med do/_/reg pa'i khams med do/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/yid kyi 
[\[272b.7\]]khams med do/_/chos kyi khams med do/_/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/gang khams med pa de la sa'i khams med do/_/chu'i khams med do/_/me'i khams med do/_/rlung gi khams med do/_/nam mkha'i khams med do/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams med do/_/
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]'dod pa'i khams med do/_/gzugs kyi khams med do/_/gzugs med pa'i khams med do/_/'dus byas kyi khams med do/_/'dus ma byas kyi khams med do/_/gang khams med pa de la bdag med/_sems can med/_srog med/_gso ba med/_gang zag med/_shed las skyes med/_shed bu med de/_
[\[273a.2\]]gang gis de dag rjes su rtogs pa med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa de 'jig rten las yang dag par 'da'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de las dge slong stong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/de dag sems rnam par grol nas rang rang gi bla 
[\[273a.3\]]gos kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bkab ste/_tshig 'di skad du gang dag chos zab mo bstan pa 'di la mos pa med pa'i sems can de dag ni thob pa yang med/_mngon par rtogs pa yang med do zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[273a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig mngon par rtogs/_dge slong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong ni thob pa med pa/_mngon par rtogs pa med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thob pa zhes bya ba de ni g.yo ba nyid do/_/mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba de ni 
[\[273a.5\]]rlom sems nyid do/_/g.yo ba dang rlom sems gang yin pa de ni bdud kyi las so/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag ni bdag gis thob bo/_/bdag gis mngon par rtogs so zhes 'di lta bu 'di dag gi tshul du rnam par rtog par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams 
[\[273a.6\]]shes sam/_smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das mkhyen pa dang ldan pas mkhyen te/_bdag cag ni ji ltar sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid mi shes par bdag gis sdug bsngal yongs su shes so zhes smra ba lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya zhing kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_'gog pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[273a.7\]]dang /_lam gyi mtshan nyid mi shes pa bdag gis lam bsgoms so zhes smra ba lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du rig par bya'o snyam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dang /_kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_'gog pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_lam gyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni skye 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de/_skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/mtshan nyid med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'o/_/chos thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de/_de la ni gang sdug bsngal yongs su shes so/_/gang kun 'byung ba spong ngo /_/gang 'gog pa mngon 
[\[273b.2\]]du byed do/_/gang lam sgom mo zhes bya ba gang yang mi dmigs te/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'di thos nas skrag pa de lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal 
[\[273b.3\]]pa/_rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis ji skad bstan pa de de bzhin no/_/rab 'byor dge slong 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid las zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos te/_chos zab mo mnyan pa de nyid kyi rgyus 'di ltar mngon 
[\[273b.4\]]par shes pa myur bar gyur to/_/zab mo'i chos bstan pa 'di la yang rjes su 'thun par gyur te mi 'thun pa ma yin no/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams ma gtogs par gang dag [(]da'i [,]de'i [)]gsung rab 'di la chos zab mo bstan pa 'di nyan cing 
[\[273b.5\]]thos nas kyang lhag par mos pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la 'dus pa gsum gyi grangs su gtogs par rig par bya'o/_/gang yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de ni bzod pa gang yang rung ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i bu dpal 
[\[273b.6\]{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod rgyun tu 'dzam bu'i gling na chos ston tam/_'jam dpal dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhud do/_/der dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la chos bstan du gsol/_de na lha'i bu sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag 
[\[273b.7\]]par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag yod de/_de dag yul phun sum tshogs pas bag med pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das dang /_khyod la chos nyan du mi 'ong bas na de dag chos mi nyan pas yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/_de dag khyod las chos thos nas dge ba'i 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]rtsa ba chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe gang gis lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa dang /_nyams dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang /_nyams dga' ba'i tshal dang /_
[\[274a.2\]]nyams dga' ba'i rdzing dang /_nyams dga' ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /_rim pa bdun dang /_brgyad dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bsil khang dang /_ba gam dang /_stegs bu dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung dang ldan pa de dag kyang snang ba dang /_lha'i bu mo rkang lag 'jam zhing mnyen pa/_gser gyi dra ba ltar 
[\[274a.3\]]'od rnam par dag pa/_smin ma legs pa/_'phral ba legs pa/_bzhin legs pa/_mig pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa sngon po lta bur mdzes shing dri ma med pa shin du yangs pa/_'dod pa'i sems bskyed pa/_zla ba tshes pa ltar mngon par dga' ba/_bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas pa de dag rgyud gcig pa dang /_pi bang 
[\[274a.4\]]dang /_sgra snyan dang /_khar ba'i sil khrol dang /_pheg dang /_rnga zlum dang /_rdza rnga dang /_rnga snyan pa dang /_gling bu dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang /_gar dang /_bzhad gad dang /_'jo ba dang /_sgeg pa dang /_rtse bas rgyags shing dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod pa dag kyang snang ba de lta bu'i rdzu 
[\[274a.5\]]'phrul mngon par bya ba mngon par byas so/_/de 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis rlabs so/_/de nas lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]rang gi gnas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yang mthong /_rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams kyang mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du gyur te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[274a.6\]]so/_/'jam dpal bdag cag 'di ltar myur du dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin te/_nyams dga' ba'i kun dga'i ra ba 'di dag dang zhes bya ba nas/_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod pa dang /_bdag gi rang gi gnas 'di dang rang gi g.yog ces bya ba'i bar du sbyar te/_'di dag snang ba ngo mtshar to/_/de 
[\[274a.7\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos la/_dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang ma phyin te/_lha'i bu 'on kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]shes pa dang /_lha'i bu kho bo cag kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas su zhugs par bdag nyid kyis shes pa de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]'di skad ces 
[\[274b.2\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_'di ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di sa phyogs 'di nas gang du yang ma g.yos par 'di snyam du bdag cag dga' 
[\[274b.3\]]ldan gyi gnas su phyin to snyam pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig ngas shes pa las khyod kyis ji tsam zhig shes te/_lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod 
[\[274b.4\]]pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad zhing gcig tu yang dag par ston to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag yod pa/_de dag gtsug phud kyis phug ste/_sting gi bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'jog go_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na rgya mtsho chen por gyur pa'i 
[\[274b.5\]]chu'i phung po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu blugs kyang chu'i sems can rnams la gnod pa med de/_thams cad kyang rang rang gi rgya mtsho chen po na gnas par bdag nyid kyis shes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad ri gcig tu byin gyis 
[\[274b.6\]]brlabs te/_ri de dag yungs kar gyi 'bru'i nang du bcug kyang ri rab la gnas pa'i lha de dag la yang gnod pa med de/_thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod par bdag nyid kyis shes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad lag pa g.yas 
[\[274b.7\]]pa'i mthil du bzhag ste/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde bar sbyar ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu dag de dag la sgrub po/_/gang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sreg par byed pa'i me de dag thams cad mar me'i snying po gcig gi me lce 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]tsam gyi mer byin gyis rlob ste/_des bya ba byed pa gang yin pa de byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig gi 'od kyis zil du rlag par byed do/_/lha'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 
[\[275a.2\]]'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul las brtsams nas nga bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par yang chos ston te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no//_//bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_de nas bdud sdig can 'khor de nyid 
[\[275a.3\]]du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug ste/_des bdag nyid dge slong gi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de bdag gis blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das tshig tsam du gsungs 
[\[275a.4\]]pas ci sman gyis bdag la mngon sum du gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can du mkhyen bzhin du sems can tshad med pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal ngas khyod la bskul gyis khyod kyis 
[\[275a.5\]]'khor 'di dag la rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang cho 'phrul ston cig dang /_sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar shes nas chos thams cad sems kyis dbang sgyur ba rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya 
[\[275a.6\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos thams cad sems kyis dbang sgyur ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 
[\[275a.7\]]'phrul bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du ma chad pa dang /_ma lhag pa dang /_mi mang bar mthong ngo /_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis cho 'phrul de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_sangs rgyas byung ba legs so legs so/_/sangs rgyas byung ba ni sems can rnams la don 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]chen por nye bar gnas so/_/de byung bas skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang 'jig rten du byung ba yin no/_/cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di lta bu yang 'jig rten na snang ba yin no zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis cho 'phrul de mthong ste/_ngo mtshar du gyur nas thal mo sbyar te 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[275b.2\]]nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste ngo mtshar to/_/sems can gang dag cho 'phrul bshad pa 'di thos nas mos pa de dag ngo mtshar che bar bdag gis bsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdud 
[\[275b.3\]]sdig can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur kyang de ltar mos pa'i sems can de la bar chad bgyi ba'i rngo mi thog lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can bdag ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol ba dang /_sems can rnams la yang gtse bar sems pa 
[\[275b.4\]]dang /_brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du yang zhugs pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa der kho ra khor yug tu dpag 
[\[275b.5\]]tshad brgya tshun chad du mig gis mi rtsol bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag mi mchi bar bdag yi dam de lta bu blang bar bgyi'o/_/gang dag 'chang ba dang /_'chad pa dang /_ston pa dang /_so sor rtog pa dang /_bsgrub pa de la ston pa la bgyi ba ltar gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'o na du 
[\[275b.6\]]lags kyang bdag gi 'khor gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i bar chad bgyi ba dang /_brtson pa rnams g.yengs par bgyi ba'i slad du zhugs pa dag mchis te de dag chad pas dgum pa'i slad du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a ma le/_
[\[275b.7\]]bi ma le/_s+thi ta twe/_a ga la ma ni rdzi ta sha tru/_dza ye dza ya ba ti/_b+hU ta ma ti/_sha me/_shAn ti/_a phu me/_phu phu me/_d+hi re/_a khe/_ma khe/_kha khe/_mi si le/_a ga me/_phu la te/_phu la/_phu le/_pha shu me/_shu shu me/_d+hi d+he re/_a na ba na te/_s+thi ta twe/_kr-i tA ra the/_kri tA bIr+ya/_bai ro tsa na sad d+harma b+ha Na ko 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]s+ya sU tra s+ya d+hA ri ka/_a b+h+ra mu ga ta i ba sUr+ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba gang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis kun du bsrungs pa de la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bar chad bgyi ba ni gnas ma lags shing skabs ma lags te/_de ni gnas ma mchis kyi steng du de la gos 
[\[276a.2\]]dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams nye bar bsgrub pa dang /_spro bar bgyi ba dang /_spobs par bgyi bar spro bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod pas g.yeng ba ma mchis 
[\[276a.3\]]pa'i rgyud kyis gdugs mtshan 'das par bgyid pa de dag lha rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur/_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bsrungs par 'gyur te/_de 
[\[276a.4\]]dag la slar rgol ba'am mi mdza' ba gang gis glags bltas kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sdig can legs so legs so/_/'dir khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa brjod pas 
[\[276a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_khyod kyi spobs pa de thams cad ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs su rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul dang byin gyi rlabs 'di bstan 
[\[276a.6\]]pa dang /_bdud kyi gsang sngags kyi stobs dang /_rig sngags kyi stobs bstan pa na srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdzu 'phrul bsdus nas lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces 
[\[276a.7\]]smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod dga' ldan gyi gnas su song la dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams sdus shig dang kho bo yang der 'ong ngo /_/de nas lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ltar mnyan te/_bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la bskor ba byas nas 'khor dang bcas par 'khor de nas mi snang bar gyur te dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to/_/de nas lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la smras pa/_grogs po dag shes 
[\[276b.2\]]par gyis shig_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'o bu cag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'dir 'ong gis de la dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha khyed dga' ba dang /_rtse ba la bag med pa 'or te bag yod par gyis la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la chos nyan du sheg shig_/de nas lha'i bu dpal 
[\[276b.3\]{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi dbus su lha'i yid las byung ba rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i 'khor gyi khyams chur shar nub tu dpag tshad sum khri nyis stong yod la/_zheng lho byang du dpag tshad khri drug stong yod pa byas te/_
[\[276b.4\]]der seng ge'i khri sna tshogs blta na sdug pa lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba stong phrag du ma byas so/_/de nas lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dag dang /_seng ge'i khri rnams kyang byas nas thal mo sbyar te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di 
[\[276b.5\]]skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa dang /_seng ge'i khri bkod pa bgyis lags na da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na gshegs su gsol/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dang /_nyan thos kyi mchog lnga brgya 
[\[276b.6\]]dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur 
[\[276b.7\]]nas/_skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams der rang gi khri ji ltar bshams pa la 'dug go_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_thams 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyang stan ci rigs pa la 'khod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_bdud kyi ris rnams dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i tshangs ris kyi lha nas bzung ste/_
[\[277a.2\]]'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos pa/_'di ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam chen po smra bar 'gyur gyis bdag cag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir nges par der 'dong bar bya'o/_/skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag mthong ba ni 
[\[277a.3\]]legs par mthong ba'o/_/de dag las chos thos pa ni legs par thos pa'o zhes sgra thos nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu tshad med grangs med pa dag rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/_dga' ldan gyi gnas su phyin to/_/
[\[277a.4\]]de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pas des lha'i 'khor de tsam du tshad med pa dag rin po che bkod pa'i khyams kyi 'khor de nyid du go skabs yangs par gnas par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[277a.5\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal lha'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus lags na chos kyi bka' mchid las brtsams te spobs par mdzad du gsol/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces 
[\[277a.6\]]smras so/_/grogs po dag chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba dag go_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste tshul khrims la gnas pa'i thos pa dang /_bsam gtan la gnas pa'i shes rab dang /_mngon par shes pa la gnas 
[\[277a.7\]]pa'i ye shes dang /_thabs la gnas pa'i bag yod pa ste/_grogs po dag chos bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o/_/grogs po dag de la yongs su dag pa rnam pa brgyad kyis tshul khrims la 'jug ste/_yongs su dag pa 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]rnam pa brgyad kyis ji ltar 'jug ce na/_'di lta ste/_lus dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /_ngag dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /_sems dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /_bsam pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /_'tsho ba dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang 
[\[277b.2\]]yo byad bsnyungs pa dag pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_gzhogs slong dang /_thob kyis 'jal ba thams cad rnam par spong ba'i rnam pas 'jug pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa ste/_grogs po dag de ltar yongs su dag 
[\[277b.3\]]pa rnam pa brgyad kyis tshul khrims la 'jug go_/grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis thos pa yongs su dag ste/_rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bla ma la gus pas yongs su dag pa dang /_nga rgyal bcom pas yongs su dag pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ting nge 'dzin thob pas 
[\[277b.4\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_dran pa mi g.yeng bas yongs su dag pa dang /_bstan pa dang rab tu bshad pas yongs su dag pa dang /_bdag la mi stod cing gzhan la mi smod pas yongs su dag pa dang /_tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos 
[\[277b.5\]]sgrub pas yongs su dag pa ste/_grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis thos pa yongs su dag go_/grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ste/_rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dgon pa la gnas shing dben pa la dga' bas yongs 
[\[277b.6\]]su dag pa dang /_'du 'dzi spong bas yongs su dag pa dang /_yul dang mi 'dre bas yongs su dag pa dang /_lus dang sems las su rung bas yongs su dag pa dang /_kha zas bsnyungs te lus 'tsho bas yongs su dag pa dang /_dmigs pa la 'jog pas yongs su dag pa dang /_sgra dang 
[\[277b.7\]]mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pas yongs su dag pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa dang zang zing med par so sor yang dag par bgeng pas yongs su dag pa ste/_grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis bsam gtan yongs su dag go_/grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]shes rab yongs su dag ste/_rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 
[\[278a.2\]]'byung ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /_bden pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /_dbang po la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_kun nas 
[\[278a.3\]]dkris pa dang /_lta ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas pa'i rnam pas yongs su dag pa ste/_grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis shes rab yongs su dag go_/grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag ste/_rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/_
[\[278a.4\]]'di lta ste/_sgrib pa med par gzugs thams cad mthong bas lha'i mig yongs su dag pa dang /_sgrib pa med par sgra thams cad thos pas lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta bas pha rol gyi sems shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[278a.5\]]sgrib pa med cing chags pa med par sngon gyi mtha' rjes su dran pas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro bas rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba yongs su dag pa dang /_zag pa thams cad zad pa shes pas bsal cing dus ma yin pa 
[\[278a.6\]]yongs su spangs pas zag pa zad pa yongs su dag pa dang /_g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems thams cad dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_ji ltar sngon dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pas shes pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa ste/_grogs po dag 
[\[278a.7\]]de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par shes pa yongs su dag go_/grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag ste/_rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po lnga yongs su shes pas sdug bsngal shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sred pa shin tu spong bas kun 'byung ba 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_brten nas skyes pa la skye ba med par so sor rtog pas 'gog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas lam shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bas rgyu shes pa yongs su 
[\[278b.2\]]dag pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gso ba med pas rkyen shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_'khor gsum yongs su gcod pas dus gsum shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ye shes thams cad la 'jug 
[\[278b.3\]]pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/_grogs po dag de ltar rnam pa brgyad kyis ye shes yongs su dag go_/grogs po dag de la rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag ste/_rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nang nye bar zhi bas yongs su dag pa 
[\[278b.4\]]dang /_phyi rol du mi rgyu bas yongs su dag pa dang /_khams gsum la mi gnas pas yongs su dag pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'thun pas yongs su dag pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pas yongs su dag pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa med par so sor rtog 
[\[278b.5\]]pas yongs su dag pa dang /_chos thams cad bdag med par so sor rtog pas yongs su dag pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis shin tu mi 'khrugs pas yongs su dag pa ste/_grogs po dag 'di ni rnam pa brgyad kyis nges par sems pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/grogs po dag de la 
[\[278b.6\]]rnam pa brgyad kyis bag yod pa yongs su dag ste/_rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang /_thos pa yongs su byang bas yongs su dag pa dang /_bsam gtan de la ma chags pas yongs su dag pa dang /_shes rab dang gsung rab 
[\[278b.7\]]kyis yongs su dag pa dang /_mngon par shes pa las ma nyams pas yongs su dag pa dang /_ye shes kyis rlom sems med pas yongs su dag pa dang /_nges par sems pas rtsod pa med pas yongs su dag pa dang /_dge ba'i chos chud mi za bas yongs su dag pa ste/_grogs po dag 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis bag yod pa yongs su dag go_/grogs po dag de lta bas na khyed bag yod par gyis shig_/bag yod pa la rton pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bde ba gsum las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lha'i bde ba dang /_bsam 
[\[279a.2\]]gtan gyi bde ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba'o/_/ngan song gsum las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten te gsum po de dag go_/sdug bsngal gsum gyis 'phrogs par mi 
[\[279a.3\]]'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal te gsum po de dag go_/'jigs pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa med pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_
[\[279a.4\]]'khor la bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa ste gsum po de dag go_/srid pa gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/_'dod pa'i srid pa dang /_gzugs kyi srid pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o/_dri ma gsum sbyong ste/_'dod chags kyi dri ma dang /_zhe sdang gi dri ma dang /_gti mug gi dri ma'o/_/
[\[279a.5\]]bslab pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /_lhag pa'i sems dang /_lhag pa'i shes rab bo/_/yongs su dag pa gsum thob par 'gyur te/_lus yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_sems yongs su dag pa'o/_/bsod nams bya ba las byung ba'i dngos po 
[\[279a.6\]]gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed de/_sbyin pa las byung ba dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgoms pa las byung ba'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum sgom par byed de/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa'o/_/rigs gsum rgyun mi gcod de/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[279a.7\]]rigs dang /_chos kyi rigs dang /_dge 'dun gyi rigs so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mi 'thun pa'i phyogs gsum gsum rab tu spong ste/_ser sna'i dri ma dang /_ser sna'i kun tu sbyor ba dang gtong ba dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang /_'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims las zlog pa dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]sdang ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_bzod pa las zlog pa dang /_bzod pa dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang /_le lo dang /_brtson 'grus las zlog pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_bsam gtan las zlog pa dang /_bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba 
[\[279b.2\]]dang /_'chal ba'i shes rab dang /_shes rab las zlog pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa rnams la sdang ba'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rton pa gsum gsum gyis nye bar rton te/_gsum gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang /_
[\[279b.3\]]byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang /_tshul khrims yang dag par len pa dang /_tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang /_byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang /_bzod cing des pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba dang /_byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang /_brtson 'grus gces pa mi 'dor ba dang /_blang ba med 
[\[279b.4\]]cing dor ba med pa dang /_byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang /_bsam gtan nye bar len pa dang /_mi gnas par bsam gtan byed pa dang /_byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang /_shes rab kyis snang ba dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba ste/_grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[279b.5\]]dpa' rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rton pa 'di gsum gsum gyis nye bar rton to/_/grogs po dag de lta bas na khyed cag bag yod par gyis shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang /_de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas 'thob 
[\[279b.6\]]bo/_/grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung ngus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa gang zhe na/_gang la lus kyi gnas med pa dang /_tshor ba'i gnas med pa dang /_sems kyi gnas med pa dang /_chos kyi gnas med pa de/_
[\[279b.7\]]chos thams cad kyi gnas med cing rten med pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o/_/tshegs chung ngus yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi bsgom pa gang zhe na/_gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /_gzod ma nyid 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]nas ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma 'thon pa dang /_mngon par ma grub par yang so sor rtog cing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te/_yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_chos 
[\[280a.2\]]thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par yang so sor rtog cing /_sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_sdig 
[\[280a.3\]]pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du yang mos la dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus 
[\[280a.4\]]rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /_chos thams cad rnam par grol bar yang yid ches la/_dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba dang /_nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba dang /_phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed cing 'bad la brtson 
[\[280a.5\]]'grus rtsom zhing sems rab tu 'dzin te yang dag par rab tu 'jog la chos thams cad la rtsom pa med cing rtul ba med par yang mthong ste/_yang mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de la chos gang gi skye ba yang med/_'gog pa yang med pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba bsgom pa'o/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 
[\[280a.6\]]bzhi bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa gang zhe na/_gang lus dang sems las su rung ba ste/_de sems las su rung bas dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yang mi 'dor la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang mngon par brtson pa dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[280a.7\]]yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la/_brtags nas kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor la sems sgyu ma lta bur yang rab tu shes pa dang /_ji ltar thos 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du yang dpyod la chos rnams la gnas par yang mi byed cing mngon par zhen pa yang med pa'o/_/de dbang po lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_dbang po drug la rten par mi byed cing sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir shes pa yang 
[\[280b.2\]]gtong la/_gcig tu gnas pa yang thob par 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dad pas kyang mi 'gro ba dang /_thams cad kyang yongs su thob la/_blang ba yang med cing dor ba yang med pa dang /_thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam la yang rmongs pa med la/_dran pa yang med cing yid la byed pa yang med pa dang /_chos 
[\[280b.3\]]thams cad kyi rjes su yang song la/_rtag tu mnyam par yang gzhag par gyur cing chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rab rib med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang thob par gyur la/_spros pa dang lta ba yang yang dag par chad pa 'di ni de'i dbang po bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[280b.4\]]pa'o/_/de stobs lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_dad pa'i stobs dang ldan pas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba dang /_dran pa'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad 
[\[280b.5\]]du mi 'phrogs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis sgrib pa rnams kyis mi non pa dang /_shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pas lta bar gyur pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa ste/_de ltar stobs lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[280b.6\]]par 'gyur te/_byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos thams cad mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom 
[\[280b.7\]]pa dang /_byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /_zang zing med pa'i chos la dga' ba rab tu myang bar bya ba'i phyir dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /_lus dang sems kyi g.yo ba dang bral ba'i phyir 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa mngon par bsgrubs pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa dang /_mtho dma' med pa'i btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa ste/_'di ni byang 
[\[281a.2\]]chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa zhes bya'o/_/grogs po dag bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung ngus 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_lam bsgom pa gang zhe na/_gang 'di rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bsgom pa dang /_'dod pa 
[\[281a.3\]]dang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa bsgom pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba med pa'i yang dag pa'i ngag bsgom pa dang /_tshul 'chos pa dang /_kha gsag dang /_gzhogs slong dang /_thob kyis 'jal ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba bsgom 
[\[281a.4\]]pa dang /_lus dang sems nyam chung ba dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' bsgom pa dang /_bdag la stod pa dang /_gzhan la smod pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i rtsol ba bsgom pa dang /_gti mug dang rmongs pa dang bral ba'i yang dag pa'i dran pa bsgom pa dang /_rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang 
[\[281a.5\]]bral ba'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa ste/_'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa zhes bya'o/_/des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub dang /_de las gzhan pa'i dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa dag kyang bag yod pas thob ces bya'o/_/grogs po dag de 
[\[281a.6\]]ltar na bag yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po 'di dag la 'jug go_/zhugs nas 'du byed thams cad kyi 'dam las rgal lo/_/rgal nas kyang rnam par lta ste/_rnam par bltas na mi mthong ngo /_/mi 'bar ro/_/shin tu nye bar zhi ste rnam par 'khrul bar 
[\[281a.7\]]mi byed do/_/shin tu nye bar zhi ba gang zhe na/_gang nye bar ma bsgrubs pa de ma byas pa'o/_/gang ma byas pa de myong ba med pa'o/_/gang myong ba med pa de la gdags pa med do/_/gdags pa med pa ni shin tu nye bar zhi ba'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' lam ji ltar sgom/_smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor ba yang mi spong la/_'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams kyis kyang mi gos 
[\[281b.2\]]so/_/'dus ma byas su yang mi ltung la/_'dus ma byas kyi yon tan rnams kyang myong ngo /_/pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam yang sgom la/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang snang ngo /_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni stong pa nyid kyis rnam par dag pa yang yin la/_
[\[281b.3\]]lta bar gyur pa la yang mkhas shing lta bar gyur pa la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/_/mtshan ma med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/_mtshan ma la yang mkhas shing mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/_/smon pa med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/_khams gsum pa la yang 
[\[281b.4\]]mkhas shing khams gsum pa la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/_/skye ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pas rnam par dag pa yang yin la/_skye ba dang 'jig pa la yang mkhas shing skye ba dang 'jig pa la mngon par zhen pa yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par sems 
[\[281b.5\]]pa rnams ni sems can chos thams cad stong pa'o snyam pa'i lta bar gyur par zhugs pa/_lta bar gyur pa bag la nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa spang ba'i phyir chos kyang ston la/_lta bar gyur pa de dag kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems nges par 
[\[281b.6\]]sems pa ni mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa'i chos thams cad la 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i rjes su 'thun pa/_'byung ba dang 'jig pa bag la nyal bar byas pa rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig par lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos kyang 
[\[281b.7\]]ston la/_'byung ba dang 'jig pa de yang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med pa nyid du mthong ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam sgom pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]kyi 'gro ba ni sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la'o/_/'ong ba ni so so ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa skyed pa'i phyir ro/_/'ong ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi nang du skye ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 
[\[282a.2\]]'phags pa'i lam du'o/_/'ong ba ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'gro ba ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'ong ba ni bzod pa de sems can gyi khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni 'byung ba la mkhas 
[\[282a.3\]]pa la'o/_/'ong ba ni 'byung ba ma yin par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro/_/'ong ba ni 'khor ba na sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'gro ba ni gang du yang 'gro ba dang /_'ong ba med par so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[282a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ong ba ni chos khong du chud par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'gro ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro/_/'ong ba ni rnam par rtog pa gsum spang bar chos ston pa'i phyir ro/_/'gro ba ni dam bcas pa brtan par byed 
[\[282a.5\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/'ong ba ni dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'ong ba ni byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i phyir te/_lha'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes 
[\[282a.6\]]bya'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so/_/de nas lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bgyi ba zhig 
[\[282a.7\]]thos na 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de phyogs gang na mchis/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba zhig chos ston/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba chos ston to/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[282b.2\]]yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de blta bar bgyi'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[282b.3\]]gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lus las de dang 'thun pa'i 'od byung ste/_'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed po de dag snang bar byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de yang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[282b.4\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes pa de dag gis 'od de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'od 'di ltar yongs su dag pa 'di gang nas mchis/_
[\[282b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[282b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/'tsho 'o/_/gzhes so/_/chos kyang ston to/_/de na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de'i lus kyi 'od 
[\[282b.7\]]kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag snang ba chen pos khyab bo/_/des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang snang ba chen pos khyab bo/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]pa shAkya thub pa de dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa blta bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa las 'od zer stong byung ste/_'od zer de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[283a.2\]]gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las 'das te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[283a.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyi 'od de mthong zhing /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[283a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[283a.5\]]bu dag de ltar chos kyi gtam chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na/_khyed kyi nang nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'gro bar spro ba su yod/_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin ces bya ba der 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des bcom ldan 'das de la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[283a.6\]]'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi bar spro lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes sgron ma 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' bye ba 
[\[283a.7\]]phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang /_brkyang ba las bskum 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]pa tsam gyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun gyi steng gi bar snang la gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs par phyin to/_/de'i g.yog 'khor 
[\[283b.2\]]de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa legs par gnas pa rnams su phyin to/_/de dag rang rang gi stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/'jam dpal bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[283b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po des khyod la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dir btang ngo /_/khyod kyis 'od bkye ba de yang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/_/de nas 
[\[283b.4\]]'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_kye ma ji tsam du 'di ltar myur bar 'od zer 'di 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin pa dang /_ji ltar myur bar byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag 'jig 
[\[283b.5\]]rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa 'di ni skyes bu dam pa de dag gi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[283b.6\]]pas lha'i 'khor chen po de ltar 'dus pa de la ci nas kyang lha khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta de ltar chos bstan to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji srid du dga' ldan gyi gnas 
[\[283b.7\]]su lha rnams kyi don bya ba de srid du byas nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag dang lhan cig_/rang gi 'khor dang lhan cig_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/_sems kyi 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]'gyu ba tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/_phyogs gcig tu rang rang gi stan la 'khod 
[\[284a.2\]]do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 
[\[284a.3\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[284a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par rab tu gzengs stod de yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad cing yang 
[\[284a.5\]]dag par 'dzin du bcug la yang dag par gzengs stod de/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[284a.6\]]ye shes sgron ma 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang /_sems can sdud pa dang /_yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_thabs dang /_rigs pa dang /_ye shes dang /_shes rab kyi rab tu dbye ba dang spobs pa la ltos/_grogs po dag byang chub sems 
[\[284a.7\]]dpa' 'di dag ni bskal pa grangs med pa nas bzung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa dag go_/sems can gang dag gis dbang po drug po dag la skyes bu dam pa 'di dag mngon par 'gyur ba de dag ni phyis bdud kyi yul la gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub sems dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las chos thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[284b.2\]]dpa' ye shes sgron ma 'dzin dang lhan cig lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan bdun bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos par byas te/_bcom ldan 
[\[284b.3\]]'das kyi drung nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/
[\[284b.4\]]gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na 'di'i ming ji skad bgyi bar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam 
[\[284b.5\]]dpal gyi le'u dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha'i bu dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[284b.6\]]dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u 
[\[284b.7\]]ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_mu ni bar ma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa ste/[ {D80}]'phags pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa lung bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su s+thi ta ma ti de ba pu tra pa ri pr-i ts+tshA nA ma ma hA 
[\[285a.2\]]yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong 
[\[285a.3\]]drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa dgra bcom pa sha stag dang /_'jam dpal dang /_seng ge'i tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_
[\[285a.4\]]mthu chen thob dang /_spobs pa brtsegs dang /_gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_lhun po brtsegs pa dang /_lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rab tu mi sgul dang /_don rab sems dang /_legs par bsam pa sems dang /_sems dpa' ba dang /_sems kyi blo gros dang /_sems bzang po dang /_
[\[285a.5\]]nor bu brtsegs dang /_ri 'joms rgyal po dang /_lag na rin po che dang /_sems pa rin po che dang /_lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /_rtag tu lag bteg dang /_rtag tu lag brkyang dang /_rtag tu brtson dang /_sems can sgrol dang /_brtson 'grus mos pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa la 
[\[285a.6\]]gnas pa dang /_smon lam 'phags dang /_lag na sgron ma dang /_sems mnyam dang /_ngan song spong ba dang /_mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang /_brtson pa mi gtong dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_rdo rjes rnam par gnon dang /_mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang /_dpag med rnam par 
[\[285a.7\]]gnon dang /_mi g.yo gnas kyis rnam par gnon dang /_nam mkha' mdzod dang /_blo gros dam pa dang /_khyad par blo gros dang /_blo gros 'phel dang /_'gro grub dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_zla 'od dang /_zla ba'i tog dang /_'od kyi tog dang /_'od dpal dang /_snang ba thob pas rnam par gnon dang /_
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]seng ge ltar rnam par gnon pas mngon par bsgrags pa'i nga ro dang /_spobs pa thogs med dang /_spobs pa bzhad pa dang /_spobs pa dpa' ba dang /_rnam par gnon dang /_nyi zla'i 'od zer mog mog por byed pa'i 'od dang /_dmigs med dang /_blo gros dpe med dang /_rtag tu bzhad dgyes dbang po 
[\[285b.2\]]dang /_nor bu dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_bud med rnam sgyur go cha dang /_rab tu snang ba dang /_rnam par snang byed dang /_mes byin dang /_tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs zab mo dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems 
[\[285b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhi khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_de dag dang gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri tsam dang yang thabs cig go_/lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang /_lha'i bu mtshams 
[\[285b.4\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /_lha'i bu blo gros bzang po dang /_de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu bdun khri sum stong dang yang thabs cig go_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po 
[\[285b.5\]]lhun po dang /_de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po nyi khri dang yang thabs cig go_/klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po zla ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_de dag la sogs pa thams cad kyang byang chub 
[\[285b.6\]]sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po drug khri dang yang thabs cig go_/de dag dang gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 'bum phrag du ma dang /_dge slong dang /_dge 
[\[285b.7\]]slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag dang yang thabs cig ste/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang gi gnas na 'dug pa/_gcig pu dben par gyur cing nang du 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_sems med cing sems dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[286a.2\]]pa langs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[286a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni brgya la brgya lam na ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ba de bzhin du gang dag skye ba'i sdug bsngal zad par bya ba'i phyir zhi ba gsal ba/_brtag tu med pa/_rtog ge ba dang bral ba/_
[\[286a.4\]]zab pa/_shes par dka' ba'i chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na ni chos mnyan pa yang med do/_/chos mnyan pa med na ni sems can rnams kyi 
[\[286a.5\]]sdug bsngal zad pa yang med pas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/_zhu ba zhus pa ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams sangs 
[\[286a.6\]]rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la nem nur med cing the tshom med par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can 'di dag ni 'dod chags che ba/_zhe sdang che ba/_gti mug che ba/_dkar po'i chos dang bral 
[\[286a.7\]]ba/_mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa/_glen pa/_blun pa/_mi gus pa/_sangs rgyas dang bral ba/_chos dang bral ba/_dge 'dun dang bral ba sha stag yin pas ci nas kyang sems can 'di dag gis chos thos nas shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i zhu ba zhu'o snyam mo/_/
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag zab mo'i bzod pa 'di la lus kyis mngon du byed par 'gyur ba 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o 
[\[286b.2\]]snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun tu snang ba dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun du snang ba dri med bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la shar phyogs dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[286b.3\]]zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mnyan pa/_'jam pa/_rnam par dag pa/_'od gsal ba/_dri ma med pa/_yongs su dag pa'i 'od chen po dang /_snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/'od de dang /_snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag dang /_
[\[286b.4\]]ri'i rtse mo dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_ri dang /_khor yug dang /_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen po dang /_gangs dang /_ri rab dang /_lhun po chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[286b.5\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang dag bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag la rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba dag gis zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i 'od 'di ltar yid du mchi ba/_'di ltar 'od gsal ba'i snang ba chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba 'di bcom ldan 'das 
[\[286b.6\]]rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das 'od 'dis bdag cag sems dang ba dang /_lus sim pa chen po dang ldan zhing sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dag kyang kun du mi 'byung lags na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkye ba 
[\[286b.7\]]'di su'i mthu lags/_'di su'i byin gyis brlabs lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsnyen bkur ba de dag la cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na lha'i sgra dang /_klu'i sgra dang /_gnod sbyin gyi 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]sgra dang /_lha ma yin gyi sgra dang /_nam mkha' lding gi sgra dang /_dri za'i sgra dang /_mi 'am ci'i sgra dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i sgra dang /_mi'i sgra dang /_mi ma yin pa'i sgra dang /_bya'i sgra dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur to/_/rlung gi sgra 
[\[287a.2\]]dang /_chu'i phung po'i sgra dang /_rgya mtsho chen po'i shugs kyi sgra dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu dbyangs kyi sgra gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mi grag par gyur te/_'ga' yang sgra mi 'byin cing thams cad zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi bar gyur to/_/yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen 
[\[287a.3\]]bkur ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to/_/skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis 'od 'di lta bu bkye zhing des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[287a.4\]]'di dag thams cad snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i mthu lags pa bshad du gsol/_de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus nas gsung gi 
[\[287a.5\]]phrin las brjod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin du gsung zhing de dag gis gsung gi phrin las sgra dbyangs gcig tu bsdus pa de lta bu des bsnyen bkur ba de dag la bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsung brjod pa des sangs rgyas 
[\[287a.6\]]kyi zhing thams cad kun du gang bar gyur te/_lha dang mir bcas pa'i sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang sgra mngon par 'byin cing rol mo'i sgra dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra grag par gyur to/_/rol mo'i sgra de dag las mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung 
[\[287a.7\]]zhing stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang /_smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang /_rnam par grol ba'i sgra dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi sgra dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang /_sbyin pa'i sgra dang /_tshul khrims kyi sgra dang /_
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]bzod pa'i sgra dang /_brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang /_bsam gtan gyi sgra dang /_shes rab kyi sgra dang /_des pa'i sgra dang /_phan pa'i dngos po'i sgra dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi sgra dag dang /_de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi sgo 'bum phrag du ma dag gi sgra byung bar 
[\[287b.2\]]gyur to/_/sgra byung ba de dag gis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /_nyan thos nyid dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid dang /_brgya byin nyid dang /_tshangs pa nyid dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su 'grub 
[\[287b.3\]]pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyed la ci zhig byas thong shig_/'od 'di ni ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_ji 
[\[287b.4\]]tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba byas pa yin te/_'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no/_/gal te de bzhin 
[\[287b.5\]]gshegs pas 'od 'di'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad 'di la rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/'od 'di ni byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms thams cad kyis yongs su bsgos pas yongs su tshim par byed pa ste/_'od 'di'i bsngags pa 
[\[287b.6\]]brjod par gyur na bskal pa 'am/_bskal pa las lhag par yang bsngags pa brjod pa'i mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta mod kyi 'on kyang legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang /_khyed la bshad par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur 
[\[287b.7\]]ba de dag gis lan gnyis lan gsum du 'di skad ces gsol to/_/skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_de skad ces 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]gsol pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang rang gi bsnyen bkur ba de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[288a.2\]]shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa de snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[288a.3\]]gnas par 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis gzir ba'i sems can mi gus pa/_dbang po rtul ba/_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang bral ba/_nyon mongs pa can gyi las la spyod pa de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[288a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[288a.5\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba mthu che ba/_shes pa che ba/_brtson 'grus che ba/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par ston par byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par gzengs stod pa/_
[\[288a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i go 'byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma'i go 'byed pa/_chos thams cad kyi gzhi rab tu 'byed pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/_chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha 
[\[288a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa thob pa/_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/_gzungs thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa de 'di lta ste/_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la chos kyi zhu ba zhus par gyur te/_rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[288b.2\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa de nyan cing 'du bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag phyogs bcu nas bsdu ba'i phyir 'od 'di bkye ste/_rigs kyi bu dag snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung ba 'di'i rgyu ni de yin/_
[\[288b.3\]]rkyen ni de yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur ba de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 
[\[288b.4\]]'di 'gyed pa lags/_bka' stsal pa/_ting nge 'dzin kun du snang ba dri med bkod pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas 'od 'di lta bu 'di 'gyed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[288b.5\]]rnams ni 'di ltar gsal ba/_'di ltar rnam par dag pa/_'di ltar lus dang sems dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i 'od 'di lta bu 'gyed par mi mdzad lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[288b.6\]]bskul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rtag tu mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang gA'i klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[288b.7\]]'bum phrag dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba der dong ste/_lhags nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i 'od 'di lta bu dang /_snang ba 'di lta bu dang /_'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di ga las mchis su'i 'od lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub 
[\[289a.2\]]sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos 
[\[289a.3\]]kyang ston to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa des 'di lta ste/_phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i phyir 'od 'bar ba 'di lta bu 'di bkye'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[289a.4\]]la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /_zhu ba dang /_
[\[289a.5\]]zhu blag bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dang /_de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab par shes na deng shig_/
[\[289a.6\]]de nas de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'di lta ste/_dper na mi stobs po che'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/_brkyang 
[\[289a.7\]]ba las bskum pa tsam la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags par gyur to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/_/la la dag ni phye ma dang /_byug pa dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos kyi char dag dang /_me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_
[\[289b.2\]]a ti mug ta ka dang /_skya snar dang /_d+ha nu ska ri dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_bAr shi ka dang /_bAr shi ka chen po dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_pA ru Sha ka dang /_pA ru Sha ka chen po dang /_zla mdog dang /_zla mdog chen po dang /_zla mdog rab mdzes la sogs 
[\[289b.3\]]pa me tog gi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char dag dang /_spos kyi char dag dang /_phreng ba'i char dag dang /_phye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu 'bebs shing /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags 
[\[289b.4\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu gsil zhing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' la la dag ni de bzhin 
[\[289b.5\]]gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs re res kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sgra dbyangs kyis go bar byed cing lhags te/_de lta bu'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[289b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der lhags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na
