[\[289b.7\]]sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar gyur to/_/sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod pa med/_zhe sdang gis ma yin/_gti mug gis ma yin/_
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]nga rgyal gyis ma yin/_phrag dog gis ma yin/_ser snas ma yin/_'chab pas ma yin/_khro bas ma yin/_yongs su gdung bas ma yin te/_sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang /_mchog tu dga' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas byang 
[\[290a.2\]]chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[290a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la lus mi snang bar byas te/_lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[290a.4\]]par zhugs nas rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i pad ma kha dog sna tshogs 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i pad ma'i snying po dag la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i chos kyi cho 'phrul chen po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de dang /_me tog 
[\[290a.5\]]gi char dang /_spos kyi char dang /_phye ma'i char de dag dang /_sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po sgra 'byin pa de dag dang /_snang ba chen po de yang mthong /_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dag gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs par gyur pa yang mthong /_'khor phal 
[\[290a.6\]]po che lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur 
[\[290a.7\]]snang ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po stan las langs te/_chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]gis mngon par bstod do/_/rab dga' bde ba stsol ba shin tu dri ma med pa'i zhal/_/mi yi dam pa stobs bcu yon tan brgya dag nges bsags pa/_/bsam yas gzhal du ma mchis yid gnyis mun pa sel ba bo/_/sa bla lha yul rnam par rgyu ba khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/_/bskal pa 
[\[290b.2\]]khrag khrig phrag brgyar sbyin dang dul ba legs par spyad/_/bde gshegs khyod kyi tshul khrims mtshungs pa ma mchis gnas ma mchis/_/bzod stobs shin du stobs dang ldan pa stobs bcu'i stobs ldan pa/_/yon tan mnga' ba 'dzum mdzad bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/_/
[\[290b.3\]]sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas bskal pa brgya dag rnam spyad kyang /_/skyo zhing spong ba mi mnga' dgyes pa gzhal du ma mchis brnyes/_/sras dang sras mo btsun mo rgyal srid spyan dang sna tshogs btang /_/spyan dgyes thams cad gtong ba bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/_/khyod 
[\[290b.4\]]kyis sngon chad chibs dang glang po shing rta dpung chung stsal/_/gtong la dgyes pas dbu dang na bza' khrag khrig brgya yang btang /_/thub pas zhal zas stsang nan de bzhin pho brang dkor yang stsal/_/sbyin dang gtong la rtag tu dgyes pa bde gshegs khyod la zhu/_/stong pa'i 
[\[290b.5\]]chos rnams nges par brten cing thugs la legs dgongs pas/_/rdul bral sku lus gtubs kyang sdug bsngal 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing /_/gsungs zhes zhus na bzod pa gsung ba'i stobs la brtson pa yi/_/yon tan mnga' ba rdul dang bral ba khyod la zhu ba 'tshal/_/'dod 
[\[290b.6\]]chags zhe sdang dag gis rab dkrugs rmongs shing kun dkris la/_/bdag tu 'du shes brtson pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni/_/thugs rje bskyed nas bskal pa brgya dag srid pa 'dir spyad pa/_/dpa' bo lam rab ston par mdzad pa bdag gi skyabs gyur cig_/
[\[290b.7\]]bde gshegs legs pa mdzad pa khyod ni 'gro la thogs mi mnga'/_/spyad pa legs par spyad pas rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ye shes brnyes/_/bdag dang sems can rnam par gshig cing stong pa'i chos la brtson/_/shin tu dri ma ma mchis bsam bsgom bdag gi the tshom khum/_/
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]khyod kyis sngon ni sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang /_/bsam gtan shes rab snying rje byams pa mtshungs pa ma mchis bsten/_/khyod kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab chu 'dzin rgya mtsho bzhin/_/'byung gnas bzang po shin tu gnas pa bdag gi 
[\[291a.2\]]skyabs gyur cig_/rdul bral khyod kyis sku lus dum bu dum bur bcad cing ni/_/srang la gcal ba mdzad cing dam dum lhag rol ma lus par/_/sku kun ril gyis btang ste phug ron phru gu gcig ma btang /_/rdul bral 'od mdzad thugs rje mnga' ba the tshom gcad du gsol/_/lha 
[\[291a.3\]]tshogs gnas pa'i ri bo g.yos shing dgung ni rdib gyur la/_/lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyi gnas mal rgya mtsho bas gyur cing /_/mkha' la gnas shing rgyu ba'i dgung zla dog sar lhung gyur kyang /_/rgyal ba drang po mdzad pa khyod ni log pa'i tshig mi gsung /_/de nas gnas brtan 'od 
[\[291a.4\]]srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'jig rten du byung zhing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags 
[\[291a.5\]]rkyen ni gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung 'di lta bu'i gtam dris pas khyod la ci zhig bya thong shig_/'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 
[\[291a.6\]]yin no/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan par gyur na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs shing bslang par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bshad du 
[\[291a.7\]]gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung de'i phyir legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das legs so 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od srung 'di na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun du snang ba dri med bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i 
[\[291b.2\]]klung bye ba'i bye ma snyed dag 'od kyis snang bar byas nas 'od des phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yang dag par bskul te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas de dag 
[\[291b.3\]]gis da gzod nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te/_nga la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam na pad ma dag la 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[291b.4\]]sems dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing spos kyi char dag dang /_phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/_sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung de de 
[\[291b.5\]]bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthus me tog gi char 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu bab cing spos kyi char dag dang /_phye ma'i char 'di dag kyang rab tu bab la/_sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byin to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di na byang 
[\[291b.6\]]chub sems dpa' 'ga' yang mi gda'o/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung de dag ni nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'od srung 'di ltar nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[291b.7\]]rnams snying rje chen po gang dang /_byams pa chen po gang dang /_phan par 'dod pa gang dang /_spyod pa gang la gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab gang la gnas 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]pa de la mi gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams gang la spyod pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de la yang mi spyod pa'i phyir ro/_/'od srung byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas de dag ni nyan thos 
[\[292a.2\]]rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas dag gis blta bar mi nus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs pa kho nar zad do/_/'od srung rigs kyi bu de dag ni 'di ltar sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[292a.3\]]kyis kyang re shig mi mthong na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[292a.4\]]chos du dag dang /_spyod pa ci 'dra ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/_byang 
[\[292a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa 'thob par 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_mtshan ma thams cad 
[\[292a.6\]]rnam par 'jig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing de la rlom sems med pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la lhag par dmigs pa med cing de las ye shes yongs su tshol ba dang /_lus dang srog kyang yongs su gtong na dngos po gzhan dag 
[\[292a.7\]]lta ci smos te/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /_tshogs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'dzin cing tshogs des rlom sems med pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dpag tu med pa yongs su 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]rdzogs par byed cing pha rol du phyin pa de dag la rtog pa med pa dang /_bdag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bkod nas phyis byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro bar bya'o snyam yang sems can rnams dang byang chub mi dmigs pa ste/_'od srung byang chub sems dpa' chos 
[\[292b.2\]]bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das 
[\[292b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pas nam yang sems 'ga' yang ma bskyed pa'i legs par gsungs pa gsung ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags te/_bdag gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos rnams la 
[\[292b.4\]]yang dgong par bgyi na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung de lta bas na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mi 
[\[292b.5\]]nus te/_ting nge 'dzin de'i ming yang ma shes na snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems 
[\[292b.6\]]dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'das kyi bar du khyod re shig sdod cig dang /_de nas byang 
[\[292b.7\]]chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de las ldang zhing de'i 'og tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'od srung de lta mod kyi khyod nyid ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi gnas thob pa yin gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa rtogs shig_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa blta ba'i phyir de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[293a.2\]]dpa' de dag gi 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba yang ma shes/_de dag gi gnas dang rab tu gnas pa yang ma shes/_ci byed pa dang /_ci ston pa dag kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du ma shes ma mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[293a.3\]]ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ting nge 'dzin nyi khri la snyoms par zhugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ma mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag da dung thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob 
[\[293a.4\]]par de ltar zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pas kyang de lta lags na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi 
[\[293a.5\]]bgyid/_bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi slad du go cha 'tshal bar bgyid pa ni go cha legs par 'tshal ba lags pas ting nge 'dzin 'di ni slad kyis kyang yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[293a.6\]]'od srung de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang ma yin na sems can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab can rnams kyi 
[\[293a.7\]]mchog tu bstan pa yin gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag spyod lam ji lta bus gnas pa bdag gis brtag par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin sum khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag gi mtshan ma yang 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]shes par ma nus so/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_rang gi stobs bskyed pas ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri 
[\[293b.2\]]la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag gis 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba yang ma shes/_'greng ba yang ma mthong /_'chag pa yang ma mthong /_'dug pa yang ma mthong /_nyal bar yang ma mthong ste/_de dag blta bar ma nus so/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 
[\[293b.3\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa la gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan te/_bdag zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[293b.4\]]bdag gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur cing gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams cig shos kyang rnga bo che'i sbubs gcig tu gyur la/_der mi la la zhig skyes nas der ri rab tsam gyi rnga shing thogs te/_bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 
[\[293b.5\]]zhugs pa'i mdun du mchis nas sug las gzhan mi bgyid par bskal pa'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par rnga bo che de gnyis brdungs par gyur kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa'i slad du de ltar bsgrubs te zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa la re shig bskal pa 'das par 
[\[293b.6\]]gnas pa'i rnga bo che de gnyis kyi sgra de dag bdag gi rna ba'i rnam par rig pa tsam du yang grags par mi 'gyur na des ting nge 'dzin de las slongs pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_de ni gnas ma mchis lags na bcom ldan 'das bdag nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gnas pa de lta bu dang ldan zhing ye shes de 
[\[293b.7\]]lta bu dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin bzhi khri la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par langs kyang de dag ma mthong ste/_de dag gi gnas kyang ma 'tshal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes de lta bu yongs 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]su tshol ba na sems can re re'i slad du bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg par gyur kyang spro bar bgyi zhing bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/_/
[\[294a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag len pa ma mchis par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni bdag slad ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'khor bar spyod cing de lta bu'i theg pa chen po yang yongs su spong bar mi bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la legs 
[\[294a.3\]]so zhes bya ba byin te/_rab 'byor khyod kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus tshig de skad smras pa legs so legs so/_/rab 'byor khyod gal te phung po 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma gyur du zin na khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang gA'i klung 
[\[294a.4\]]gi bye ma snyed du 'jug cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag mang ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde 
[\[294a.5\]]bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor yongs su brtag pa'i phyir gal te sems can de dag thams cad dge slong rab 'byor dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_'od srung chen po ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i shes pa dang ldan par gyur la/_rab 'byor nyan thos chen po de lta bu de 
[\[294a.6\]]dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta ba'i phyir bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar brtags kyang mthong bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang dag la spyod pa de dag la mi spyod pa'i 
[\[294a.7\]]phyir te/_rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas ma yin no/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]gyur pa gnas de nyid na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po 'di dag 'dus kyis/_bdag gis lha 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bsdu bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon 
[\[294b.2\]]par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas na 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas pas pad ma'i shing rta'i phang lo tsam 'dab ma ni gser/_sdong bu ni dngul/_snying po ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po/_ze ba ni bai DUr+ya las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[294b.3\]]brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mngon par sprul cing pad ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dpal dang ldan pa/_kha dog dang ldan pa/_gzi brjid dang ldan pa/_'od gsal ba dag pad ma'i snying po dag gi dbus na skyil mo 
[\[294b.4\]]krung gis 'dug pa'i lus gzugs dag kyang mngon par sprul to/_/de nas pad ma de dag rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris nas bzung ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa kun 
[\[294b.5\]]'khor dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_
[\[294b.6\]]gya nom snang ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar dang /_de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris ther 'bum nas 'og min gyi lha'i ris kyi bar gyi 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha 
[\[294b.7\]]rnams kyi gnas ji snyed pa thams cad du 'dong zhing sgra sgrogs par byed/_dbyangs rjod par byed/_yang dag par skul bar byed de/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]smras so/_sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rtsa lag rnams/_/'jig rten du ni lan 'ga' 'byung /_/u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar/_/sangs rgyas de bzhin shin tu dkon/_/shAkya seng ge mi yi mchog_/de ni 'jig rten 'dir byung ste/_/sdug bsngal thams cad 
[\[295a.2\]]zad byed pa'i/_/chos ni yang dag de ston mdzad/_/lha yi 'dod pa yid dga' la/_/ji snyed yun ring spyad byas na/_/gang du tshor ba myong 'gyur ba'i/_/ngan song rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/_/ji srid 'dod pa rnams bsten pa/_/srid pa phyir zhing rab tu 'phel/_/khams gsum 
[\[295a.3\]]'khor ba'i srog chags la/_/bde ba yod pa ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab dkon dang /_/khom pa dam pa rnyed nas ni/_/gang dag bag med mi rtogs pa/_/de dag sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas blta phyir deng la ni/_/chos kyi dam pa nyan par gyis/_/'jig 
[\[295a.4\]]rten 'dren pa 'das 'og tu/_/phyi dus 'gyod par ma byed cig_/mi rnams gang dag rtag myos shing /_/'jigs chen bdud kyi zhags pa yi/_/bag med spyod par byed rnams la/_/thar pa yod par ga la 'gyur/_/da ni 'di skad smra bar bya/_/bsod nams byas pa'i sems can gang /_/
[\[295a.5\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba'i/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas dang myur phrad byos/_/gang dag byams pa bsam yas pa'i/_/'jig rten mgon rnams ma gtogs par/_/sems can rnams kyi skyabs gzhan med/_/dpung gnyen gzhan yang yod ma yin/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ge 
[\[295a.6\]]yis/_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/bskal pa bye bar spyad mdzad nas/_/ye shes dam pa brnyes nas ni/_/gang la sems can mi dmigs shing /_/srog dang gang zag yod min pa'i/_/chos mchog zhi ba zab mo dang /_/mthong bar dka' bar rab tu ston/_/rtag 
[\[295a.7\]]pa dang ni de bzhin du/_/chad pa 'ang rab tu spangs gyur cing /_/mtshan ma thams cad spangs pa'i chos/_/srog chags rnams la ston par mdzad/_/gang la 'jig rten mi gnas pa'i/_/stong nyid mtshan ma med pa dang /_/smon par byed pa ma yin pa'i/_/yang dag mtha' ni 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]rab tu ston/_/rtags med mtshan ma yod min zhing /_/skye med 'byung ba med pa dang /_/'ong ba med cing 'gro med pa'i/_/chos ni mkhas pa ston par mdzad/_/zad med 'byung ba yod min zhing /_/rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med dang /_/bltar med mtshan ma yod min pa/_/ston kyang 
[\[295b.2\]]rlom pa'i sems mi mnga'/_/sems can gang yang skye med cing /_/'ga' yang 'chi ba yod ma yin/_/mya ngan 'das pa'ang gang yang med/_/sems can 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin/_/skad kyis chos rnams bstan byas kyang /_/skad la rten pa yod min zhing /_/yi ge rnams 
[\[295b.3\]]dang bral ba'i chos/_/mi yi 'dren pa ston par mdzad/_/gang la rlung ni mi gnas shing /_/chu dang me yang mi dmigs la/_/sar yang rtog pa med pa'i chos/_/spyan dang ldan pa ston par mdzad/_/gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang /_/'du byed rnams dang rnam shes ni/_/stong 
[\[295b.4\]]zhing phung po lnga po dag_/dngos po med pa ston par mdzad/_/mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/_/lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid/_/rang bzhin stong par ston mdzad kyang /_/stong pa de yang dmigs su med/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri rnams dang /_/ro dang reg bya yid 'ong ba/_/de dag rnam 
[\[295b.5\]]par rtog pas bskyed/_/rtog pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa yin/_/de ltar sangs rgyas skyob pa ni/_/srog chags rnams la chos ston gyis/_/gang dag sdug bsngal thar 'dod pa/_/de dag rnam 'dren drung du shog_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa de dag gis stong 
[\[295b.6\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis chos bstan pas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams las lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/
[\[295b.7\]]lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis ni 'dod chags dang bral ba rjes su thob po/_/lha'i bu sa ya phrag gsum dang nyis 'bum ni byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i lha'i bu khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs de dag gis lha'i bu gang dag yang dag par bskul ba de dag las lha'i bu 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[296a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po 
[\[296a.3\]]dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dag dang /_phye ma dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor to/_/steng gi bar snang la yang lha'i glu dbyangs mang po dag rab tu len par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[296a.4\]]'dir gang du lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba/_gzi brjid che ba dag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang med pa de snyed kyi lha'i bu dag 'dus par gyur cing gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang me tog dag gis pus mo 
[\[296a.5\]]nub tsam du khebs par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang /_lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_lha'i bu dri med dang /_lha'i bu ngo tsha shes pa'i nor can zhes bya ba lha bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag 
[\[296a.6\]]gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas kyi phyi rol nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te/_me tog man dA ra ba'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo/_/me tog man dA ra ba'i 
[\[296a.7\]]char de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas su me tog gi phung po 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa kun nas gnas par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs ji lta bus byin gyis brlabs na 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i steng gi bar snang la me tog gi dra ba kun nas bkram par gyur to/_/me tog gi 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun du khyab par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[296b.2\]]rang gi gnas nas byung ste/_smon lam las byung ba'i stan la 'dug go_/de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/_/lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la 
[\[296b.3\]]gtugs so//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag su dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_shes par dka' ba'i 
[\[296b.4\]]gzhi rnams dang /_gnas med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_spros pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_spros pa dang bral ba'i gzhi rnams dang /_brjod du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_bstan du med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_zab mo'i gzhi rnams dang /_bden pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_
[\[296b.5\]]chags pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_mi phyed pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_stong pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_smon pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_de bzhin nyid bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i gzhi rnams dang /_chos kyi 
[\[296b.6\]]dbyings kyi gzhi rnams dang /_mtshungs pa med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_blang ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_dor ba med pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gzhi rnams dang /_chos kyi gzhi rnams dang /_dge 'dun gyi gzhi rnams dang /_ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa 
[\[296b.7\]]'thob pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_khams gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi rnams dang /_chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_chos thams cad skye ba med par bstan pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_seng ge'i gzhi rnams dang /_dpa' bo'i gzhi rnams dang /_gzhi med pa'i 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]gzhi de dag bstan pa na snod du 'gyur ba ni su yod snyam mo/_/de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du sems te/_lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas 'di ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_zab mo la bzod pa/_thogs pa med pa'i spobs 
[\[297a.2\]]pa dang ldan pa yin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag 'di dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu khyod ni zab mo la bzod pa/_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 
[\[297a.3\]]dang ldan pa yin na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kho bo dang lhan cig tu dri ba bstan pa bshad par nus sam/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gal te khyod gsung bar mi mdzad/_
[\[297a.4\]]rjod par mi mdzad/_'don par mi mdzad cing yi ge yang mi rjod/_sgra yang mi gsan pa lta na bdag gis de bzhin bstan par bgyi'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gal te khyod nyan par mi byed/_'dzin par mi byed/_'chang bar mi byed/_kun chub par mi byed/_sems 
[\[297a.5\]]par mi byed/_rig par mi byed/_rnam par shes par mi byed/_len par mi byed/_gtong bar mi byed cing thos nas kyang gzhan dag la ston par mi byed pa lta na kho bos kyang de bzhin bstan par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni yi ge med pa/_sems med pa/_

[\[297a.7\]]gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu kho bo ni nyan par 'dod pa rnams la chos ston par mi byed de/_'dzin par 'dod pa rnams la yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu bdag tu 'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur la/_sems can du 'dzin pa dang /_srog tu 'dzin pa dang /_gang zag tu 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]'dzin na nyan 'dod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa de ni 'di snyam du 'di ni ston par byed pa'o/_/bdag ni nyan pa'o/_/'di ni bshad par bya ba'o snyam du sems pas de ni chags pa gsum gyis chags pa yin te/_gsum gang zhe na/_
[\[297b.2\]]bdag tu dmigs pa dang /_sems can du dmigs pa dang /_chos su dmigs pa'o/_/lha'i bu gang la ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa med pa de ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas chos ston par byed de/_rnam par rtog par mi byed/_sems par mi byed de/_rlom sems su

[\[297b.4\]]par mi byed pa dang /_chos su dmigs pa med cing rnam par rtog par mi byed/_rlom sems su mi byed/_sems par mi byed pa ste/_lha'i bu gang dag de ltar nyan pa de dag ni mnyam par nyan pa yin te/_mi mnyam par nyan pa ma yin no/_/lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis smras 
[\[297b.5\]]pa/_'jam dpal ci nas kyang mi ldog pa nyid kyi slad du bstan pa bshad pa legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu ci rung rnam par ma rtog shig_/byang chub sems dpa' gang ldog pa de ni/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_byang chub kyang dmigs su 
[\[297b.6\]]med do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gang las ldog_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'dod chags las ldog go_/zhe sdang las ldog go_/gti mug las ldog go_/sred pa las ldog go_/ma rig pa las ldog go_/'khor bar skye ba'i yan lag bcu

[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa las ldog go_/rtog pa las ldog go_/'dzin pa las ldog go_/mtshan ma las ldog go_/dngos por 'dzin pa las ldog go_/chad par lta ba las ldog go_/rtag par lta ba las ldog go_/blang ba las ldog go_/dor

[\[298a.3\]]go_/'jig tshogs las ldog go_/'jig tshogs la lta ba las ldog go_/'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las ldog go_/sgrib pa dag las ldog go_/phung po lngar 'dzin pa las ldog go_/phyi dang nang gi skye mched thams cad las 
[\[298a.4\]]ldog go_/khams rnams las ldog go_/sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa las ldog go_/chos su 'du shes pa las ldog go_/dge 'dun du 'du shes pa las ldog go_/bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/bdag chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/bdag sems can grol bar

[\[298a.6\]]rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do/_/mtshan rnams la rtogs par mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnams la rtog par mi byed do/_/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa la rtog par mi byed cing rtog pa thams cad las 
[\[298a.7\]]ldog ste/_lha'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang de las ldog pa de ni mi ldog pa yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gang las mi ldog_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las mi ldog go_/stong pa nyid las mi ldog go_/mtshan 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]ma med pa las mi ldog go_/smon pa med pa las mi ldog go_/de bzhin nyid las mi ldog go_/chos kyi dbyings las mi ldog go_/yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi ldog go_/mnyam pa nyid las mi ldog go_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[298b.2\]]gang rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa'i chos de dag las ldog pa de ni des na ldog pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa de ci gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag mchis pa zhig gam/_'on te ma mchis pa zhig gam/_'on te mchis pa dang ma mchis pa zhig gam/_
[\[298b.3\]]'on te mchis pa yang ma lags ma mchis pa yang ma lags pa zhig lags/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang dag las ldog pa'i chos de dag ni yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin/_yod pa dang med pa yang ma yin/_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma 
[\[298b.4\]]yin pa yang ma yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'o na gang las ldog_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang /_legs pa ma yin par 'dzin pa dang /_log par 'dzin pa gang yin pa de 'dzin par mi byed/_yongs su 
[\[298b.5\]]gtong bar mi byed/_mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya ste/_de ni yod par yang bstan par mi bya/_med par yang bstan par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te yod pa dang med pa las ldog par gyur na de ni skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te 
[\[298b.6\]]yod pa las ldog par gyur na rtag par 'gyur la med pa las ldog par gyur na chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa dang chad pa'i phyir chos ston par mi mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni rtag pa'i phyir yang ma yin/_chad 
[\[298b.7\]]pa'i phyir yang ma yin no/_/lha'i bu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni sngon ma byung bar gyur pa'o zhes 'du shes kyis yod pa ma yin par yongs su shes par zad kyi/_de la ni chad pa yang med/_rtag pa yang med de/_lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ldog pa yin no/_/bstan pa 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]'di bshad pa na lha'i bu khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen 
[\[299a.2\]]bkur bgyi ba dang /_zhu ba dang /_zhu blag bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhud kyis gshegs so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa la ma spyod cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin to/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[299a.3\]]dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de gang na bzhugs/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de mi gda'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gal te khyod kyis thams cad mthong na des de bzhin 
[\[299a.4\]]gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i slad du de skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa de ni kho bos blangs zin te/_de ni kho bo'i mdun na bzhugs so zhes gsung /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_kho bo'i 
[\[299a.5\]]mdun zhes bya ba ci zhig yin snyam/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de yang 'di lta ste/_nam mkha'i khams yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 
[\[299a.6\]]mnyam pa'i phyir nam mkha' ji lta bu yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa yang de lta bu yin pas nam mkha' dang de bzhin gshegs pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu de lta bas na/_khyod de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod na 
[\[299a.7\]]mtha' 'di khong du chud par bya zhing cung zad kyang rnam par brtag par mi bya'o/_/de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/_ka ba bzhi pa/_cha mnyam pa/_shin tu mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_sum khri nyis stong mngon 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]par sprul to/_/khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu rin po che'i khri stan lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyis bshams pa dag kyang sprul cing khri stan re re la yang byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dag sprul to/_/
[\[299b.2\]]de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji lta bus byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs nas 'di lta bur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni rnam par spyod pa'i pad ma gang dag yin pa de dag dang /_
[\[299b.3\]]khang pa brtsegs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar byed cing phyogs bzhi kun nas 
[\[299b.4\]]'khor bar 'khod do/_/de nas pad ma de dag la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dag na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la sgra dbyangs 'thun par 
[\[299b.5\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/gang gA'i bye snyed bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang khyod kyis mchod/_/byang chub mchog gi spyad pa btsal mdzad pas/_/de slad mi mchog khyod ni mdzes pa lags/_/thub pa mtshan gyis 
[\[299b.6\]]yongs su spras gyur pa/_/sku mchog srid pa gsum na lhang nge ste/_/'dren pa gang la mi dang srog dang ni/_/gang zag ma mchis chos ni 'gro la ston/_/rnam par 'dren pas sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad/_/bzod pa brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan bsten/_/khyod 
[\[299b.7\]]kyi shes rab srid gsum thogs mi mnga'/_/ye shes mthar byon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig chos rje lha dang mis mchod pa'i/_/'jig rten 'dren pa la ni 'dud 'gyur zhing /_/stong pa nyid la mos par bgyid pa yi/_/mi de 'jig rten dag gi 'dren par 'gyur/_/
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]gang dag sngon byung de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_/gang dag phyogs rnams bzhugs pa'i 'dren pa dag_/de dag gis ni mtshan med ston pa'i chos/_/rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis rtag tu bsgoms/_/'di la rang bzhin sems can gang yang ni/_/
[\[300a.2\]]skye dang 'chi ba dmigs su ma mchis shing /_/'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis te/_/chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin no/_/ji ltar mi yis sgyu ma bstan gyur pa/_/snang yang de bzhin nyid du ma mchis ltar/_/de bzhin chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra ba dang /_/rmi lam 
[\[300a.3\]]lta bur bde bar gshegs pas bstan/_/gang zag la las gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/'jig rten khams rnams 'dir ni sbyin byas dang /_/'dus byas stong par bzod pa gang lags pa/_/bzod pa de ni sbyin las khyad par 'phags/_/byang chub 'dod pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[300a.4\]]dpa' yis/_/bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/me tog spos dang de bzhin zas skom dag_/phul nas mi mchog sangs rgyas mchod pa bas/_/gang gis gang la mi dang srog dang ni/_/gang zag ma mchis de 'dra'i chos 'di dag_/thos nas de la 'od gsal 
[\[300a.5\]]bzod thob pa/_/de yis mi rnams dam pa mchod pa lags/_/gang la mi dang gang zag 'du shes mchis/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por zas skom dang /_/shing rta dpung chung khri stan sbyin bgyis kyang /_/des ni 'di la grol ba mi 'thob po/_/mi mchog gang dag mya ngan 'das pa 
[\[300a.6\]]dang /_/de dag gis kyang sems can mang bkrol ba/_/mkhas rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal stong pa yi/_/chos rnams de ltar mkhyen pas rnam par grol/_/sangs rgyas 'byung dang yul du gnas pa dang /_/de bzhin bstan la dad pa thob par dka'/_/mi yi srid pa'ang snyed par 
[\[300a.7\]]dka' bas na/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan la legs brtson gyis/_/mi khom brgyad po thams cad rnam spangs shing /_/khom pa phun sum rnyed dka' thob gyur la/_/bde gshegs bstan la dad pa rnyed gyur pa'i/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis rigs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod/_/sgra la 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]'chel cing 'dug par ma byed par/_/chos thos gyur nas rtag tu nan tan gyis/_/khyed kyis rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas bsten la/_/des ni mi rnams dam par 'gyur bar byos/_/chos smra'i dge bshes gang yin bsten gyis la/_/sdig pa'i grogs la lan 'ga'ang ma bsten cig_/
[\[300b.2\]]sems can kun la sems ni mnyam gyis la/_/sems can de la nam yang ma rlom shig_/tshul khrims ldan dang mang du thos gyis la/_/rtag tu phyag dar khrod dang bsod snyoms spyod/_/g.yel ba med par shing drung sten gyis la/_/bkus te bor ba mchog la ma smod cig_/
[\[300b.3\]]'dus byas 'di dag thams cad 'dus byas min/_/mtshan nyid gcig cing smig rgyu 'dra ba yin/_/dam pa'i don gyi mu gcig shes gyis la/_/myur du gzhal yas byang chub reg par gyis/_/phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma bzhin du ltos/_/nang gi skye mched drug dang phyi yi drug_/
[\[300b.4\]]de dag grong stong 'dra bar gsungs pas na/_/de la nam yang bsten par ma byed cig_/'dod chags zhe sdang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/_/gti mug nga rgyal yongs su rtog pas bskyed/_/rtog pa de yang ma byung 'byung med par/_/de ltar shes na 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[300b.5\]]sprul pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa na 'khor de la srog chags nyi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong sum brgya 
[\[300b.6\]]ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/dge slong ma sum stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/dge bsnyen bdun stong dang /_dge bsnyen ma stong dang /_lha'i bu nyi khri bdun 
[\[300b.7\]]stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/byang chub sems dpa' sum brgyas ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_g.yos/_rab 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_ldeg_/rab tu ldeg_/kun tu rab tu ldeg go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 
[\[301a.2\]]gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs pad ma dag dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag na mchis pa 'di rnams chos zab mo 'di lta bu ston par bgyid pa dang /_'khor 'di yang 
[\[301a.3\]]snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa dang /_lha'i bu bye ba phrag 'di snyed 'dus pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po 'dus pa 'di dag su'i mthu lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[301a.4\]]stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mthu yin te/_des bkod pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun du snang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar deng de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lha'i bu blo gros rab gnas dang lhan 
[\[301a.5\]]cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhu zhing zhu blag byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[301a.6\]]la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'khor 'dus pa 'di na mi gda'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod re shig sdod cig dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 
[\[301a.7\]]de'u re bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang /_bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bkod pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[301b.2\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud kyi gnas bye ba brgya phrag ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mog mog por gyur to/_/bdud sdig can de dag kyang rang rang gi lus rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs par gyur nas lag pa 'khar ba la rten cing 'gro bar gyur to/_/de dag 
[\[301b.3\]]gis lha'i bu mo rnams kyang rgas shing gtugs la 'khogs par gyur pa dang /_rang rang gi gzhal med khang dag kyang rnyings shing rab tu 'jig la mun pa mun gnag tu gyur par mthong ngo /_/de nas bdud sdig can de dag skrag cing dngangs la yi chad cing sgyid lug ste/_spu'i 
[\[301b.4\]]khung bu zing zhes byed par gyur nas 'di snyam du rnam par rtog ste/_gang gis bdag cag bdud kyi gnas rnams 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang yin/_rkyen ni gang yin/_bdag cag 'di nas 'chi 'pho zhing med pa 'am gcig tu mi 'gyur grang snyam 
[\[301b.5\]]mo/_/bdud de dag gi rnam par rtog pa de lta bu de skyes ma thag tu de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu sprul pa ther 'bum sprul te/_bdud de dag gi mdun du bkod do/_/de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs 
[\[301b.6\]]po dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba de da ltar bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de'i mthu yin te/_khyed la 'tshe ba 'ga' yang 'byung 
[\[301b.7\]]bar mi 'gyur gyis ma skrag shig_/lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/_de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis sgra de yang thos/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming yang thos nas yang rgya cher dngangs shing skrag ste/_bdud kyi gnas de dag 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos so/_/de nas bdud sdig can de dag gis lha'i bu sprul pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag yongs su skyobs shig_/grogs po dag yongs su skyobs shig_/de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis 
[\[302a.2\]]bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig_/grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig_/khyed cag deng la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la 
[\[302a.3\]]ba der song shig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje dang ldan pa de ni sems can 'jigs par gyur pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol bar mdzad do/_/de nas lha'i bu sprul pa de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bdud sdig 
[\[302a.4\]]can 'khor bdud sdig can 'bum phrag ther 'bum du ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad rgas shing 'khogs nas gzer cing lag pa 'khor ba la rten bzhin du 'dong zhing skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[302a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_bde bar 
[\[302a.6\]]gshegs pa bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa ni mi mngon lags kyi/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming ni de lta ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'jam dpal 
[\[302a.7\]]gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos na bdag cag 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur te/_'chi 'pho ba snyam du 'tshal cing ma mchis par 'gyur ba snyam du 'tshal ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]can dag de de bzhin no/_/ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin pa dang /_rnam par dbye ba med par sems can rnams kyi don byas pa dang /_byed par 'gyur ba de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyis kyang sems can rnams kyi 
[\[302b.2\]]don ma mdzad mi mdzad pas de'i phyir ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gcig pu'i ming yongs su bsgrags pa de ltar sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pas ni khyed cag sdug bsngal zhing rnam par 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[302b.3\]]bdud sdig can de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'di ltar lus 'khogs pa 'dis nyam thag cing ngo tsha lags pas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sngon bdag cag gi kha dog rgyas par gyur pa gang lags pa de lta bu 'tshal lags so/_/bcom 
[\[302b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ongs kyi bar du re shig 'di nyid du sdong cig dang /_des khyed cag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di las yongs su thar bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_
[\[302b.5\]]stan las langs nas byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du mas kyang yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar/_lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po 'bum 
[\[302b.6\]]phrag du ma sil snyan 'bum phrag mang po dag rab tu gsil zhing me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po'i char dag rab tu 'bebs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_bkod pa chen po dang /_rnam par rtse ba chen pos 
[\[302b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug gam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das snyoms par 'jug lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[303a.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa gang las thos/_khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs nas ji srid cig lon/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 
[\[303a.3\]]bsgrubs pa de thos shing bdag gis ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs pa de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu thugs bskyed par yang ma gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis gang la ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pa de thos pa'i de bzhin 
[\[303a.4\]]gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_grangs ma mchis pa'i yang ches grangs ma mchis pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de 
[\[303a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa me tog man dA ra ba'i dri zhes bgyi ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung ste/_de ting nge 'dzin 
[\[303a.6\]]bsgrubs pa de gsung bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa de las bdag gis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs pa de thos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal bsgrubs pa de dag gang 
[\[303a.7\]]yin/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu dang ldan na bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/_nyi shu gang lags she na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]sems dpa' 'dod chags rnam par 'jig cing 'dod chags kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_zhe sdang rnam par 'jig cing zhe sdang gi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_gti mug rnam par 'jig cing gti mug gi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_
[\[303b.2\]]phrag dog rnam par 'jig cing phrag dog gi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_nga rgyal rnam par 'jig cing nga rgyal gyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_'chab pa rnam par 'jig cing 'chab pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_khro ba rnam 
[\[303b.3\]]par 'jig cing khro ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba rnam par 'jig cing yongs su gdung ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_'du shes rnam par 'jig cing 'du shes kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_lta ba 
[\[303b.4\]]rnam par 'jig cing lta ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_rtog pa rnam par 'jig cing rtog pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_len pa rnam par 'jig cing len pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_'dzin pa rnam par 'jig 
[\[303b.5\]]cing 'dzin pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_mtshan ma rnam par 'jig cing mtshan ma'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_srid pa rnam par 'jig cing srid pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_rtag pa rnam par 'jig cing rtag pa'i 
[\[303b.6\]]sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_chad pa rnam par 'jig cing chad pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_phung po rnam par 'jig cing phung po'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_khams rnam par 'jig cing khams kyi sems rnam 
[\[303b.7\]]par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_skye mched rnam par 'jig cing skye mched kyi sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_khams gsum pa rnam par 'jig cing khams gsum pa la dmigs pa'i sems rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]sems dpa' rnam pa nyi shu po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/_bzhi gang lags she na/_lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[304a.2\]]g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang /_zab pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting 
[\[304a.3\]]nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/_bzhi gang lags she na/_slu ba ma mchis pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig gis dam 'cha' ba dang /_'du shes kyi dbang gi spyod yul ma lags pa dang /_chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de 
[\[304a.4\]]dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/_bzhi gang lags she na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po spong ba dang /_sbyangs pa dang /_
[\[304a.5\]]tshul khrims dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang ldan pa dang /_'du 'dzi ma mchis par spyod pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi 
[\[304a.6\]]dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/_bzhi gang lags she na/_tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /_tshul khrims ma dral ba dang /_tshul khrims mi rten pa dang /_tshul khrims nag nog ma mchis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de 
[\[304a.7\]]dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob ste/_bzhi gang lags she na/_nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spong ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la lhag par mi dmigs pa 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]dang /_bzod pa la gnas pa dang /_sems can la rlom sems ma mchis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin 
[\[304b.2\]]de 'thob ste/_bzhi gang lags she na/_stong pa nyid kyi chos sgom zhing gang zag la rlom sems ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa sgom zhing mtshan ma yongs su spong ba dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa sgom zhing smon pa'i sems yongs su spong ba dang /_cho ga 'tshal 
[\[304b.3\]]cing dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang bzhi ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa de dag dang chos de dag dang ldan na bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin de 'thob bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin 
[\[304b.4\]]gshegs pa me tog man dA ra'i dris ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de rab tu bstan te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de las ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa de thos shing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man dA ra'i dri de'i 'og tu de bzhin 
[\[304b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu dang /_rin po che dang /_glog dang /_nyi zla thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba byung bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs so/_/
[\[304b.6\]]bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' khris ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji tsam du ting nge 'dzin de legs par 
[\[304b.7\]]bsgrubs shing ting nge 'dzin de bsgrubs pas bdud sdig can 'di dag mi sdug pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bur bgyis pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]bu 'di snyam du sems/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'ba' zhig gi bdud sdig can 'di dag 'di ltar mi sdug pa'i rnam par byas so snyam na shA ri'i bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta 
[\[305a.2\]]ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bdud sdig can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[305a.3\]]'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs 'di thong la/_ci nas kyang bdud sdig can 'di dag sngon gyi kha dog rgyas pa dang ldan par 'gyur bar gyis shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyis 
[\[305a.4\]]brlabs de btang ngo /_/byin gyis brlabs de btang ma thag tu de nas bdud sdig can de dag sngon gyi kha dog rgyas pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can de dag dang /_bdud kyi 'khor de dag la smras pa/_sdig can dag gang la mig dang /_
[\[305a.5\]]gang la mig gi 'du shes dang /_gang la mig tu lhag par 'dzin pa dang /_gang la mig gi mtshan ma dang /_gang la mig tu lhag par dmigs pa dang /_gang la mig tu mngon par chags pa dang /_gang la mig gi rlom sems dang /_gang la mig bdag gir 'dzin pa 
[\[305a.6\]]dang /_gang la mig gi rten dang /_gang la mig la mngon par zhen pa dang /_gang la mig gi spros pa dang /_gang la mig nga'i ba nyid dang /_gang la mig kun du srung ba dang /_gang la mig sgom pa dang /_gang la mig blang ba dang /_gang la mig dor ba dang /_gang la 
[\[305a.7\]]mig tu rtog pa dang /_gang la mig tu sems pa dang /_gang la mig yongs su 'grub pa dang /_gang la mig 'gog pa dang /_gang la mig skye ba dang /_gang la mig tu 'dzin pa dang /_gang la mig 'ong ba yod pa de la ni khyed bdud kyi las bar chad byed pa'i yul yod 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]do/_/sdig can dag de bzhin du gang la rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos dang /_gang la chos kyi 'du shes dang /_gang la chos su lhag par 'dzin pa dang /_gang la chos 
[\[305b.2\]]kyi mtshan ma dang /_gang la chos su lhag par dmigs pa dang /_gang la chos su mngon par chags pa dang /_gang la chos kyi rlom sems dang /_gang la chos bdag gir 'dzin pa dang /_gang la chos kyi rten dang /_gang la chos la mngon par zhen pa dang /_gang la 
[\[305b.3\]]chos kyi spros pa dang /_gang la chos nga'i ba nyid dang /_gang la chos kun du srung ba dang /_gang la chos sgom pa dang /_gang la chos blang ba dang /_gang la chos dor ba dang /_gang la chos su rtog pa dang /_gang la chos su sems pa dang /_gang la chos yongs su 'grub 
[\[305b.4\]]pa dang /_gang la chos 'gog pa dang /_gang la chos skye ba dang /_gang la chos su 'dzin pa dang /_gang la chos 'ong ba yod pa de la ni khyed bdud kyi las bar chad byed pa'i yul yod do/_/sdig can dag gang la mig med pa dang /_gang la mig gi 'du shes med pa dang /_
[\[305b.5\]]gang la mig tu lhag par 'dzin pa med pa dang /_gang la mig gi mtshan ma med pa dang /_gang la mig tu lhag par dmigs pa med pa dang /_gang la mig tu mngon par chags pa med pa dang /_gang la mig gi rlom sems med pa dang /_gang la mig bdag gir 'dzin 
[\[305b.6\]]pa med pa dang /_gang la mig gi rten med pa dang /_gang la mig la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_gang la mig gi spros pa med pa dang /_gang la mig nga'i ba nyid med pa dang /_gang la mig kun tu srung ba med pa dang /_gang la mig sgom pa med pa dang /_gang la mig 
[\[305b.7\]]blang ba med pa dang /_gang la mig dor ba med pa dang /_gang la mig tu rtog pa med pa dang /_gang la mig tu sems pa med pa dang /_gang la mig yongs su 'grub pa med pa dang /_gang la mig 'gog pa med pa dang /_gang la mig skye ba med pa dang /_gang la mig tu 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]'dzin pa med pa dang /_gang la mig 'ong ba med pa de la ni khyed kyi gnas med do/_/yul med do/_/bdag po med do/_/stobs med do/_/dbang phyug med do/_/mthus gzung ba med do/_/sdig can dag de bzhin du gang la rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce 
[\[306a.2\]]dang /_lus dang /_yid dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos med pa dang /_gang la chos kyi 'du shes med pa dang /_gang la chos su lhag par 'dzin pa med pa dang /_gang la chos kyi mtshan ma med pa dang /_gang la chos su 
[\[306a.3\]]lhag par dmigs pa med pa dang /_gang la chos su mngon par chags pa med pa dang /_gang la chos kyi rlom sems med pa dang /_gang la chos bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa dang /_gang la chos kyi rten med pa dang /_gang la chos la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_gang 
[\[306a.4\]]la chos kyi spros pa med pa dang /_gang la chos nga'i ba nyid med pa dang /_gang la chos kun tu srung ba med pa dang /_gang la chos sgom pa med pa dang /_gang la chos blang ba med pa dang /_gang la chos dor ba med pa dang /_gang la chos su rtog pa med pa dang /_gang la chos su 
[\[306a.5\]]sems pa med pa dang /_gang la chos yongs su 'grub pa med pa dang /_gang la chos 'gog pa med pa dang /_gang la chos skye ba med pa dang /_gang la chos su 'dzin pa med pa dang /_gang la chos 'ong ba med pa de la ni khyed kyi gnas med do/_/yul med do/_/bdag 
[\[306a.6\]]po med do/_/stobs med do/_/dbang phyug med do/_/mthus gzung ba med do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de lta de ltar chos bstan pa des bdud kyi 'khor de las bdud khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/bdud 
[\[306a.7\]]kyi 'khor de las bdud brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di mchis 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]lags kyi/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa de lta bu de dag mthong bar dka' ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 
[\[306b.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'khor 'di phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag blta bar 'dod kyis khyod kyis ston cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' chos dang /_chos 'phags dang /_chos kyi blo gros dang /_
[\[306b.3\]]nyi ma dang /_bdud kyi mtshon cha dang /_'jam dbyangs dang /_sdig pa zhi dang /_zhi ba srung dang /_rnam rgyal srung dang /_chos rgyal rnam bsgrags dang /_de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag gi rang rang gi sangs rgyas 
[\[306b.4\]]kyi zhing dag na byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus ci 'dra ba de lta bur khyed cag rang rang gi lus ston cig_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_langs 
[\[306b.5\]]nas kyang rang rang gi lus dag bstan to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi lus ni ri rab tsam mo/_/kha cig gi lus ni dpag tshad brgyad khri tsam mo/_/kha cig gi lus ni dpag tshad bdun khri dang /_drug khri dang /_lnga khri dang /_bzhi khri dang /_sum khri dang /_
[\[306b.6\]]nyi khri dang /_khri tsam mo/_/kha cig gi lus ni dpag tshad lnga stong dang /_bzhi stong dang /_sum stong dang /_nyis stong dang /_stong tsam mo/_/kha cig gi lus ni dpag tshad lnga brgya dang /_bzhi brgya dang /_sum brgya dang /_nyis brgya dang /_brgya tsam mo/_/kha cig 
[\[306b.7\]]gi lus ni dpag tshad lnga bcu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_sum cu dang /_nyi shu dang /_bcu tsam mo/_/kha cig gi lus ni dpag tshad lnga dang /_bzhi dang /_gsum dang /_gnyis dang /_gcig tsam mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi lus ni 'jig rten 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i sems can rnams kyi lus ji tsam par khru phyed dang bzhi tsam ste/_de dag gi lus de lta bu dag kun du snang ngo /_/de'i tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang du byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid che ba gzi 
[\[307a.2\]]brjid che ba sha stag gis khyab par ma gyur pa'i sa phyogs ni tha na 'khar ba gzugs pa'i gtos tsam yang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'od kyis kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum dag snang bar gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[307a.3\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas 
[\[307a.4\]]zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[307a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus shig dang /_ngas zhus pa de dang /_de nyid kyi lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[307a.6\]]pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi na/_bcom ldan 
[\[307a.7\]]'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/'jam 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]dpal gang dag rtogs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i chos thams cad po de dag gang zhe na/_'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpas mig rtogs par byed do/_/rna ba rtogs par byed do/_/sna rtogs par byed do/_/lce rtogs par 
[\[307b.2\]]byed do/_/lus rtogs par byed do/_/yid rtogs par byed do/_/'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' mig rtogs par byed/_ji ltar rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid rtogs par byed ce na/_'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpas 
[\[307b.3\]]mig rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar rtogs par byed kyang rtogs so snyam du rnam par mi rtog go_/rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar rtogs par byed kyang rtogs so snyam du rnam par mi rtog go_/gzugs rnams dang /_sgra rnams 
[\[307b.4\]]dang /_dri rnams dang /_ro rnams dang /_reg bya rnams dang /_chos rnams rang bzhin gyis stong zhes bya bar rtogs par byed kyang rtogs so snyam du rnam par mi rtog go_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dag rtogs par byed do/_/
[\[307b.5\]]ji ltar rtogs par byed ce na/_stong pa nyid dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/mtshan ma med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/smon pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/'dod chags dang bral ba dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/zhi ba dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/dben pa dag tu 
[\[307b.6\]]rtogs par byed do/_/dngos po med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/g.yo ba med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/skye ba med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/'ong ba med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/'gro ba med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/ngo bo nyid med pa 
[\[307b.7\]]dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/bdag po med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/rnam par rig pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/shes pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/mthong ba med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/ma skyes pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]spros pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/bdag gi med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/rtog pas kun nas bslang ba dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/rnam par rtogs pas kun nas bslang ba dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dag tu 
[\[308a.2\]]rtogs par byed do/_/sgyu ma lta bu dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/rmi lam lta bu dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/mig yor lta bu dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/brag ca lta bu dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/chu shing gi snying po lta bu dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/ring du mi gnas pa 
[\[308a.3\]]dag dang /_snying po med pa dag dang /_gsog dag dang /_gsob dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'dod chags rtogs par byed do/_/zhe sdang rtogs par byed do/_/gti mug rtogs par byed do/_/ji ltar rtogs par 
[\[308a.4\]]byed ce na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dag ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba yin par rtogs par byed de/_yongs su rtog pa de dag kyang stong pa dag dang /_med pa dag dang /_dngos po med pa dag dang /_spros pa med pa dag dang /_rnam par 
[\[308a.5\]]rig pa med pa dag tu rtogs par byed do/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'dod pa'i khams rtogs par byed do/_/gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams rtogs par byed do/_/ji ltar rtogs par byed ce na/_bdag med pa dang /_stong 
[\[308a.6\]]pa dang /_dben par rnam par rtogs par byed do/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi spyod pa rtogs par byed do/_/ji ltar rtogs par byed ce na/_sems can 'di dag ni 'dod chags spyad pa'o/_/'di dag ni zhe sdang spyad pa'o/_/'di 
[\[308a.7\]]dag ni gti mug spyad pa'o/_/'di dag ni cha mnyam pa spyad pa'o zhes bya bar rtogs nas spyod pa la mkhas pa rtogs par byed de/_gang gi shes pa'i rnam par rig pa bstan pa gang yin pa de yang rtogs par byed cing rtogs nas kyang ji lta ji ltar de dag rnam par grol ba de 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]lta de ltar chos ston to/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad rtogs par byed do/_/ji ltar rtogs par byed ce na/_sems can thams cad ni ming tsam ste/_ming de yang g.yo ba med pa dang /_sems can 'di dag thams cad ni sems 
[\[308b.2\]]can gcig pa ste/_sems can de yang sems can med pa dang /_de ltar yang rnam par mi rtog pa ste/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rtogs par byed pa de'i tshe byang chub rtogs par byed pa yin no/_/de la 
[\[308b.3\]]'di skad ces bya ste/_mig dang rna ba de dag ni/_/rang bzhin stong par rtogs byed kyang /_/rtogs snyam rtog par mi byed pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/sna dang lce yang rang bzhin gyis/_/dngos po med par rtogs byed kyang /_/rtogs snyam rtog par mi byed 
[\[308b.4\]]pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/shes rab can gyis lus dang ni/_/yid ni stong par rtogs byed cing /_/rtogs nas yang dag ston byed pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag dang /_/ro dang reg bya yid 'ong rnams/_/thams 
[\[308b.5\]]cad stong par rtogs byed pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/gzugs dang tshor ba rtogs byed cing /_/'du shes kyang ni de bzhin te/_/'du byed rnams dang rnam shes ni/_/sgyu ma lta bur rtogs par byed/_/lnga phung rmi lam lta bu dang /_/mtshan nyid med par 
[\[308b.6\]]mtshan gcig par/_/rtogs kyang rtogs snyam mi rtog pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/nang ni byung ba ma yin te/_/spros pa med cing 'dus ma byas/_/de dag ming gis bstan pa ste/_/ming de dngos po yod ma yin/_/'dod chags zhe sdang kun rtog 
[\[308b.7\]]gis/_/kun nas bslang bar rtogs par byed/_/rtogs pa de yang 'byung min te/_/gtan du dngos po med pa yin/_/gti mug rnam par rtog las byung /_/rnam par rtog pa rgyu las skye/_/rgyu yang lta bas bskyed pa ste/_/lta ba de yang dmigs su med/_/khams 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]gsum thams cad stong pa ste/_/de ni med par rtogs par byed/_/'di na 'pho ba 'ga' med pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/'dod khams grub pa ma yin te/_/rnam par rtog pas kun nas bslang /_/gzugs dang gzugs med de bzhin te/_/
[\[309a.2\]]de dag thams cad yod ma yin/_/'dod chags spyod dang zhe sdang spyod/_/de bzhin gti mug spyod pa dang /_/sems can spyod pa gang yin pa/_/thams cad mkhas pas rtogs par byed/_/sems can thams cad sems can gcig_/sems can de yang yod min par/_/
[\[309a.3\]]shes rab can gyis de rtogs kyang /_/sems can de la rlom sems med/_/chos rnams kun gyi 'byung ba ni/_/phyin ci log las skye ba ste/_/gang dag phyin ci log rtog pa/_/de ni logs pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/shes pa kun la mkhas pa ni/_/gang gi sgra la'ang chags pa med/_/
[\[309a.4\]]chags pa med par rtogs gyur pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/rang gi sha rnams gtong byed kyang /_/de la gnas pa yod min zhing /_/ji bzhin rjes su rtogs gyur pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang bya/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin gyur kyang /_/tshul 
[\[309a.5\]]khrims la ni rlom sems med/_/sangs rgyas tshul don gang yin pa/_/skye med 'byung ba med pa yin/_/byams pas sems can khyab byed kyang /_/sems can dmigs su yod ma yin/_/sems can don ni rjes rtogs pa/_/de ni ming gis bstan pa yin/_/'dus byas kun la rnam 
[\[309a.6\]]sems pa'i/_/brtson 'grus rtsom la gnas gyur cing /_/'jig rten stong par rig nas ni/_/byang chub dam pa rtogs par byed/_/de ni bsam gtan sgom byed kyang /_/de la rten pa yod min zhing /_/gnas med dmigs pa yod min pa/_/de ltar mkhas pa sgom par 
[\[309a.7\]]byed/_/bag chags lta ba'i nyon mongs rnams/_/shes rab mtshon gyis gcod byed kyang /_/chos kyi dbyings la dbye ba dang /_/gcod pa'i rlom sems yod ma yin/_/
